h4.p: [03]^b^1-2^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pubbaṅgamā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0393^ea^^a^V2.0103^ea^ pubbecarā. Avijjā hi aññāṇalakkhaṇā sammuyhanākārena ārammaṇe pavattatīti sampayuttadhammānampi tadākārānuvidhānatāya paccayo hoti. Tathā hi te aniccāsubhadukkhānattasabhāvepi dhamme niccādito gaṇhanti, ayamassā tesaṃ sahajātavasena pubbaṅgamatā. Yaṃ pana mohena abhibhūto pāpakiriyāya ādīnavaṃ apassanto pāṇaṃ hanati, adinnaṃ ādiyati, kāmesu micchā carati, musā bhaṇati, aññampi vividhaṃ dussīlyaṃ ācarati, ayamassa sahajātavasena ca upanissayavasena ca pubbaṅgamatā. ^b^Samāpajjanāyā^eb^ti tabbhāvāpajjanāya ^a^V2.0104^ea^ akusalappattiyā. ^b^Sabhāvapaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti attalābhāya. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uppattiyā’’^eb^ti. Sā panesā vuttākārena akusalānaṃ pubbaṅgamabhūtā avijjā uppajjatīti sambandho. ^b^Yadeta^eb^nti yaṃ etaṃ pāpājigucchanatāya pāpato ^b^alajjanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ ahirikaṃ,^eb^ pāpānutrāsatāya ^b^pāpato abhāyanākārasaṇṭhitañca anottappaṃ, etaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0394^ea^ dvayaṃ ^b^anudeva^eb^ anvāgatameva. ^b^Anu^eb^-saddena cettha ^b^eta^eb^nti upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Anudevā^eb^ti etassa attho saheva ekatoti. Ettha avijjāya vuttanayānusārena tappaṭipakkhato ca attho veditabbo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – tattha yathā akusalakammapathavasena pavattiyaṃ pubbaṅgamatā avijjāya, evaṃ kusalakammapathavasena puññakiriyavatthuvasena ca pavattiyaṃ vijjāya pubbaṅgamatā vattabbā. Vīmaṃsādhipativasena pavattiyaṃ ādhipaccākāravasena ca pubbaṅgamatā veditabbā. Dvīhevāti ca avadhāraṇaṃ ādhipaccākārassa sahajāteneva saṅgahetabbato.

[03]^b^Lajjanākārasaṇṭhitā^eb^ti pāpato jigucchanākārasaṇṭhitā. ^b^Bhāyanākārasaṇṭhita^eb^nti uttasanākārasaṇṭhitaṃ. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti hiriottappe. Vidati, vindatīti vā ^b^vijjā. Viddasū^eb^ti ca sappaññapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘viddasunoti viduno’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yāthāvadiṭṭhī^eb^ti aviparītā diṭṭhi, saṃkilesato ^b^niyyānikadiṭṭhi. Sammādiṭṭhi pahotī^eb^ti ettha sā vijjā sammādiṭṭhi veditabbā. ^b^Na ekato sabbāni labbhanti^eb^ sammāvācākammantājīvānaṃ pubbābhisaṅkhārassa anekarūpattā. ^b^Lokuttaramaggakkhaṇe ekato labbhanti^eb^ kiccato bhinnānampi tāsaṃ tattha sarūpato abhinnattā. Ekā eva hi virati maggakkhaṇe tissannampi viratīnaṃ kiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati, yathā ekā eva sammādiṭṭhi parijānanādivasena catubbidhakiccaṃ sādhentī pavattati. Tāni ca kho sabbāni aṭṭhapi paṭhamajjhānike magge labbhantīti yojanā. ^b^Paṭhamajjhānike^eb^ti paṭhamajhānavante.

[03]^b^Tathābhūtassā^eb^ti ariyamaggasamaṅgino. ^b^Yasmā mahāsaḷāyatanasutte vuttaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ pañcannaṃ eva aṅgānaṃ vasenā’’ti, ^b^tasmā pañcaṅgiko lokuttaramaggo hoti^eb^. ‘‘Pubbeva kho panā’’ti hi vacanaṃ tadā maggakkhaṇe viratīnaṃ abhāvaṃ ñāpeti, tasmā kāmāvacaracittesu viya lokuttaracittesu virati aniyatāti adhippāyo. ^b^Parisuddhabhāvadassana^eb^nti parisuddhasīlabhāvadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Ayamattho dīpito,^eb^ na ariyamagge viratīnaṃ abhāvo.

[03]Yadi evaṃ kasmā abhidhamme maggavibhaṅge pañcaṅgikavāro āgatoti āha ^b^‘‘yampi abhidhamme’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ta^eb^nti ‘‘pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī’’ti vacanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Ekaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0395^ea^^b^kiccantaraṃ dassetuṃ vutta’’^eb^nti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yasmiñhi kāle’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Yasmiñhi kāle^eb^ti lokiyakāle ^a^V2.0105^ea^. Tena ‘‘ekaṃ kiccantara’’nti vuttaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikakiccaṃ dasseti. Viratiuppādanena micchāvācādīni puggalena maggasamaye pajahāpentīti sammādiṭṭhiādīni ‘‘pañca kārakaṅgānī’’ti vuttāni. Sammāvācādikiriyā hi virati, tañca etāni kārāpentīti. ^b^Virativasenā^eb^ti viramaṇakiriyāvasena kārāpakabhāvena, kattubhāvena vāti attho. ‘‘Viratittayavasenā’’ti vā pāṭho.

[03]^b^Sammākammanto pūratī^eb^ti imehi sammādiṭṭhiādīhi sammākammantakiccaṃ pūrati nāma tehi vīriyādikehi tadatthasiddhito. Tampi sandhāya ^b^‘‘ekaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetu’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Imaṃ kiccantaraṃ dassetu^eb^nti lokuttaramaggakkhaṇepi imāneva pañca sammāvācādiviratittayassa ekakkhaṇe kārāpakaṅgānīti dassetuṃ. ^b^Evaṃ vutta^eb^nti ‘‘tasmiṃ samaye pañcaṅgiko maggo hotī’’ti (vibha. 494) evaṃ vuttaṃ. Lokiyamaggakkhaṇe pañceva honti, virati pana aniyatā, tasmā ‘‘chāṅgiko’’ti avatvā ‘‘pañcaṅgiko’’icceva vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ abhidhamme pañcaṅgikavāradesanāya kāraṇakittanamaggo, ariyamaggo pana aṭṭhaṅgikovāti dassetuṃ, ^b^‘‘yā ca, bhikkhave’’^eb^tiādimāha, taṃ suviññeyyameva. Micchādiṭṭhiādikā dasa, tappaccayā akusalā ca dasāti vīsati akusalapakkhiyā, sammādiṭṭhiādikā dasa, tappaccayā kusalā ca dasāti vīsati kusalapakkhiyā mahācattārīsakasutte vuttā. ^b^Mahācattārīsaka^eb^nti tassetaṃ nāmaṃ. ^b^Missakova kathito^eb^ lokuttarassapi idha labbhamānattā.

[03]Yasmā kosalasaṃyuttepi idha ca therena ‘‘upaḍḍhamidaṃ, bhante, brahmacariyassā’’tiādinā vuttaṃ ‘‘mā hevaṃ ānandā’’tiādinā paṭikkhipitvā ‘‘sakalamevidaṃ ānandā’’tiādinā bhagavatā desitaṃ suttaṃ āgataṃ. Tassattho kosalasaṃyuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ vutto, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kosalasaṃyutte vuttatthamevā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Avijjāsuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^3^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sāvakabodhi ^a^M2.0396^ea^ sāvakapāramiyo, tappariyāpannaṃ ñāṇaṃ sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ, taṃ pana dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ tatthapi dhammasenāpatino eva savisesaṃ matthakaṃ pattaṃ, na itaresanti āha – ^b^‘‘sāvaka…pe… appattatāyā’’^eb^ti. Tasmā tassa matthakappattiyā maggabrahmacariye ijjhante tassa ekadeso idha ijjhati, na sakalanti. Na hi addhabrahmacariyaṃ nāma atthi, tasmā vuttaṃ, ^b^‘‘sakalampi^eb^^a^V2.0106^ea^^b^…pe… labbhatī’’^eb^ti, taṃ pana bhaṇḍāgāriko nāññāsi ñāṇassa sāvakavisayepi sappadesikattā, dhammasenāpati pana ñāṇassa tattha nippadesikattā aññāsīti. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘ānandatthero…pe… aññāsī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘sakalamidaṃ, bhante’’ti evaṃ avoca.
[06]Sāriputtasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^4^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vaḷavābhi^eb^-saddo vaḷavāpariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘catūhi vaḷavāhi yuttarathenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Yodharatho^eb^ti yodhehi yujjhanatthaṃ ārohitabbaratho. ^b^Alaṅkāraratho^eb^ maṅgaladivasesu alaṅkatapaṭiyattehi ārohitabbaratho. ^b^Ghanadukulena parivārito^eb^ti rajatapaṭṭavaṇṇena setadukulena paṭicchādito. Paṭicchādanattho hi idha parivārasaddo. ^b^Rajatapanāḷisuparikkhittā^eb^ setabhāvakaraṇatthaṃ.

[03]^b^Channaṃ channaṃ māsāna^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Ekavāraṃ nagaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ karotī^eb^ti idaṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare ṭhitena kātabbaṃ cārittaṃ. ^b^Nagarato na pakkantā^eb^ti nagarato bahi na gatā. Maṅgalavacane niyuttā ^b^maṅgalikā,^eb^ suvatthivacane niyuttā ^b^sovatthikā. Ādi^eb^-saddena thutimāgadhavandikācariyake saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Sukapattasadisāni^eb^ vaṇṇato.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇagīta^eb^nti thutigītaṃ. Brahmabhūtaṃ seṭṭhabhūtaṃ yānaṃ, brahmabhūtānaṃ seṭṭhabhūtānaṃ yānanti vā ^b^brahmayānaṃ. Vijitattā^eb^ visesena jinanato. ^b^Rāgaṃ vinayamānā pariyosāpetī^eb^ti sabbampi rāgaṃ samucchedavinayavasena vineti, attano kiccaṃ pariyosāpeti. Kiccapariyosāpaneneva hi sayampi ^a^M2.0397^ea^ pariyosānaṃ nipphattiṃ upagacchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pariyosānaṃ gacchati nipphajjatī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Dhura^eb^nti bhummatthe upayogavacananti āha ^b^‘‘tatramajjhattatāyuge yuttā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Īsā^eb^ti yugasandhārikā dāruyugaḷā. Yathā vā bāhiraṃ yugaṃ dhāreti, tassā ṭhitāya eva kiccasiddhi, evaṃ kiriyāvasena laddhabalena tatramajjhattatāyuge thiraṃ dhāreti, teheva ariyamaggarathassa pavattanaṃ. ^b^Hiri^eb^ggahaṇena cettha taṃsahacaraṇato ottappampi gahitaṃyeva hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘attanā saddhi’’^eb^ntiādi. Nāḷiyā minamāno puriso viya ārammaṇaṃ minātīti ^b^mano^eb^. Kataraṃ pana taṃ mano, kathañcassa yottasadisatāti āha ^b^‘‘vipassanācitta’’^eb^ntiādi. Tena yottaṃ viyāti yottanti dasseti. Lokiyavipassanācittaṃ atirekapaññāsa kusaladhamme ekābaddhe ekasaṅgahite karotīti sambandho. Te pana ‘‘phasso hoti…pe… avikkhepo hotī’’ti cittaṅgavasena ^b^dhammasaṅgahe^eb^ (dha. sa. 1) āgatanayeneva ^a^V2.0107^ea^ veditabbā. ^b^Lokuttaravipassanācitta^eb^nti maggacittaṃ āha. ^b^Atirekasaṭṭhī^eb^ti te eva sammākammantājīvehi anaññātaññassāmītindriyādīhi ca saddhiṃ atirekasaṭṭhi kusaladhamme. ^b^Ekābaddhe^eb^ti ekasmiṃ eva ārammaṇe ābaddhe. ^b^Ekasaṅgahe^eb^ti tatheva vipassanākiccavasena ekasaṅgahe karoti. Pubbaṅgamabhāvena ārakkhaṃ sāretīti ^b^ārakkhasārathī. ‘‘Yathā hi rathassa…pe… sārathī’’^eb^ti vatvā taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yoggiyo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhuraṃ vāheti^eb^ yogge. ^b^Yojeti^eb^ yogge samagatiyañca. ^b^Akkhaṃ abbhañjati^eb^ sukhappavattanatthaṃ. ^b^Rathaṃ peseti^eb^ yoggacodanena. ^b^Nibbisevane karoti^eb^ gamanavīthiyaṃ paṭipādanena sanniyojeti. ^b^Ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā^eb^ti ārakkhaṃ paccupaṭṭhapeti asammosasabhāvattā. ^b^Gatiyo^eb^ti pavattiyo, nipphattiyo vā. ^b^Samanvesatī^eb^ti gavesati.

[03]Ariyapuggalassa nibbānaṃ paṭimukhaṃ sampāpane ratho viyāti ^b^ratho^eb^. Parikaroti vibhūsayatīti ^b^parikkhāro,^eb^ vibhūsanaṃ, sīlañca ariyamaggassa vibhūsanaṭṭhāniyaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘catupārisuddhisīlālaṅkāro’’^eb^ti, sīlabhūsanoti attho. ^b^Vipassanāsampayuttāna^eb^nti lokiyāya lokuttarāya ca vipassanāya sampayuttānaṃ. Vidhinā īretabbato pavattetabbato ^b^vīriyaṃ,^eb^^a^M2.0398^ea^ sammāvāyāmo. Samaṃ sammā ca dhiyatīti samādhi, dhurañca taṃ samādhi cāti dhurasamādhi, upekkhā dhurasamādhi etassāti ^b^upekkhādhurasamādhi,^eb^ ariyamaggo upekkhāsaṅkhātadhurasamādhīti attho. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana byañjanaṃ anādiyitvā dhurasamādhisaddānaṃ bhinnādhikaraṇatā vuttā. ^b^Payogamajjhatte^eb^ti vīriyasamatāya. ^b^Anicchā^eb^ti icchāpaṭipakkhā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘alobhasaṅkhātā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parivāraṇa^eb^nti parivāro, paricchadoti attho.

[03]^b^Mettā^eb^ti mettācetovimutti. Tathā ^b^karuṇā. Pubbabhāgo^eb^ti ubhinnampi upacāro. Dvepi kāyacittavivekā viya pubbabhāgadhammavasena vuttā. ^b^Ariyamaggarathe^eb^ti parisuddhamaggasaṅkhāte rathe. Ariyamaggaratho ca maggaratho cāti ^b^ariyamaggaratho,^eb^ evaṃ ekasesanayena vā attho veditabbo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘imasmiṃ lokiyalokuttaramaggarathe ṭhito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sannaddhacammo^eb^ti yogāvacarassa paṭimukkacammaṃ. ^b^Na naṃ te vijjhantī^eb^ti vacanapathā na naṃ vijjhanti. Dhammabhedanavasena na bhañjati, tassa ariyamaggassa rathassa sammā yojitassa antarā bhaṅgo natthīti attho.

[03]^b^Attano purisakāraṃ nissāya laddhattā^eb^ attano santāneti adhippāyo. ^b^Anuttara^eb^nti uttararahitaṃ. Tato eva ^b^seṭṭhayānaṃ,^eb^ nassa kenaci sadisanti ^b^asadisaṃ^eb^. Dhitisampannatāya ^b^dhīrā paṇḍitapurisā^eb^^a^V2.0108^ea^^b^lokamhā niyyanti gacchanti^eb^. ‘‘Jayaṃ jaya’’nti gāthāyaṃ vacanavipallāsena vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘jinantā jinantā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Jāṇussoṇibrāhmaṇasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^5-6^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Niyamattho^eb^ti avadhāraṇattho. ^b^Tena^eb^ niyamena avadhāraṇena – ^b^aññaṃ maggaṃ paṭikkhipati^eb^ ito aññassa niyyānikamaggassa abhāvato. ‘‘Dukkhassa pariññattha’’nti vuttattā ^b^vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kathitaṃ^eb^. Ariyamagge gahite tassa pubbabhāgamaggo vipassanāya gahito evāti ^b^‘‘missakamaggo kathito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Uttānameva^eb^ apubbassa abhāvā. Ayaṃ pana viseso ‘‘rāgakkhayo’’tiādīhi ^a^M2.0399^ea^ yadipi nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ. Tathāpi arahattaṃ viya brahmacariyampi. Tena nibbānaṃ eva vuccati ^b^‘‘idaṃ brahmacariyapariyosāna’’^eb^nti.
[06]Kimatthiyasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^7^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rāgavinayā^eb^dipadehi nibbānaṃ vāpi vucceyya arahattaṃ vāpi. Yasmā so bhikkhu ubhayatthapi niviṭṭhabuddhi, tasmā bhagavā tassa ajjhāsayavasena ‘‘nibbānadhātuyā kho eta’’ntiādinā nibbānadhātuṃ vissajjetvā puna ‘‘āsavānaṃ khayo tena vuccatī’’ti āha. Yasmā ariyamaggo rāgādike samucchedavasena vineti, āsavañca sabbaso khepeti, tena ca vuttaṃ nibbānaṃ arahattañca, tasmā tadubhayaṃ ^b^‘‘rāgavinayotiādi nāmamevā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Anusandhikusalatāya pucchanto etaṃ avocā^eb^ti iminā ‘‘pucchānusandhi idha labbhatī’’ti dīpitaṃ, ajjhāsayānusandhipi ettha labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Dutiyāññatarabhikkhusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^8^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekena pariyāyena aṭṭhaṅgikamaggaṃ vibhajitvā^eb^ti ‘‘sammādiṭṭhī’’tiādinā ekena pariyāyena ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ maggaṃ vibhāgena dassetvā ‘‘katamā ca, bhikkhave, sammādiṭṭhī’’tiādinā ^a^V2.0109^ea^^b^puna aparena pariyāyena vibhajitukāmo^eb^. Uggahadhāraṇaparicayañāṇānipi savanañāṇe eva avarodhaṃ gacchantīti ^b^‘‘savanasammasanapaṭivedhapaccavekkhaṇavasenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Kammaṭṭhānābhiniveso^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānapaṭipatti. Purimāni dve saccāni uggaṇhitvāti sambandho. ^b^Iṭṭhaṃ kantaṃ manāpa^eb^nti nirodhamaggesu ninnabhāvaṃ dasseti, na abhinandanaṃ, tanninnabhāvo eva ca tattha kammakaraṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ekenevākārena saccānaṃ paṭivedhanimittatā, so eva abhimukhabhāvo tesaṃ samāgamoti ^b^ekābhisamayo^eb^.

[03]^b^Assā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0400^ea^ ñāṇassa, yogino vā. Ettha ca keci ‘‘lokiyañāṇampi paṭivedho sabbassa yāthāvabodhabhāvato’’ti vadanti. Nanu uggahādipaṭivedho ca paṭivedhova, na ca so lokuttaroti? Taṃ na, kevalena paṭivedha-saddena uggahādipaṭivedhānaṃ avacanīyattā, paṭivedhanimittattā vā uggahādivasena pavattaṃ dukkhādīsu pubbabhāge ñāṇaṃ ‘‘paṭivedho’’ti vuccati, na paṭivedhattā, paṭivedhabhūtameva pana ñāṇaṃ ujukaṃ paṭivedhoti vattabbataṃ arahati. ^b^Kiccato^eb^ti pariññādikiccato. ^b^Ārammaṇapaṭivedho^eb^ti sacchikiriyāpaṭivedhamāha. ^b^Kiccato^eb^ti asammohapaṭivedhaṃ. Uggahādīhi saccassa pariggaṇhanaṃ ^b^pariggaho^eb^.

[03]^b^Duddasattā^eb^ti anadhigatañāṇena yāthāvasarasalakkhaṇato daṭṭhuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā uppattito pākaṭānipi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dukkhasaccaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ubhaya^eb^nti purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ. ^b^Payogo^eb^ti kiriyā, vāyāmo vā. Tassa mahantatarassa icchitabbataṃ dukkarataratañca upamāhi dasseti ^b^‘‘bhavaggaggahaṇattha’’^eb^ntiādinā. Yathā purimaṃ saccadvayaṃ viya kenaci pariyāyena apākaṭatāya paramagambhīrattā uggahādivasena pubbabhāge pavattibhedaṃ gahetvā ^b^‘‘dukkhe ñāṇa’’^eb^ntiādinā catubbidhaṃ katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekameva taṃ ñāṇaṃ hoti^eb^ ekābhisamayavaseneva pavattanato.

[03]^b^Kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhenā^eb^ti kāmānaṃ ujupaccanīkabhāvena. ^b^Kāmato nissaṭabhāvenā^eb^ti kāmehi visaṃyuttabhāvena. ^b^Kāmaṃ sammasantassā^eb^ti duvidhampi kāmaṃ aniccādito sammasantassa. Pajjati pavattati etenāti padaṃ, kāmassa padanti ^b^kāmapadaṃ,^eb^ kāmassa uppattikāraṇassa ghāto samugghāto, taṃ ^b^kāmapadaghātaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāmavūpasama’’^eb^nti. Kāmehi vivittaṃ ^b^kāmavivittaṃ^eb^. So eva ca nesaṃ anto samucchedaviveketi katvā tasmiṃ sādhetabbe uppannoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāmavivittante uppanno’’^eb^ti. Kāmato nikkhamatīti nikkhamo, so eva ^b^nekkhammasaṅkappo^eb^. Imasmiñca ^a^V2.0110^ea^ nekkhammasaṅkappassa saddatthavibhāvena yathāvutto kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhādiko atthaniddhāraṇaviseso antogadho.

[03]^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā byāpādapaccanīkaṭṭhena vihiṃsāya paccanīkaṭṭhenātiādikaṃ abyāpādāvihiṃsāsaṅkappānaṃ atthuddhāraṇavidhiṃ atidisati. ^b^Nekkhammasaṅkappādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena abyāpādāvihiṃsāsaṅkappe eva saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Kāma…pe… saññāna^eb^nti kāmavitakkādiviratisampayuttānaṃ nekkhammādisaññānaṃ. ^b^Nānattā^eb^ti nānākhaṇikattā. ^b^Tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0401^ea^ tippakāresu kāraṇesu. ^b^Uppannassā^eb^ti uppajjanārahassa. Bhūmiladdhauppannaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. Esa nayo ito paresupi. ^b^Padacchedato^eb^ti kāraṇupacchedato. ^b^Pada^eb^nti hi uppattikāraṇanti vuttovāyamattho. ^b^Anuppattisādhanavasenā^eb^ti yathā saṅkappo āyatiṃ nuppajjati, evaṃ anuppattisādhanavasena. Sammādiṭṭhi viya ^b^ekova kusalasaṅkappo uppajjati^eb^.

[03]^b^Catūsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti visaṃvādanādīsu catūsu vītikkamaṭṭhānesu. Pabbajitānaṃ micchājīvo nāma āhāranimittakoti āha ^b^‘‘khādanīyabhojanīyādīnaṃ atthāyā’’^eb^ti. Sabbaso anesanāya pahānaṃ sammāājīvoti āha ^b^‘‘buddhappasatthena ājīvenā’’^eb^ti. Kammapathapattānaṃ vasena ^b^‘‘sattasu ṭhānesū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Akammapathapattāya hi anesanāya so padaghātaṃ karotiyeva.

[03]^b^Tathārūpe vā ārammaṇe^eb^ti yasmiṃ ārammaṇe imassa pubbe kilesā na uppannā, tasmiṃ eva. ^b^Anuppannāna^eb^nti anuppādassapi patthanāvasena anuppannānaṃ. ^b^Vīriyacchanda^eb^nti vīriyassa nibbattetukāmatāchandaṃ. ‘‘Chandasampayuttavīriyañcā’’ti vadanti. Vīriyameva pana anuppannākusalānuppādane labbhamānachandatāya dhurasampaggahatāya chandapariyāyena vuttaṃ. Tathā hi vīriyaṃ – ‘‘anikkhittachandatā anikkhittadhuratā’’ti (dha. sa. 26) niddiṭṭhaṃ. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā ^b^cittaṃ paggahitaṃ karoti. Padhāna^eb^nti padhānabhūtavīriyaṃ.

[03]^b^Uppattipabandhavasenā^eb^ti nirantaruppādanavasena. ^b^Catūsu ṭhānesu kiccasādhanavasenā^eb^ti yathāvuttesu catūsu ṭhānesu padhānakiccassa nipphādanavasena anuppādanādivasena. ^b^Kiccasādhanavasenā^eb^ti kāyavedanācittadhammesu subhasukhaniccāttagāhavidhamanavasena asubhadukkhāniccānattasādhanavasena.

[03]^b^Aya^eb^nti yathāvutto sadisāsadisatāviseso. ^b^Assā^eb^ti maggassa. ^b^Ettha katha^eb^nti yadi rūpāvacaracatutthajjhānato ^a^V2.0111^ea^ paṭṭhāya yāva sabbabhavaggā jhānaṅgamaggaṅgabojjhaṅgānaṃ sadisatā, evaṃ sante ‘‘āruppe catukkapañcakajjhānaṃ uppajjati, tañca lokuttara’’nti ettha kathaṃ attho gahetabboti āha ^b^‘‘etthāpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Taṃjhānikāvā^eb^ti paṭhamajjhānādīsu yaṃ jhānaṃ maggapaṭilābhassa pādakabhūtaṃ, taṃjhānikāva ^b^assa^eb^ ariyassa uparipi ^b^tayo maggā^eb^^a^M2.0402^ea^. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttākārena. ^b^Pādakajjhānameva niyameti^eb^ āruppe catukkapañcakajjhānuppattiyaṃ. ^b^Vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā^eb^ti sammasitakhandhe vadanti. ^b^Puggalajjhāsayo niyameti^eb^ pādakasammasitajjhānānaṃ bhede. Yasmā saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇameva ariyamaggassa bojjhaṅgādivisesaṃ niyameti, tato dutiyādipādakajjhānato uppannassa saṅkhārupekkhāñāṇassa pādakajjhānātikkantānaṃ aṅgānaṃ asamāpajjitukāmatāvirāgabhāvato itarassa ca atabbhāvato tīsupi vādesu vipassanāva niyametīti veditabbo, tasmā vipassanāniyameneva hi paṭhamavādepi apādakajjhānādipādakāpi maggā paṭhamajjhānikā honti. Itarehi ca pādakajjhānehi vipassanāniyamehi taṃtaṃjhānikāva. Evaṃ sesavādesu vipassanāniyamo yathāsambhavaṃ yojetabbo. Dutiyavāde taṃtaṃjhānikatā sammasitasaṅkhāravipassanāniyamehi hoti. Tatra hi vipassanā taṃtaṃvirāgabhāvanā bhāvetabbā, na somanassasahagatā upekkhāsahagatā hutvā jhānaṅgādiniyamaṃ maggassa karotīti evaṃ vipassanāniyamo vuttanayeneva veditabbo. Imasmiñca vāde pādakasammasitajjhānupanissayasabbhāve ajjhāsayo ekantena hotīti ^b^‘‘puggalajjhāsayo niyametīti vadantī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana visuddhimaggassa etissā aṭṭhakathāya ekasaṅgahitattā ^b^‘‘tesaṃ vādavinicchayo…pe… veditabbo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pubbabhāge^eb^ti vipassanākkhaṇe.
[06]Vibhaṅgasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^9^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sūka^eb^nti sāliyavādīnaṃ vālamāha. So hi nikantakasadiso paṭimukhagataṃ hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā bhindati, tasmā bhedaṃ icchantena uddhaggaṃ katvā ṭhapitaṃ ^b^sammāpaṇihitaṃ^eb^ nāma, tathā aṭṭhapitaṃ ^b^micchāpaṇihitaṃ^eb^ nāmāti vuttaṃ. ^b^Micchāpaṇihitāyā^eb^ti kammassakatapaññāya micchāṭhapanaṃ nāma – ‘‘ime sattā kammavasena sukhadukkhaṃ paccanubhavanti, taṃ pana kammaṃ issarassa icchāvasena brahmā nimminātī’’tiādinā micchāpakappanaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘natthi dinnantiādinā nayena pavatti, tassa vā ñāṇassa appavattī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Maggabhāvanāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0403^ea^ etthāpi micchāmaggassa pavattanaṃ, ariyamaggassa vā appavattanaṃ micchāṭhapanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘appavattitattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Avijjaṃ bhindissatī^eb^ti avijjaṃ samucchindissati. ^b^Magganissitaṃ katvā^eb^ magge ^a^V2.0112^ea^ eva pakkhipitvā. Tañhi ñāṇaṃ maggassa mūlakāraṇaṃ magge siddhe tassa kiccassa matthakappattito. ‘‘Sammāpaṇihitāya diṭṭhiyā sammāpaṇihitāya maggabhāvanāyā’’ti vuttattā ^b^missakamaggo kathito^eb^. Chavibhedasadiso cettha avijjābhedo, lohituppādasadiso lokuttaramaggabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
[06]Sūkasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^10^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Channaparibbājako^eb^ vatthacchādiyā channaṅgaparibbājako, na naggaparibbājako.
[06]Avijjāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^11^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aḍḍhamāsa^eb^nti accantasaṃyoge upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Paṭisallīyitu^eb^nti yathāvuttaṃ kālaṃ paṭi divase divase samāpattiyaṃ dhammacintāyaṃ cittaṃ nilīyituṃ. ^b^Vinetabbo^eb^ti samucchedavinayena vinetabbo ariyamaggādhigantabbo. ^b^Ta^eb^nti diṭṭhānugatiāpajjanaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti janatāya. ^b^Apagacchatī^eb^ti satthu santikato apeti. ^b^Sū^eb^ti nipātamattaṃ.

[03]^b^Padesenā^eb^ti ekadesena. Saha padesenāti ^b^sapadeso^eb^. Svāyaṃ sapadeso yasmā vedanāvaseneva pāḷiyaṃ āgato, tasmā paramatthadhammakoṭṭhāse vedanā anavasesato labbhati, te gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘khandhapadeso’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Taṃ sabba^eb^nti khandhapadesādikaṃ sabbampi. ^b^‘‘Sammasanto’’^eb^ti padassa atthadassanavasena ^b^‘‘paccavekkhanto’’^eb^ti āha. Paccavekkhaṇā idha sammasanaṃ nāma, na vipassanā. Vipassanāsammasanaṃ pana bhagavato ^a^M2.0404^ea^ visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ eva nipphannaṃ, tasmā bhagavato aññabhūmikāpi vedanā aññabhūmikānaṃ sattānaṃ viruddhā uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yāva bhavaggā pavattā sukhā vedanā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbākārenā^eb^ti sarūpato samudayato atthaṅgamato assādāditoti sabbākārena. ^b^Pariggaṇhanto^eb^ upaparikkhanto.

[03]^b^Nippadesāneva^eb^^a^V2.0113^ea^ anavasesāneva. Indriyasatipaṭṭhānapadeso suviññeyyoti anuddhato. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato. ^b^Ṭhāne^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ paccavekkhitabbasaṅkhāte okāse. ^b^Sā sā ca vihārasamāpattī^eb^ti khandhavasena āyatanādivasena ca pavattitvā tesaṃ ekadesabhūtaṃ vedanaṃyeva pariggahetvā taṃ sammasitvā anukkamena samāpannā jhānasamāpatti phalasamāpatti ca. Phalasamāpatti hi tathā sammasitvā punappunaṃ samāpajjanavasena atthato abhinnāpi adhiṭṭhānabhūtadhammabhedena bhinnā viya vuccati, yato catuvīsatikoṭisatasahassabhedā devasikaṃ vaḷañjanasamāpattiyo aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttā. Kāmaṃ aññadhammavasenapi jātā eva, vedanāvasena panettha abhiniveso kato ^b^vedanānubhāvena jātā^eb^. Kasmā evaṃ jātāti? Buddhānaṃ ñāṇapadassa antaravibhāgattā. Tathā hi bhagavā sakalampi aḍḍhamāsaṃ vedanāvaseneva sammasanaṃ pavatteti, tadanusārena ca tā vihārasamāpattiyo samāpajji. Tayidaṃ acchariyaṃ anaññasādhāraṇaṃ bhikkhū pavedento satthā – ‘‘yena svāha’’ntiādimavoca.

[03]^b^Akusalāvā^eb^ti pāṇātipāta-adinnādāna-kāmesumicchācāra-musāvāda-pisuṇavācāsamphappalāpa-abhijjhā-byāpādavasena taṃtaṃmicchādassanavasena ca akusalā vedanā eva hoti. Brahmalokādīsu uppajjitvā tattha niccā dhuvā bhavissāmāti evaṃ diṭṭhiṃ upanissāyāti yojetabbaṃ. ^b^Devakulādīsu^eb^ devapūjatthaṃ, sabbajanaparibhogatthaṃ vā ^b^mālāvacchaṃ ropenti. Vadhabandhanādīnī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena adinnādāna-micchācāra-musāvāda-pisuṇavācā-samphappalāpādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Diṭṭhadhammavipākassa apacurattā apākaṭattā ca ^b^‘‘bhavantaragatāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Iti nesa^eb^nti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho, pakārattho vā. Tena yathā pharusavācāvasena, evaṃ tadaññesampi akusalakammānaṃ vasena sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ^a^M2.0405^ea^ akusalavedanāppavatti yathārahaṃ nīharitvā vattabbā. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā yathā micchādiṭṭhipaccayā sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca kusalākusalavipākavedanā sahajātakoṭiyā upanissayakoṭiyā ca vasena yathārahaṃ yojetvā dassitā, evaṃ micchāsaṅkappapaccayādīsupi yathārahaṃ yojetvā dassetabbāti imamatthaṃ atidisati. ^b^Chandapaccayā^eb^ti ettha taṇhāchandasahito kattukāmatāchando adhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘chandapaccayātiādīsu pana chandapaccayā aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittasampayuttā vedanā veditabbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vitakkapaccayā^eb^ti ettha appanāppattova vitakko adhippetoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vitakkapaccayā paṭhamajjhānavedanāvā’’^eb^ti. Vitakkapaccayā paṭhamajjhānavedanāya gahitattā ^b^‘‘ṭhapetvā paṭhamajjhāna’’^eb^nti. Upari tisso rūpāvacarā, heṭṭhā tisso arūpāvacarā evaṃ ^b^sesā cha saññāsamāpattivedanā^eb^.

[03]^b^Tiṇṇa^eb^nti ^a^V2.0114^ea^ chandavitakkasaññānaṃ. ^b^Avūpasame^eb^ti paṭipakkhena avūpasamite. Tiṇṇañhi tesaṃ sahabhāvena paccayatā aṭṭhalobhasahagatacittesu eva. Tattha yaṃ vattabbaṃ taṃ vuttameva. ^b^Chandamattassā^eb^ti tesu tīsu chandamattassa. ^b^Vūpasame paṭhamajjhānavedanāva^eb^ appanāppattassa adhippetattā. ^b^Chandavitakkānaṃ vūpasame dutiyajjhānādivedanā adhippetā^eb^ saññāya avūpasantattā. Dutiyajjhānādivedanāgahaṇena hi sabbā saññāsamāpattiyo ca gahitāva honti. ^b^Tiṇṇampi vūpasame^eb^ti chandavitakkasaññānaṃ vūpasame ^b^nevasaññānāsaññāyatanavedanā adhippetā^eb^. Bhavaggappattasaññā hi vūpasamanti chandasaṅkappānaṃ accantasukhumabhāvappattiyā. Heṭṭhā ‘‘sammādiṭṭhipaccayā’’ti ettha sammādiṭṭhiggahaṇena heṭṭhimamaggasammādiṭṭhipi gahitāva hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘appattassa pattiyāti arahattaphalassa pattatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Atha vā heṭṭhimamaggādhigamena vinā aggamaggo natthīti heṭṭhimamaggādhigamaṃ atthāpannaṃ katvā ^b^‘‘arahattaphalassa pattatthāyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Āyameti phalena missito hoti etenāti ^b^āyāmo,^eb^ sammāvāyāmoti āha ^b^‘‘atthi āyāmanti atthi vīriya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Tassa vīriyārambhassā^eb^ti aññādhigamakāraṇassa sammāvāyāmassa vasena. Pāḷiyaṃ ṭhāna-saddo kāraṇapariyāyoti āha – ^b^‘‘arahattaphalassa kāraṇe’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tappaccayā^eb^ti ettha ^b^taṃ^eb^-saddena ‘‘ṭhāne’’ti vuttakāraṇameva paccāmaṭṭhanti āha – ^b^‘‘arahattassa ṭhānapaccayā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Catumaggasahajātā^eb^ti etena ‘‘arahattaphalassa pattatthāyā’’ti ^a^M2.0406^ea^ ettha heṭṭhimamaggānaṃ atthāpattivasena gahitabhāvameva joteti. Keci pana ‘‘catumaggasahajātāti vatvā nibbattitalokuttaravedanāti bhūtakathanaṃ visesanaṃ. Nibbattitalokuttaravedanāti paṭhamaṃ apekkhitabbaṃ, pacchā catumaggasahajātā’’ti vadanti.
[06]Paṭhamavihārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^12^eb^^b^.^eb^ Micchādiṭṭhi vūpasamati sabbaso pahīyati etenāti ^b^micchādiṭṭhivūpasamo^eb^. ‘‘Micchādiṭṭhivūpasamo nāma sammādiṭṭhi. Bhavantare uppajjanto atidūreti maññamāno vipākavedanaṃ na gaṇhātī’’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Iminā nayenā’’^eb^ti atidisitvāpi tamatthaṃ pākaṭataraṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘yassa yassā’’^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā eva sāmaññavasena vuttamatthaṃ pacchimesu tīsu padesu sarūpatova dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘chandavūpasamapaccayā’’^eb^tiādimāha, taṃ suviññeyyameva. ^b^Vuttatthāneva^eb^ anantarasutte.
[06]Dutiyavihārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^13-17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tissannampi ^a^V2.0115^ea^ sikkhānaṃ sikkhanaṃ sīlaṃ etassāti ^b^sikkhanasīlo^eb^. Sikkhatītipi vā ^b^sekkho^eb^. Vuttañhetaṃ ‘‘sikkhatīti kho, bhikkhave, tasmā sekkhoti vuccati. Kiñca sikkhati? Adhisīlampi sikkhatī’’tiādi (a. ni. 3.86). ^b^Tīhi phalehi^eb^ heṭṭhā. Sāpi catutthamaggena saddhiṃ uppannasikkhāpi. Maggakkhaṇe hi sikkhākiccaṃ na niṭṭhitaṃ vippakatabhāvato, phalakkhaṇe pana niṭṭhitaṃ nāma. ^b^Uttānatthāneva^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.
[06]Sekkhasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Vihāravaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^21-30^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Micchāsabhāva^eb^nti ^a^M2.0407^ea^ ayāthāvasabhāvaṃ aniyyānikasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Sammāsabhāva^eb^nti yāthāvasabhāvaṃ niyyānikasabhāvaṃ. ^b^Micchāpaṭipattādhikaraṇahetū^eb^ti ettha ^b^adhi^eb^-saddo anatthakoti āha – ^b^‘‘micchāpaṭipattikaraṇahetū’’^eb^ti. Ñāyati paṭividdhavasena nibbānaṃ gacchatīti ^b^ñāyo^eb^. So eva taṃsamaṅgīnaṃ vaṭṭadukkhapātato dhāraṇaṭṭhena ^b^dhammo^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘ñāyaṃ dhammanti ariyamaggadhamma’’^eb^nti. Ñāṇassa micchāsabhāvo nāma natthīti viññāṇamevettha paccavekkhaṇavasena pavattaṃ ñāṇa-saddena vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘micchāviññāṇo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Micchāpaccavekkhaṇo^eb^ti kiñci pāpaṃ katvā ‘‘aho mayā kataṃ sukata’’nti evaṃ pavatto micchāpaccavekkhaṇo. Gosīlagovatādipūraṇaṃ muttīti evaṃ gaṇhato ^b^micchāvimutti^eb^ nāma. Micchāpaṭipadādīhi vivaṭṭanti evaṃ ^b^vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. Puggalo pucchito^eb^ti nigamito ca ‘‘ayaṃ vuccati, bhikkhave, asappuriso’’tiādinā. Kiñcāpi ‘‘micchādiṭṭhiko hotī’’tiādinā puggalova niddiṭṭho, tathāpi puggalasīsenāyaṃ dhammadesanāti āha ^b^‘‘dhammo vibhatto’’^eb^ti. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘dhammena puggalo dassito’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dhammenā^eb^ti micchādiṭṭhiādikena dhammena. Kalyāṇaputhujjanato paṭṭhāya sabbaso ^b^sappurisā^eb^ nāma, khīṇāsavo ^b^sappurisataro. Suppavattaniyo^eb^ti sukhena pavattetuṃ sakkuṇeyyo. ^b^Dhāvatī^eb^ti gacchati. Paccayuppannena upecca nissitabbato upanisā, paccayo, ekassa sa-kārassa lopaṃ katvā vāti āha – ^b^‘‘saupanisaṃ sapaccaya’’^eb^nti. Parikaraṇato ^b^parikkhāro,^eb^ parivāroti ^a^V2.0116^ea^ āha – ^b^‘‘saparikkhāraṃ saparivāra’’^eb^nti. Sahajātavasena upanissayavasena ca sapaccayatā kiccasādhane nipphādane sahāyabhāvūpagamane ca saparivāratā daṭṭhabbā.
[06]Micchattavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^31-40^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayāthāvapaṭipatti,^eb^ na yathāpaṭipatti, hetumhipi phalepi ayāthāvavatthusādhanato. ^b^Ekaṃ suttaṃ dhammavasena kathitaṃ^eb^ paṭipattivasena. ^b^Ekaṃ suttaṃ puggalavasena kathitaṃ^eb^ paṭipannakavasena. Saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato yo naṃ adhigacchati, taṃ pāreti gametīti pāraṃ, nibbānaṃ, tabbidhuratāya ^a^M2.0408^ea^ natthi ettha pāranti apāraṃ, saṃsāroti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘apārāpāranti vaṭṭato nibbāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Pāraṅgatā^eb^ti asekkhe sandhāya. ^b^Yepi gacchantī^eb^ti sekkhe. ^b^Yepi gamissantī^eb^ti kalyāṇaputhujjane. ^b^Pāragāmino^eb^ti ettha kita-saddo tikālavācīti evaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Tīra^eb^nti orimatīramāha. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vaṭṭameva anudhāvatī’’^eb^ti. Ekantakāḷakattā cittassa apabhassarabhāvakaraṇato kaṇhābhijātihetuto ca vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kaṇhanti akusaladhamma’’^eb^nti. Vodānabhāvato cittassa pabhassarabhāvakaraṇato sukkābhijātihetuto ca vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘sukkanti kusaladhamma’’^eb^nti. Kilesamāra-abhisaṅkhāramāra-maccumārānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānatāya okaṃ vuccati vaṭṭaṃ, tabbidhuratāya anokanti nibbānanti āha – ^b^‘‘okā anokanti vaṭṭato nibbāna’’^eb^nti.

[03]Paramatthato samaṇā vuccanti ariyā, samaṇānaṃ bhāvo sāmaññaṃ, ariyamaggo, tena araṇīyato upagantabbato sāmaññattho nibbānanti āha – ^b^‘‘sāmaññatthanti nibbānaṃ, taṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Brahmaññattha^eb^nti etthāpi iminā nayena attho veditabbo. ^b^Brahmaññena^eb^ ariyamaggena. ^b^Rāgakkhayo^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādisaddattho. Tena ‘‘dosakkhayo mohakkhayo’’ti padadvayaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Vaṭṭatiyevāti vadanti^eb^ ‘‘rāgakkhayo’’ti. Pariyāyena hi arahattassa vattabbattāti.
[06]Paṭipattivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^41-48^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aparāparaṃ ^a^V2.0117^ea^ parivattamānena vattasampannena saṃsāraddhānapariññāvaseneva nibbānassa pattabbattā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘nibbānaṃ patvā pariññātaṃ nāma hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nibbānaṃ patvā^eb^ti nibbānappattihetu. Hetuattho hi ayaṃ ^b^tvā^eb^-saddo yathā – ‘‘ghataṃ pivitvā balaṃ hoti, sīhaṃ disvā bhayaṃ hotī’’ti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā apariññeyyaparijānanakiccena nibbānassa pattiyā addhānapariññāsiddhi ñāyati, tasmā upacāravasena nibbānaṃ ‘‘addhānapariññā’’ti vuccati yathā ‘‘himasanti sūriyaṃ uggametī’’ti. ^b^Vijjāvimuttiphalasacchikiriyattha^eb^nti ettha ^b^vijjā^eb^ti aggamaggavijjā. ^b^Vimuttī^eb^ti aggamaggasamādhi adhippeto ^a^M2.0409^ea^. Tesaṃ phalaṃ aññāti āha – ^b^‘‘vijjāvimuttiphalena arahattaṃ kathita’’^eb^nti. Yāthāvato jānanato paccakkhato dassanato ca ñāṇadassananti idha phalanibbānapaccavekkhaṇā adhippetāti āha – ^b^‘‘ñāṇadassanena paccavekkhaṇā kathitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sesehī^eb^ti rāga-virāga-saṃyojanappahāna-anusayasamugghāta-addhānapariññā- āsavakkhaya-vijjā-vimutti-phalasacchikiriyā-ñāṇadassana-anupādāparinibbānapadehi.
[06]Aññatitthiyapeyyālavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^49-62^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā aruṇuggaṃ sūriyuggamanassa ekantikaṃ pubbanimittaṃ, evaṃ kalyāṇamittatā ariyamaggapātubhāvassāti sadisūpamā ^b^aruṇuggaṃ kalyāṇamittatāya^eb^. Kalyāṇamittoti cettha ariyo, ^b^ariyamaggo^eb^ vā daṭṭhabbo ^b^sūriyapātubhāvo viya^eb^ tena vidhūpanīyandhakāravidhamanato. ^b^Kusalakattukamyatāchando chandasampadā^eb^ itarachandato sampannattā. ^b^Kārāpakāppamādassā^eb^ti saccapaṭivedhassa kārāpakassa. Evaṃ sabbattheva sampadāsaddā visesādhigamahetutāya veditabbā. ^b^Aññenapi ākārenā^eb^ti ‘‘vivekanissita’’ntiādiākārato aññena ‘‘rāgavinayapariyosāna’’ntiādinā ākārena.
[06]Sūriyapeyyālavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^63-138^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tathā^eb^^a^V2.0118^ea^^b^tathā vutte bujjhanakānaṃ ajjhāsayavasena kathito,^eb^ tasmā ‘‘vutto eva attho, kasmā puna vutto’’ti na codetabbaṃ.
[06]Ekadhammapeyyālavaggādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^139^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kārāpakāppamādo^eb^^a^M2.0410^ea^ nāma ‘‘ime akusalā dhammā pahātabbā, ime kusalā dhammā uppādetabbā’’ti vuttavajjetabbavajjanasampādetabbasampādanavasena pavatto appamādo. ^b^Esā^eb^ti appamādo. ^b^Lokiyova. Na^eb^ lokuttaro. ^b^Aya^eb^nti ^b^esā^eb^ti ca appamādameva vadati. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti catubhūmakadhammānaṃ. ^b^Paṭilābhakaṭṭhenā^eb^ti paṭilābhāpanaṭṭhena.
[06]Tathāgatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^140^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jaṅgalāna^eb^nti jaṅgalavāsīnaṃ. ^b^Jaṅgala^eb^-saddo cettha thaddhabhāvasāmaññena pathavīpariyāyo, na anupaṭṭhānavidūradesavācī. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pathavītalavāsīna’’^eb^nti. Padānaṃ vuccamānattā ^b^‘‘sapādakapāṇāna’’^eb^nti visesetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Samodhāna^eb^nti antogadhabhāvaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘odhānaṃ upakkhepa’’^eb^nti, upanetvā pakkhipitabbanti attho.
[06]Padasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^141-148^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vassikāya pupphaṃ ^b^vassikaṃ^eb^ yathā ‘‘āmalakiyā phalaṃ āmalaka’’nti. ^b^Mahātalasmi^eb^nti ^a^V2.0119^ea^ uparipāsāde. ^b^‘‘Yāni kānicī’’^eb^ti padehi itarāni samānādhikaraṇāni bhavituṃ yuttānīti ^b^‘‘paccatte sāmivacana’’^eb^nti vatvā tathā vibhattivipariṇāmo kato. ^b^‘‘Tantāvutāna’’^eb^nti padaṃ niddhāraṇe sāmivacananti tattha ‘‘vatthānī’’ti vacanasesena atthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.
[06]Kūṭasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Appamādavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^149^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kammāniyeva ^a^M2.0411^ea^^b^kammantā^eb^ yathā suttantā. ^b^Ariyaṃ aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ magga^eb^nti ettha nānantariyakatāya vipassanāpi gahitā eva hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sahavipassana’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^150^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcavidhampi samūhaṭṭhena ^b^bījagāmo nāma. Tadevā^eb^ti mūlabījādi ^b^eva. Sampanna^eb^nti sahajātamūlavantaṃ. ^b^Nīlabhāvato paṭṭhāyā^eb^ti nīlabhāvāpattito paṭṭhāya.

[03]^b^151^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Balaṃ gāhentī^eb^ti attano sarīrabalaṃ gāhenti. Taṃ pana nāgānaṃ balappatti evāti āha – ^b^‘‘balaṃ gaṇhantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sambhejjamukhadvāra^eb^nti mahāsamuddena sambhedagatamahānadīnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ. ^b^Nāgā kāyaṃ vaḍḍhentī^eb^tiādi yasmā ca bhagavatā upamāvasena ābhataṃ, tasmā ^b^evameva khoti etthā^eb^tiādinā upamaṃ saṃsandati. ^b^Āgatesū^eb^tiādīsu tīsu padesu bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe.
[03]^b^153^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na^eb^^a^V2.0120^ea^^b^patiāvamatī^eb^ti ca nikujjitabhāvena udakavamano ghaṭo, na taṃ puna mukhena gaṇhāti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na anto pavesetī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^155^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tenetaṃ vutta^eb^nti tena ariyamaggassa ijjhanena etesaṃ sabbesaṃ bodhipakkhiyadhammānaṃ ijjhanaṃ vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^156-158^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṃsurajojalla^eb^nti bhūmireṇusahajātamalaṃ. ^b^Vāṇijakopame^eb^ti vāṇijakopamapaṭhamasutte cāpi.

[03]^b^159-160^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sahavipassanassa ^a^M2.0412^ea^ ariyamaggassa bhāvanāya ijjhanena ^b^etaṃ^eb^ abhiññāpariññeyyādidhammānaṃ abhiññāparijānanādīnaṃ ijjhanaṃ ^b^vuttaṃ^eb^ khattiyādīnaṃ visayāadikaṃ karontassa kathāya sajjitattā.
[06]Balakaraṇīyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^161^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāmāna^eb^nti vatthukāmakilesakāmānaṃ. Kilesakāmopi hi kāmitanti parikappitena vidhinā ca adhikarāgehi esanīyo. ^b^Bhavāna^eb^nti tiṇṇaṃ gatīnaṃ. Diṭṭhigatikaparikappitassa ^a^V2.0121^ea^ brahmacariyassa nimittabhāvato micchādiṭṭhi ‘‘brahmacariya’’nti adhippetā.
[03]^b^162-171^eb^^b^.^eb^ Seyyohamasmītiādinā taṃtaṃvibhāgena dhīyanti vidhīyantīti ^b^vidhā,^eb^ mānakoṭṭhāsā, mānaṭṭhapanā vā. ^b^Nīhanantī^eb^ti vibādhenti.
[06]Esanāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^172-173^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vaṭṭe ohananti osīdāpentīti ^b^oghā. Rūpārūpabhave^eb^ti rūpabhave ca arūpabhave ca rūpārūpataṇhopanissayā rūpārūpāvacarakammanibbattā khandhā. Yojanaṭṭhena ^b^yogo^eb^.

[03]^b^174-175^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmanavasena upādiyanato ^b^kāmupādānaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kāmaggahaṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Nāmakāyassā^eb^ti vedanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ arūpakkhandhānaṃ. ^b^Ghaṭanapabandhanakileso^eb^ti ^a^M2.0413^ea^ hetunā phalassa kammavaṭṭassa vipākavaṭṭena dukkhappabandhasaññitassa ghaṭanassa sambajjhanassa nibbattakakileso. ^b^Antaggāhikadiṭṭhi^eb^ sassatucchedagāho.
[06]Upādānasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^176-181^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Thāmagataṭṭhenā^eb^ti sattasantāne thirabhāvūpagamanabhāvena. ^b^Thāmagata^eb^nti ca aññehi asādhāraṇo kāmarāgādīnaṃyeva āveṇiko sabhāvo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Kāmarāgovā^eb^ti kāmarāgo ^a^V2.0122^ea^ eva appahīno. So sati paccayalābhe uppajjanārahatāya santāne anusetīti ^b^anusayo. Sesesupī^eb^ti paṭighānusayādīsu. Orambhāgo vuccati kāmadhātu rūpārūpabhāvato heṭṭhābhūtattā. Tattha pavattiyā paccayabhāvato ^b^orambhāgiyāni^eb^ yathā ‘‘pacchiyo goduhako’’ti. Saṃyojentīti ^b^saṃyojanāni,^eb^ heṭṭhā viya attho vattabbo. ^b^Uddhambhāgo^eb^ mahaggatabhāgo, tassa hitānīti sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā na vuttanti adhippāyo.
[06]Anusayasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Oghavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Maggasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^182^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bujjhati ^a^V2.0123^ea^^a^M2.0414^ea^ catusaccaṃ ariyasāvako etāyāti ^b^bodhaṃ,^eb^ dhammasāmaggī, ariyasāvako pana catusaccaṃ bujjhatīti ^b^bodhi. Aṅgā^eb^ti kāraṇā. Yāya dhammasāmaggiyāti sambandho. Taṇhāvasena ^b^patiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ diṭṭhivasena ^b^āyūhanā^eb^. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā ^b^patiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ ucchedadiṭṭhiyā ^b^āyūhanā^eb^. Līnavasena ^b^patiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ uddhaccavasena ^b^āyūhanā^eb^. Kāmasukhānuyogavasena ^b^patiṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ attakilamathānuyogavasena ^b^āyūhanā. Oghataraṇasuttavaṇṇanāyaṃ^eb^ (saṃ. ni. 1.1) –

[08]‘‘Kilesavasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, abhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā. Taṇhādiṭṭhīhi patiṭṭhānaṃ, avasesakilesābhisaṅkhārehi āyūhanā, sabbākusalābhisaṅkhāravasena patiṭṭhānaṃ, sabbalokiyakusalābhisaṅkhāravasena āyūhanā’’ti –

[07]Vuttesu pakāresu idha avuttānaṃ vasena veditabbo. ^b^Kilesasantānaniddāya uṭṭhahatī^eb^ti etena sikhāpattavipassanāsahagatānampi satiādīnaṃ bojjhaṅgabhāvaṃ dasseti. ^b^Cattārī^eb^tiādinā maggaphalena sahagatānaṃ. Sattahi bojjhaṅgehi bhāvitehi saccapaṭivedho hotīti kathamidaṃ jānitabbanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘yathāhā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Jhānaṅgamaggaṅgādayo viyā^eb^ti etena bodhibojjhaṅgasaddānaṃ samudāyāvayavavisayataṃ dasseti. ^b^Senaṅgarathaṅgādayo viyā^eb^ti etena puggalapaññattiyā avijjamānapaññattibhāvaṃ dasseti.

[03]Bodhāya saṃvattantīti bojjhaṅgāti vuttaṃ ‘‘kāraṇattho aṅgasaddo’’ti. Bujjhatīti bodhi, bodhiyā eva aṅgāti ^b^bojjhaṅgā^eb^ti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bujjhantīti bojjhaṅgā’’^eb^ti. Vipassanādīnaṃ kāraṇānaṃ bujjhitabbānaṃ saccānaṃ anurūpaṃ paccakkhabhāvena paṭimukhaṃ aviparītaṃ sammā bujjhantīti evaṃ vatthuvisesadīpakehi ^a^V2.0124^ea^ uparimaggehi anubujjhantītiādinā vuttabodhisaddehi nippadesena vuttaṃ ^a^M2.0415^ea^ ‘‘bujjhanatāsāmaññena saṅgaṇhātī’’ti. Ettha ca līnapatiṭṭhāna-kāmasukhallikānuyoga-ucchedābhinivesānaṃ dhammavicaya-vīriyapītipadhāna-dhammasāmaggī paṭipakkho. Uddhaccāyūhanāttakilamathānuyoga-sassatābhinivesānaṃ passaddhisamādhi-upekkhāpadhāna-dhammasāmaggī paṭipakkho. Sati pana ubhayatthāpi icchitabbā. Tathā hi sā sabbatthikā vuttā.

[03]Saṃ-saddo pasaṃsāyaṃ. Punadeva sundaro ca atthopīti āha ^b^‘‘pasattho sundaro ca bojjhaṅgo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Abhinibbattetī^eb^ti abhivisiṭṭhabhāvena nibbatteti savisesabhāvaṃ vadati. ^b^‘‘Eke vaṇṇayantī’’^eb^ti vatvā tattha yathāvuttavivekattayato aññaṃ vivekadvayaṃ uddharitvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘te hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha jhānakkhaṇe tāva kiccato vikkhambhanavivekanissitaṃ, vipassanākkhaṇe ajjhāsayato paṭippassaddhivivekanissitaṃ bhāvetīti. Tenāha – ‘‘anuttaraṃ vimokkhaṃ upasampajja viharissāmī’’ti. Tattha tattha nicchayatāya kasiṇajjhānaggahaṇena anuppādānampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Himavantasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^183^eb^^b^.^eb^ Tiṭṭhanti etenāti ṭhiti, kāraṇaṃ. Kammautucittāhārasaññito catubbidho paccayo ṭhiti etassāti ^b^paccayaṭṭhitiko^eb^. Āhārapaccayasaddā hi ekatthā. ^b^Subhampī^eb^ti kāmacchando paccayo, asubhe subhākārena pavattanato subhanti vuccati. Tena kāraṇena pavattanakassa aññassa kāmacchandassa nimittattā ^b^subhanimitta^eb^nti. ^b^Subhassā^eb^ti yathāvuttassa subhassa. ^b^Ārammaṇampī^eb^ti subhākārena, iṭṭhākārena vā gayhamānaṃ rūpādiārammaṇampi subhanimittaṃ vuttākārena. ^b^Anupāyamanasikāro^eb^ti ākaṅkhitassa hitasukhassa anupāyabhūto manasikāro, tato eva ^b^uppathamanasikāro^eb^ti ayonisomanasikāro. ^b^Tasmi^eb^nti yathāniddhārite kāmacchandabhūte tadārammaṇabhūte ca duvidhepi subhanimitte. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘subhārammaṇe’’icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Atthi, bhikkhave, subhanimittantiādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kāmacchandanīvaraṇassa āhāradassanapāḷi uttānāti katvā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘evaṃ sabbanīvaraṇesu yojanā veditabbā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Paṭighopi^eb^^a^M2.0416^ea^^b^paṭighanimittaṃ^eb^ purimuppannassa pacchā uppajjanakassa nimittabhāvato. ^b^Paṭighārammaṇaṃ^eb^ nāma ekūnavīsati āghātavatthubhūtā sattasaṅkhārā. ^b^Aratī^eb^ti pantasenāsanādīsu aramaṇaṃ ^a^V2.0125^ea^. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhitā^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhabhāvo. ^b^Pantesū^eb^ti dūresu, vivittesu vā. ^b^Adhikusalesū^eb^ti samathavipassanādhammesu. ^b^Arati^eb^ ratipaṭipakkho. ^b^Aratitā^eb^ti aramaṇākāro. ^b^Anabhiratī^eb^ti anabhiratabhāvo. ^b^Anabhiramaṇā^eb^ti anabhiramaṇākāro. ^b^Ukkaṇṭhitā^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhanākāro. ^b^Paritassitā^eb^ti ukkaṇṭhanavaseneva paritassanā.

[03]^b^Āgantukaṃ,^eb^ na sabhāvasiddhaṃ. ^b^Kāyālasiya^eb^nti nāmakāye alasabhāvo. ^b^Sammohavinodaniyaṃ^eb^ pana ‘‘tandīti jātiālasiya’’nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vadatī^eb^ti etena atisītādipaccayā saṅkocāpattiṃ dasseti. ^b^Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ^eb^ kilesavatthuvibhaṅge (vibha. aṭṭha. 857). ^b^Tandī^eb^ti jātiālasiyaṃ. ^b^Tandiyanā^eb^ti tandiyanākāro. ^b^Tandimanakatā^eb^ti tandiyā abhibhūtacittatā. Alasassa bhāvo ^b^ālasyaṃ^eb^. Ālasyāyanākāro ^b^ālasyāyanā^eb^. Ālasyāyitassa bhāvo ^b^ālasyāyitattaṃ^eb^. Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyālasiyaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03]^b^Kilesavasenā^eb^ti sammohavasena. ^b^Kāyavinamanā^eb^ti kāyassa virūpato namanā. ^b^Jambhanā^eb^ti phandanā. Punappunaṃ jambhanā ^b^vijambhanā. Ānamanā^eb^ti purato namanā. ^b^Vinamanā^eb^ti pacchato namanā. ^b^Sannamanā^eb^ti samantato namanā. ^b^Paṇamanā^eb^ti yathā hi tantato uṭṭhitapesakāro kiñcideva upariṭṭhitaṃ gahetvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ ussāpeti, evaṃ kāyassa uddhaṃ ṭhapanā. ^b^Byādhiyaka^eb^nti uppannabyādhitā. Iti sabbehipi imehi padehi kilesavasena kāyaphandanameva kathitaṃ (vibha. aṭṭha. 858).

[03]^b^Bhattapariḷāho^eb^ti bhattavasena pariḷāhuppatti. ^b^Bhuttāvissā^eb^ti bhuttavato. ^b^Bhattamucchā^eb^ti bhattagelaññaṃ. Atibhuttapaccayā hi mucchāpatto viya hoti. ^b^Bhattakilamatho^eb^ti bhuttapaccayā kilantabhāvo. ^b^Bhattapariḷāho^eb^ti bhattadaratho. Kucchipūraṃ bhuttavato hi pariḷāhuppattiyā upahatindriyo viya hoti, kāyo khijjati. ^b^Kāyaduṭṭhulla^eb^nti bhuttabhattaṃ nissāya kāyassa akammaññatā.

[03]^b^Cittassa^eb^^a^M2.0417^ea^^b^līyanākāro^eb^ti ārammaṇe cittassa saṅkocappatti. ^b^Cittassa akalyatā^eb^ti cittassa gilānabhāvo. ^b^Gilāno^eb^ti akallako vuccati. Tathā cāha ‘‘nāhaṃ, bhante, akallako’’ti. ^b^Akammaññatā^eb^ti cittagelaññasaṅkhāto akammaññanākāro. ^b^Olīyanā^eb^ti olīyanākāro. Iriyāpathikampi cittaṃ yassa vasena iriyāpathaṃ sandhāretuṃ asakkonto olīyati, tassa taṃ ākāraṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘olīyanā’’^eb^ti. Dutiyapadaṃ upasaggena vaḍḍhitaṃ. ^b^Līna^eb^nti avipphārikatāya ^a^V2.0126^ea^ saṅkocappattaṃ. Itare dve ākāraniddesā. ^b^Thina^eb^nti avipphārikatāya anussāhanā asaṅgahanasaṅgahanaṃ. Thiyanākāro ^b^thiyanā. Thiyitatta^eb^nti thiyitassa ākāro, avipphārikatāti attho.

[03]^b^Cetaso avūpasamo^eb^ti cittassa avūpasantatā asannisinnabhāvo. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘avūpasantākāro’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atthato paneta^eb^nti svāyaṃ avūpasantākāro vikkhepasabhāvattā vikkhepahetutāya ca atthato etaṃ uddhaccakukkuccameva.

[03]^b^Vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā^eb^ nāma ‘‘buddhe kaṅkhatī’’tiādinā āgatāṭṭhakaṅkhāvatthubhūtā dhammā. Yasmā vicikicchā byāpādādayo viya anu anu uggahaṇapaccayā uppajjati, tasmā kaṅkhāṭṭhānīyaṃ ārammaṇameva dassitaṃ ‘‘vicikicchāya ārammaṇadhammā’’ti. Yasmā purimuppannā vicikicchā pacchā vicikicchāya paccayo hoti, tasmā vicikicchāpi vicikicchāṭṭhānīyadhammā veditabbā. Tatrāyaṃ vacanattho – tiṭṭhanti pavattanti etthāti ṭhānīyā, vicikicchā eva ṭhānīyā ^b^vicikicchāṭṭhānīyā^eb^. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ārammaṇassapi tattha visesapaccayataṃ upādāya ^b^‘‘kāmacchando vicikicchāti ime dve dhammā ārammaṇena kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Subhanimittassa hi paccayabhāvamattaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ, tathāpi yathā ‘‘paṭighampi paṭighanimitta’’nti katvā ‘‘byāpādo upanissayena kathito’’ti vuttaṃ, evaṃ subhampi subhanimittanti katvā kāmacchando upanissayena kathitoti sakkā viññātuṃ. ^b^Sesā^eb^ thinamiddhauddhaccakukkuccāni. Tattha thinamiddhaṃ aññamaññaṃ sahajātādivasena paccayo, tathā uddhaccakukkuccanti. Ubhayesampi upanissayakoṭiyā paccayabhāve vattabbameva natthīti āha ^b^‘‘sahajātena ca upanissayena cā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yasmā ^a^M2.0418^ea^ sati nāma ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhānā’’tiādinā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ anussaraṇavasena vattati, tasmā te dhammā satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā nāma. Lokuttaradhamme ca anussavādivasena gahetvā tathā pavattateva. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘satiyā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Kosallaṃ vuccati paññā, tato uppannā ^b^kosallasambhūtā. Anavajjasukhavipākā^eb^ti anavajjā hutvā sukhavipākā vipaccanakā. Padadvayena paccayato sabhāvato kiccato phalato kusaladhammaṃ dasseti. Akusalaniddesepi eseva nayo. ^b^Sāvajjā^eb^ti gārayhā. ^b^Anavajjā^eb^ti agārayhā. ^b^Hīnā^eb^ lāmakā. ^b^Paṇītā^eb^ seṭṭhā. ^b^Kaṇhā^eb^ kāḷakā asuddhā. ^b^Sukkā^eb^ odātā suddhā ^a^V2.0127^ea^. ^b^Paṭibhāga^eb^-saddo paṭhame vikappe sadisakoṭṭhāsattho, dutiye paṭipakkhakoṭṭhāsattho, tatiye niggahetabbapaṭipakkhakoṭṭhāsattho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]Kusalakiriyāya ādikammabhāvena pavattavīriyaṃ dhitisabhāvatāya dhātūti vuttanti āha ^b^‘‘ārambhadhātūti paṭhamārambhavīriya’’^eb^nti. Laddhāsevanaṃ vīriyaṃ balappattaṃ hutvā paṭipakkhaṃ vidhamatīti āha – ^b^‘‘nikkamadhātūti kosajjato nikkhantattā tato balavatara’’^eb^nti. Adhimattādhimattatarānaṃ paṭipakkhadhammānaṃ vidhamanasamatthaṃ paṭupaṭutarādibhāvappattaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘parakkamadhātūti paraṃ paraṃ ṭhānaṃ akkamanatāya tatopi balavatara’’^eb^nti.

[03]Tiṭṭhati pavattati etthāti ṭhānīyā. Ārammaṇadhammā, pītisambojjhaṅgassa ṭhānīyāti ^b^pītisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyā^eb^ti ^b^‘‘pītiyā ārammaṇadhammā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā aparāparuppattiyā pītipi tathā vattabbataṃ labhatīti vuttaṃ visuddhimagge ‘‘pītiyā eva taṃ nāma’’nti. ^b^Darathapassaddhī^eb^ti daratho kilesapariḷāho, so passambhati etāyāti darathapassaddhi, kāyapassaddhiyā vedanādikhandhattayassa viya rūpakāyassapi passambhanaṃ hoti, cittapassaddhiyā cittasseva passambhanaṃ, tato evettha bhagavatā lahutādīnaṃ viya duvidhatā vuttā. Tathā samāhitākāraṃ sallakkhetvā gayhamāno samathova ^b^samathanimittaṃ,^eb^ tassa ārammaṇabhūtaṃ paṭibhāganimittampi. Vividhaṃ aggaṃ etassāti byaggo, vikkhepo. Tathā hi so anavaṭṭhānaraso bhantatāpaccupaṭṭhāno vutto. Ekaggabhāvato byaggapaṭipakkhoti ^b^abyaggo,^eb^ samādhi, so eva nimittanti pubbe viya vattabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasseva vevacana’’^eb^nti.

[03]Yo ^a^M2.0419^ea^ ārammaṇe iṭṭhāniṭṭhākāraṃ anādiyitvā gahetabbo majjhattākāro, yo ca pubbe upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāvasena uppanno majjhattākāro, duvidhopi so upekkhāya ārammaṇadhammoti adhippetoti āha – ^b^‘‘atthato pana majjhattākāro upekkhāṭṭhānīyā dhammāti veditabbo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ārammaṇena kathitā^eb^ ārammaṇasseva tesaṃ visesapaccayabhāvato. ^b^Sesā^eb^ti vīriyādayo cattāro dhammā. Tesañhi upanissayova sātisayo icchitabboti.
[06]Kāyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^184^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Khīṇāsavassa lokuttaraṃ sīlaṃ^eb^ nāma maggaphalapariyāpannā sammāvācākammantājīvā sīlalakkhaṇappattā ^a^V2.0128^ea^ tadaññe cetanādayo. ^b^Lokiyaṃ^eb^ pana kiriyābyākatacittapariyāpannaṃ cārittasīlaṃ, vārittasīlassa pana sambhavo eva natthi viramaṇavasena pavattiyā abhāvato. ‘‘Pubbabhāgasīlaṃ lokiyasīla’’nti keci.

[03]^b^Cakkhudassana^eb^nti cakkhūhi dassanaṃ. ^b^Lakkhaṇassa dassana^eb^nti sabhāvadhammānaṃ saṅkhatānaṃ paccattalakkhaṇassa ñātapariññāya, aniccādisāmaññalakkhaṇassa tīraṇapariññāya dassanaṃ. Pajahantopi hi te pahātabbākārato passati nāma. Nibbānassa tathalakkhaṇaṃ maggaphalehi dassanaṃ, taṃ pana ^b^paṭivijjhanaṃ^eb^. Jhānena pathavīkasiṇādīnaṃ, abhiññāhi rūpānaṃ dassanampi ^b^ñāṇadassanameva. Cakkhudassanaṃ adhippetaṃ^eb^ savanapayirupāsanānaṃ parato gahitattā. ^b^Pañhapayirupāsana^eb^nti pañhapucchanavasena payirupāsanaṃ aññakammatthāya upasaṅkamanassa kevalaṃ upasaṅkamaneneva jotitattā.

[03]Ariyānaṃ anussati nāma guṇavasena, tatthāpi laddhaovādāvajjanamukhena yathābhūtasīlādiguṇānussaraṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘jhānavipassanā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aññesaṃyeva santike^eb^ti ariyehi aññesaṃ sāsanikānaṃyeva santike. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘anupabbajjā nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññesū^eb^ti sāsanikehi aññesu tāpasaparibbājakādīsu. Tattha hi pabbajjā ariyānaṃ anupabbajjā nāma na hotīti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Satasahassamattā^eb^^a^M2.0420^ea^^b^ahesuṃ^eb^ samantapāsādikattā mahātherassa. ^b^Laṅkādīpe^eb^ti nissayasīsena nissitasallakkhaṇaṃ. Na hi pabbajjā dīpapaṭiladdhā, atha kho dīpanivāsiācariyapaṭiladdhā. ^b^Mahinda…pe… pabbajanti nāma^eb^ tassa parivāratāya pabbajjāyāti.

[03]^b^Saratī^eb^ti taṃ ovādānusāsanidhammaṃ cinteti citte karoti. ^b^Vitakkāhataṃ karotī^eb^ti punappunaṃ parivitakkanena tadatthaṃ vitakkanipphāditaṃ karoti. ^b^Āraddho hotī^eb^ti sampādito hoti. Taṃ pana sampādanaṃ pāripūri evāti āha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇo hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti yathāvutte dhamme. ^b^Ñāṇacāravasenā^eb^ti ñāṇassa pavattanavasena. ^b^Tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ovādadhamme āgatānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ. ^b^Lakkhaṇa^eb^nti visesalakkhaṇaṃ sāmaññalakkhaṇañca. ^b^Pavicinatī^eb^ti ‘‘idaṃ rūpaṃ ettakaṃ rūpa’’ntiādinā vicayaṃ āpajjati. ^b^Ñāṇañca ropetī^eb^ti ‘‘aniccaṃ calaṃ palokaṃ pabhaṅgū’’tiādinā ñāṇaṃ pavatteti. ^b^Vīmaṃsanaṃ…pe… āpajjatī^eb^ti rūpasattakārūpasattakakkamena ^a^V2.0129^ea^ vipassanaṃ paccakkhato viya aniccatādīnaṃ dassanaṃ sammasanaṃ āpajjati.

[03]^b^Ubhayampeta^eb^nti phalānisaṃsāti vuttadvayaṃ. ^b^Atthato ekaṃ^eb^ pariyāyasaddattā. ^b^Paṭikaccā^eb^ti pageva. ^b^Maraṇakāle^eb^ti maraṇakālasamīpe. Samīpatthe hi idaṃ bhummanti āha ^b^‘‘maraṇassa āsannakāle’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^So tividho hoti^eb^ ñāṇassa tikkhamajjhamudubhāvena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kappasahassāyukesū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Upahaccaparinibbāyī nāma^eb^ āyuvemajjhaṃ atikkamitvā parinibbāyanato. ^b^Yattha katthacī^eb^ti avihādīsu yattha katthaci. ^b^Sappayogenā^eb^ti vipassanāñāṇasaṅkhārasaṅkhātena payogena, saha vipassanāpayogenāti attho. Suddhāvāsabhūmiyaṃ uddhaṃyeva maggasoto etassāti ^b^uddhaṃsoto^eb^. Paṭisandhivasena akaniṭṭhabhavaṃ gacchatīti ^b^akaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^.

[03]Avihādīsu vattamānopi ekaṃsato uddhaṃgamanāraho puggalo akaniṭṭhagāmī eva nāmāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca hontī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti niddhāraṇe sāmivacanaṃ. Uddhaṃsotabhāvato yadipi heṭṭhimādīsupi ariyabhūmi nibbattateva, tathāpi tattha bhūmīsu āyuṃ ^a^M2.0421^ea^ aggahetvā akaniṭṭhabhave āyuvaseneva soḷasakappasahassāyukatā daṭṭhabbā. ‘‘Satta phalā sattānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘arahattamaggassa pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgā kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sattannampi sahabhāvo labbhatīti ^b^‘‘apubbaṃ acarimaṃ ekacittakkhaṇikā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tayidaṃ pāḷiyaṃ tattha tattha ‘‘tasmiṃ samaye’’ti āgatavacanena viññāyati, bojjhaṅgānaṃ pana nānāsabhāvattā ^b^‘‘nānālakkhaṇā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Sīlasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^185^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Satisambojjhaṅgo’’ti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ hotī^eb^ti satisambojjhaṅgo nāma seṭṭho uttamo pavaro, tasmāhaṃ satisambojjhaṅgasīsena phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā viharissāmīti evaṃ ce mayhaṃ pubbabhāge hotīti attho. ^b^‘‘Appamāṇo’’ti evaṃ mayhaṃ hotī^eb^ti svāyaṃ satisambojjhaṅgo, sabbaso pamāṇakarakilesābhāvato appamāṇadhammārammaṇato ca appamāṇoti evaṃ mayhaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hoti. ^b^Suparipuṇṇo^eb^ti bhāvanāpāripūriyā suṭṭhu paripuṇṇoti evaṃ ^a^V2.0130^ea^ mayhaṃ antosamāpattiyaṃ asammohavasena hotīti. ^b^Tiṭṭhatī^eb^ti yathākālaparicchedasamāpattiyā avaṭṭhānena tappariyāpannatāya satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati paṭibandhavasena. ^b^Uppādaṃ anāvajjitattā^eb^ti uppādassa anāvajjanena asamannāhārena. Uppādasīsena cettha uppādavantova saṅkhārā gahitā. ^b^Anuppāda^eb^nti nibbānaṃ uppādābhāvato uppādavantehi ca vinissaṭattā. ^b^Pavatta^eb^nti vipākappavattaṃ. ^b^Appavatta^eb^nti nibbānaṃ tappaṭikkhepato. ^b^Nimitta^eb^nti sabbasaṅkhāranimittaṃ. ^b^Animitta^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^Saṅkhāre^eb^ti uppādādianāmasanena kevalameva saṅkhāragahaṇaṃ. ^b^Visaṅkhāra^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^Āvajjitattā^eb^ āvajjitakālato paṭṭhāya ārabbha pavattiyā ^b^satisambojjhaṅgo tiṭṭhati. Aṭṭhahākārehī^eb^ti aṭṭhahi kāraṇehi. ^b^Jānātī^eb^ti samāpattito vuṭṭhitakāle pajānāti. ^b^Aṭṭhahākārehī^eb^ti uppādāvajjanādīhi ceva anuppādāvajjanādīhi ca vuttākāraviparītehi aṭṭhahi ākārehi ^b^cavantaṃ^eb^ samāpattivasena anavaṭṭhānatopi gacchantaṃ ^b^cavatī^eb^ti thero ^b^pajānātī^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Phalabojjhaṅgā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0422^ea^ phalasamāpattipariyāpannā bojjhaṅgā. Kiṃ pana te visuṃ visuṃ pavattantīti āha ^b^‘‘yadā hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sīsaṃ katvā^eb^ti padhānaṃ seṭṭhaṃ katvā. ^b^Tadanvayā^eb^ti tadanugatā satisambojjhaṅgaṃ anugacchanakā. Tañca kho tathā katvā dhammaṃ paccavekkhaṇavasena. Keci pana ‘‘taṃ paccavekkhaṇādikaṃ katvā’’ti vadanti.
[06]Vatthasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^186^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bodhāyā^eb^ti ettha bodho nāma bujjhanaṃ, taṃ pana kissa kenāti pucchanto ^b^‘‘kiṃ bujjhanatthāyā’’^eb^ti vatvā taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘maggenā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Maggena nibbānaṃ bujjhanatthāya saṃvattanti, paccavekkhaṇāya katakiccataṃ bujjhanatthāya saṃvattanti, paṭhamavikappe sacchikiriyābhisamayo eva dassitoti tena atuṭṭhe ^b^‘‘maggena vā’’^eb^ti dutiyavikappamāha. ^b^Vivekanissitaṃ virāganissita^eb^nti padehi sabbaṃ maggakiccaṃ tassa phalañca dassitaṃ. ^b^Nirodhanissita^eb^nti iminā nibbānasacchikiriyā. ^b^Kāmāsavāpi cittaṃ vimuccatī^eb^tiādinā kilesappahānaṃ. ^b^Vimuttasmiṃ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṃ hotī^eb^tiādinā paccavekkhaṇā dassitā.
[06]Bhikkhusuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^187-188^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nibaddhavāsavasena ^a^V2.0131^ea^ ārāme nisīdanasīloti ^b^ārāmanisādī^eb^. Parisaṃ ogāḷho hutvā caratīti ^b^parisāvacaro^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘yo panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Eva^eb^nti iminākārena. ^b^Gahaṇa^eb^nti niggahaṇaṃ. Tena pucchāpadassa atthaṃ vivarati. ^b^Nibbeṭhana^eb^nti niggahanibbeṭhanaṃ. Tena vissajjanapadassa atthaṃ vivarati. ^b^Iminā nayenā^eb^ti etena ‘‘itivādo’’ti ettha iti-saddassa atthaṃ dasseti. Upārambhādhippāyo vadati etenāti ^b^vādo,^eb^ doso. ^b^Itivādo hotī^eb^ti evaṃ imassa upari vādāropanaṃ hoti. ^b^Itivādappamokkho^eb^ti evaṃ tato pamokkho hoti ^a^M2.0423^ea^. Evaṃ vādappamokkhānisaṃsaṃ parehi āropitadosassa nibbeṭhanavasena dassetvā idāni dosapavedanavasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ pucchāya doso’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ettakaṃ ṭhāna^eb^ntiādito paṭṭhāya yāva ‘‘tīṇi sucaritānī’’ti ettakaṃ ṭhānaṃ. ^b^Imaṃ desana^eb^nti ‘‘indriyasaṃvaro kho’’tiādinayappavattaṃ imaṃ desanaṃ. ^b^Nābhijjhāyatī^eb^ti na abhijjhāyati. ^b^Nābhihaṃsatī^eb^ti na abhitussati. ^b^Gocarajjhatte ṭhitaṃ hotī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānārammaṇe samādhānavasena ṭhitaṃ hoti avaṭṭhitaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘susaṇṭhita’’^eb^nti. ^b^Susaṇṭhita^eb^nti sammā avikkhepavasena ṭhitaṃ. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānānuyuñjanavasena paṭipakkhato nīvaraṇato vimuttiyā. Suṭṭhu vimuttanti ^b^suvimuttaṃ. Tasmiṃ^eb^ amanāparūpadassane ^b^na maṅku^eb^ vilakkho na hoti. ^b^Kilesavasena^eb^ dosavasena. ^b^Aṭṭhitacitto^eb^ athaddhacitto. Kovesena hi cittaṃ thaddhaṃ hoti, na mudukaṃ. ^b^Adīnamānaso^eb^ti domanassavasena yo dīnabhāvo, tadabhāvena niddosamānaso. ^b^Apūticitto^eb^ti byāpajjābhāvena sītibhūtacitto.

[03]Imesu chasu dvāresu aṭṭhārasa duccaritāni honti paccekaṃ kāyavacīmanoduccaritabhedena. Tāni vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate^eb^ti nayadānamattametaṃ. Tena ‘‘aniṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate dosaṃ uppādentassā’’tiādinā tividhaduccaritaṃ nīharitvā vattabbaṃ, tathā ‘‘majjhattārammaṇe mohaṃ uppādentassā’’tiādinā ca. Manoduccaritādisāmaññena pana tīṇiyeva duccaritāni hontīti veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Paññattivasenā^eb^ti vatthuṃ anāmasitvā piṇḍagahaṇamukhena kevalaṃ paññattivaseneva. ^b^Bhāvanāpaṭisaṅkhāne^eb^ti bhāvanāsiddhe paṭisaṅkhāne, bhāvanāya paṭisaṅkhāne vāti attho. ^b^Imānī^eb^ti yathāvuttāni chadvārārammaṇāni. ^b^Duccaritānī^eb^ti duccaritakāraṇāni. Appaṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassa duccaritāni ^a^V2.0132^ea^ sucaritāni katvā. ^b^Pariṇāmetī^eb^ti parivatteti duccaritāni tattha anuppādetvā sucaritāni ^a^M2.0424^ea^ uppādento. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena. ^b^Indriyasaṃvaro…pe… veditabbo^eb^ indriyasaṃvarasampādanavasena tiṇṇaṃ sucaritānaṃ sijjhanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ettāvatā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Ettāvatā^eb^ti ādito paṭṭhāya yāva ‘‘tīṇi sucaritāni paripūrentī’’ti padaṃ, ettāvatā. ^b^Sīlānurakkhakaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīla^eb^nti catupārisuddhisīlassa anurakkhakaṃ indriyasaṃvarasīlaṃ kathikaṃ. Kathaṃ pana tadeva tassa anurakkhakaṃ hotīti? Aparāparuppattiyā upanissayabhāvato.

[03]^b^Tīṇi sīlānī^eb^ti indriyasaṃvara-ājīvapārisuddhi-paccayasannissita-sīlāni. ^b^Lokuttaramissakā^eb^ti lokiyāpi lokuttarāpi hontīti attho. ^b^Sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgāna^eb^nti lokuttarānaṃ sattannaṃ bojjhaṅgānaṃ. ^b^Mūlabhūtā satipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā,^eb^ te sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘cattāro kho, kuṇḍaliya, satipaṭṭhānā bhāvitā bahulīkatā satta bojjhaṅge paripūrentī’’ti. ^b^Tepī^eb^ti yathāvuttasatipaṭṭhānā. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānamūlakā bojjhaṅgā^eb^ti lokiyasatipaṭṭhānamūlakā bojjhaṅgāva. ^b^Pubbabhāgāvā^eb^ti ettha keci ‘‘pubbabhāgā cā’’ti pāṭhaṃ katvā ‘‘pubbeva lokuttarā pubbabhāgā cā’’ti atthaṃ vadanti. ^b^Vijjāvimuttimūlakā^eb^ti ‘‘satta kho, kuṇḍaliya, bojjhaṅgā bhāvitā bahulīkatā vijjāvimuttiṃ paripūrentī’’ti evaṃ vuttā bojjhaṅgā lokuttarāva vijjāvimuttisahagatabhāvato.
[06]Kuṇḍaliyasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^189^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paccatta^eb^nti karaṇaniddeso ayanti āha – ^b^‘‘attanāvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kurumānoyevā^eb^ti uppādento ^b^eva. Kammaṭṭhānavimuttiyā suṭṭhu vimutta^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānamanasikārena nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvato tehi suṭṭhu vimuttaṃ. ^b^Atthaṃ karitvā^eb^ti bhāvanāmanasikāraṃ uttamaṃ katvā. ‘‘Mahā vata me ayaṃ attho uppanno’’ti ^b^atthiko hutvā^eb^.
[03]^b^190^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tathāgatassa pātubhāvā^eb^tiādinā buddhuppādakāle eva bojjhaṅgaratanapaṭilābhoti dasseti.
[06]Pabbatavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^192-194^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yesa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0425^ea^^a^V2.0133^ea^ yesaṃ sattānaṃ. ^b^Cattāro iriyāpathā atthi^eb^ labbhanti tadupagasarīrāvayavalābhena. ^b^Eta^eb^nti ‘‘cattāro iriyāpathe kappentī’’ti etaṃ vacanaṃ. ‘‘Vivekanissita’’ntiādivacanato ^b^‘‘sahavipassanake maggabojjhaṅge’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Dutiyatatiyāni uttānatthāneva^eb^ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā.

[03]^b^195-201^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Visuddhaṃ ahosi^eb^ visabhāgadhātukkhobhaṃ vūpasamentaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pokkharapatte …pe… vinivattitvā gato’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ pāḷito atthato ca catutthena pañcamachaṭṭhānaṃ samānattā. ^b^Visarukkhavātasamphassenā^eb^ti visarukkhasannissitavātasamphassena. ^b^Mandasītajaro^eb^ti muduko sītajaro. ^b^Sesa^eb^nti vuttāvasesaṃ. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sattamādīsu catūsu.
[06]Gilānavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^202-203^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kittakena nu kho^eb^ kāraṇena ^b^bujjhanakāṅgā nāma vuccanti^eb^ bujjhanakassa puggalassa aṅgāti vattabbataṃ labhanti. ^b^Missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā^eb^ sahavipassanā maggabojjhaṅgā kathitāti katvā. ^b^Dhammaparicchedo kathito^eb^ gaṇanāmattena paricchinditvā vuttattā na bhūmantaraparicchedo, vipassanādiparicchedo vā.

[03]^b^204-206^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kāmarāgena ^a^V2.0134^ea^ gadhitabbaṭṭhānabhūtā kāmarāgaṭṭhāniyāti āha ^b^‘‘ārammaṇadhammāna’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Manasikārabahulīkārā’’ti vuttattā ^b^‘‘ārammaṇeneva kathita’’^eb^nti ^a^M2.0426^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Vuttaparicchedo^eb^ti etena na kevalaṃ ārammaṇavaseneva, atha kho upanissayavasenapettha attho labbhatīti dasseti. Paṭhamavaggassa hi dutiye sutte upanissayavaseneva attho dassito. ^b^Missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā^eb^ avibhāgeneva kathitattā. ^b^Aparihāniye^eb^ti tīhi sikkhāhi aparihānāvahe.

[03]^b^207-208^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘So maṃ pucchissatī’’^eb^ti adhippāyena ^b^bhagavatā osāpitadesanaṃ. Patthaṭattā^eb^ bhāvanāpāripūriyā vitthāritaṃ gatattā. ^b^Mahantabhāva^eb^nti bhāvanāvaseneva mahattaṃ gatattā. Tato eva ^b^vaḍḍhippamāṇā^eb^. Nīvaraṇavigame sambhavato paccayato byāpādo vigato hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘nīvaraṇānaṃ dūrībhāvena byāpādavirahitattā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Taṇhāmūlaka^eb^nti taṇhāpaccayaṃ. Yañhi taṇhāsahagataṃ asahagatampi taṇhaṃ upanissāya nipphannaṃ, sabbaṃ taṃ taṇhāmūlakaṃ. ^b^Pahīyati^eb^ anuppādappahānena. ^b^Taṇhādīnaṃyeva khayā,^eb^ na tesaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ khayā. ^b^Etehi^eb^ taṇhakkhayādipadehi.

[03]^b^209^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nibbijjhantīti nibbedhā, nibbijjhanadhammā dhammavinayādayo, tappariyāpannatāya nibbedhabhāge gato nibbedhabhāgiyo, taṃ ^b^nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘nibbijjhanakoṭṭhāsiya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bhāvetvā ṭhitena^eb^ cittena. Vipassanāmaggampi gahetvā ^b^‘‘maggabojjhaṅgā missakā’’^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti bojjhaṅgehi ^b^bhāvitaṃ^eb^ cittaṃ. ^b^Te vā^eb^ bojjhaṅge ^b^bhāvetvā ṭhitaṃ cittaṃ^eb^ nāma phalacittaṃ, tasmā ^b^nibbattitalokuttarameva. Tampī^eb^ti phalacittampi maggānantaratāya ^b^magganissitaṃ katvā missakameva kathetuṃ vaṭṭati^eb^ ‘‘bodhāya saṃvattantī’’ti vuttattā.
[03]^b^210^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṃyojanasaṅkhātā vinibandhā^eb^ti kāmarāgādisaṃyojanasaññitā bandhanā. ^b^Pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇā^eb^ti gilitvā viya pariniṭṭhapetvā gahaṇākārā.

[03]^b^211^eb^^b^.^eb^ Bahukataṃ ^a^M2.0427^ea^^a^V2.0135^ea^ vuccati bahukāro bahumāno, natthi etassa bahukatanti ^b^abahukato,^eb^ akatabahumāno. Dhammo uppajjamāno ukkujjanto viya nirujjhamāno avakujjanto viya hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ukkujjaṃ vuccati udayo, avakujjaṃ vayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Parivattento^eb^ti aniccātipi dukkhātipi anattātipi. ‘‘Eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho, yo te…pe… tathattāya upanessatī’’ti pariyosāne bhagavato vacanañcettha sādhakaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Tena tenākārena viharanta^eb^nti yena sammasanākārena vipassanāvihārena viharantaṃ. ^b^Tathābhāvāyā^eb^ti khīṇāsavabhāvapaccavekkhaṇāya. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘khīṇā jātīti…pe… taṃ dassento evamāhā’’^eb^ti.
[06]Udāyivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^214-215^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na ca pabhāvanta^eb^nti na ca pabhāsampannaṃ. ^b^Pabhijjanasabhāva^eb^nti tāpetvā tālane pabhaṅgutaṃ. ^b^Avasesaṃ loha^eb^nti vuttāvasesaṃ jātilohaṃ, vijātilohaṃ, kittimalohanti pabhedaṃ sabbampi lohaṃ. ^b^Uppajjituṃ appadānenā^eb^ti ettha nanu lokiyakusalacittassapi suvisuddhassa uppajjituṃ appadānena upakkilesatāti? Saccametaṃ, yasmiṃ pana santāne nīvaraṇāni laddhapatiṭṭhāni, tattha mahaggatakusalassapi asambhavo, pageva lokuttarakusalassa, parittakusalaṃ pana yathāpaccayaṃ uppajjati. Nīvaraṇe hi vūpasante santāne uppattiyā aparisuddhaṃ hoti, upakkiliṭṭhaṃ nāma hoti, aparisuddhadīpakapallikavaṭṭhitelādisannissayo dīpo viya, apica nippariyāyato uppajjituṃ appadāneneva tesaṃ upakkilesatāti dassento ^b^‘‘yadaggena hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ārammaṇe vikkhittappattivasena ^b^cuṇṇavicuṇṇatā^eb^ veditabbā. ^b^Na āvarantī^eb^ti kusaladhamme uppajjituṃ appadānavasena na āvaranti, atha kho tesaṃ uppattiyā honti. ^b^Na paṭicchādentī^eb^ti na ^a^M2.0428^ea^ vinandhanti. ^b^Catubhūmakacittassā^eb^ti catutthabhūmakakusalacittassa anupakkilesā, tehi akilissanato.
[03]^b^219^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paññā^eb^^a^V2.0136^ea^^b^dubbalā hoti,^eb^ na balavatī paṭipakkhena upakkiliṭṭhabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mandā avisadā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pañca nīvaraṇā dūre honti^eb^ āvaraṇābhāvato. ^b^Tameva pīti^eb^nti sappāyadhammasavane uppannaṃ pītiṃ. Tassā tadā uppannākārasallakkhaṇena avijahanto punappunaṃ tassā nibbattanena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pañca nīvaraṇe vikkhambhetvā’’^eb^ti.^b^ Idaṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti ettake divasepi na vinassanti, sā dhammapīti laddhapaccayā hutvā visesāvahāti imamatthaṃ sandhāya etaṃ ‘‘imassa pañca nīvaraṇā tasmiṃ samaye na hontī’’tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Pītipāmojjapakkhiyā^eb^ti pītipāmojjapaccayā. ^b^Nassantī^eb^ti nirodhapaccayavasena pavattanato nassanti. Sabhāgapaccayavasena ^b^puna uppajjantāpi…pe… vuccati^eb^ kiccasādhanavasena pavattanato.
[03]^b^220^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiruhanakā^eb^ti samīparukkhe abhibhavitvā ruhanakā. ^b^Aṭṭhikacchako^eb^ti aṭṭhibahulakacchako. Kapithanasadisaphalattā ^b^kapitthano^eb^ti laddhanāmo.

[03]^b^221^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Andhabhāvakaraṇā^eb^ paññācakkhussa vibandhanato. Tathā hi te ‘‘acakkhukaraṇā paññānirodhikā’’ti vuttā. Vihanati vibādhatīti ^b^vighāto,^eb^ dukkhanti āha ^b^‘‘vighātapakkhiyāti dukkhapakkhikā’’^eb^ti. Nibbānatthāya na saṃvattantīti ^b^anibbānasaṃvattanikā. Missakabojjhaṅgāva kathitā^eb^ pubbabhāgikānaṃ kathitattā.
[06]Nīvaraṇavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^222^eb^^b^.^eb^ Vidhīyantīti ^a^M2.0429^ea^^a^V2.0137^ea^^b^vidhā,^eb^ mānādibhāgā koṭṭhāsāti āha ^b^‘‘tayo mānakoṭṭhāsā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tathā tathā vidahanato^eb^ti ‘‘seyyohamasmī’’tiādinā tena tenākārena vidahanato ṭhapanato, ṭhapetabbato vā.

[03]^b^223^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sirisampattiyā rājati^eb^ dippati sobhatīti ^b^rājā,^eb^ dānapiyavacanātthacariyāsamānattatāsaṅkhātehi ^b^catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi^eb^. ^b^Rañjetī^eb^ti rameti. ^b^Abbhuggatāyā^eb^ti udīritā nibbattito tattha tattha gacchanato. ^b^Cakkaṃ vattetī^eb^ti cakkaratanaṃ pavatteti. ^b^Devaṭṭhāna^eb^nti pūjanīyadevaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Cittīkataṭṭhenā^eb^ti pūjanīyabhāvena. ^b^Aggho natthi^eb^ cirakālasambhavapuññānubhāvasiddharatanasabbhāvato. ^b^Aññehi^eb^ cakkavattino pariggahabhūtaratanehi. ^b^Loke^eb^ti manussaloke. Tena tadaññalokaṃ nivatteti. ^b^Vijjamāna^eb^ggahaṇena atītānāgataṃ nivatteti. ^b^Buddhā ca kadāci karahaci uppajjanti^eb^ cakkavattinopi yebhuyyena tasmiṃyeva uppajjanatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Anomassā^eb^ti alāmakassa ukkaṭṭhassa. ^b^Sesāni^eb^ ratanāni.

[03]^b^Tatrā^eb^ti vākyopaññāsane nipāto, tasmiṃ pātubhāvavacane. ^b^‘‘Ayutta’’^eb^nti vatvā tattha adhippāyaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘uppannaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tehi ratanehi ^b^cakkavattananiyamāpekkhatāya^eb^ cakkavattivacanassa. ^b^Niyamenā^eb^ti ekantena. ^b^Vattabbataṃ āpajjati^eb^ bhāvini bhūte viya upacāroti yathā – ‘‘agamā rājagahaṃ buddho’’ti (su. ni. 410). ^b^Laddhanāmassā^eb^ti cakkavattīti loke laddhasamaññassa patthanīyassa purisavisesassa. ^b^Mūluppattivacanatopī^eb^ti ‘‘cakkavattissa pātubhāvā’’ti etassa paṭhamuppattiyā vacanatopi. Idāni tamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Yo hi cakkavattirājā, tassa uppattiyā cakkaratanassa uppajjanato cakkavattīti evaṃ nāmaṃ uppajjati. ‘‘Cakkaṃ vattessatī’’ti idaṃ pana niyāmaṃ anapekkhitvā tassa uppajjatīti ratanānuppattiṃ ^a^M2.0430^ea^ gahetvā vuttanayato saññā uppajjati ‘‘cakkavattī’’ti. ^b^Ekamevā^eb^ti cakkaratanameva paṭhamaṃ pātubhavati. Yasmiṃ bhūte rañño cakkavattisamaññā, atha pacchā ^a^V2.0138^ea^ ratanāni pātubhavantīti bahūnaṃ pātubhāvaṃ upādāya ^b^bahulavacanatopi etaṃ^eb^ ‘‘cakkavattissa pātubhāvā ratanānaṃ pātubhāvo’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^ hetukattusaññito atthabhedo. ^b^Pātubhāvā^eb^ti pātubhāvato. Puññasambhāro bhinnasantānatāya ^b^ratanānampi pariyāyena upanissayahetū^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Yuttamevetaṃ^eb^ yathāvuttayuttiyuttattā.

[03]Vattabbabhūto adhippāyo etassa atthīti adhippāyo, atthaniddeso, saṅkhepato adhippāyo ^b^saṅkhepādhippāyo^eb^. Cakkaratanānubhāvena cakkavattissariyassa sijjhanato ^b^‘‘dātuṃ samatthassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yojanappamāṇe padese pavattattā ^b^yojanappamāṇaṃ andhakāraṃ^eb^. Atidīghātirassatādiṃ chabbidhaṃ dosaṃ vivajjetvā ṭhitassāti vacanaseso.

[03]^b^Sabbesaṃ catubhūmakadhammānaṃ purecaraṃ^eb^ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ gatiyo samanvesanavasena pavattanato. Buddhādīhipi appahānīyatāya mahantadhammasabhāvattā dhammakāye ca jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena ^b^dhammakāyūpapannaṃ^eb^. Paññāpāsādatāya cassa uparigataṭṭhena ^b^accuggataṃ^eb^. Vitthataṭṭhena ^b^vipulaṃ^eb^. Mahantatāya ^b^mahantaṃ^eb^. Anādikālabhāvitassa kilesasantānassa khaṇeneva viddhaṃsanato ^b^sīghaṃ lahu java^eb^nti pariyāyā. Bojjhaṅgadhammapariyāpannattā hi vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ekanta-kusalattā’’^eb^ti. Sampayuttavasena pītiyā ālokaviddhaṃsanabhāvavasenāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sahajātapaccayādī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sabbasaṅgāhikadhammaparicchedo^eb^ti catubhūmakattā sabbasaṅgāhako bojjhaṅgadhammaparicchedo kathito.
[03]^b^225-231^eb^^b^.^eb^ Eḷaṃ vuccati doso, eḷena mūgo viyāti ^b^eḷamūgo^eb^ti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘mukhena vāca’’^eb^ntiādimāha.
[06]Cakkavattivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^232^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Purimanayato^eb^ti ^a^V2.0139^ea^^a^M2.0431^ea^ ‘‘satisambojjhaṅgaṭṭhānīyānaṃ dhammāna’’ntiādinā āgatanayato. ^b^Eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākārena. Sati ca sampajaññañca ^b^satisampajaññaṃ^eb^. Satipadhānaṃ vā abhikkantādīsu satthakabhāvapariggaṇhakañāṇaṃ ^b^satisampajaññaṃ^eb^. Taṃ sabbattha satokārībhāvāvahattā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya saṃvattati. Yathā ca paccanīkadhammappahānaṃ anurūpadhammadesanā ca anuppannānaṃ kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādāya hoti, evaṃ satirahitapuggalavajjanā satokārīpuggalasevanā ca tattha ca yuttapayuttatā satisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti imamatthaṃ dasseti ^b^‘‘satisampajañña’’^eb^ntiādinā. ^b^Arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti^eb^. Tathā hi arahāva ‘‘sativepullappatto’’ti vuccati.

[03]Dhammānaṃ, dhammesu vā vicayo, so eva heṭṭhā vuttanayena sambojjhaṅgo, tassa ^b^dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa. Paripucchakatā^eb^ti ācariyaṃ payirupāsitvā pañcapi nikāye sahaṭṭhakathāya pariyogāhetvā yaṃ yaṃ tattha gaṇṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, tassa tassa ‘‘idaṃ, bhante, kathaṃ imassa ko attho’’ti evaṃ khandhādīsu atthapucchakabhāvo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khandha…pe… bahulatā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Vatthuvisadakiriyā^eb^ti cittacetasikānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato sarīraṃ tappaṭibaddhāni ca cīvarādīni idha ‘‘vatthūnī’’ti adhippetāni, tāni yathā cittassa sukhāvahāni honti, tathā karaṇaṃ tesaṃ visadabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ajjhattikabāhirāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Ussannadosa^eb^nti vātādiussannadosaṃ. ^b^Sedamalamakkhita^eb^nti sedena ceva jallikāsaṅkhātena sarīramalena ca makkhitaṃ. ^b^Ca^eb^-saddena aññampi sarīrassa ca cittassa ca pīḷāvahaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Senāsanaṃ vā^eb^ti ^b^vā^eb^-saddena pattādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Avisade^eb^ sati, visayabhūte vā. Kathaṃ bhāvanamanuyuttassa tāni visayoti? Antarantarā pavattanakacittuppādavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Te hi cittuppādā cittekaggatāya ijjhantiyāpi aparisuddhabhāvāya saṃvattanti. ^b^Cittacetasikesu^eb^ nissayādipaccayabhūtesu. ^b^Ñāṇampī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo sampiṇḍane. Tena na kevalaṃ taṃ vatthuyeva ^a^M2.0432^ea^, atha kho tasmiṃ aparisuddhe ñāṇampi aparisuddhaṃ hotīti nissayāparisuddhiyā nissitāparisuddhi viya visayassa aparisuddhatāya visayīnaṃ aparisuddhiṃ dasseti anvayato byatirekato ca.

[03]^b^Samabhāvakaraṇaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0140^ea^ kiccato anūnādhikabhāvakaraṇaṃ. Yathāpaccayaṃ saddheyyavatthusmiṃ adhimokkhakiccassa paṭutarabhāvena paññāya avisadatāya vīriyādīnañca anubalappadānasithilatādinā ^b^saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ hoti^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘itarāni mandānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tato^eb^ti tasmā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvato itaresañca mandattā. Kosajjapakkhe patituṃ adatvā sampayuttadhammānaṃ paggaṇhanaṃ anubalappadānaṃ ^b^paggaho,^eb^ paggahakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotīti sambandhitabbaṃ. Ārammaṇaṃ upagantvā ṭhānaṃ, anissajjanaṃ vā ^b^upaṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ vikkhepapaṭipakkho. Yena vā sampayuttā avikkhittā honti, so ^b^avikkhepo^eb^. Rūpagataṃ viya cakkhunā yena yāthāvato visayasabhāvaṃ passati, taṃ ^b^dassanakiccaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ balavatā saddhindriyena abhibhūtattā. Sahajātadhammesu hi indaṭṭhaṃ karontānaṃ saha pavattamānānaṃ dhammānaṃ ekarasatāvaseneva atthasiddhi, na aññathā. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti vuttamevatthaṃ kāraṇabhāvena paccāmasati. ^b^Ta^eb^nti saddhindriyaṃ.

[03]^b^Dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇenā^eb^ti yassa saddheyyavatthuno uḷāratādiguṇe adhimuccanassa sātisayappavattiyā saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tassa paccayapaccayuppannatādivibhāgato yāthāvato vīmaṃsanena. Evañhi evaṃdhammatānayena sabhāvasarasato pariggayhamāne savipphāro adhimokkho na hoti – ‘‘ayaṃ imesaṃ dhammānaṃ sabhāvo’’ti paññābyāpārassa sātisayattā. Dhuriyadhammesu hi yathā saddhāya balavabhāve paññāya mandabhāvo hoti, evaṃ paññāya balavabhāve saddhāya mandabhāvo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘taṃ dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena…pe… hāpetabba’’nti. ^b^Tathā amanasikaraṇenā^eb^ti yenākārena bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tenākārena bhāvanaṃ nānuyuñjanenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Idha duvidhena saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo attano vā paccayavisesena kiccuttariyato vīriyādīnaṃ vā mandakiccatāya. Tattha paṭhamavikappe hāpanavidhi dassito, dutiyavikappe pana yathā manasikaroto vīriyādīnaṃ mandakiccatāya saddhindriyaṃ balavaṃ jātaṃ, tathā amanasikārena vīriyādīnaṃ paṭutarabhāvāvahena manasikārena saddhindriyaṃ tehi ^a^M2.0433^ea^ samataṃ karontena hāpetabbaṃ. Iminā nayena sesindriyesupi hāpanavidhi veditabbo.

[03]^b^Vakkalittheravatthū^eb^ti so hi āyasmā saddhādhimutto tattha ca katādhikāro satthu rūpakāyadassane pasuto eva hutvā viharanto satthārā – ‘‘kiṃ te, vakkali, iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho, vakkali, dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ passatī’’tiādinā (saṃ. ni. 3.87) ovadiyamāno kammaṭṭhāne niyojitopi taṃ ananuyuñjanto paṇāmito attānaṃ ^a^V2.0141^ea^ vinipātetuṃ papātaṭṭhānaṃ abhiruhi. Atha naṃ satthā yathānisinnova obhāsavissajjanena attānaṃ dassetvā –
[21]‘‘Pāmojjabahulo bhikkhu, pasanno buddhasāsane;
[22]Adhigacche padaṃ santaṃ, saṅkhārūpasamaṃ sukha’’nti. (dha. pa. 381) –

[07]Gāthaṃ vatvā ‘‘ehi, vakkalī’’ti āha. So tena vacanena amateneva abhisitto haṭṭhatuṭṭho hutvā vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapesi, saddhāya bahulabhāvato vipassanāvīthiṃ nārohati. Taṃ ñatvā bhagavā indriyasamattapaṭipādanāya kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā adāsi. So satthārā dinnanayena vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā maggapaṭipāṭiyā arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Tena vuttaṃ – ‘‘vakkalittheravatthu cettha nidassana’’nti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti saddhindriyassa adhimattabhāve sesindriyānaṃ sakiccākaraṇe.

[03]^b^Itarakiccabheda^eb^nti upaṭṭhānādikiccavisesaṃ. ^b^Passaddhādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena samādhiupekkhāsambojjhaṅgānaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Hāpetabba^eb^nti yathā saddhindriyassa balavabhāvo dhammasabhāvapaccavekkhaṇena hāyati, evaṃ vīriyindriyassa adhimattatā passaddhiyādibhāvanāya hāyati samādhipakkhikattā tassā. Tathā hi samādhindriyassa adhimattataṃ kosajjapātato rakkhantī vīriyādibhāvanā viya vīriyindriyassa adhimattataṃ uddhaccapātato rakkhantī ekaṃsato hāpeti. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘passaddhādibhāvanāya hāpetabba’’nti. ^b^Soṇattherassa vatthū^eb^ti sukumārasoṇattherassa vatthu. So hi āyasmāpi satthu santikā kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sītavane viharanto – ‘‘mama sarīraṃ sukhumālaṃ, na ca sakkā sukheneva sukhaṃ adhigantuṃ, kāyaṃ kilametvāpi samaṇadhammo kātabbo’’ti ṭhānacaṅkamanameva adhiṭṭhāya ^a^M2.0434^ea^ padhānamanuyuñjanto pādatalesu phoṭesu uṭṭhitesupi vedanaṃ ajjhupekkhitvā daḷhavīriyaṃ karonto accāraddhavīriyatāya visesaṃ pavattetuṃ nāsakkhi. Satthā tattha gantvā vīṇopamovādena ovaditvā vīriyasamatāyojanavidhiṃ dassento kammaṭṭhānaṃ sodhetvā gijjhakūṭaṃ gato. Theropi satthārā dinnanayena vīriyasamataṃ yājetvā bhāvento vipassanaṃ ussukkāpetvā arahatteva patiṭṭhāsi. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘soṇattherassa vatthu dassetabba’’nti. ^b^Sesesupī^eb^ti satisamādhipaññindriyesupi.

[03]^b^Samata^eb^nti saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ anūnādhikabhāvaṃ, tathā samādhivīriyānañca. Yathā hi saddhāpaññānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ dhuriyadhammabhūtānaṃ kiccato aññamaññanātivattanaṃ visesato icchitabbaṃ. Yato tesaṃ samadhuratāya appanā sampajjati, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ kosajjuddhaccapakkhikānaṃ ^a^V2.0142^ea^ samatāya sati aññamaññupatthambhanato sampayuttadhammānaṃ antadvayapātābhāvena sammadeva appanā ijjhatīti. ^b^Balavasaddho^eb^tiādi vuttasseva atthassa byatirekamukhena samatthanaṃ. Tassattho – yo balavatiyā saddhāya samannāgato avisadañāṇo, so mudhappasanno hoti, na aveccappasanno. Tathā hi so avatthusmiṃ pasīdati, seyyathāpi titthiyasāvakā. ^b^Kerāṭikapakkha^eb^nti sāṭheyyapakkhaṃ bhajati. Saddhāhīnāya paññāya atidhāvanto ‘‘deyyavatthupariccāgena vinā cittuppādamattenapi dānamayaṃ puññaṃ hotī’’tiādīni parikappeti hetupatirūpakehi vañcito, evaṃbhūto ca lūkhatakkaviluttacitto paṇḍitānaṃ vacanaṃ nādiyati, saññattiṃ na gacchati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhesajjasamuṭṭhito viya rogo atekiccho hotī’’^eb^ti. Yathā cettha saddhāpaññānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho, visamabhāvo anatthāvaho, evaṃ samādhivīriyānaṃ aññamaññaṃ samabhāvo atthāvaho, itaro anatthāvaho, tathā samabhāvo avikkhepāvaho, itaro vikkhepāvaho. ^b^Kosajjaṃ abhibhavati,^eb^ tena appanaṃ na pāpuṇātīti adhippāyo. Esa nayo ^b^uddhaccaṃ abhibhavatī^eb^ti etthāpi. ^b^Tadubhaya^eb^nti saddhāpaññādvayaṃ samādhivīriyadvayañca. ^b^Samaṃ kātabba^eb^nti samataṃ kātabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Samādhikammikassā^eb^ti samathakammaṭṭhānikassa. ^b^Eva^eb^nti evaṃ sante, saddhāya thokaṃ balavabhāve satīti attho. ^b^Saddahanto^eb^ti ‘‘pathavī pathavīti manasikāramattena ^a^M2.0435^ea^ kathaṃ jhānuppattī’’ti acintetvā ‘‘addhā sambuddhena vuttavidhi ijjhatī’’ti saddahanto saddhaṃ janento. ^b^Okappento^eb^ti ārammaṇaṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanavasena avakappento pakkhandanto. ^b^Ekaggatā balavatī vaṭṭati^eb^ samādhipadhānattā jhānassa. ^b^Ubhinna^eb^nti samādhipaññānaṃ. Samādhikammikassa samādhino adhimattatāya paññāya adhimattatāpi icchitabbāti āha ^b^‘‘samatāyapī’’^eb^ti, samabhāvenāpīti attho. ^b^Appanā^eb^ti lokiyāppanā. Tathā hi ‘‘hotiyevā’’ti sāsaṅkaṃ vadati, lokuttarappanā pana tesaṃ samabhāveneva icchitā. Yathāha ‘‘samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ bhāvetī’’ti (a. ni. 4.170). Yadi visesato saddhāpaññānaṃ samādhivīriyānañca samānataṃ icchati, kathaṃ satīti āha – ^b^‘‘sati pana sabbattha balavatī vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti līnuddhaccapakkhikesu pañcindriyesu. Uddhaccapakkhikekadese gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘saddhāvīriyapaññāna’’^eb^nti āha. Aññathā pīti ca gahetabbā siyā. Tathā hi ^b^‘‘kosajjapakkhikena samādhinā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ, na ca ‘‘passaddhisamādhiupekkhāhī’’ti. ^b^Sā^eb^ti sati. Sabbesu rājakammesu niyuttoti ^b^sabbakammiko. Tenā^eb^ti yena kāraṇena sabbattha icchitabbā, tena ^b^āha^eb^ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ. Sabbattha niyuttā ^b^sabbatthikā^eb^^a^V2.0143^ea^, sabbena vā līnuddhaccapakkhikena bojjhaṅgena atthetabbā sabbatthiyā, sabbatthiyāva ^b^sabbatthikā. Citta^eb^nti kusalacittaṃ. Tassa hi ^b^satipaṭisaraṇaṃ^eb^ parāyaṇaṃ appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘ārakkhapaccupaṭṭhānā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Khandhādibhede anogāḷhapaññāna^eb^nti pariyattibāhusaccavasenapi khandhāyatanādīsu appatiṭṭhitabuddhīnaṃ. Bahussutasevanā hi sutamayañāṇāvahā. Taruṇavipassanāsamaṅgīpi bhāvanāmayañāṇe ṭhitattā ekaṃsato paññavā eva nāma hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘samapaññāsa…pe… puggalasevanā’’^eb^ti. Ñeyyadhammassa gambhīrabhāvavasena tapparicchedakañāṇassa gambhīrabhāvagahaṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘gambhīresu khandhādīsu pavattāya gambhīrapaññāyā’’^eb^ti. Tañhi ñeyyaṃ tādisāya paññāya caritabbato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ, tassā vā paññāya tattha pabhedato pavatti gambhīrañāṇacariyā, tassā paccavekkhaṇāti āha ^b^‘‘gambhīrapaññāya pabhedapaccavekkhaṇā’’^eb^ti. Yathā sativepullappatto nāma arahā eva, evaṃ so eva paññāvepullappattopīti āha ^a^M2.0436^ea^^b^‘‘arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī’’^eb^ti. Vīriyādīsupi eseva nayoti.

[03]‘‘Tattaṃ ayokhilaṃ hatthe gamentī’’tiādinā vuttapañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇā niraye nibbattasattassa sabbapaṭhamaṃ karontīti ^b^devadūtasuttā^eb^dīsu (ma. ni. 3.250), tassā ādito vuttattā ca āha – ^b^‘‘pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakaṭavahanādikāle^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena tadaññamanussehi tiracchānehi ca vibādhanīyakālaṃ saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Ekaṃ buddhantara^eb^nti idaṃ aparāparaṃ petesu eva uppajjanakasattavasena vuttaṃ, ekaccānaṃ vā petānaṃ, ekaccatiracchānānaṃ viya tathā dīghāyukatāpi siyāti tathā vuttaṃ. Tathā hi kālo nāgarājā catunnaṃ buddhānaṃ rūpadassāvī.

[03]^b^Evaṃ ānisaṃsadassāvino^eb^ti ‘‘vīriyāyatto eva sakalalokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamo’’ti evaṃ ānisaṃsadassanasīlassa. ^b^Gamanavīthi^eb^nti sapubbabhāgaṃ nibbānagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ. Saha vipassanāya ariyamaggapaṭipāṭi, sattavisuddhiparamparā vā. Sā hi vaṭṭato niyyānāya gantabbā paṭipadāti katvā gamanavīthi nāma.

[03]^b^Kāyadaḷhībahulo^eb^ti kāyassa posanapasuto. ^b^Piṇḍa^eb^nti raṭṭhapiṇḍaṃ. Paccayadāyakānaṃ attani kārassa attano sammāpaṭipattiyā mahapphalabhāvassa karaṇena piṇḍāya bhikkhāya paṭipūjanā ^b^piṇḍāpacāyanā. Nīharanto^eb^ti pattatthavikato nīharanto. ^b^Taṃ saddaṃ sutvā^eb^ti taṃ upāsikāya vacanaṃ paṇṇasāladvāre ṭhitova pañcābhiññatāya dibbasotena sutvāti vadanti. Manussasampatti, dibbasampatti ^a^V2.0144^ea^, ante nibbānasampattīti ^b^tisso sampattiyo. Sitaṃ karontovā^eb^ti ‘‘akiccheneva mayā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ samatikkanta’’nti paccavekkhaṇāvasāne sañjātapāmojjavasena sitaṃ karonto eva.

[03]Alasānaṃ bhāvanāya nāmamattampi ajānantānaṃ kāyassa posanabahulānaṃ yāvadatthaṃ paribhuñjitvā seyyasukhādiṃ anuyuñjantānaṃ tiracchānakathikānaṃ dūratova vajjanaṃ ^b^kusītapuggalaparivajjanā^eb^. ‘‘Divasaṃ caṅkamena nisajjāyā’’tiādinā bhāvanārambhavasena āraddhavīriyānaṃ daḷhaparakkamānaṃ kālenakālaṃ ^a^M2.0437^ea^ upasaṅkamanā ^b^āraddhavīriyapuggalasevanā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kucchiṃ pūretvā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^Visuddhimagge^eb^ pana ‘‘jātimahattapaccavekkhaṇā, sabrahmacārimahattapaccavekkhaṇā’’ti idaṃ dvayaṃ na gahitaṃ, ‘‘thinamiddhavinodanatā, sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā’’ti idaṃ dvayaṃ gahitaṃ. Tattha ānisaṃsadassāvitāya eva sammappadhānapaccavekkhaṇā gahitā lokiyalokuttaravisesādhigamassa vīriyāyattatādassanabhāvato. Thinamiddhavinodanaṃ tadadhimuttatāya gahitaṃ, vīriyuppādane yuttapayuttassa thinamiddhavinodanaṃ atthato siddhameva. Tattha thinamiddhavinodanaṃ kusītapuggalaparivajjana-āraddhavīriyapuggala-sevana- tadadhimuttatāpaṭipakkhavidhamana-paccayūpasaṃhāravasena, apāyabhayapaccavekkhaṇādayo samuttejanavasena vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa uppādakāti daṭṭhabbā.

[03]Buddhānussatiyā upacārasamādhiniṭṭhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘yāva upacārā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno^eb^ti pītisamuṭṭhānehi paṇītarūpehi sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno. Dhammasaṅghaguṇe anussarantassapi yāva upacārā sakalasarīraṃ pharamāno pītisambojjhaṅgo uppajjatīti yojanā.
