Evaṃ sesānussatīsu pasādanīyasuttantapaccavekkhaṇāya ca yojetabbaṃ tassāpi vimuttāyatanabhāvena taggatikattā. ^b^Evarūpe kāle^eb^ti dubbhikkhabhayādīsūti vuttakāle. ^b^Samāpattiyā…pe… na samudācarantī^eb^ti idaṃ upasamānussatiyā vasena vuttaṃ. Saṅkhārānañhi sappadesavūpasamepi nippadesavūpasame viya tattha sapaññāya pavattanato bhāvanāmanasikāro kilesavikkhambhanasamattho hutvā upacārasamādhiṃ āvahanto tathārūpapītisomanassasamannāgato pītisambojjhaṅgassa uppādāya hotīti. Pasādanīyesu ṭhānesu pasādasinehābhāvena saṃsūcitahadayatā lūkhatā. Sā ca tattha ādaragāravākaraṇena viññāyatīti āha ^b^‘‘asakkaccakiriyāya saṃsūcitalūkhabhāve’’^eb^ti.

[03]Kāyacittadarathavūpasamalakkhaṇā passaddhi eva yathāvuttabodhiaṅgabhūto passaddhisambojjhaṅgo, tassa ^a^V2.0145^ea^^b^passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa. Paṇītabhojanasevanatā^eb^ti paṇītasappāyabhojanasevanatā. Utuiriyāpathasukhaggahaṇehi sappāyautuiriyāpathaṃ gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tañhi tividhampi sappāyaṃ seviyamānaṃ kāyassa kallatāpādanavasena cittassa kallataṃ ^a^M2.0438^ea^ āvahantaṃ duvidhāyapi passaddhiyā kāraṇaṃ hoti. Sattesu labbhamānaṃ sukhadukkhaṃ ahetukanti ayameko anto, issarādivisamahetukanti ayaṃ dutiyo, ete ubho ante anupagamma yathāsakaṃ kammunā hotīti ayaṃ majjhimā paṭipatti. Majjhatto payogo yassa so majjhattapayogo, tassa bhāvo ^b^majjhattapayogatā^eb^. Ayañhi pahānasāraddhakāyatā-saṅkhātapassaddhakāyatāya kāraṇaṃ hontī passaddhidvayaṃ āvahati. Eteneva sāraddhakāyapuggalaparivajjana-passaddhakāyapuggalasevanānaṃ tadāvahanatā saṃvaṇṇitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[03]Vatthuvisadakiriyā indriyasamattapaṭipādanā ca ‘‘paññāvahā’’ti vuttā. Samathāvahāpi tā honti samathāvahabhāveneva paññāvahattāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vatthuvisada…pe… veditabbā’’^eb^ti.

[03]Karaṇakosallabhāvanākosallānaṃ nānantariyabhāvato rakkhaṇakosallassa ca taṃmūlakattā ^b^‘‘nimittakusalatā nāma kasiṇanimittassa uggahaṇakusalatā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. ^b^Atisithilavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paññāpayogamandataṃ appamādavekallañca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tassa paggaṇhana^eb^nti tassa līnassa cittassa dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena layāpattito samuṭṭhāpanaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye līnaṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo vīriyasambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo pītisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Līnaṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi susamuṭṭhāpayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletukāmo assa, so tattha sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni gomayāni pakkhipeyya, sukkhāni kaṭṭhāni pakkhipeyya, mukhavātañca dadeyya, na ca paṃsukena okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso parittaṃ aggiṃ ujjāletunti. Evaṃ, bhante’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234).
[03]Ettha ca yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā, sā anantaraṃ vibhāvitā eva.

[03]^b^Accāraddhavīriyatādīhī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0439^ea^^a^V2.0146^ea^^b^ādi^eb^-saddena paññāpayogabalavataṃ pamoduppilāvanañca saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Tassa niggaṇhana^eb^nti tassa uddhatassa cittassa samādhisambojjhaṅgādisamuṭṭhāpanena uddhatāpattito nisedhanaṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ bhagavatā –

[08]‘‘Yasmiñca kho, bhikkhave, samaye uddhataṃ cittaṃ hoti, kālo tasmiṃ samaye passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo samādhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya, kālo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya. Taṃ kissa hetu? Uddhataṃ, bhikkhave, cittaṃ, taṃ etehi dhammehi suvūpasamayaṃ hoti. Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetukāmo assa, so tattha allāni ceva tiṇāni….pe… paṃsukena ca okireyya, bhabbo nu kho so puriso mahantaṃ aggikkhandhaṃ nibbāpetunti. Evaṃ, bhante’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.234).

[03]Etthāpi yathāsakaṃ āhāravasena passaddhisambojjhaṅgādīnaṃ bhāvanā samuṭṭhāpanāti veditabbā. Tattha passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanā vuttā eva, samādhisambojjhaṅgassa vuccamānā, itarassa anantaraṃ vakkhati. ^b^Paññāpayogamandatāyā^eb^ti paññābyāpārassa appabhāvena. Yathā hi dānaṃ alobhappadhānaṃ, sīlaṃ adosappadhānaṃ, evaṃ bhāvanā amohappadhānā. Tattha yadā paññā na balavatī hoti, tadā bhāvanā pubbenāparaṃ visesāvahā na hoti, anabhisaṅkhato viya āhāro purisassa yogino cittassa abhiruciṃ na uppādeti, tena taṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tathā bhāvanāya sammadeva vīthipaṭipattiyā abhāvena upasamasukhaṃ na vindati, tenapi cittaṃ nirassādaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘paññāpayoga…pe… nirassādaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Tassa saṃveguppādanañca pasāduppādanañca tikicchananti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘aṭṭha saṃvegavatthūnī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha jātijarābyādhimaraṇāni yathārahaṃ sugatiyaṃ duggatiyañca hontīti tadaññameva pañcavidhabandhanādikhuppipāsādiaññamaññavibādhanādihetukaṃ apāyadukkhaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tayidaṃ sabbaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ paccuppannabhavanissitaṃ gahitanti atīte anāgate ca kāle ^a^M2.0440^ea^ vaṭṭamūlakadukkhāni visuṃ gahitāniyeva. Ye pana sattā āhārūpajīvino tattha ca uṭṭhānaphalūpajīvino, tesaṃ aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ jīvikadukkhaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ saṃvegavatthu gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati samaye sampahaṃsanā^eb^ti ayaṃ sampahaṃsitabbasamaye vuttanayena saṃvegajananavasena ceva pasāduppādanavasena ca sammadeva pahaṃsanā, saṃvegajananapubbakapasāduppādanena bhāvanācittassa tosanātiattho.
[03]^b^Sammāpaṭipattiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0147^ea^^b^āgammā^eb^ti līnuddhaccavirahena samathavīthipaṭipattiyā ca sammadeva bhāvanāpaṭipattiṃ āgamma.

[03]^b^Alīna^eb^ntiādīsu kosajjapakkhikānaṃ dhammānaṃ anadhimattatāya ^b^alīnaṃ,^eb^ uddhaccapakkhikānaṃ anadhimattatāya ^b^anuddhataṃ,^eb^ paññāpayogasampattiyā upasamasukhādhigamena ca ^b^anirassādaṃ,^eb^ tato eva ārammaṇe ^b^samappavattaṃ samathavīthipaṭipannañca^eb^. Tattha alīnatāya paggahe, anuddhatāya ca niggahe, anirassādatāya sampahaṃsane na byāpāraṃ āpajjati. Alīnānuddhaccatāhi ārammaṇe samappavattaṃ, anirassādatāya samathavīthipaṭipannaṃ, samappavattiyā vā alīnaṃ anuddhataṃ, samathavīthipaṭipattiyā anirassādanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Ayaṃ vuccati samaye ajjhupekkhanatā^eb^ti ayaṃ ajjhupekkhitabbasamaye cittassa paggahaniggahasampahaṃsanesu byāvaṭatāsaṅkhātaṃ paṭipakkhaṃ abhibhuyya upekkhanā vuccati. ^b^Esā^eb^ti samādhibojjhaṅgo anuppanno uppajjati. ^b^Arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hotī^eb^ti etena nippariyāyato samādhivepullappattopi arahā evāti dasseti.

[03]Anurodhavirodhapahānavasena majjhattabhāvo upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa kāraṇaṃ tasmiṃ sati sijjhanato, asati ca asijjhanato, so ca majjhattabhāvo visayavasena duvidhoti āha ^b^‘‘sattamajjhattatā saṅkhāramajjhattatā’’^eb^ti. Tadubhayavasena cassa virujjhanaṃ passaddhisambojjhaṅgassa bhāvanāya eva dūrīkatanti anurujjhanasseva pahānavidhiṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sattamajjhattatā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tathā hissa sattasaṅkhārakelāyanapuggalaparivajjanaṃ ‘‘uppattiyā kāraṇa’’nti vuccati. Upekkhāya hi visesato rāgo paṭipakkho, tato rāgabahulassa puggalassa upekkhā ‘‘visuddhimaggo’’ti vuccati. ^b^Dvīhākārehī^eb^ti kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ attasuññatāpaccavekkhaṇanti imehi dvīhi kāraṇehi. ^b^Dvīhevā^eb^ti avadhāraṇaṃ saṅkhārasahitāya saṅkhyāsamānatāya dassanatthaṃ. Saṅkhyā eva hettha samānaṃ, na ^a^M2.0441^ea^ saṅkhyeyyaṃ sabbathā samānanti. ^b^Assāmikabhāvo^eb^ anattaniyatā. Sati hi attani tassa kiñcanabhāvena cīvaraṃ aññaṃ vā kiñci attaniyaṃ nāma siyā, so pana koci natthevāti adhippāyo. ^b^Anaddhaniya^eb^nti, na addhānakkhamaṃ, na ciraṭṭhāyi ittaraṃ aniccanti attho. ^b^Tāvakālika^eb^nti tasseva vevacanaṃ.

[03]^b^Mamāyatī^eb^ti mamattaṃ karoti. Mamāti taṇhāya pariggayha tiṭṭhati. ^b^Dhanāyantā^eb^ti dhanaṃ dabbaṃ karontā. ^b^Assā^eb^ti upekkhāsambojjhaṅgassa ^b^arahattamaggena bhāvanāpāripūrī hoti^eb^. Tathā hi arahato eva chaḷaṅgupekkhānipphatti.

[03]^b^Asubhārammaṇā^eb^^a^V2.0148^ea^^b^dhammā^eb^ti asubhappakārā asubhajhānassa ārammaṇabhūtā dhammā. Kāmaṃ indriyabaddhāpi kesādayo asubhappakārā eva, visesato pana jigucchitabbe jigucchāvahe gaṇhanto ^b^‘‘dasā’’^eb^ti āha. Yathā manasikaroto sabhāvasarasato tattha asubhasaññā santiṭṭhati, tathā pavatto manasikāro ^b^upāyamanasikāro^eb^. Asubhe asubhapaṭikkūlākārassa uggaṇhanaṃ, yathā vā tattha uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, tathā manasikāro asubhanimittassa uggaho. Upacārappanāvahāya asubhabhāvanāya anuyuñjanā ^b^asubhabhāvanānuyogo^eb^.

[03]Manacchaṭṭhānaṃ indriyānaṃ suṭṭhu susaṃvaraṇe sati avasaraṃ alabhanto kāmacchando pahīyateva, tathā bhojane mattaññuno mitāhārassa thinamiddhābhibhavābhāvā otāraṃ alabhamāno kāmacchando pahīyati. Yo pana āhāre paṭikkūlasaññaṃ tabbipariṇāmassa tadādhārassa tassa ca udariyabhūtassa ativiya jegucchataṃ, kāyassa ca āhāratiṭṭhakataṃ sammadeva jānāti, so sabbaso bhojane pamāṇassa jānanena visesato ^b^bhojane mattaññū^eb^ nāma. Tassa kāmacchando pahīyateva, aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana appāhārataṃyeva dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘catunna’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Asubhakammikatissatthero^eb^ dantaṭṭhidassāvī. ^b^Pahīnassā^eb^ti vikkhambhanavasena pahīnassa. Abhidhammapariyāyena sabbopi lobho kāmacchandanīvaraṇanti ^b^‘‘arahattamaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]Mejjati hitapharaṇavasena siniyhatīti mitto, hitesī puggalo, tasmiṃ mitte bhavā, mittassa vā esāti mettā, hitesitā. Sā eva paṭipakkhato ^a^M2.0442^ea^ cetaso vimuttīti ^b^mettācetovimutti^eb^. Tattha mettāyanassa sattesu hitapharaṇassa uppādanaṃ pavattanaṃ ^b^mettānimittassa uggaho^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘odissakā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Tattha attapiyasahāyamajjhattaverivasena ^b^odissakatā^eb^. Sīmāsambhede kate ^b^anodissakatā^eb^. Ekādidisāpharaṇavasena disāpharaṇatā mettāya uggaṇhane veditabbā. ^b^Uggaho^eb^ yāva upacārā daṭṭhabbo. Uggahitāya āsevanā ^b^bhāvanā,^eb^ sabbā itthiyo purisā ariyā anariyā devā manussā vinipātikāti sattodhikaraṇavasena pavattā sattavidhā, aṭṭhavīsatividhā vā, dasahi disāhi disodhikaraṇavasena pavattā dasavidhā, ekekāya disāya sattādītthādiaverādibhedena asītādhikacatusatappabhedā ca ^b^odhisopharaṇamettā^eb^. Sabbe sattā, pāṇā, bhūtā, puggalā, attabhāvapariyāpannāti etesaṃ vasena pañcavidhā. Ekekasmiṃ averā hontu, abyāpajjā, anīghā, sukhī attānaṃ pariharantūti catudhā pavattiyā vīsatividhā ^b^anodhisopharaṇamettā,^eb^ taṃ sandhāyāha – ^b^‘‘odhiso…pe… bhāventassapī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tvaṃ etassā^eb^tiādinā kammassakatāpaccavekkhaṇaṃ dasseti ^a^V2.0149^ea^. ^b^Paṭisaṅkhāne ṭhitassā^eb^ti kodhe yathāvuttassa ādīnavassa tappaṭipakkhato akodhe mettāya ānisaṃsassa ca paṭisaṅkhāne sammadeva jānane. ^b^Sevantassā^eb^ti bhajantassa ^b^byāpādo pahīyati^eb^.

[03]^b^Atibhojane nimittaggāho^eb^ti āhārassa adhikabhojane thinamiddhassa nimittaggāho, ‘‘ettake bhutte thinamiddhaṃ uppajjati, ettake no’’ti thinamiddhassa kāraṇākāraṇaggāhoti attho. ^b^Divā sūriyāloka^eb^nti divā gahitanimittaṃ sūriyālokaṃ, rattiyaṃ manasikarontassapīti evamettha attho veditabbo. Dhutaṅgānaṃ vīriyanissitattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘dhutaṅganissitasappāyakathāyapī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Kukkuccampi katākatānusocanavasena pavattamānaṃ cetaso avūpasamāvahatāya uddhaccena samānalakkhaṇamevāti tadubhayassa pahānakāraṇaṃ dassento bhagavā – ‘‘atthi, bhikkhave, cetaso vūpasamo’’tiādimāha. Tasmā bāhusaccādi tassa pahānakāraṇanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apica cha dhammā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha bahussutassa ganthato, atthato dhammaṃ vicārentassa attavedādipaṭilābhasambhavato vikkhepo na hoti. Yathāvihitapaṭipattiyā ^a^M2.0443^ea^ yathādhammapaṭikārappattiyā ca vippaṭisāro anavasarovāti ^b^‘‘bāhusaccenapi…pe… uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yadaggena bahussutassa paṭisaṅkhānavato uddhaccakukkuccaṃ pahīyati, tadaggena paripucchakatāvinayapakataññutāhipi taṃ pahīyatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Vuddhasevitā ca vuddhasīlitaṃ āvahatīti cetaso vūpasamakarattā uddhaccakukkuccassa pahānakārī vuttā, vuddhabhāvaṃ pana anapekkhitvā vinayadharā kukkuccavinodakā kalyāṇamittāti daṭṭhabbā. Vikkhepo ca bhikkhūnaṃ yebhuyyena kukkuccahetuko hotīti ^b^‘‘kappiyākappiyaparipucchābahulassā’’^eb^tiādinā vinayanayeneva paripucchakatādayo niddiṭṭhā. ^b^Pahīne uddhaccakukkucce^eb^ti niddhāraṇe bhummaṃ. Kukkuccassa domanassasahagatattā ^b^anāgāmimaggena āyatiṃ anuppādo^eb^ vutto.

[03]^b^Kusalākusalā dhammā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. Kāmaṃ bāhusaccaparipucchakatāhi aṭṭhavatthukāpi vicikicchā pahīyati, tathāpi ratanattayavicikicchāmūlikā sesavicikicchāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tīṇi ratanāni ārabbhā’’^eb^tiādi. Vinaye pakataññutāya ca sati sikkhāya kaṅkhāya asambhavo eva, tathā ratanattayaguṇāvabodhe sati pubbantādīsu saṃsayassāti āha – ^b^‘‘vinaye’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Okappanīyasaddhā^eb^ saddheyyavatthuṃ anupavisitvā viya adhimuccanaṃ, tañca tathā adhimokkhuppādanameva. Saddhāya ninnapoṇapabbhāratā ^b^adhimutti. Arahattena kūṭaṃ gaṇhi^eb^ sattapi bojjhaṅge vitthāretvā desanāya osāpitattā.
[06]Āhārasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^233^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sambahulāti^eb^^a^V2.0150^ea^^b^vuccanti^eb^ saṅghasamaññāya abhāvato. ^b^Tato para^eb^nti tiṇṇaṃ janānaṃ upari saṅgho catuvaggakaraṇīyādisaṅghakammavasena kammappattattā. ^b^Pavisiṃsū^eb^ti bhāvini pavisane bhūte viya katvā upacārena vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘paviṭṭhā’’^eb^ti. Bhāvini hi bhūte viya upacāro. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘te panā’’^eb^tiādi, te pana bhikkhūti attho. Puna ^b^te panā^eb^ti titthiyā titthiyasāvakā ca.

[03]^b^Imasmiṃ^eb^^a^M2.0444^ea^^b^paññāpane^eb^ti ‘‘pañca nīvaraṇe pahāyā’’tiādinayappavatte imasmiṃ pakāre atthapaññāpane. Visissati aññamaññato pabhijjatīti ^b^viseso,^eb^ bhedo. Svāyaṃ idha antogadhādhikabhāvo adhippetoti āha – ^b^‘‘ko visesoti kiṃ adhika’’^eb^nti. Adhikaṃ payasanaṃ payuñjananti ^b^adhippayāso,^eb^ adhikappayogo. Nānā karīyati etenāti ^b^nānākaraṇaṃ,^eb^ bhedoti āha – ^b^‘‘kiṃ nānatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Dutiyapade^eb^ti ‘‘anusāsaniyā vā anusāsani’’nti etasmiṃ pade. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti yathā paṭhamasmiṃ pade atthayojanā, evaṃ dutiyapadepi yojetabbā.

[03]^b^Tīṇi ṭhānānī^eb^ti devamārabrahmaṭṭhānāni tīṇi ‘‘sadevake loke’’tiādinā ^b^loke pakkhipitvā^eb^. ‘‘Sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāyā’’ti ^b^dve^eb^ ṭhānāni. ^b^‘‘Pajāyā’’^eb^ti ettha pakkhipitvā iti ^b^pañcahi^eb^ padehi. ^b^Uddesa^eb^nti uddisitabbataṃ. ^b^Gaṇana^eb^nti eko kāmacchandoti gahetabbataṃ gacchati. ^b^Attano hatthapādādīsū^eb^ti nidassanamattaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ samudāyaṃ ārabbha paṭighassa uppajjanato. ^b^Attano khandhesu vimati^eb^ ‘‘ahaṃ nu khosmī’’tiādinā.

[03]Kiñcāpi sabbaṃ vīriyaṃ cetasikameva, yaṃ pana kāyakammādhiṭṭhānādivasena manasi kāyikapayogasamuṭṭhāpanaṃ vīriyaṃ kāyikanti laddhapariyāyanti tato visesetvā cetasikanti yathādhippetadutiyatādassanatthaṃ. Yadipi yathākappitairiyāpathasandhāraṇavasena pavattamānaṃ vīriyaṃ kāyassa tathāpavattassa paccayabhūtanti na sakkā vattuṃ, tathāpi na tādiso kāyapayogo, tadā pavatto natthīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyapayogaṃ vinā uppannavīriya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Satisambojjhaṅgasadiso vā^eb^ti iminā ajjhattike saṅkhāre ajjhupekkhanavasena pavattā ajjhattadhammesu upekkhātiādinayaṃ atidisati.

[03]^b^‘‘Missakabojjhaṅgā kathitā’’^eb^ti vatvā tamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘etesū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Caṅkamantenapi ^a^V2.0151^ea^ ariyamaggaṃ adhigantuṃ sakkāti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘maggaṃ apattaṃ kāyikavīriya’’^eb^nti. ^b^Bojjhaṅgā na labbhantī^eb^ti nippariyāyabojjhaṅgā na labbhantī. ^b^Bojjhaṅge uddharanti^eb^ pariyāyatoti adhippāyo. ^b^Sesā^eb^ti bahiddhādhammesu sati-dhammavicaya-upekkhā-cetasika-vīriya-savitakka-savicāra-pīti-samādhī dve passaddhiyo ca. Ayaṃ pana nayo pacurappavattivasena aṭṭhakathānayeneva ^a^M2.0445^ea^ vutto. Theravādavasena pana avitakkāvicāramattā pītisamādhisambojjhaṅgā rūpāvacarāpi atthīti tepi gahetvā dasa missakāva hontīti vattabbaṃ siyāti.
[06]Pariyāyasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^234^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Loṇadhūpana^eb^nti loṇañca dhūpanañca loṇadhūpanaṃ. ^b^Yodhakamma^eb^nti yodhapuggalena kattabbaṃ kammaṃ. ^b^Mantakamma^eb^nti rājakiccamantanaṃ. ^b^Paṭihārakamma^eb^nti rañño santikaṃ āgatānaṃ vacanaṃ rañño nivedetvā tato nesaṃ paṭiharaṇakammaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti sabbatthikattā satiyā. ^b^Evaṃ^eb^ ‘‘satiñca khvāha’’ntiādikaṃ avoca. ^b^Pubbabhāgavipassanā bojjhaṅgāva kathitā^eb^ paggahaniggahavinoditattā.
[06]Aggisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^235^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kīdisā gati nibbatti etissāti ^b^kiṃgatikā,^eb^ kiṃniṭṭhāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kīdisī paramā uttamā koṭi etissāti ^b^kiṃparamā^eb^. Kīdisaṃ phalaṃ ānisaṃsaṃ udayo etissāti ^b^kiṃphalā. Saṃsaṭṭhaṃ sampayutta^eb^nti idaṃ ^b^sahagata^eb^-saddassa atthadassanamattaṃ, idha pana mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā vipassanāpubbabhāgabojjhaṅgā ca ‘‘mettāsahagataṃ satisambojjhaṅga’’ntiādinā vuttāti veditabbaṃ. ^b^Sabbatthā^eb^ti sabbesu bojjhaṅgesu sabbesu ca brahmavihāresu.

[03]Paṭikūleti virajjatīti paṭikūlaṃ, aniṭṭhaṃ. Na paṭikūlaṃ ^b^appaṭikūlaṃ,^eb^ iṭṭhaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘iṭṭhe vatthusmi’’^eb^nti. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti appaṭikūlavatthusmiṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti paṭikūlasaññī. Satte appaṭikūle ^b^asubhapharaṇaṃ,^eb^ saṅkhāre appaṭikūle ^b^aniccanti manasikāraṃ karonto. Asubhāyā^eb^ti asubhasaññāya. ^b^Aniccato vā upasaṃharatī^eb^ti aniccanti manasikāraṃ pavatteti. ‘‘Eseva nayo’’ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘appaṭikūlapaṭikūlesū’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Chaḷaṅgupekkha^eb^nti chasu ārammaṇesu pahīnānurodhassa uppattiyā chaḷaṅgavantaṃ upekkhaṃ.

[03]^b^Mettāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0446^ea^^a^V2.0152^ea^ mettābhāvanāya. Paṭikūlādīsu vatthūsu icchitavihārena viharituṃ samatthatā ariyānaṃ eva, tattha ca arahato eva ijjhanato ^b^ariyiddhi^eb^ nāma. Tassā ^b^ariyiddhiyā ca dassitattā desanā vinivaṭṭetabbā^eb^ pariyosānetabbā ^b^siyā. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ na sakkoti^eb^ indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā nikantiyā ca duppariyādānato. ^b^Ayaṃ desanā^eb^ti ‘‘mettāsahagataṃ bojjhaṅgaṃ bhāvetī’’tiādinā ayaṃ desanā āraddhā. Yo hi mettājhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā sammasanaṃ ārabhitvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ asakkonto parisuddhesu vaṇṇakasiṇesu vimokkhasaṅkhātaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ nibbatteti, taṃ sandhāyāha bhagavā – ‘‘subhaṃ kho pana vimokkhaṃ upasampajja viharatī’’ti.

[03]^b^Subhaparama^eb^nti subhavimokkhaparamaṃ. ^b^Idha^eb^ loke eva ^b^paññā assa^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lokiyapaññassāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Arahattaparamāva mettā^eb^ arahattamaggassa pādakattā. ^b^Karuṇādīsupi eseva nayo^eb^ti karuṇādijhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasanto arahattaṃ pattuṃ sakkoti, tassa arahatthaparamā karuṇā hoti, evaṃ muditāupekkhāsupi vattabbanti imamatthaṃ atidisati. Puna desanārambhapayojanaṃ pana ‘‘iminā nayenā’’ti heṭṭhā atidiṭṭhameva.

[03]^b^Subhaparamāditā^eb^ti mettākaruṇāmuditāupekkhānaṃ subhaparamatā ākāsānañcāyatanaparamatā, viññāṇañcāyatanaparamatā, ākiñcaññāyatanaparamatā. ^b^Tassa tassā^eb^ti subhavimokkhassa heṭṭhā tiṇṇaṃ arūpajjhānānañca yathākkamaṃ upanissayattā. ^b^Appaṭikūlaparicayā^eb^ti iṭṭhārammaṇe manasikārabahulīkārā. ^b^Appakasirenevā^eb^ti sukheneva. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti visuddhatāya iṭṭhesu vaṇṇakasiṇesu. ^b^Citta^eb^nti bhāvanāmayacittaṃ ^b^pakkhandati^eb^ appanāvasena. ^b^Tato para^eb^nti tato subhavimokkhato paraṃ vimokkhānaṃ upanissayo nāma na hoti, mettāsahagatabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Sattadukkhaṃ samanupassantassā^eb^ti daṇḍena abhihaṭappattarūpahetuṃ sattesu uppajjanakadukkhaṃ ñāṇena vīmaṃsantassa. Tayidaṃ rūpanimittakaṃ sattesu uppajjanakaṃ dukkhaṃ ñāṇena karuṇāvihārissa visesato pakkhandatīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘appakasireneva tattha cittaṃ pakkhandatī’’^eb^ti, na pana sabbaso arūpe ānisaṃsadassanato.

[03]^b^Viññāṇaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0447^ea^^b^samanupassantassā^eb^ti idaṃ pāmojjagahaṇamukhena tannissayaviññāṇassa gahaṇaṃ sambhavatīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Viññāṇaggahaṇaparicita^eb^nti vuttanayena viññāṇaggahaṇe paricitaṃ.

[03]^b^Upekkhāvihārissā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0153^ea^ upekkhābrahmavihāraṃ viharato. ^b^Ābhogābhāvato^eb^ti sukhādivasena ābhujanābhāvato. ^b^Sukha…pe… sambhavato^eb^ti sukhadukkhāti paramatthakammaggahaṇe vimukhatāsambhavato. ^b^Avijjamānaggahaṇadukkha^eb^nti paramatthato avijjamānasattapaññattigahaṇaparicitaṃ tassa tassa abhāvamattakassa gahaṇampi dukkhaṃ kusalampi hoti. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Mettāsahagatasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^236^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭhamaññevā^eb^ti puretaraṃyeva. Asajjhāyakatānaṃ mantānaṃ appaṭibhānaṃ pageva paṭhamaṃyeva siddhaṃ, tattha vattabbameva natthīti adhippāyo. Pariyuṭṭhānaṃ nāma abhibhavo gahaṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘kāmarāgapariyuṭṭhitenāti kāmarāgagahitenā’’^eb^ti. Vikkhambheti apanetīti vikkhambhanaṃ, paṭipakkhato nissarati etenāti nissaraṇaṃ, vikkhambhanañca taṃ nissaraṇañcāti ^b^vikkhambhananissaraṇaṃ^eb^. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Attanā araṇiyo pattabbo ^b^attattho,^eb^ tathā ^b^parattho^eb^ veditabbo.

[03]‘‘Aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’tiādīsu byāpādādīnaṃ anāgatattā abyāpādavāre tadaṅganissaraṇaṃ na gahitaṃ. Kiñcāpi na gahitaṃ, paṭisaṅkhānavasena pana tassa vinodetabbatāya tadaṅganissaraṇampi labbhatevāti sakkā viññātuṃ. ^b^Ālokasaññā^eb^ upacārappattā, appanāppattā vā, yo koci kasiṇajjhānādibhedo ^b^samatho. Dhammavavatthānaṃ^eb^ upacārappanāppattavasena gahetabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Kuthito^eb^ti tatto. ^b^Usmudakajāto^eb^ti tasseva kuthitabhāvassa usmudakataṃ accuṇhataṃ patto. Tenāha ^b^‘‘usumajāto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tilabījakādibhedenā^eb^ti tilabījakakaṇṇikakesarādibhedena. ^b^Sevālena…pe… paṇakenā^eb^ti udakapicchilena. ^b^Appasanno^eb^ ākulatāya. ^b^Asannisinno^eb^^a^M2.0448^ea^ kalaluppattiyā. ^b^Anālokaṭṭhāne^eb^ti ālokarahite ṭhāne.
[06]Saṅgāravasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^237^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekaṃsena bhagavā nīvaraṇā^eb^ti ekaṃsato eva bhagavā ete dhammā nīvaraṇā citte kusalappavattiyā ^a^V2.0154^ea^ nīvaraṇato. ^b^Kāyakilamatho^eb^ti kāyaparissamo, so pana aṭṭhuppattiyā paccayattā ‘‘daratho’’ti vutto. Cittakilamatho tappaccayajāto daṭṭhabbo. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tassa kirā’’^eb^tiādi. Cittadarathopi paṭippassambhīti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Maggenevā^eb^ti yathādhigatena ariyamaggeneva. ^b^Assā^eb^ti abhayassa rājakumārassa. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ kāyacittadarathadvayaṃ.
[06]Abhayasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sākacchavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^238^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uppannasaññā^eb^ti saññāsīsena upacārajjhānaṃ vadati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘taṃ paneta’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Chavicammampi upaṭṭhātī^eb^ti idaṃ saviññāṇakaṃ aviññāṇakampi kāyasāmaññato gahetvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Sati vā upādisese^eb^ti ettha upādiyati attano ārammaṇaṃ gaṇhātīti ^b^upādi,^eb^ upādānaṃ, etassa ekadese appahīne satīti attho.
[06]Ānāpānavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^248-257^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anabhirati^eb^nti anabhiramaṇaṃ anapekkhitaṃ. Accantanirodhabhūte nibbāne pavattasaññā ^b^nirodhasaññā^eb^. Tattha sā maggasahagatā lokuttarā ^a^M2.0449^ea^, yā pana nibbāne ninnabhāvena pavattā, upasamānussatisahagatā ca, sā lokiyāti āha – ^b^‘‘nirodhasaññā missakā’’^eb^ti. ‘‘Tesaṃ navasū’’tiādi pamādapāṭho. ‘‘Ekādasasu appanā hoti, nava upacārajjhānikā’’ti pāṭho gahetabbo. ^b^Vīsati kammaṭṭhānānī^eb^ti idampi idhāgatanayo, na visuddhimaggādīsu āgatanayo ^a^V2.0155^ea^. Ettha ca ārammaṇādīsu yathāyogaṃ appanaṃ upacāraṃ vā pāpuṇitvā arahattappattassa pubbabhāgabhūtā vipassanāmaggabojjhaṅgā kathitā.
[06]Nirodhavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Bojjhaṅgasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^367^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekāyanvāya^eb^nti ^a^M2.0450^ea^^a^V2.0156^ea^ sandhivasena vuttaṃ o-kārassa va-kāraṃ a-kārassa dīghaṃ katvā. Ayaṃ kira saṃyuttābhilāpo, tattha ayana-saddo maggapariyāyo. Na kevalaṃ ayameva, atha kho aññepi maggapariyāyāti paduddhāraṃ karonto ^b^‘‘maggassa hī’’^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā yadi maggapariyāyo āyana-saddo, kasmā puna maggoti vuttanti codanaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^ekamaggo^eb^ti ekova maggo. Na hi nibbānagāmimaggo añño atthīti. Nanu satipaṭṭhānaṃ idha maggoti adhippetaṃ, tadaññepi bahū maggadhammā atthīti? Saccaṃ atthi, te pana satipaṭṭhānaggahaṇeneva gahitā tadavinābhāvato. Tathā hi ñāṇavīriyādayo niddese gahitā, uddese satiyā eva gahaṇaṃ veneyyajjhāsayavasenāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, satiyā maggabhāvadassanatthañca. ^b^Na dvedhāpathabhūto^eb^ti iminā imassa dvayabhāvābhāvaṃ viya anibbānagāmibhāvābhāvañca dasseti. ^b^Nibbānagamanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ gacchati etenāti nibbānagamanaṃ, so eva aviparītabhāvanāya attho, tena nibbānagamanaṭṭhena, nibbānādhigamūpāyatāyāti attho. ^b^Magganīyaṭṭhenā^eb^ti gavesitabbatāya.

[03]^b^Rāgādīhī^eb^ti ‘‘rāgo malaṃ, doso malaṃ, moho mala’’nti (vibha. 924) evaṃ vuttehi rāgādīhi malehi. Sā panāyaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhacittānaṃ visuddhi sijjhamānā yasmā sokādīnaṃ anuppādāya saṃvattati, tasmā vuttaṃ ‘‘sokaparidevānaṃ samatikkamāyā’’tiādi. Tattha socanaṃ ñātibyasanādinimittaṃ cetaso santāpo antonijjhānaṃ ^b^soko^eb^. Ñātibyasanādinimittameva sokādhikatājanito ‘‘kahaṃ ekaputtakā’’tiādinā paridevanavasena vācāvippalāpo paridevanaṃ ^b^paridevo^eb^. Tassa āyatiṃ anuppajjanaṃ idha samatikkamoti āha ^b^‘‘pahānāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dukkhadomanassāna^eb^nti ettha cetasikadukkhatāya domanassassapi dukkhasaddeneva gahaṇe ^a^M2.0451^ea^ siddhe saddena anivattanato ^a^V2.0157^ea^ sāmaññajotanāya visesavacanaṃ seṭṭhanti ‘‘domanassāna’’nteva vuttaṃ. ^b^Cetasikadomanassassā^eb^ti bhūtakathanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Ñāyati etena yāthāvato paṭivijjhīyati catusaccanti ^b^ñāyo^eb^ vuccati ariyamaggo. Nanu ayampi maggo, kiṃ maggo eva maggassa adhigamāya hotīti codanaṃ sandhāyāha – ^b^‘‘ayaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi. Taṇhāva kammakilesavipākānaṃ vinanaṭṭhena saṃsibbanaṭṭhena ^b^vānaṃ^eb^. Tena taṇhāvānena virahitattā tassa abhāvāti attho. ^b^Attapaccakkhāyā^eb^ti attapaccakkhatthāya.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇabhāsana^eb^nti pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. ^b^Visuddhi^eb^nti visujjhanaṃ kilesappahānaṃ. ^b^Uggahetabba^eb^nti ettha vācuggatakaraṇaṃ uggaho. Paricayakaraṇaṃ paripucchāmūlakattā taggahaṇeneva gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Na tato heṭṭhā^eb^ti idha adhippetakāyādīnaṃ vedanādisabhāvattābhāvā kāyavedanācittavimuttassa tebhūmakadhammassa visuṃ vipallāsavatthantarabhāvena gahitattā ca heṭṭhā gahaṇesu vipallāsavatthūnaṃ aniṭṭhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Pañcamassa pana vipallāsavatthuno abhāvena ^b^‘‘na uddha’’^eb^nti āha. Ārammaṇavibhāgena hettha satipaṭṭhānavibhāgoti. ^b^Tayo satipaṭṭhānā^eb^ti satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthuddhāradassanaṃ, na idha pāḷiyaṃ vuttassa satipaṭṭhānasaddassa atthadassanaṃ. ^b^Ādīsu hī^eb^ti ettha ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘phassasamudayā vedanānaṃ samudayo, nāmarūpasamudayā cittassa samudayo, manasikārasamudayā dhammānaṃ samudayo’’ti (saṃ. ni. 5.408) satipaṭṭhānāti vuttānaṃ satigocarānaṃ pakāsake suttapadese saṅgaṇhāti. Evaṃ paṭisambhidāmaggapāḷiyampi avasesapāḷipadesadassanattho ^b^ādi^eb^-saddo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Satiyā paṭṭhāna^eb^nti satiyā patiṭṭhātabbaṭṭhānaṃ.
[03]^b^Ariyo^eb^ti ārakattādinā ariyaṃ sammāsambuddhamāha. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti etasmiṃ ^b^saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasutte^eb^ (ma. ni. 3.311). Tattha hi –

[08]‘‘Tayo satipaṭṭhānā yadariyo…pe… marahatīti iti kho panetaṃ vuttaṃ, kiñcetaṃ paṭicca vuttaṃ. Idha, bhikkhave, satthā sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti anukampako hitesī anukampaṃ upādāya – ‘idaṃ vo ^a^M2.0452^ea^ hitāya idaṃ vo sukhāyā’ti. Tassa sāvakā na sussūsanti, na sotaṃ odahanti, na aññā cittaṃ upaṭṭhapenti, vokkamma ca satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, paṭhamaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Yadariyo sevati…pe... marahati. Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, satthā ^a^V2.0158^ea^ …pe… idaṃ vo sukhāyāti. Tassa ekacce sāvakā na sussūsanti…pe… ekacce sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… na ca vokkamma satthusāsanā vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato na ceva anattamano hoti, na ca anattamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, na ceva attamano hoti, na ca attamanataṃ paṭisaṃvedeti. Anattamanatañca attamanatañca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ…pe… marahati. Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave,…pe… sukhāyāti, tassa sāvakā sussūsanti…pe… vattanti. Tatra, bhikkhave, tathāgato attamano ceva hoti, attamanatañca paṭisaṃvedeti, anavassuto ca viharati sato sampajāno. Idaṃ, bhikkhave, tatiyaṃ satipaṭṭhāna’’nti –

[03]Evaṃ paṭighānunayehi anavassutatā niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitāya tadubhayavītivattatā ‘‘satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttā. Buddhānaṃyeva hi niccaṃ upaṭṭhitassatitā hoti āveṇikadhammabhāvato, na paccekabuddhādīnaṃ. Pa-saddo ārambhaṃ joteti, ārambho ca pavattīti katvā āha ^b^‘‘pavattayitabbatoti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Satiyā^eb^ karaṇabhūtāya ^b^paṭṭhānaṃ^eb^ paṭṭhapetabbaṃ satipaṭṭhānaṃ. Ana-saddo hi bahulavacanena kammatthopi hotīti.

[03]Tathāssa kattuatthopi labbhatīti ^b^‘‘patiṭṭhātīti paṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Upaṭṭhātī^eb^ti ettha ^b^upa^eb^-saddo bhusatthavisiṭṭhaṃ pakkhandanaṃ dīpetīti ^b^‘‘okkanditvā pakkhanditvā pavattatīti attho’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Puna bhāvatthaṃ satisaddaṃ paṭṭhānasaddañca vaṇṇento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tena purimavikappe sati-saddo paṭṭhāna-saddo ca kattuatthoti viññāyati. ^b^Saraṇaṭṭhenā^eb^ti cirakatassa cirabhāsitassa ca anussaraṇaṭṭhena. ^b^Ida^eb^nti yaṃ ‘‘satiyeva satipaṭṭhāna’’nti vuttaṃ, idaṃ ^b^idha^eb^ imasmiṃ suttapadese ^b^adhippetaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Yadi^eb^^a^M2.0453^ea^^b^eva^eb^nti yadi sati eva satipaṭṭhānaṃ, sati nāma eko dhammo, evaṃ sante kasmā satipaṭṭhānāti bahuvacananti āha ^b^‘‘satīnaṃ bahuttā’’^eb^tiādi. Yadi bahukā tā satiyo, atha kasmā maggoti ekavacananti yojanā. ^b^Magganaṭṭhenā^eb^ti niyyānaṭṭhena. Niyyāniko hi maggadhammo, teneva niyyānikabhāvena ekattupagato ekantato nibbānaṃ gacchati, atthikehi ca tadatthaṃ maggīyatīti āha ^b^‘‘vuttañheta’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^catassopi cetā^eb^ti kāyānupassanādivasena catubbidhāpi ca etā satiyo. ^b^Aparabhāge^eb^ti ariyamaggakkhaṇe. ^b^Kiccaṃ sādhayamānā^eb^ti pubbabhāge kāyādīsu ārammaṇesu subhasaññādividhamanavasena visuṃ visuṃ pavattitvā maggakkhaṇe sakiṃyeva ^a^V2.0159^ea^ tattha catubbidhassapi vipallāsassa samucchedavasena pahānakiccaṃ sādhayamānā ārammaṇakaraṇavasena nibbānaṃ gacchanti, tamevassa catukiccasādhanataṃ upādāya bahuvacananiddeso, tathāpi atthato bhedābhāvato maggoti ekavacanena vuccati. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘tasmā catassopi eko maggoti vuttā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kathetukamyatāpucchā^eb^ itarāsaṃ pucchānaṃ idha asambhavato niddesādivasena desetukāmatāya ca tathā vuttattā. ‘‘Ayañceva kāyo bahiddhā ca nāmarūpa’’ntiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.271, 287, 297; pārā. 11) khandhapañcakaṃ, ‘‘sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṃvedetī’’tiādīsu vedanādayo tayo arūpakkhandhā, ‘‘yā tasmiṃ samaye kāyassa passaddhi paṭippassaddhī’’tiādīsu (dha. sa. 40) vedanādayo tayo cetasikā khandhā ‘‘kāyo’’ti vuccanti, tato visesanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘kāyeti rūpakāye’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Kāyānupassī^eb^ti ettha tassīlatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘kāyaṃ anupassanasīlo’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Aniccato anupassatī^eb^ti catusamuṭṭhānikakāyaṃ ‘‘anicca’’nti anupassati, evaṃ passanto eva cassa aniccākārampi anupassatīti vuccati, tathābhūtassa cassa niccagāhassa visesopi na hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘no niccato’’^eb^ti. Tathā hesa ‘‘niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’ti (paṭi. ma. 1.28) vutto. Ettha ca aniccato eva anupassatīti evakāro luttaniddiṭṭhoti tena nivattitamatthaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘no niccato’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Na cettha dukkhānupassanādinivattanamāsaṅkitabbaṃ paṭiyoginivattanaparattā eva-kārassa, upari desanāāruḷhattā ca tāsaṃ. ^b^Dukkhato anupassatī^eb^tiādīsupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ pana viseso – aniccassa dukkhattā ^a^M2.0454^ea^ tameva kāyaṃ dukkhato anupassati, dukkhassa anattattā anattato anupassatīti.

[03]Yasmā pana yaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattā, na taṃ abhinanditabbaṃ, yañca na abhinanditabbaṃ, na tattha rajjitabbaṃ, tasmā vuttaṃ ‘‘aniccato anupassati, no niccato, dukkhato anupassati, no sukhato, anattato anupassati, no attato, nibbindati, no nandati, virajjati, no rajjatī’’ti. So evaṃ arajjanto rāgaṃ ^b^nirodheti, no samudeti,^eb^ samudayaṃ na karotīti attho. Evaṃ paṭipanno ca ^b^paṭinissajjati, no ādiyati^eb^. Ayañhi aniccādianupassanā tadaṅgavasena saddhiṃ kāyatannissayakhandhābhisaṅkhārehi kilesānaṃ pariccajanato saṅkhatadosadassanena tabbiparīte nibbāne tanninnatāya pakkhandanato ‘‘pariccāgapaṭinissaggo ceva pakkhandanapaṭinissaggo cā’’ti vuccati. Tasmā tāya samannāgato bhikkhu vuttanayena kilese ca pariccajati, nibbāne ca pakkhandati, tathābhūto ca pariccajanavasena kilese ^a^V2.0160^ea^ na ādiyati, nāpi adosadassitāvasena saṅkhatārammaṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘paṭinissajjati, no ādiyatī’’ti. Idāni nissitāhi anupassanāhi yesaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānaṃ hoti, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aniccato anupassanto niccasaññaṃ pajahatī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^niccasañña^eb^nti saṅkhārā niccāti evaṃ pavattaṃ viparītasaññaṃ. Diṭṭhicittavipallāsapahānamukheneva saññāvipallāsappahānanti saññāgahaṇaṃ, saññāsīsena vā tesampi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Nandi^eb^nti sappītikataṇhaṃ. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^Viharatī^eb^ti iminā kāyānupassanāsamaṅgino iriyāpathavihāro vuttoti āha – ^b^‘‘iriyatī’’^eb^ti, iriyāpathaṃ pavattetīti attho. Ārammaṇakaraṇavasena abhibyāpanato ^b^‘‘tīsu bhavesū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, uppajjanavasena pana kilesā parittabhūmakā evāti. Yadipi kilesānaṃ pahānaṃ ātāpananti taṃ sammādiṭṭhiādīnampi attheva, ātappa-saddoviya pana ātāpa-saddopi vīriye eva niruḷhoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vīriyassetaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. Atha vā paṭipakkhappahāne sampayuttadhammānaṃ abbhussahanavasena pavattamānassa vīriyassa sātisayaṃ tadātāpananti vīriyameva tathā vuccati, na aññe dhammā.

[03]^b^Ātāpī^eb^ti cāyamīkāro pasaṃsāya, atisayassa vā dīpakoti ātāpīgahaṇena sammappadhānasamaṅgitaṃ dasseti. Sammā samantato sāmañca pajānanto ^b^sampajāno,^eb^ asammissato vavatthāne aññadhammānupassitābhāvena ^a^M2.0455^ea^ sammā aviparītaṃ, sabbākārapajānanena samantato, uparūpari visesāvahabhāvena pavattiyā sāmaṃ pajānantoti attho. Yadi paññāya anupassati, kathaṃ satipaṭṭhānatāti āha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi. Tasmā satiyā laddhupakārāya eva paññāya ettha yathāvutte kāye kammaṭṭhāniko bhikkhu anupassako, tasmā ^b^‘‘kāyānupassī’’^eb^ti vuccati. ^b^Antosaṅkhepo^eb^ antolīnatā, kosajjanti attho. ^b^Upāyapariggaho^eb^ti ettha sīlavisodhanādi gaṇanādi uggahakosallādi ca ^b^upāyo,^eb^ tabbipariyāyato ^b^anupāyo^eb^ veditabbo. Yasmā ca upaṭṭhitassatī yathāvuttaṃ upāyaṃ na pariccajati, anupāyañca na upādiyati, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘muṭṭhassati…pe… asamattho hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti upāyānupāyānaṃ pariggahaparivajjanesu apariccāgāpariggahesu ca asamatthabhāvena. ^b^Assa^eb^ yogino.

[03]Yasmā satiyevettha satipaṭṭhānaṃ vuttā, tasmāssa sampayuttadhammā vīriyādayo aṅganti āha – ^b^‘‘sampayogaṅgañcassa dassetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aṅga^eb^-saddo cettha kāraṇapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Sati^eb^ggahaṇenevettha sammāsamādhissapi gahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ tassā samādhikkhandhe saṅgahitattā. Yasmā vā satisīsenāyaṃ ^a^V2.0161^ea^ desanā. Na hi kevalāya satiyā kilesappahānaṃ sambhavati, nibbānādhigamo vā, nāpi kevalā sati pavattati, tasmāssa jhānadesanāyaṃ savitakkādivacanassa viya sampayogaṅgadassanatāti aṅga-saddassa avayavapariyāyatā daṭṭhabbā. ^b^Pahānaṅga^eb^nti ‘‘vivicceva kāmehī’’tiādīsu viya pahātabbaṅgaṃ ^b^dassetuṃ^eb^. Yasmā ettha pubbabhāgamaggo adhippeto, na lokuttaramaggo, tasmā pubbabhāgiyameva vinayaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘tadaṅgavinayena vā vikkhambhanavinayena vā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Assā^eb^ti yogino. ^b^Tesaṃ dhammāna^eb^nti vedanādidhammānaṃ. Tesañhi tattha anadhippetattā ^b^‘‘atthuddhāranayenetaṃ vutta’’^eb^nti āha. ^b^Yaṃ panā^eb^ti vibhaṅge, vibhaṅgapakaraṇeti adhippāyo. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘loke’’ti etasmiṃ pade, tā ca lokiyā eva anupassanā nāma sammasananti katvā.

[03]^b^Dukkhato^eb^ti vipariṇāmasaṅkhāradukkhatāhi dukkhasabhāvato, dukkhāti anupassitabbāti attho. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Yo sukhaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0456^ea^^b^dukkhato addā^eb^ti yo bhikkhu sukhaṃ vedanaṃ vipariṇāmadukkhatāya dukkhanti paññācakkhunā addakkhi. ^b^Dukkhamaddakkhi sallato^eb^ti dukkhavedanaṃ pīḷājananato antotudanato dunnīharaṇato ca sallanti addakkhi passi. ^b^Adukkhamasukha^eb^nti upekkhāvedanaṃ. ^b^Santa^eb^nti sukhadukkhānaṃ viya anoḷārikatāya paccayavasena vūpasantasabhāvattā ca santaṃ. ^b^Aniccato^eb^ti hutvā abhāvato udayabbayavantato tāvakālikato niccapaṭikkhepato ca aniccanti yo addakkhi. ^b^Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhū^eb^ti so bhikkhu ekaṃsena, paribyattaṃ vā vedanāya sammā passanakoti attho.

[03]^b^Dukkhātipī^eb^ti saṅkhāradukkhatāya dukkhā itipi. ^b^Sabbaṃ taṃ^eb^ vedayitaṃ ^b^dukkhasmiṃ^eb^ antogadhaṃ pariyāpannanti ^b^vadāmi^eb^ saṅkhāradukkhanti vattabbato. ^b^Sukhadukkhatopi cā^eb^ti sukhādīnaṃ ṭhitivipariṇāmañāṇasukhatāya ca vipariṇāmaṭṭhitiaññāṇadukkhatāya ca vuttattā tissopi sukhato tissopi ca dukkhato anupassitabbāti attho. ^b^Satta anupassanā^eb^ heṭṭhā pakāsitā eva.

[03]^b^Ārammaṇā…pe… bhedāna^eb^nti rūpādiārammaṇanānattassa nīlāditabbhedassa, chandādiadhipatinānattassa hīnāditabbhedassa, ñāṇajhānādisahajātanānattassa sasaṅkhārikāsaṅkhārika-savitakka-savicārāditabbhedassa, kāmāvacarādibhūminānattassa, ukkaṭṭhamajjhimāditabbhedassa, kusalādikammanānattassa, devagatisaṃvattaniyatāditabbhedassa, kaṇhasukkavipākanānattassa, diṭṭhadhammavedanīyatāditabbhedassa, parittabhūmakādikiriyānānattassa, tihetukāditabbhedassa vasena anupassitabbanti yojanā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena savatthukāvatthukādinānattassa puggalattayasādhāraṇāditabbhedassa ^a^V2.0162^ea^ ca saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Sarāgādīna^eb^nti ^b^mahāsatipaṭṭhānasutte^eb^ (dī. ni. 2.381; ma. ni. 1.114) āgatānaṃ sarāgavītarāgādibhedānaṃ. ^b^Salakkhaṇa-sāmaññalakkhaṇāna^eb^nti phusanāditaṃtaṃsalakkhaṇānañceva aniccatādisāmaññalakkhaṇānañca vasenāti yojanā.

[03]^b^Suññatadhammassā^eb^ti anattatāsaṅkhātasuññatasabhāvassa. ‘‘Salakkhaṇa-sāmaññalakkhaṇāna’’nti hi iminā yo ito bāhirakehi sāminivāsīkārakavedakādhiṭṭhāyakabhāvena parikappito attā, tassa saṅkhāresu niccatā sukhatā viya katthacipi abhāvo vibhāvito. Natthi etesaṃ attāti ^b^anattā,^eb^ yasmā pana saṅkhāresu ekadhammopi attā ^a^M2.0457^ea^ na hoti, tasmā te na attātipi anattāti ayaṃ tesaṃ suññatadhammo. Tassa suññatadhammassa, yaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^abhidhamme^eb^ (dha. sa. 121) ‘‘tasmiṃ kho pana samaye dhammā hontī’’tiādinā suññatavāradesanā vuttā. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Ambapālisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^368^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saratīti ^b^sato^eb^. Ayaṃ pana na yāya kāyaci satiyā sato, atha kho edisāyāti dassento ^b^‘‘kāyādianupassanāsatiyā’’^eb^ti āha. ^b^Catusampajaññapaññāyā^eb^ti catubbidhasampajaññapaññāya, abhikkamanaṃ abhikkantanti āha – ^b^‘‘abhikkantaṃ vuccati gamana’’^eb^nti. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ paṭikkantanti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘paṭikkantaṃ nivattana’’^eb^nti. Nivattanañca nivattimattaṃ, nivattitvā pana gamanaṃ gamanameva. ^b^Kāyaṃ abhiharanto^eb^ abhigamanavasena kāyaṃ nāmento. Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu yo gamanādividhinā kāyassa purato abhihāro, so abhikkamo, pacchato apaharaṇaṃ paṭikkamoti dassento ^b^‘‘ṭhānepī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Āsanassā^eb^ti pīṭhakādiāsanassa. ^b^Purimāṅgābhimukho^eb^ti aṭanikādipurimāvayavābhimukho. ^b^Saṃsaranto^eb^ti saṃsappanto. ^b^Paccāsaṃsaranto^eb^ti paṭiāsappanto. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti iminā sarīrasseva abhimukhasaṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni nidasseti.

[03]Sammā pajānanaṃ ^b^sampajānaṃ^eb^. Tena attanā kātabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti āha – ^b^‘‘sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī’’^eb^ti. Sampajānameva hi sampajaññaṃ. ^b^Sampajaññasseva vā kārī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0163^ea^ sampajaññasseva karaṇasīlo. ^b^Sampajaññaṃ karotevā^eb^ti abhikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti eva, sampajānasseva vā kāro etassa atthīti ^b^sampajānakārī^eb^.

[03]Dhammato vaḍḍhitasaṅkhātena saha atthena vattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi, sātthakassa sampajānanaṃ ^b^sātthakasampajaññaṃ^eb^. Sappāyassa attano ^a^M2.0458^ea^ upakārāvahassa hitassa sampajānanaṃ ^b^sappāyasampajaññaṃ^eb^. Abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare, aññatthāpi ca pavattesu avijahite kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte gocare sampajaññaṃ ^b^gocarasampajaññaṃ^eb^. Abhikkamādīsu asammuyhanameva sampajaññaṃ ^b^asammohasampajaññaṃ. Pariggaṇhitvā^eb^ti tulayitvā tīretvā, paṭisaṅkhāyāti attho. ^b^Saṅghadassaneneva^eb^ uposathapavāraṇādiatthaṃ gamanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. ^b^Asubhadassanādī^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena kasiṇaparikammādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘‘cetiyaṃ disvāpi hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Arahattaṃ pāpuṇātī^eb^ti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso eso. Samathavipassanuppādanampi hi bhikkhuno vuddhi eva. ^b^Dakkhiṇadvāre^eb^ti cetiyaṅgaṇassa dakkhiṇadvāre, tathā ^b^pacchimadvāre^eb^tiādīsu. ^b^Abhayavāpi pāḷiya^eb^nti abhayavāpiyā puratthimatīre.

[03]Buddhavaṃsa-ariyavaṃsa-cetiyavaṃsa-dīpavaṃsādivaṃsakathanato ^b^mahāariyavaṃsabhāṇako^eb^ thero. ^b^Paññāyanaṭṭhāne^eb^ti cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne. ^b^Ekapaduddhāre^eb^ti paduddhārapatiṭṭhānaparivattanaṃ akatvā ekasmiṃyeva avaṭṭhāne. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti abhayagirivāsino.

[03]^b^Tasmiṃ panā^eb^ti sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitātthepi gamane. Attho nāma dhammato vaḍḍhīti yaṃ sātthakanti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ sappāyamevāti siyā kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. ^b^Cittakammarūpakāni viyā^eb^ti cittakammakatā paṭimāyo viya, yantapayogena vā vicittakammā paṭimāya sadisā yantarūpakā viya. ^b^Asamapekkhanaṃ^eb^ gehassitāññāṇupekkhāvasena ārammaṇe ayoniso olokanādi. Yaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā uppajjati upekkhā bālassa mūḷhassa puthujjanassā’’^eb^tiādi (ma. ni. 3.308). Hatthiādisammaddena ^b^jīvitantarāyo^eb^. Visabhāgarūpadassanādinā ^b^brahmacariyantarāyo^eb^.

[03]Pabbajitadivasato paṭṭhāya bhikkhūnaṃ anuvattanakathā āciṇṇā, ananuvattanakathā pana tassā aparā dutiyā nāma hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘dve kathā nāma na kathitapubbā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Eva^eb^nti iminā ^a^V2.0164^ea^ ‘‘sace panā’’tiādikaṃ sabbampi vuttākāraṃ paccāmasati, na ‘‘purisassa mātugāmāsubha’’ntiādikaṃ vuccamānaṃ.

[03]Yogakammassa ^a^M2.0459^ea^ pavattiṭṭhānatāya bhāvanāya ārammaṇaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ vuccatīti āha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānasaṅkhātaṃ gocara’’^eb^nti. ^b^Uggahetvā^eb^ti yathā uggahanimittaṃ uppajjati, evaṃ uggahakosallassa sampādanavasena uggahetvā.

[03]^b^Haratī^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānaṃ pavatteti, yāva piṇḍapātapaṭikkamā anuyuñjatīti attho. ^b^Na paccāharatī^eb^ti āhārūpabhogato yāva divāṭṭhānupasaṅkamanā kammaṭṭhānaṃ na paṭineti. ^b^Samādāya vattati^eb^ sammā ādiyitvā tesaṃ vattānaṃ paripūraṇavasena vattati. ^b^Sarīraparikamma^eb^nti mukhadhovanādisarīrapaṭijagganaṃ. ^b^Dve tayo pallaṅke^eb^ti dve tayo nisajjāvāre dve tīṇi uṇhāsanāni. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘usumaṃ gāhāpento’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānamukheneva kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto eva. Tena ‘‘pattopi acetano’’tiādinā pavattetabbakammaṭṭhānaṃ, yathāparihariyamānaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahitvāti dasseti. ^b^Tathevā^eb^ti tikkhattumeva. Paribhogacetiyato sarīracetiyaṃ garutaranti katvā ^b^‘‘cetiyaṃ vanditvā’’^eb^ti cetiyavandanāya paṭhamaṃ karaṇīyatā vuttā. Tathā hi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ – ‘‘cetiyaṃ bādhayamānā bodhisākhā haritabbā’’ti vuttā. Buddhaguṇānussaraṇavaseneva bodhiñca paṇipātakaraṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘buddhassa bhagavato sammukhā viya nipaccakāraṃ dassetvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gāmasamīpe^eb^ti gāmassa upacāraṭṭhāne.

[03]^b^Janasaṅgahaṇattha^eb^nti ‘‘mayi akathente etesaṃ ko kathessatī’’ti dhammānuggahena janasaṅgahaṇatthaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā ‘‘dhammakathā nāma kathetabbā evā’’ti aṭṭhakathācariyā vadanti, yasmā ca dhammakathā kammaṭṭhānavinimuttā nāma natthi, tasmā. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā^eb^ti attanā parihariyamānaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ avijahanto tadanuguṇaṃyeva dhammakathaṃ kathetvā. ^b^Anumodanaṃ katvā^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘kammaṭṭhānasīsenevā’’ti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Sampattaparicchedenevā^eb^ti paricito aparicitotiādivibhāgaṃ akatvā sampattakoṭiyā eva, samāgamamattenevāti attho. ^b^Bhaye^eb^ti paracakkādibhaye.

[03]^b^Kammajatejo^eb^ti gahaṇiṃ sandhāyāha. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānavīthiṃ nārohati^eb^ khudāparissamena kilantakāyattā samādhānābhāvato. ^b^Avasesaṭṭhāne^eb^ti yāguyā ^a^M2.0460^ea^ aggahitaṭṭhāne. ^b^Poṅkhānupoṅkha^eb^nti kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassa ^a^V2.0165^ea^ aviccheda-dassanametaṃ, yathā poṅkhānupoṅkhaṃ pavattāya sarapaṭipāṭiyā anavicchedo, evametassapi kammaṭṭhānupaṭṭhānassāti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03]^b^Nikkhittadhuro^eb^ bhāvanānuyoge. Vattapaṭipattiyā apūraṇena ^b^sabbavattāni bhinditvā^eb^. Kāme avītarāgo hoti. Kāye avītarāgo. Rūpe avītarāgo. Yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehaṃ bhuñjitvā seyyasukhaṃ passasukhaṃ middhasukhaṃ anuyutto viharati. Aññataraṃ devanikāyaṃ paṇidhāya brahmacariyaṃ caratī’’ti (dī. ni. 3.320; ma. ni. 1.186) evaṃ vuttaṃ ^b^pañcavidhacetovinibandhacitto. Caritvā^eb^ti pavattitvā.

[03]^b^Gatapaccāgatikavattavasenā^eb^ti bhāvanāsahitaṃyeva bhikkhāya gatapaccāgataṃ gamanapaccāgamanaṃ etassa atthīti gatapaccāgatikaṃ, tadeva vattaṃ, tassa vasena. Attano hitasukhaṃ kāmenti icchantīti ^b^attakāmā,^eb^ dhammacchandavanto. ‘‘Dhammo’’ti hi hitaṃ taṃnimittakañca sukhanti. Atha vā viññūnaṃ dhammānaṃ attaniyattā attabhāvaparicchannattā ca attā nāma dhammo. Tenāha bhagavā – ^b^‘‘attadīpā, bhikkhave, viharatha attasaraṇā’’^eb^tiādi (saṃ. ni. 3.43). Taṃ kāmenti icchantīti ^b^attakāmā. Usabhaṃ^eb^ nāma vīsati yaṭṭhiyo. ^b^Tāya saññāyā^eb^ti tāya pāsāṇasaññāya, ‘‘ettakaṃ ṭhānamāgatā’’ti jānantāti adhippāyo. ^b^So eva nayo^eb^ ayaṃ bhikkhūtiādiko yo ṭhāne vutto, so eva nisajjāyapi nayo. Pacchato āgacchantānaṃ chinnabhattabhāvabhayenapi yonisomanasikāraṃ paribrūheti.

[03]^b^Maddantā^eb^ti dhaññakaraṇaṭṭhāne sālisīsāni maddantā. ^b^Mahāpadhānaṃ pūjessāmī^eb^ti amhākaṃ atthāya lokanāthena cha vassāni kataṃ dukkaracariyaṃ evāhaṃ yathāsatti pūjessāmīti. Paṭipattipūjā hi satthupūjā, na āmisapūjāti. ^b^Ṭhānacaṅkamamevā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhātabbairiyāpathakālavasena vuttaṃ, na bhojanādikālesu avassaṃ kātabbanisajjāya paṭikkhepavasena.

[03]Vīthiṃ otaritvā ito cito anoloketvā paṭhamameva vīthiyo sallakkhetabbāti āha ^b^‘‘vīthiyo sallakkhetvā’’^eb^ti. Yaṃ sandhāya ^a^M2.0461^ea^ vuccati – ‘‘pāsādikena abhikkantenā’’tiādi. Taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha cā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Āhāre paṭikūlasaññaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā vuttameva. ^b^Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgata^eb^nti ‘‘yāvadeva imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā (ma. ni. 1.23; 2.24; 3.75; saṃ. ni. 4.120; a. ni. 6.58; 8.9) vuttehi aṭṭhahi aṅgehi samannāgataṃ katvā. ^b^Neva davāyā^eb^tiādi pana paṭikkhepadassanaṃ.

[03]Paccekabodhiṃ ^a^V2.0166^ea^ sacchikaroti, yadi upanissayasampanno hotīti sambandho. Idañca yathā heṭṭhā tīsu ṭhānesu, evaṃ ito paresu ṭhānesu upanetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. Tattha paccekabodhiyā upanissayasampadā kappānaṃ dve asaṅkhyeyyāni satasahassañca tajjaṃ puññañāṇasambhārasambharaṇaṃ, sāvakabodhiyaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ kappasatasahassañca, mahāsāvakānaṃ kappasatasahassameva tajjaṃ sambhārasambharaṇaṃ, itaresaṃ atītāsu jātīsu vivaṭṭasannissayavasena nibbattitaṃ nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ kusalaṃ. ^b^Bāhiyo dārucīriyo^eb^ti bāhiyavisaye jātasaṃvaddhatāya bāhiyo, dārucīrapariharaṇena dārucīriyoti laddhasamañño. So hi āyasmā ‘‘tasmātiha te, bāhiya, evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ – diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissatī’’tiādivasappavattena (udā. 10) saṃkhitteneva ovādena khippataraṃ visesaṃ adhigacchi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘khippābhiñño vā hoti seyyathāpi thero bāhiyo dārucīriyo’’^eb^ti. Evaṃ ^b^mahāpañño vā^eb^tiādīsu yathārahaṃ vattabbanti.

[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti asammuyhanaṃ. ^b^Eva^eb^nti idāni vuccamānākāradassanaṃ. ^b^Attā abhikkamatī^eb^ti iminā andhaputhujjanassa diṭṭhiggāhavasena abhikkame sammuyhanaṃ dasseti, ^b^ahaṃ abhikkamāmī^eb^ti pana iminā mānaggāhavasena, tadubhayaṃ pana taṇhāya vinā na hotīti taṇhāggāhavasenapi sammuyhanaṃ dassitameva hoti, ^b^‘‘tathā asammuyhanto’’^eb^ti vatvā taṃ asammuyhanaṃ yena ghanavinibbhogena hoti, taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘abhikkamāmīti citte uppajjamāne’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha yasmā vāyodhātuyā anugatā tejodhātu uddharaṇassa paccayo. Uddharaṇagatikā hi tejodhātūti uddharaṇe vāyodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha dhātūnaṃ sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento ^b^‘‘ekekapāduddharaṇe…pe… balavatiyo’’^eb^ti āha. Yasmā pana tejodhātuyā anugatā ^a^M2.0462^ea^ vāyodhātu atiharaṇavītiharaṇānaṃ paccayo. Tiriyagatikāya hi vāyodhātuyā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesu sātisayo byāpāroti tejodhātuyā tassānugatabhāvo, tasmā imāsaṃ dvinnamettha sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento ^b^‘‘tathā atiharaṇavītiharaṇesū’’^eb^ti āha. Satipi anugamanānugantabbatāvisese tejodhātuvāyodhātubhāvamattaṃ sandhāya ^b^tathā^eb^-saddaggahaṇaṃ.

[03]Tattha akkantaṭṭhānato pādassa ukkhipanaṃ ^b^uddharaṇaṃ,^eb^ ṭhitaṭṭhānaṃ atikkamitvā purato haraṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ^eb^. Rukkhakhāṇuādipariharaṇatthaṃ, patiṭṭhitapādaghaṭṭanapariharaṇatthaṃ vā passena haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇaṃ^eb^. Yāva patiṭṭhitapādo, tāva āharaṇaṃ ^b^atiharaṇaṃ,^eb^ tato paraṃ haraṇaṃ ^b^vītiharaṇa^eb^nti ayaṃ vā etesaṃ viseso. Yasmā pathavīdhātuyā anugatā āpodhātu vossajjanassa paccayo. Garutarasabhāvā hi āpodhātūti vossajjane pathavīdhātuyā tassānugatabhāvo, tasmā tāsaṃ dvinnamettha ^a^V2.0167^ea^ sāmatthiyato adhimattatā, itarāsañca omattatāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘vossajjane…pe… balavatiyo’’^eb^ti. Yasmā pana āpodhātuyā anugatā pathavīdhātu sannikkhepanassa paccayo. Patiṭṭhābhāve viya patiṭṭhāpanepi tassā sātisayakiccattā āpodhātuyā tassā anugatabhāvo, tathā ghaṭṭanakiriyāya pathavīdhātuyā vasena sannirumbhanassa sijjhanato tatthāpi pathavīdhātuyā āpodhātuanugatabhāvo, tasmā vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘tathā sannikkhepanasannirumbhanesū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti tasmiṃ abhikkamane, tesu vā vuttesu uddharaṇādīsu chasu koṭṭhāsesu. ^b^Uddharaṇe^eb^ti uddharaṇakkhaṇe. ^b^Rūpārūpadhammā^eb^ti uddharaṇākārena pavattā rūpadhammā taṃsamuṭṭhāpakā arūpadhammā ca. ^b^Atiharaṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti^eb^ khaṇamattāvaṭṭhānato. ^b^Tattha tatthevā^eb^ti yattha yattha uppannā, tattha tattheva. Na hi dhammānaṃ desantarasaṅkamanaṃ atthi. ^b^Pabbaṃ pabba^eb^ntiādi uddharaṇādikoṭṭhāse sandhāya sabhāgasantativasena vuttanti veditabbaṃ. Atīttaro hi rūpadhammānampi pavattikkhaṇo, gamanassādānaṃ devaputtānaṃ heṭṭhupariyāyena ^a^M2.0463^ea^ paṭimukhaṃ dhāvantānaṃ sirasi pāde ca baddhakhuradhārāsamāgamatopi sīghataro. Yathā tilānaṃ bhajjiyamānānaṃ taṭataṭāyanena bhedo lakkhīyati, evaṃ saṅkhatadhammānaṃ uppādenāti dassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘taṭataṭāyantā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Uppannā hi ekantato bhijjantīti.

[03]^b^Saddhiṃ rūpenā^eb^ti idaṃ tassa tassa cittassa nirodhena saddhiṃ nirujjhanakarūpadhammavasena vuttaṃ, yaṃ tato sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ. Aññathā yadi rūpārūpadhammā samānakkhaṇā siyuṃ, ‘‘rūpaṃ garupariṇāmaṃ dandhanirodha’’ntiādivacanehi virodho siyā. Tathā – ‘‘nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, aññaṃ ekadhammampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ lahuparivattaṃ, yathayidaṃ citta’’nti (a. ni. 1.48) evamādipāḷiyā ca. Cittacetasikā hi sārammaṇasabhāvā yathābalaṃ attano ārammaṇapaccayabhūtamatthaṃ vibhāventāyeva uppajjantīti tesaṃ taṃsabhāvanipphattianantaraṃ nirodho, rūpadhammā pana anārammaṇā pakāsetabbā. Evaṃ tesaṃ pakāsetabbabhāvanipphatti soḷasahi cittehi hotīti taṅkhaṇāyukatā tesaṃ icchitā, lahukaviññāṇassa visayasaṅgatimattapaccayatāya tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ, visayasaṅgatimattatāya ca viññāṇassa lahuparivattitā, dandhamahābhūtapaccayatāya rūpadhammānaṃ dandhaparivattitā. Nānādhātuyā yathābhūtañāṇaṃ kho pana tathāgatasseva, tena ca purejātapaccayo rūpadhammova vutto, pacchājātapaccayo ca tassevāti rūpārūpadhammānaṃ samānakkhaṇatā na yujjateva, tasmā vuttanayenevettha attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Aññaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0168^ea^^b^uppajjate cittaṃ, aññaṃ cittaṃ nirujjhatī^eb^ti yaṃ purimuppannaṃ cittaṃ, taṃ aññaṃ, taṃ pana nirujjhantaṃ aparassa anantarādipaccayo hutvā eva nirujjhatīti tathāladdhapaccayaṃ aññaṃ uppajjate cittaṃ. Yadi evaṃ tesaṃ antaro labbheyyāti, noti āha ^b^‘‘avīcimanupabandho’’^eb^ti. Yathā vīci antaro na labbhati, ‘‘tadeveta’’nti avisesavidū maññanti, evaṃ anu anu pabandho cittasantāno rūpasantāno ca ^b^nadīsotova^eb^ nadiyaṃ udakappavāho viya ^b^vattati^eb^.

[03]Abhimukhaṃ lokitaṃ ^b^ālokita^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘puratopekkhana’’^eb^nti. Yasmā yaṃdisābhimukho gacchati tiṭṭhati nisīdati vā, tadabhimukhaṃ pekkhanaṃ ālokitaṃ ^a^M2.0464^ea^, tasmā tadanugataṃ vidisālokanaṃ vilokitanti āha ^b^‘‘vilokitaṃ nāma anudisāpekkhana’’^eb^nti. Sammajjanaparibhaṇḍādikaraṇe olokitassa, ullokāharaṇādīsu ullokitassa, pacchato āgacchantassa parissayassa parivajjanādivasena apalokitassa ca siyā sambhavoti āha – ^b^‘‘iminā vā mukhena sabbānipi tāni gahitānevā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Kāyasakkhi^eb^nti kāyena sacchikatavantaṃ, paccakkhakārinanti attho. Sohāyasmā vipassanākāle eva ‘‘yamevāhaṃ indriyesu aguttadvārataṃ nissāya sāsane anabhiratiādivippakāraṃ patto, tameva suṭṭhu niggahessāmī’’ti ussāhajāto balavahirottappo, tattha ca katādhikārattā indriyasaṃvare ukkaṃsapāramippatto, teneva naṃ satthā – ‘‘etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ indriyesu guttadvārānaṃ yadidaṃ nando’’ti (a. ni. 1.230) etadagge ṭhapesi.

[03]Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva gocarasampajaññabhāvatoti vuttamevatthaṃ hetubhāvena paccāmasati. ^b^Attano kammaṭṭhānavaseneva ālokanavilokanaṃ kātabbaṃ,^eb^ khandhādikammaṭṭhānikehi añño upāyo na gavesitabboti adhippāyo. Yasmā ālokitādisamaññāpi dhammamattasseva pavattiviseso, tasmā tassa yāthāvato pajānanaṃ asammohasampajaññanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘abbhantare’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasenā^eb^ti kiriyamayacittasamuṭṭhānavāyodhātuyā calanākārapavattivasena. ^b^Adho sīdatī^eb^ti thokaṃ otarati. ^b^Uddhaṃ laṅghetī^eb^ti laṅghantaṃ viya upari gacchati.

[03]^b^Aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamāna^eb^nti padhānabhūtaṃ aṅgakiccaṃ nipphādentaṃ, upapattibhavassa sarīraṃ hutvāti attho. ^b^Paṭhamajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepi na hotī^eb^ti idaṃ pañcadvāraviññāṇavīthiyaṃ ‘‘itthī puriso’’ti ^a^V2.0169^ea^ rajjanādīnaṃ abhāvaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanavasena iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhamattaṃ, aniṭṭhe paṭighamattaṃ uppajjati. Manodvāre pana ‘‘itthī puriso’’ti rajjanādi hoti, tassa pañcadvārajavanaṃ mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ ^a^M2.0465^ea^ vā sabbaṃ bhavaṅgādi. Evaṃ manodvārajavanassa mūlabhūtadhammaparijānanavaseneva mūlapariññā vuttā, āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārajavanasseva apubbabhāvavasena ceva ittarabhāvavasena ca vuttā. ^b^Heṭṭhupariyavasena bhijjitvā patitesū^eb^ti heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca aparāparaṃ bhaṅgappattimāha.
[03]^b^Ta^eb^nti javanaṃ. Tassa javanassa na yuttanti sambandho. ^b^Āgantuko^eb^ abbhāgato. Udayabbayaparicchinno tāvatako kālo etesanti ^b^tāvakālikāni^eb^.

[03]^b^Etaṃ^eb^ asammohasampajaññaṃ. ^b^Samavāye^eb^ti sāmaggiyaṃ. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokane paññāyamāne tabbinimutto – ^b^ko eko āloketi, ko viloketi. Upanissayapaccayo^eb^ti idaṃ suttantanayena pariyāyato vuttaṃ. ^b^Sahajātapaccayo^eb^ti nidassanamattametaṃ aññamaññasampayuttātthiavigatādipaccayānampi labbhanato.
[03]^b^Kāle^eb^ti samiñjituṃ yuttakāle ^b^samiñjantassa,^eb^ tathā pasāretuṃ yuttakāle ^b^pasārentassa. ‘‘Maṇisappo^eb^ nāma ekā sappajātī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Laḷana^eb^nti kampanaṃ, līḷākaraṇaṃ vā.

[03]^b^Uṇhapakatiko^eb^ pariḷāhabahulakāyo. Sīlassa vidūsanena ahitāvahattā ^b^micchājīvavasena uppannaṃ asappāyaṃ. ‘‘Cīvarampi acetana’’^eb^ntiādinā cīvarassa viya kāyopi acetanoti kāyassa attasuññatāvibhāvanena ^b^‘‘abbhantare’’^eb^tiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ paridīpento itarītarasantosassa kāraṇaṃ dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^Catupañcagaṇṭhikāhato^eb^ti āhatacatupañcagaṇṭhiko, catupañcagaṇṭhikāhi vā hatasobho.

[03]^b^Aṭṭhavidhopi attho^eb^ti aṭṭhavidhopi payojanaviseso. Mahāsivattheravādavasena ‘‘imassa kāyassa ṭhitiyā’’tiādinā nayena vutto daṭṭhabbo. Imasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^‘‘neva davāyātiādinā nayenā’’^eb^ti pana idaṃ paṭikkhepaṅgadassanamukhena pāḷi āgatāti katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]Pathavīsandhārakajalassa ^a^M2.0466^ea^^a^V2.0170^ea^ taṃsandhārakavāyunā viya paribhuttassa āhārassa vāyodhātuyāva āsaye avaṭṭhānanti āha – ^b^‘‘vāyodhātuvaseneva tiṭṭhatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Atiharatī^eb^ti yāva mukhā abhiharati. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti tato kucchiyaṃ vimissaṃ karonto harati. ^b^Atiharatī^eb^ti vā mukhadvāraṃ atikkāmento harati. ^b^Vītiharatī^eb^ti kucchigataṃ passato harati. ^b^Parivattetī^eb^ti aparāparaṃ cāreti. Ettha ca āhārassa dhāraṇaparivattanasañcuṇṇanavisosanāni pathavīdhātusahitā eva vāyodhātu karoti, na kevalāti tāni pathavīdhātuyā kiccabhāvena vuttāni, sā eva dhāraṇādīni kiccāni karontassa sādhāraṇāti vuttāni. ^b^Allattañca anupāletī^eb^ti yathā vāyodhātuādīhi aññehi visosanaṃ na hoti, tathā anupāleti allabhāvaṃ. ^b^Tejodhātū^eb^ti gahaṇīsaṅkhātā tejodhātu. Sā hi antopaviṭṭhaṃ āhāraṃ paripāceti. ^b^Añjaso hotī^eb^ti āhārassa pavisanādīnaṃ maggo hoti. ^b^Ābhujatī^eb^ti pariyesanavasena, ajjhoharaṇajiṇṇājiṇṇatādipaṭisaṃvedanavasena ca āvajjeti, vijānātīti attho. Taṃtaṃvijānanassa paccayabhūtoyeva hi payogo ‘‘sammāpayogo’’ti vutto. Yena hi payogena pariyesanādi nipphajjati, so tabbisayavijānanampi nipphādeti nāma tadavinābhāvato. Atha vā sammāpayogaṃ sammāpaṭipattiṃ ^b^anvāya^eb^ āgamma ^b^ābhujati^eb^ samannāharati. Ābhogapubbako hi sabbopi viññāṇabyāpāroti tathā vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Gamanato^eb^ti bhikkhācāravasena gocaragāmaṃ uddissa gamanato. ^b^Pariyesanato^eb^ti gocaragāme bhikkhatthaṃ āhiṇḍanato. ^b^Paribhogato^eb^ti āhārassa paribhuñjanato. ^b^Āsayato^eb^ti pittādiāsayato. Āsayati ettha ekajjhaṃ pavattamānopi kammabalavavatthito hutvā mariyādavasena aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato sayati tiṭṭhati pavattatīti ^b^āsayo,^eb^ āmāsayassa upari tiṭṭhanako pittādiko. Mariyādattho hi ayamākāro. Nidheti yathābhutto āhāro nicito hutvā tiṭṭhati etthāti nidhānaṃ, āmāsayo, tato ^b^nidhānato. Aparipakkato^eb^ti gahaṇīsaṅkhātena kammajatejena avipakkato. ^b^Paripakkato^eb^ti yathābhuttassa āhārassa vipakkabhāvato. ^b^Phalato^eb^ti nipphattito. ^b^Nissandato^eb^ti ito cito ca vissandanato ^a^M2.0467^ea^. ^b^Sammakkhanato^eb^ti sabbaso makkhanato. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanāya^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.294) gahetabbo.

[03]^b^Sarīrato sedā muccantī^eb^ti vegasandhāraṇena uppannapariḷāhato sarīrato sedā muccanti. ^b^Aññe ca rogā^eb^ kaṇṇasūlabhagandarādayo. ^b^Aṭṭhāne^eb^ti manussāmanussapariggahe ayuttaṭṭhāne khettadevāyatanādike. Kuddhā hi manussā amanussāpi vā jīvitakkhayaṃ pāpenti. Vissaṭṭhattā ^b^neva tassa^eb^^a^V2.0171^ea^^b^bhikkhuno attano,^eb^ kassaci anissajjitattā jigucchanīyattā ca ^b^na parassa, udakatumbato^eb^ti veḷunāḷiādiudakabhājanato. ^b^Ta^eb^nti chaḍḍitaudakaṃ.

[03]Ettha ca eko iriyāpatho dvīsu ṭhānesu āgato, so pubbe abhikkamapaṭikkamagahaṇena. ‘‘Gamanepi purato pacchato ca kāyassa abhiharaṇaṃ vuttanti idha gamanameva gahita’’nti apare. Yasmā idha sampajaññakathāyaṃ asammohasampajaññameva dhuraṃ, tasmā antarantare iriyāpathe pavattānaṃ rūpārūpadhammānaṃ tattha tattheva nirodhadassanavasena sampajānakāritā gahitāti. Majjhimabhāṇakā pana evaṃ vadanti – eko hi bhikkhu gacchanto aññaṃ cintento, aññaṃ vitakkento gacchati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva gacchati, tathā eko tiṭṭhanto, nisīdanto, sayanto aññaṃ cintento, aññaṃ vitakkento sayati, eko kammaṭṭhānaṃ avissajjetvāva sayati. Ettakena pana na pākaṭaṃ hotīti caṅkamanena dīpenti. Yo bhikkhu caṅkamanaṃ otaritvā caṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ ṭhito pariggaṇhāti – ‘‘pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattā rūpārūpadhammā pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, pacchimacaṅkamanakoṭiyaṃ pavattāpi pācīnacaṅkamanakoṭiṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamanamajjhe pavattā ubho koṭiyo appatvā ettheva niruddhā, caṅkamane pavattā rūpārūpadhammā ṭhānaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, ṭhāne pavattā nisajjaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā, nisajjāya pavattā sayanaṃ appatvā ettheva niruddhā’’ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, uṭṭhahanto pana kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva uṭṭhahati. Ayaṃ bhikkhu ^b^gatādīsu sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma hotīti.

[03]Evampi ^a^M2.0468^ea^ sutte kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ hoti, kammaṭṭhānaṃ avibhūtaṃ na kātabbaṃ, tasmā so bhikkhu yāva sakkoti, tāva caṅkamitvā ṭhatvā nisīditvā sayamāno evaṃ pariggahetvā sayati – ‘‘kāyo acetano mañco acetano, kāyo na jānāti ‘ahaṃ mañce sayito’ti, mañcopi na jānāti ‘mayi kāyo sayito’ti, acetano kāyo acetane mañce sayito’’ti, evaṃ pariggaṇhanto eva cittaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ otāreti, pabujjhanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvāva pabujjhatīti ayaṃ ^b^sutte sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma hoti. Kāyikādikiriyānibbattanena tammayattā āvajjanakiriyānibbattakattā āvajjanakiriyāsamuṭṭhitattā ca javanaṃ, sabbampi vā chadvārappavattaṃ kiriyāmayapavattaṃ nāma, tasmiṃ sati jāgaritaṃ nāma hotīti pariggaṇhanto ^b^jāgarite sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma. Apica rattindivaṃ cha koṭṭhāse katvā pañca koṭṭhāse jaggantopi ^b^jāgarite sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma hotīti.

[03]Vimuttāyatanasīse ^a^V2.0172^ea^ ṭhatvā dhammaṃ desentopi bāttiṃsatiracchānakathaṃ pahāya dasakathāvatthunissitasappāyakathaṃ kathentopi ^b^bhāsite sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma hoti. Aṭṭhatiṃsāya ārammaṇesu cittaruciyaṃ ārammaṇaṃ manasikāraṃ pavattentopi dutiyajjhānaṃ samāpannopi ^b^tuṇhībhāve sampajānakārī^eb^ nāma. Dutiyañhi jhānaṃ vacīsaṅkhārappahānato visesato tuṇhībhāvo nāmāti. ^b^Oṭṭhe cā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^ca^eb^-saddena kaṇṭhasīsanābhiādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Tadanurūpaṃ payoga^eb^nti tassa uppattiyā anucchavikaṃ cittassa pavattiākārasaññitaṃ payogaṃ, yato sabbe vicārādayo nipphajjanti. ^b^Upādārūpapavattiyā^eb^ti viññattivikārasahitasaddāyatanuppattiyā. ^b^Eva^eb^nti vuttappakārena. Sattasupi ṭhānesu asammuyhanavasena ^b^‘‘missaka’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Maggasammāsatiyāpi kāyānupassanādianurūpattā sampajaññānurūpa^b^pubbabhāgaṃ^eb^ sattaṭṭhāniyassa ekantalokiyattā.
[06]Satisuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^369^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yasmā so bhikkhu ‘‘desetu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhamma’’nti saṃkhittena dhammadesanaṃ yāci, tassa saṃkhittarucibhāvato, tasmā saṃkhitteneva ^a^M2.0469^ea^ dhammaṃ desetukāmo bhagavā ‘‘tasmātihā’’tiādimāhāti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘yasmā saṃkhittena desanaṃ yācasi, tasmā’’^eb^ti. Kammassakatādiṭṭhikasseva lokiyalokuttaraguṇavisesā ijjhanti, na diṭṭhivipannassa, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘diṭṭhīti kammassakatādiṭṭhī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^370^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjamāne apāyadukkhe apātanavasena dhāraṇaṭṭhena ^b^dhammo,^eb^ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ, tadeva tadaṅgādivasena kilesānaṃ vinayanaṭṭhena ^b^vinayo^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘dhammoti vā…pe… nāma’’^eb^nti. Paṭipakkhadhammehi anabhibhūtatāya eko udetīti ekodīti laddhanāmo samādhi bhūto jāto etesanti ^b^ekodibhūtā^eb^. Ettha ca ^b^ekodibhūtā^eb^ti etena upacārajjhānāvaho pubbabhāgiko samādhi vutto. ^b^Samāhitā^eb^ti etena upacārappanāsamādhi. ^b^Ekaggacittā^eb^ti etena subhāvito vasippatto appanāsamādhi vuttoti veditabbo. ^b^Navakabhikkhūhi bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānā pubbabhāgā^eb^. Te hi yathābhūtañāṇāya bhāvitā. Yathābhūtañāṇanti hi sotāpattimaggañāṇaṃ idhādhippetaṃ. ^b^Khīṇāsavehi bhāvitasatipaṭṭhānāpi pubbabhāgā^eb^. Tesañhi katakaraṇīyānaṃ ^a^V2.0173^ea^ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārāya satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā, sekkhānaṃ pana satipaṭṭhānabhāvanā pariññatthāya pavattā lokiyā, parijānanavasena pavattā lokuttarāti ^b^‘‘missakā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^371^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^kevalo^eb^ti kusaladhammehi asammisso, tato eva sakalo sukkapakkho anavajjaṭṭho. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^372^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pākatikasakuṇakulesu balavabhāvato tesaṃ hananato ^b^sakuṇagghi^eb^. Senoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘senassetaṃ adhivacana’’^eb^nti, senaviseso pana so veditabbo. Āmisatthāya pattattā ^b^‘‘lobhasāhasena pattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, lobhanimittena sāhasākārena pattāti attho. Naṅgalena kaṭṭhaṃ kasitaṃ naṅgalakaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ karīyati etthāti ^b^naṅgalakaṭṭhakaraṇa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0470^ea^ āha – ^b^‘‘adhunā kaṭṭhaṃ khettaṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti. Leḍḍuyo tiṭṭhanti etthāti ^b^leḍḍuṭṭhānaṃ,^eb^ leḍḍunimittaṃ kasitaṭṭhānaṃ. Vajjatīti vadaṃ, vacanaṃ. Kucchitaṃ vadaṃ avadaṃ. Garahane hi ayaṃ a-kāro yathā – ‘‘aputto abhariyā’’ti. Avadaṃ mānetīti ^b^avadamānā,^eb^ attano balamadena lāpaṃ atimaññitvā vadantīti attho. Tenevāha ‘‘gaccha kho, tvaṃ lāpa, tatrapi me gantvā na mokkhasī’’ti. Yaṃ pana aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ ‘‘attano balassa suṭṭhu vaṇṇaṃ vadamānā’’ti, tattha attato āpannaṃ gahetvā vuttaṃ. ‘‘Vadamāno’’ti vā pāṭho, sārambhavasena avhāyantoti attho. Tenāha ‘‘ehi kho dāni sakuṇagghī’’ti. ^b^Suṭṭhu ṭhapetvā^eb^ti jiyāmuttasarassa viya sīghapātayogyatākaraṇena ubho pakkhe sammā ṭhapetvā. ^b^Aya^eb^nti sakuṇagghi. ^b^Ñatvā^eb^ti yathābhūtadassanena attano ñāṇena jānitvā. ^b^Phālīyitthā^eb^ti phālacchedatikhiṇasikhare sukkhaleḍḍusmiṃ bhijjittha.

[03]^b^373^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sañcāro^eb^ti sañcaraṇaṃ. ^b^Lepa^eb^nti silesasadisaṃ ālepanaṃ. ^b^Kājasikkā viyā^eb^ti kājadaṇḍake olaggetabbā sikkā viya. Apica catasso rajjuyo upari bandhanaṭṭhānañcāti ^b^pañcaṭṭhānaṃ. Oḍḍito^eb^ti olambito. ^b^Thunanto^eb^ti nitthunanto.

[03]^b^374^eb^^b^.^eb^ Āhārasampādanena ^a^V2.0174^ea^ taṃtaṃāhāravatthugate sūdeti paggharetīti ^b^sūdo,^eb^ bhattakārako. Daharehi manāpataraṃ accetabbato atikkamitabbato accayā, bhojane rasavisesā, tasmā ^b^nānaccayehī^eb^ti nānappakārarasavisesehīti attho. Tena vuttaṃ ‘‘nānaccayehī’’tiādi. Aggīyati asaṅkarato vibhajīyatīti aggo, ambilameva aggo ^b^ambilaggo^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘ambilaggehīti ambilakoṭṭhāsehī’’^eb^ti. Dātuṃ abhiharitabbatāya ^b^abhihārā,^eb^ deyyadhammā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘abhihaṭānaṃ dāyāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Idaṃ me kammaṭṭhānaṃ anulomaṃvā^eb^ti idaṃ mama kammaṭṭhānaṃ evaṃ pavattamānaṃ anulomāvasānameva hutvā tiṭṭhati. Evaṃ puna pavattamānaṃ ^a^M2.0471^ea^ ussakkitvā visesanibbattanatthameva hotīti evaṃ ^b^nimittaṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti^eb^ bālo abyatto, paṇḍito pana sakkoti. ^b^Attano cittassā^eb^ti attano bhāvanācittassa. ^b^Pubbabhāgavipassanā satipaṭṭhānāva kathitā^eb^ ‘‘sakassa cittassa nimittaṃ uggaṇhātī’’ti vuttattā.

[03]^b^375^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pādagāmo^eb^ti nagarassa padasadiso mahantagāmo. Tenevāha ^b^‘‘vesāliyaṃ viharati veḷuvagāmake’’^eb^ti. Ahitanisedhana-hitaniyojana-byasanapariccajana-lakkhaṇo mittabhāvo yesu atthi, te ^b^mittā^eb^. Ye pana diṭṭhamattasahāyā, te ^b^sandiṭṭhā^eb^. Ye savisesaṃ bhattimanto, te ^b^sambhattā^eb^ti dassento ^b^‘‘mittāti mittāvā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Assā^eb^ti bhagavato. Pañcamiyaṃ aṭṭhamiyaṃ cātuddasiyaṃ pañcadasiyanti ekekasmiṃ pakkhe cattāro vāre katvā māsassa ^b^aṭṭhavāre^eb^.

[03]Vedanānaṃ balavabhāvena ^b^kharo pharuso^eb^ kakkhaḷo. ^b^Ābādho^eb^ti pubbakammahetutāya kammasamuṭṭhāno ābādho saṅkhāradukkhatāsaṅkhāto sabbakālikattā sarīrassa sabhāgarogo nāma. Nāyamīdiso ābādho, ayaṃ pana bahalatarabyādhitāya ^b^‘‘visabhāgarogo’’^eb^ti vutto. Anta-saddo samīpapavattoti āha – ^b^‘‘maraṇantaṃ maraṇasantika’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vedanā…pe… akaronto^eb^ ukkaṃsagatabhāvitakāyāditāya. ^b^Apīḷiyamāno^eb^ti apīḷiyamāno viya. Ovādameva bhikkhusaṅghassa apalokananti āha – ^b^‘‘ovādānusāsaniṃ adatvāti vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pubbabhāgavīriyaṃ^eb^ nāma phalasamāpattiyā parikammabhūtavipassanāvīriyaṃ. ^b^Jīvitampi jīvitasaṅkhāro^eb^ patituṃ adatvā attabhāvassa abhisaṅkharaṇato.

[03]‘‘Ettakaṃ ^a^V2.0175^ea^ kālaṃ atikkamitvā vuṭṭhahissāmī’’ti khaṇaparicchedavatī samāpatti ^b^khaṇikasamāpatti. Niggumbaṃ nijjaṭaṃ katvā^eb^ti rūpasattakārūpasattakavasena pavattiyamānaṃ vipassanābhāvanaṃ sabbaso khilavirahena niggumbaṃ, abyākulatāya nijjaṭaṃ katvā. ^b^Mahāvipassanāvasenā^eb^ti paccekaṃ savisesaṃ vitthāritānaṃ aṭṭhārasādīnaṃ mahāvipassanānaṃ vasena vipassitvā ^b^samāpannā^eb^ yā ^b^samāpatti, sā suṭṭhu vikkhambheti^eb^ vedanaṃ mahābalavatāya pubbārammaṇassa, mahānubhāvatāya tathāpavattitavipassanāvīriyassa. ^b^Yathā^eb^^a^M2.0472^ea^^b^nāmā^eb^tiādinā tassa nidassanaṃ dasseti. ^b^Vedanā^eb^ti dukkhavedanā. ^b^Cuddasahākārehī^eb^ti tasseva sattakadvayassa vasena vadati. ^b^Sannetvā^eb^ti antarantarā samāpannajjhānasamāpattisambhūtena vipassanāpītisinehena temetvā. ^b^Samāpattī^eb^ti phalasamāpatti.

[03]^b^Gilānā vuṭṭhito^eb^ti gilānabhāvato vuṭṭhito. Sarīrassa garuthaddhabhāvappatti madhurakatāti āha – ^b^‘‘sañjātagarubhāvo sañjātathaddhabhāvo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nānākārato^eb^ti puratthimādibhedato. ^b^Satipaṭṭhānadhammā^eb^ti pubbe attanā bhāviyamānā satipaṭṭhānadhammā. ^b^Pākaṭā na honti^eb^ kāyacittānaṃ akammaññatāya. ^b^Tanti dhammā^eb^ti pariyattidhammā na ñāyanti.

[03]^b^Anantaraṃ abāhira^eb^nti dhammavasena puggalavasena ca antarabāhiraṃ akatvā. ^b^Ettaka^eb^ntiādinā vuttamevatthaṃ vivarati. ^b^Daharakāle^eb^ti attano daharakāle. ^b^Na evaṃ hotī^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ bhikkhusaṅghaṃ pariharissāmī’’tiādiko mānataṇhāmūlako issāmacchariyānaṃ pavattiākāro tathāgatassa na hoti, nattheva pageva tesaṃ samucchinnattāti āha – ^b^‘‘bodhipallaṅkeyevā’’^eb^tiādi. Paṭisaṅkharaṇena veṭhena missakena. ^b^Maññe^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ paṭisaṅkharaṇasaññitena veṭhamissakena viya jarasakaṭaṃ. ^b^Arahattaphalaveṭhenā^eb^ti arahattaphalasamāpattisaññitena atthabhāvaveṭhena.

[03]Phalasamāpattiyā adhippetattā ^b^‘‘ekaccānaṃ vedanānanti lokiyānaṃ vedanāna’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Attadīpā^eb^ti ettha ^b^atta^eb^-saddena dhammo eva vutto, svāyamattho heṭṭhā vibhāvito eva. ^b^Navavidho lokuttaradhammo veditabbo^eb^. So hi catūhi oghehi anajjhottharaṇīyato ‘‘dīpo’’ti vutto. ^b^Tamāgge^eb^ti tamayogābhāvena sadevakassa lokassa agge. ^b^Sabbesa^eb^nti sabbesaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ. ^b^Te^eb^ ‘‘dhammadīpā viharathā’’ti vuttā ^b^catusatipaṭṭhānagocarāva bhikkhū agge bhavissanti.^eb^

[03]^b^376^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kammaṭṭhānakammikā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0176^ea^ kammaṭṭhānamanuyuttā. Visesetīti ^b^viseso,^eb^ atisayo, svāyaṃ pubbāparaviseso upādāyupādāya gahetabboti taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Uppajjati^eb^^a^M2.0473^ea^^b^kilesapariḷāho^eb^ti kāye asubhādivasena manasikāraṃ adahantassa manasikārassa vīthiyaṃ apaṭipannatā subhādivasena kāyārammaṇo kilesapariḷāho ca uppajjati. Vīriyārambhassa abhāvena tasmiṃ ārammaṇe ^b^cetaso vā līnattaṃ^eb^ hoti, gocarajjhattato ^b^bahiddhā puthuttārammaṇe cittaṃ vikkhipati. Evaṃ kilesapariḷāhe cā^eb^tiādinā tividhampi bhāvanānuyogassa kilesavatthubhāvaṃ upādāya samuccayavasena aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ. Yasmā pana te pariḷāhalīnattavikkhepā ekajjhaṃ na pavattanti, tasmā pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘kāyārammaṇo vā’’tiādinā aniyamattho vā-saddo gahito. ^b^Kilesānurañjitenā^eb^ti kilesavivaṇṇitacittena hutvā na vattitabbaṃ. Kathaṃ pana vattitabbanti āha ^b^‘‘kismiñcidevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na ca vitakketi na ca vicāretī^eb^ti kilesasahagate vitakkavicāre na pavatteti. ^b^Sukhito^eb^ti jhānasukhena sukhito.

[03]Imassa bhikkhuno bhāvanā pavattāti sambandho. Yasmā hi imassa bhikkhuno taṃ mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ paripanthe sati ṭhapetvā buddhaguṇādianussaraṇena cittaṃ pasādetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānabhāvanā pavattā, tasmā paṇidhāya bhāvanāti vuttanti sambandho. ^b^Aṭṭhapetvā^eb^ti cittaṃ appavattetvāti attho veditabbo. Kammaṭṭhānādīnaṃ tiṇṇampi vasena atthayojanā sambhavati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sārento viyā^eb^ti rathaṃ vāhayanto viya. Samappamāṇato aṭṭhakādivasena ^b^sutacchitaṃ pakkhipanto viya^eb^. Sukheneva kilesānaṃ okāsaṃ adento antarā asajjanto ^b^alagganto^eb^. Vipassanācārassa āraddhavuttitaṃ aparipanthatañca dassento opammadvayamāha. ^b^Byābhaṅgiyā^eb^ti kājadaṇḍena. ^b^Kilesapariḷāhādīna^eb^nti kilesapariḷāhalīnattavikkhepānaṃ.
[03]^b^Guḷakhaṇḍādīnī^eb^ti guḷakhaṇḍasakkharakhaṇḍādīni ucchuvikārabhūtāni. ‘‘Kāye kāyānupassī viharāmī’’tiādivacanato ^b^‘‘pubbabhāgavipassanā kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Ambapālivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^378^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyavagge ^a^M2.0474^ea^^a^V2.0177^ea^ paṭhamasuttaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayattā suviññeyyanti taṃ laṅghitvā ^b^‘‘dutiye’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Bhiyyataro abhiññāto^eb^ti sambodhiyā seṭṭhataroti abhilakkhito. ^b^Bhiyyatarābhiñño^eb^ti sabbasattesu adhikatarapañño. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uttaritarañāṇo’’^eb^ti. Sammā anavasesato bujjhati etenāti ^b^sambodhī^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘sambodhiyanti sabbaññutaññāṇe’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nippadesā gahitā^eb^ti anavasesā buddhaguṇā gahitā aggamaggasiddhiyāva bhagavato sabbaguṇānaṃ siddhattā. Na kevalañca buddhānaṃ, atha kho aggasāvakapaccekabuddhānampi taṃtaṃguṇasamijjhanaṃ aggamaggādhigamenevāti dassento ^b^‘‘dvepi aggasāvakā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Aparo nayo – ^b^pasanno^eb^ti iminā pasādassa vattamānatā dīpitāti ^b^uppannasaddho^eb^ti imināpi saddhāya paccuppannatā pakāsitāti āha – ^b^‘‘evaṃ saddahāmīti attho’’^eb^ti. Abhijānāti abhimukhabhāvena sabbaññeyyaṃ jānātīti abhiñño, bhiyyo adhiko abhiññoti ^b^bhiyyobhiñño^eb^. So eva atisayavacanicchāvasena bhiyyobhiññataroti vuttoti āha – ^b^‘‘bhiyyataro abhiññāto’’^eb^ti. Dutiyavikappe pana abhijānātīti abhiññā, abhivisiṭṭhā paññā. Bhiyyo abhiññā etassāti bhiyyobhiñño, so eva atisayavacanicchāvasena ^b^bhiyyobhiññataro^eb^. Svāyaṃ assa atisayo abhiññāya bhiyyobhāvakatoti āha – ^b^‘‘bhiyyatarābhiñño vā’’^eb^ti. Sambujjhati etāyāti ^b^sambodhi,^eb^ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ aggamaggañāṇañca. Sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānañhi aggamaggañāṇaṃ, aggamaggañāṇapadaṭṭhānañca sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ ^b^sambodhi nāma^eb^. Tattha padhānavasena tadatthadassane paṭhamavikappo, padaṭṭhānavasena dutiyavikappo. Kasmā panettha arahattamaggañāṇasseva gahaṇaṃ, nanu heṭṭhimānipi bhagavato maggañāṇāni savāsanameva yathāsakaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanavasena pavattāni. Savāsanappahānañhi ñeyyāvaraṇappahānanti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana aparipuṇṇaṃ paṭipakkhavidhamanassa vippakatabhāvatoti āha ^b^‘‘arahattamaggañāṇe vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sabba^eb^nti sammāsambuddhena adhigantabbaṃ sabbaṃ.

[03]Khādanīyānaṃ ^a^M2.0475^ea^^a^V2.0178^ea^ uḷāratā sātarasānubhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘madhure āgacchatī’’^eb^ti. Pasaṃsāya uḷāratā visiṭṭhabhāvenāti āha – ^b^‘‘seṭṭhe’’^eb^ti. Obhāsassa uḷāratā mahantabhāvenāti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘vipule’’^eb^ti. Usabhassa ayanti āsabhī, idha pana āsabhī viyāti ^b^āsabhī^eb^. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘usabhassa vācāsadisī’’^eb^ti. Yena guṇena sā taṃsadisā, taṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘acalā asampavedhī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Yato kutoci anussavanaṃ ^b^anussavo^eb^. Vijjāṭṭhānādīsu kataparicayānaṃ ācariyānaṃ taṃ taṃ atthaṃ ñāpentī paveṇī ^b^ācariyaparamparā^eb^. Kevalaṃ attano matiyā ‘‘iti kira evaṃ kirā’’ti parikappanā ^b^itikirā^eb^. Piṭakassa ganthassa sampadānato bhūtato tassa gahaṇaṃ ^b^piṭakasampadānaṃ^eb^. Yathāsutānaṃ attānaṃ ākārassa parivitakkanaṃ ^b^ākāraparivitakko^eb^. Tathevassa ‘‘evameta’’nti diṭṭhiyā nijjhānakkhamanaṃ ^b^diṭṭhinijjhānakkhanti^eb^. Āgamādhigamehi vinā kevalaṃ anussutato takkamaggaṃ nissāya takkanaṃ ^b^takko^eb^. Anumānavidhiṃ nissāya gahaṇaṃ ^b^nayaggāho^eb^. Yasmā buddhavisaye ṭhatvā bhagavato ayaṃ therassa codanā therassa ca so avisayo, tasmā ^b^‘‘paccakkhato ñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā viyā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sīhanādo viyāti ^b^sīhanādo^eb^. Taṃsadisatā cassa seṭṭhabhāvena, so cettha evaṃ veditabboti dassento ^b^‘‘sīhanādo’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Unnādayantenā^eb^ti asanisadisaṃ karontena.

[03]^b^Anuyogadāpanattha^eb^nti anuyogaṃ sodhāpetuṃ. Vimaddakkhamañhi sīhanādaṃ nadanto atthato anuyogaṃ ^b^sodheti^eb^ nāma, anuyujjhanto ca naṃ ^b^sodhāpeti^eb^ nāma. ^b^Dātu^eb^nti sodhetuṃ. Keci ‘‘dānattha’’nti atthaṃ vadanti, taṃ na yuttaṃ. Na hi yo sīhadānaṃ nadati, so eva tattha anuyogaṃ detīti yujjati. ^b^Nighaṃsana^eb^nti vimaddanaṃ. ^b^Dhamamāna^eb^nti tāpayamānaṃ. Tāpanañcettha gaggariyā dhammāpanasīsena vadati.

[03]^b^Sabbe te^eb^ti sabbe te atīte niruddhe sammāsambuddhe. Tenetaṃ dasseti – ye te ahesuṃ atītamaddhānaṃ tava abhinīhārato oraṃ sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ tāva sāvakañāṇagocare dhamme paricchindanto mārādayo viya ca buddhānaṃ lokiyacittācāraṃ tvaṃ jāneyyāsi. Ye pana te abbhatītā, tato parato chinnavaṭumā chinnapapañcā pariyādinnavaṭṭā sabbadukkhavītivattā sammāsambuddhā, tesaṃ sabbesampi tava sāvakañāṇassa ^a^M2.0476^ea^ avisayabhūte dhamme kathaṃ jānissasīti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti sambodhisaṅkhātena sabbaññutaññāṇapadaṭṭhānena arahattamaggañāṇena. ^b^Evaṃsīlā^eb^ti tādisasīlā. ^b^Samādhipakkhā^eb^ti samādhi ca samādhipakkhā ca samādhipakkhā ekadesasarūpekasesanayena. Tattha ^b^samādhipakkhā^eb^ti vīriyasatiyo tadanuguṇā ca dhammā veditabbā ^a^V2.0179^ea^. Jhānasamāpattīsu yebhuyyena vihāravohāro, jhānasamāpattiyo samādhippadhānāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahito’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yathā pana heṭṭhā gahitāpi samādhipaññā paṭipakkhato vimuttattā vimuccana-saṅkhāta-kiccavisesa-dassanavasena vimuttipariyāyena puna gahitā ‘‘evaṃvimuttā’’ti, evaṃ dibbavihāro dibbavihāravisesadassanavasena puna gahito ‘‘evaṃvihārī’’ti, tasmā sabbesaṃ samāpattivihārānaṃ vasenettha attho yujjatīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Vimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti^eb^ vimuccitthāti katvā. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Paṭippassaddhante^eb^ti paṭippassambhanosāpanena. Sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā asaṃsaṭṭhattā vimuttattā ca ^b^nissaraṇavimutti^eb^ nibbānaṃ.

[03]^b^Anāgatabuddhānaṃ panā^eb^ti ^b^pana^eb^-saddo visesatthajotano. Tena atītesu tāva khandhānaṃ bhūtapubbattā tattha siyā ñāṇassa savisaye gati, anāgatesu pana sabbaso asañjātesu kathanti imamatthaṃ joteti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anāgatāpī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^‘‘Attano cetasā paricchinditvā viditā’’^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu atītānāgate sattāhe eva pavattaṃ cittaṃ cetopariyañāṇassa visayo, na tato paranti? Nayidaṃ cetopariyañāṇakiccavasena vuttaṃ, atha kho pubbenivāsānāgataṃsañāṇānaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, tasmā nāyaṃ doso. ^b^Viditaṭṭhāne na karoti^eb^ sikkhāpadeneva tādisassa paṭikkhepassa paṭikkhittattā setughātato ca. Kathaṃ pana thero dvayasambhave paṭikkhepameva akāsi, na vibhajja byākāsīti āha ^b^‘‘thero kirā’’^eb^tiādi. Pāraṃ pariyantaṃ minotīti pāramī, sā eva ñāṇanti pāramiñāṇaṃ, sāvakānaṃ pāramiñāṇaṃ ^b^sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ^eb^. Tasmiṃ sāvakānaṃ ukkaṃsapariyantagate jānane nāyamanuyogo, atha kho sabbaññutaññāṇe sabbaññutāya jānane. Keci pana ‘‘sāvakapāramiñāṇeti sāvakapāramiñāṇavisaye’’ti atthaṃ vadanti, tathā sesapadesupi. ^b^Sīla…pe… samattha^eb^nti sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttiñāṇasaṅkhātānaṃ kāraṇānaṃ ^a^M2.0477^ea^ jānanasamatthaṃ. Buddhasīlādayo hi buddhānaṃ buddhakiccassa parehi ete buddhāti jānanassa ca kāraṇaṃ.

[03]Anumānañāṇaṃ viya saṃsayaṭṭhitaṃ ahutvā idamidanti yathāsabhāvato ñeyyaṃ dhāreti nicchinotīti ^b^dhammo,^eb^ paccakkhañāṇanti āha ^b^‘‘dhammassa paccakkhato ñāṇassā’’^eb^ti. Anuetīti ^b^anvayo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘anuyogaṃ anugantvā’’^eb^ti. Paccakkhasiddhañhi atthaṃ anugantvā anumānañāṇassa pavatti ‘‘diṭṭhena adiṭṭhassa anumāna’’nti veditabbā. Vidite vedakampi ñāṇaṃ atthato viditameva hotīti ^b^‘‘anumānañāṇaṃ nayaggāho vidito’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Vidito^eb^ti viddho ^a^V2.0180^ea^ paṭiladdho, adhigatoti attho. ^b^Appamāṇo^eb^ti aparimāṇo mahāvisayattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘apariyanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti apariyantattā. ^b^Tena^eb^ vā apariyantena ñāṇena. Etena thero yaṃ yaṃ anumeyyamatthaṃ ñātukāmo hoti, tattha tattha tassa asaṅgamappaṭihataṃ anumānañāṇaṃ pavattetīti dasseti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so iminā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^iminā^eb^ti iminā kāraṇena.

[03]Pākārassa thirabhāvaṃ uddhamuddhaṃ āpetīti ^b^uddhāpaṃ,^eb^ pākāramūlaṃ. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena pākāradvārabandhaparikhādīnaṃ saṅgaho veditabbo. Paccante bhavaṃ ^b^paccantimaṃ^eb^. Paṇḍitadovārikaṭṭhāniyaṃ katvā thero attānaṃ dassetīti dassento ^b^‘‘ekadvāranti kasmā āhā’’^eb^ti codanaṃ samuṭṭhāpesi.

[03]Yassā paññāya vasena puriso paṇḍitoti vuccati, taṃ paṇḍiccanti āha – ^b^‘‘paṇḍiccena samannāgato’’^eb^ti. Taṃtaṃitikattabbatāsu chekabhāvo byattabhāvo ^b^veyyattiyaṃ^eb^. Medhati aññāṇaṃ hiṃsati vidhamatīti medhā, sā etassa atthīti ^b^medhāvī^eb^. Ṭhāne ṭhāne uppatti etissā atthīti ^b^ṭhānuppattikā,^eb^ ṭhānaso uppajjanapaññā. Anupariyāyanti etenāti anupariyāyo, so eva pathoti ^b^anupariyāyapatho,^eb^ parito pākārassa anuyāyanamaggo. Pākārabhāgā sambandhitabbā etthāti ^b^pākārasandhi,^eb^ pākārassa phullitapadeso. So pana heṭṭhimantena dvinnampi iṭṭhakānaṃ vigamena evaṃ vuccatīti āha – ^b^‘‘dvinnaṃ iṭṭhakānaṃ apagataṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti. ^b^Chinnaṭṭhāna^eb^nti chinnabhinnapadesaṃ, chinnaṭṭhānaṃ vā. Tañhi ‘‘vivara’’nti vuccati. ^b^Kīliṭṭha^eb^nti malīnaṃ. ^b^Upatāpentī^eb^ti kilesapariḷāhena santāpenti. ^b^Vibādhentī^eb^ti pīḷenti. Uppannāya paññāya nīvaraṇehi na kiñci kātuṃ sakkāti āha ^b^‘‘anuppannāya paññāya uppajjituṃ na dentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti paccayūpaghātena ^a^M2.0478^ea^ uppajjituṃ appadānato. ^b^Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suṭṭhu ṭhapitacittā^eb^ti catubbidhāyapi satipaṭṭhānabhāvanāya sammadeva ṭhapitacittā appitacittā. ^b^Yathāsabhāvena bhāvetvā^eb^ti yāthāvato sammadeva yathā paṭipakkhā samucchijjanti, evaṃ bhāvetvā.

[03]Purimanaye satipaṭṭhānāni bojjhaṅgā ca missakā adhippetāti tato aññathā vattuṃ ^b^‘‘apicetthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Missakā^eb^ti samathavipassanāmaggavasena missakā. ‘‘Catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittāti paṭhamaṃ vuttattā satipaṭṭhānesu vipassanaṃ gahetvā satta bojjhaṅge yathābhūtaṃ bhāvetvāti vuttattā maggapariyāpannānaṃyeva ca nesaṃ nippariyāyabojjhaṅgabhāvato tesu ca adhigatameva hotīti bojjhaṅge maggo ca sabbaññutaññāṇañcāti gahite sundaro pañho bhaveyyā’’ti ^b^mahāsivatthero āha. Na panevaṃ gahitaṃ^eb^ porāṇehīti adhippāyo. ^b^Itī^eb^ti vuttappakāraparāmasanaṃ. ^b^Thero^eb^ti sāriputtatthero.

[03]^b^Tatthā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0181^ea^ tesu paccantanagarādīsu. ^b^Nagaraṃ viya nibbānaṃ^eb^ tadatthikehi upagantabbato upagatānañca parissayarahitasukhādhigamaṭṭhānato. ^b^Pākāro viya sīlaṃ^eb^ tadupagatānaṃ parito ārakkhabhāvato. ^b^Anupariyāyapatho viya hirī^eb^ sīlapākārassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘pariyāyapathoti kho bhikkhu hiriyā etaṃ adhivacana’’nti. ^b^Dvāraṃ viya ariyamaggo^eb^ nibbānanagarappavesane añjasabhāvato. ^b^Paṇḍitadovāriko viya dhammasenāpati^eb^ nibbānanagaraṃ paviṭṭhapavisanakānaṃ sattānaṃ sallakkhaṇato. ^b^Dinno^eb^ti dāpito, sodhitoti attho. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^379^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pubbe sāvatthito veḷuvagāmassa gatattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘āgatamaggeneva paṭinivattanto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Sattanna^eb^nti upaseno, revato, khadiravaniyo, cundo, samaṇuddeso ahanti catunnaṃ, cālā, upacālā, sīsūpacālāti, tissannanti imesaṃ sattannaṃ arahantānaṃ. ^b^Natthi nu kho^eb^ti etthāpi ‘‘olokento’’ti ānetvā sambandho sīhāvalokanañāyena. Bhavissanti me vattāro harituṃ nāsakkhīti sambandho. ^b^Idaṃ dāni pacchimadassana^eb^nti bhūtakathanamattaṃ, na tattha sālayatādassanaṃ yathā tathāgatassa vesāliyā nikkhamitvā nāgāpalokitaṃ.

[03]Tassa ^a^M2.0479^ea^ tassa visesassa adhiṭṭhānavaseneva iddhibhedadassanaṃ ^b^iddhivikubbanaṃ^eb^.
