Sīhassa vijambhanādivasena kīḷitvā nādasadisī ayaṃ dhammakathāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sīhavikīḷito dhammapariyāyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gamanakālo mayhantī^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo parisamāpane. Tena therena yathārambhassa vacanapabandhassa samāpitabhāvaṃ joteti. Esa nayo sesesupi edisesu sabbaṭṭhānesu. Yugandharādayo ^b^paribhaṇḍapabbatā^eb^ti veditabbā. ^b^Ekappahārenevā^eb^ti ekappahārena iva. Svāyaṃ ^b^iva^eb^-saddo na sakkomīti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbo.

[03]^b^Paṭipādessāmī^eb^ti ṭhitakāyaṃ paṭipādessāmi. Patthanākāle anomadassissa bhagavato vacanasutānusārena ñāṇena diṭṭhamattataṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘taṃ paṭhamadassana’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhāretuṃ asakkontī^eb^ guṇasāraṃ. ^b^Esa maggo^eb^ti eso jātānaṃ sattānaṃ maraṇaniṭṭhito pantho. Punapi ^b^evaṃbhāvino nāma saṅkhārā^eb^ti saṅkhārā nāma evaṃbhāvino, maraṇapariyosānāti attho. ^b^Ettaka^eb^nti ettakaṃ kālaṃ. ^b^Saṅkaḍḍhitvā^eb^ saṃharitvā. ^b^Mukhaṃ pidhāyā^eb^ti mukhaṃ chādetvā. ^b^Agghikasatānī^eb^ti makuḷaṅkuracetiyasatāni.

[03]^b^Purimadivase^eb^ti ^a^V2.0182^ea^ atītadivase. Yasmā dhammasenāpatino arahattappattadivaseyeva satthu sāvakasannipāto ahosi, tasmā ^b^‘‘pūritasāvakasannipāto esa bhikkhū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Pañca jātisatānī^eb^ti bhummatthe, accantasaṃyoge vā upayogavacanaṃ.
[03]^b^Kaḷopihattho^eb^ti vilīvamayabhājanahattho. ‘‘Cammamayabhājanahattho’’ti ca vadanti. ^b^Purantare^eb^ti nagaramajjhe. ^b^Vane^eb^ti araññe.

[03]^b^Osakkanākāravirahito^eb^ti dhammadesanāya saṅkocahetuvirahito. ^b^Visārado^eb^ti sāradavirahito. ^b^Dhammoja^eb^nti dhammarasaṃ, ojavantaṃ desanādhammanti attho. ^b^Dhammabhoga^eb^nti dhammaparibhogaṃ, parehi saddhiṃ saṃvibhajanavasena pavattaṃ dhammasambhoganti desanādhammameva vadati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ubhayenapi dhammaparibhogova kathito’’^eb^ti.

[03]Piyāyitabbato ^b^piyehi^eb^. Manassa vaḍḍhanato ^b^manāpehi. Jātiyā^eb^ti khattiyādijātiyā. ^b^Nānābhāvo^eb^ asahabhāvo visuṃbhāvo. ^b^Aññathābhāvo^eb^ aññathattaṃ. ^b^Sarīra^eb^nti rūpadhammakāyasaṅkhātaṃ sarīraṃ. Rūpakāye ^a^M2.0480^ea^ hi bhijjante bhijjanteva. ^b^So bhijjeyyā^eb^ti so mahantataro khandho bhijjeyya.

[03]^b^Dakkhiṇadisaṃ gato^eb^ti dakkhiṇadisāmukhe pavatto. ^b^Mahākhandho viyā^eb^ti mahanto sāravanto sākhākhandho viya. Sākhakhandhā hi disābhimukhapavattākārā, mūlakhandho pana uddhamuggato. ^b^Soḷasannaṃ pañhāna^eb^nti soḷasannaṃ aparāpariyapavattaniyānaṃ atthānaṃ. Ñātuṃ icchito hi attho pañho.
[03]^b^380-381^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Amāvasuposathe^eb^ti amāvasiuposathe, kālapakkhauposatheti attho. ^b^Purimanayenevā^eb^ti anantarasutte vuttanayeneva.
[03]^b^382^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Maccudheyyassā^eb^ti maccuno pavattiṭṭhānassa.

[03]^b^384^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tasmiṃ^eb^^a^V2.0183^ea^^b^kāle^eb^ti paṭhamābhisambodhiyaṃ. ^b^Bhikkhuyeva natthi^eb^ dhammacakkassa appavattitattā, ^b^bhikkhuyeva^eb^ bhikkhulakkhaṇayogato. Ekako maggo, na dvedhāpathabhūtoti ekamaggo, taṃ ^b^ekamaggaṃ^eb^. Jātiyā khayo vaṭṭadukkhassa antabhūtoti jātikkhayanto, nibbānaṃ, taṃ diṭṭhattā ^b^jātikkhayantadassī^eb^ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^385^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ayaṃ tassa laddhī^eb^ti ayaṃ idāni vuccamānā tassa ācariyassa laddhi. ^b^Tato anāmento^eb^ti yena vaṃso namati, tena kāyaṃ anāmento. Tathā namanto hi patitvā cuṇṇavicuṇṇaṃ hoti. ^b^Ta^eb^nti kāyaṃ, ^b^taṃ^eb^ vaṃsaṃ vā. ^b^Ākaḍḍhento viyā^eb^ti namitaṭṭhānato parabhāgena ākaḍḍhento viya. ^b^Ekatobhāgiyaṃ katvā^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ ^a^M2.0481^ea^ katvā onataṃ viya katvā. Tathā karaṇaṃ pana tathā vātūpatthambhagāhāpanenāti āha – ^b^‘‘vātūpatthambhaṃ gāhāpetvā’’^eb^ti. Tañca satiyā tadatthaṃ upaṭṭhānenāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Niccalova nisīdanto^eb^ antevāsī ^b^ācariyaṃ rakkhati,^eb^ ettakaṃ ācariyassa laddhivasena vuttaṃ. ^b^‘‘Ācariyo vaṃsaṃ suggahitaṃ gaṇhanto’’^eb^tiādi sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.

[03]^b^‘‘Attānameva rakkhatī’’^eb^ti idaṃ attano rakkhaṇaṃ padhānaṃ katvā vuttaṃ, ^b^na antevāsika^eb^nti avadhāraṇaphalaṃ. Attarakkhāya panettha sijjhamānāya antevāsikarakkhāpi siddhā eva hotīti. Dutiyapakkhepi eseva nayo. ^b^So tattha ñāyo^eb^ti yā attano eva rakkhā, sā atthato pararakkhāpi hotīti ayamettha ñāyo yuttappayogo. ^b^Anuvaḍḍhiyā^eb^ti yathāvaḍḍhitassa anuanuvaḍḍhiyā. Etena paṭiladdhasampayuttapamodanākāro dassitoti āha – ^b^‘‘sapubbabhāgāya muditāyāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āsevanāyā^eb^tiādīni padāni anudayatāpariyosānāni (yasmā satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevantassa siddhaṃ attano ca parassa ca rakkhaṇaṃ pakāsenti, tasmā) – ‘‘attānaṃ, bhikkhave, rakkhissāmīti satipaṭṭhānaṃ sevitabba’’ntiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^386^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Janapadasmiṃ kalyāṇī^eb^ti sakalajanapade bhaddā rūpasampattiyā sikkhāsampattiyā ca sundarā ^a^V2.0184^ea^ seṭṭhā. Rūpasampatti ca nāma sabbaso rūpadosābhāvena rūpaguṇapāripūriyā hotīti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘chasarīradosarahitā pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ duvidhampi vivaranto ^b^‘‘sā hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Pañcakalyāṇasamannāgatā^eb^ti pañcavidhasarīraguṇasampadāhi samannāgatā. ^b^Nātidīghā nātirassā^eb^ti pamāṇamajjhimā dīghatarappamāṇā na hoti, na atirassā, lakuṇḍakarūpā na hoti. ^b^Nātikisā^eb^ti ativiya kisathaddhamaṃsalohitā dissamānā aṭṭhisarīrā jālasarīrā na hoti. ^b^Nātithūlā^eb^ti bhāriyamaṃsā mahodarā na hoti. ^b^Nātikāḷā nāccodātā^eb^ti ativiya kāḷavaṇṇā jhāmaṅgāro viya ^a^M2.0482^ea^, dadhitakkādīhi pamajjitamattakaṃsalohavaṇṇā na hoti. Manussaloke tādisiyā rūpasampattiyā abhāvato ^b^atikkantā manussavaṇṇaṃ^eb^. Yathā pamāṇayuttā, evaṃ ārohapariṇāhayogato ca paresaṃ pasādāvahā nātidīghatādayo. Evaṃ manussānaṃ dibbarūpatāsampattīpīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘appattā dibbavaṇṇa’’^eb^nti. Ettha ca nātidīghanātirassatāvacanena ārohasampatti vuttā ubbedhena pāsādikabhāvato. Kisathūladosābhāvavacanena pariṇāhasampatti vuttā. Ubhayenapi saṇṭhānasampadā vibhāvitā, nātikāḷatāvacanena vaṇṇasampatti vuttā vivaṇṇatābhāvato. ^b^Piyaṅgusāmā^eb^ti pariṇatapiyaṅgupupphasadisasarīranibhāsā. ^b^Mukhapariyosāna^eb^nti adharoṭṭhamāha. ^b^Ayaṃ^eb^ yathāvuttā sarīravaṇṇasampatti. ^b^Assā^eb^ti janapadakalyāṇiyā. ^b^Chavikalyāṇatā^eb^ chavisampattihetukattā tassā. Esa nayo sesesupi. Nakhā eva pattasadisatāya ^b^nakhapattāni^eb^.

[03](^b^Pasāvo^eb^ sarīrāvayavena iriyananti āha – ^b^‘‘pavattīti attho’’^eb^ti, pasāvo yathāparitameva kanatanti, na sabhāvasandhānaṃ. Yathāvibhāvasena ^b^uttamameva naccaṃ naccati^eb^. Te vā vīsatiyāsūtiraṃ dhānappattiyā pavattiyā pavattimakatamandatā vibhāvasuṭatassa uttamameva gītañca gāyatīti attho.) [Etthantare pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca. Suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.] ^b^Samatittiko telapatto^eb^ti mukhavattisamaṃ telānaṃ pūritattā samatittikamukhaṃ telabhājanaṃ. ^b^Antarena ca mahāsamajjaṃ antarena ca janapadakalyāṇi^eb^nti janapadakalyāṇiyā, tassā ca naccagītaṃ pekkhituṃ sannipatitamahājanasamūhassa majjhato ^b^pariharitabbo^eb^ netabbo. ^b^Na^eb^nti telaṃ. ^b^Āhareyyā^eb^ti āpajjeyya. Tatridaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – telapattaṃ viya kāyagatāsati, tassa pariharaṇapuggalo viya vipassako, janakāyā viya puthuttārammaṇāni, asipuriso viya mano, telassa cajanaṃ viya kilesuppādanaṃ, sīsapātanaṃ viya ariyamaggañāṇasīsānuppatti. ‘‘Kāyagatā sati no bhāvitā…pe… sikkhitabba’’nti vuttattā ^b^‘‘pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Nālandavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^387-388^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sīlānī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0185^ea^^a^M2.0483^ea^ bahuvacanaṃ anekavidhattā sīlassa. Tañhi sīlanaṭṭhena ekavidhampi cārittādivasena anekavidhaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘catupārisuddhisīlānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pañhamaggo^eb^ti ñātuṃ icchitassa atthassa vīmaṃsanaṃ. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘pañhagavesana’’^eb^nti.
[03]^b^389-391^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Puggalavasena parihānaṃ hoti^eb^ na dhammavasena. Yo na bhāveti, tasseva parihāyati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yo hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^392^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Padesato bhāvitattā^eb^ti ekadesato bhāvitattā bhāvanāpāripūriyā ananuppattattā. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘cattāro hi magge’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^393^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samattā bhāvitattā^eb^ti pariyattā bhāvitattā.

[03]^b^394-396^eb^^b^.^eb^ Mahāvisayattā mahatiyo abhiññā etassāti ^b^mahābhiñño,^eb^ tassa bhāvoti sabbaṃ vattabbaṃ. ^b^‘‘Satatavihāravasena vutta’’^eb^nti vatvā tamatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘thero kirā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti therassa. ^b^Āvajjanassa gati^eb^nti ekāvajjanasseva gamanavīthiṃ. ^b^Anubandhati^eb^ cakkavāḷānaṃ sahassaṃ ekāvajjaneneva sahassalokadhātuyā icchitamatthaṃ jānituṃ samatthoti dasseti.
[06]Sīlaṭṭhitivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^397-407^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yā^eb^^a^V2.0186^ea^^a^M2.0484^ea^^b^vedanā sammasitvā^eb^ti yā tebhūmakavedanā sammasitvā. ^b^Tāvassā^eb^ti tā tebhūmakavedanā eva assa bhikkhuno. Sadisavasena cetaṃ vuttaṃ, aniccādisammasanavasena ^b^viditā^eb^ pubbabhāge sammasanakāle ^b^upaṭṭhahanti. Pariggahitesū^eb^ti parijānanavasena paricchijja gahitesu. ^b^‘‘Vedanā^eb^ taṇhāpapañcassa, ^b^vitakko^eb^ mānapapañcassa, ^b^saññā^eb^ diṭṭhipapañcassa mūlavasena sammasanaṃ vuttā’’ti vadanti. ‘‘Vedanāvitakkasaññā taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcānaṃ mūladassanavasenā’’ti apare.
[06]Ananussutavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^408^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānā^eb^ti ārammaṇalakkhitā satipaṭṭhānā kathitā, na satilakkhaṇā.
[03]^b^410^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Suddhikaṃ katvā^eb^ visuṃ visuṃ katvā. Tathā ca vuttaṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘kāye vā bhikkhū’’ti.

[03]^b^412^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Jeṭṭhakasīla^eb^nti padhānakasīlaṃ. Sīlaggahaṇañhi pāḷiyaṃ pātimokkhasaṃvaravaseneva āgataṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthero panā’’^eb^tiādi. Tattha ^b^pātimokkhasaṃvarova sīla^eb^nti avadhāraṇaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ekadesena pātimokkhantogadhabhāvaṃ dīpeti. Tathā hi anolokiyolokane ājīvahetu ca chasikkhāpadavītikkamane gilānapaccayassa appaccavekkhitaparibhoge ^a^V2.0187^ea^ ca āpatti vihitāti. ^b^Tīṇīti^eb^ indriyasaṃvarādīni. ^b^Sīlanti vuttaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthī^eb^ti sīlapariyāyena tesaṃ katthaci sutte gahitaṭṭhānaṃ nāma natthīti nippariyāyasīlataṃ tesaṃ ^a^M2.0485^ea^ paṭikkhipati. ^b^Chadvārarakkhaṇamattamevā^eb^ti tassa sallahukatamāha cittādhiṭṭhānamattena paṭipākatikabhāvappattito. Itaradvayepi eseva nayo. ^b^Paccayuppattimattaka^eb^nti phalena hetuṃ dasseti. Uppādanahetukā hi paccayānaṃ uppatti. ^b^Idamattha^eb^nti idaṃ payojanaṃ imassa paccayassa paribhuñjaneti adhippāyo. ^b^Nippariyāyenā^eb^ti iminā indriyasaṃvarādīni tīṇi padhānasīlassa paripālanaparisodhanavasena pavattiyā pariyāyasīlāni nāmāti dasseti. Idāni pātimokkhasīlasseva padhānabhāvaṃ byatirekato anvayato ca upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yassā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^so^eb^ti pātimokkhasaṃvaro. ^b^Sesāni^eb^ indriyasaṃvarādīni. Pātimokkhasaddassa attho pana visuddhimaggasaṃvaṇṇanādīsu vitthārito, tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03]^b^Ācārena ca gocarena ca sampanno^eb^ti kāyikacetasikāvītikkamasaṅkhātena ācārena ca navesiyādigocaratādisaṅkhātena gocarena ca sampanno, sampannāacāragocaroti attho. ^b^Appamattakesū^eb^ti atiparittakesu anāpattigamanīyesu. ‘‘Dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattesū’’ti apare. ^b^Vajjesū^eb^ti akaraṇīyesu gārayhesu. Te pana ekantato akusalā hontīti āha – ^b^‘‘akusaladhammesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Bhayadassāvī^eb^ti bhayato dassanasīlo, paramāṇumattampi vajjaṃ sineruppamāṇaṃ viya katvā dassanasīlo. ^b^Sammā ādiyitvā^eb^ti sammadeva sakkaccaṃ sabbaso ca ādiyitvā. ^b^Sikkhāpadesūti niddhāraṇe bhumma^eb^nti samudāyato avayavaniddhāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘sikkhāpadesu taṃ taṃ sikkhāpada’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Sikkhāpadaṃ samādātabbaṃ sikkhitabbañcāti adhippāyo. ^b^Sikkhā^eb^ti adhisīlasikkhā. Pubbe ^b^pada^eb^-saddo adhiṭṭhānaṭṭho, idha bhāgatthoti daṭṭhabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘sikkhākoṭṭhāsesū’’^eb^ti. Mūlapaññattianupaññattiādibhedaṃ yaṃkiñci sikkhitabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ sīlaṃ, taṃ pana dvāravasena duvidhamevāti āha – ^b^‘‘kāyikaṃ vā vācasikaṃ vā’’^eb^ti. Imasmiṃ atthavikappe ^b^sikkhāpadesū^eb^ti ādhāre bhummaṃ sikkhābhāgesu kassaci visuṃ aggahaṇato. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘taṃ taṃ sabba’’^eb^nti. ‘‘Tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāyā’’ti vacanato anabhijjhā abyāpādasammādiṭṭhiyopi sīlanti vuttā, tasmā imasmiṃ sutte ^b^‘‘pātimokkhasaṃvarasīlameva kathita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^413^eb^^b^.^eb^ Etthāpi ^a^M2.0486^ea^ manosucaritaṃ sīlaṃ nāmāti dassetīti katvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘pacchimāpi tayo’’^eb^ti. Anabhijjhāabyāpādasammādiṭṭhidhammā sīlaṃ hotīti veditabbā kāyavacīsucaritehi saddhiṃ ^a^V2.0188^ea^ manosucaritampi vatvā ‘‘tato tvaṃ bhikkhu sīlaṃ nissāya sīle patiṭṭhāyā’’ti vuttattā. ^b^Sesaṃ^eb^ vuttanayameva. ^b^Chaṭṭhasattamesū^eb^ti chaṭṭhasattamavaggesu apubbaṃ natthi. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo’’^eb^ti. Vaggapeyyālato pana imasmiṃ satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte katipayavaggā saṅgahaṃ ārūḷhā, tathāpi tesaṃ atthavisesābhāvato ekaccesu potthakesu mukhamattaṃ dassetvā saṃkhittā, ekaccesu atisaṃkhittāva, te saṅkhepavasena dve katvā ^b^‘‘chaṭṭhasattamesū’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.
[06]Amatavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Satipaṭṭhānasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^471^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Catubhūmaka^eb^^a^V2.0189^ea^^a^M2.0487^ea^^b^…pe… labbhanti^eb^ kusalābyākatabhāvato tesaṃ tiṇṇaṃ indriyānaṃ. ^b^Vīriyindriyasamādhindriyāni…pe… sabbattha labbhanti^eb^ kusalattikasādhāraṇattā. ^b^Catubhūmaka …pe… vasenā^eb^ti catubhūmakadhammaparicchedavasena ceva kusalādīhi sabbasaṅgāhakadhammaparicchedavasena ca vuttanti attho.

[03]^b^477^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dukkhasaccavasenā^eb^ti dukkhasaccabhāvena na pajānanti. Tañhi pariññeyyatāya dukkhasaccasaṅgahaṃ. ^b^Samudayasaccavasenā^eb^ti taṇhāvijjādiṃ saddhindriyassa samudayasaccabhāvena na pajānanti. ^b^Nirodha^eb^nti saddhindriyassa anupādāya nirodhanimittaṃ nibbānaṃ. ^b^Paṭipada^eb^nti saddhindriyanirodhagāminiṃ paṭipadaṃ ariyamaggaṃ. ^b^Sesesū^eb^ti vīriyindriyādīsu.

[03]^b^Sukkapakkhe^eb^ti ‘‘saddhindriyaṃ pajānantī’’tiādinayappavatte anavajjapakkhe. ^b^Adhimokkhavasena āvajjanasamudayā^eb^ti ‘‘atthi dinna’’ntiādinayappavattapubbabhāgabhūtasaddhādhimokkhavasena āvajjanuppattiyā. Tasmā paṭhamuppannā saddhā eva hettha ‘‘āvajjana’’nti vuttā, na manodvārāvajjanaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. Tasmā paṭhamuppannā āvajjanā paggahuppattiṭṭhānānaṃ tikkhānaṃ vīriyindriyādīnaṃ paṭhamuppattiyā āvajjanapariyāyena vuttāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Dubbalā hi paṭhamuppannā paggahābhāvato vīriyindriyādīnaṃ samudayoti balavabhāvappattavīriyindriyādikassa āvajjanaṭṭhāniyāni hontīti tesaṃ samudayoti vuttā, pubbe adhimuccanādivasena pavattassa āvajjanassa samudayāti attho. Puna ^b^chandavasenā^eb^ti kattukāmatākusalacchandavasena saddhādīnaṃ uppādetukāmatākārappavattassa ^a^V2.0190^ea^ chandassa vasena. ^b^Manasikāravasena āvajjanasamudayā^eb^ti saddhindriyādivasena pavattassa dubbalassa tassa nibbattakayonisomanasikāravasena āvajjanassa uppattiyā. ^b^Evampī^eb^ti ‘‘adhimokkhavasenā’’tiādinā vuttākārenapi. ^b^Chasu suttesū^eb^ti ^a^M2.0488^ea^ dutiyato paṭṭhāya chasu suttesu. ^b^Catusaccameva kathitaṃ^eb^. Assādaggahaṇena hi samudayasaccaṃ, ādīnavaggahaṇena dukkhasaccaṃ, nissaraṇaggahaṇena nirodhamaggasaccāni gahitānīti. Paṭhamasutte pana indriyānaṃ sarūpadassanamevāti.

[03]^b^478^eb^^b^.^eb^ Soto āpajjīyati etenāti ^b^sotāpatti,^eb^ anāgataṃ pati paṭhamamaggo. ^b^Soto^eb^ti ariyamaggasoto daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Āpajjīyatī^eb^tiādito paṭipajjīyati. Paṭhamamaggapaṭilābhanimittāni sotāpannassa aṅgāni idha ^b^‘‘sotāpattiyaṅgānī’’^eb^ti vuttāni. Tāni pana tīsu ṭhānesu saddhā ariyakantasīlañcāti veditabbāni. ^b^Savisaye^eb^ti sakavisaye. ^b^Jeṭṭhakabhāvadassanattha^eb^nti padhānabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Yattha saddhādīndriyānaṃ sātisayakiccaṃ, tesaṃ kiccātirekataṃ dassetunti attho. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāhi vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Patvā^eb^ti attano kiccātirekaṭṭhānaṃ paṭilabhitvā. ^b^Pubbaṅgama^eb^nti saddahanakiccesu purecāraṃ dhorayhaṃ. ^b^Sesāni^eb^ vīriyindriyādīni. ^b^Tadanvayānī^eb^ti tadanugatāni tassa saddhindriyādikassa pakkhikāni. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Jhānavimokkhe^eb^ti jhānasaṅkhāte vimokkhe samādhipadhānatāya jhānānaṃ. Evañca katvā ‘‘sotāpattiyaṅgāni patvā’’ti idañca vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. Saddhūpanisañhi sīlanti. ^b^Ariyasaccāni patvā^eb^ti cattāri saccāni abhisametabbāni pāpuṇitvā.

[03]^b^479-480^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nepakkaṃ vuccati paññāti āha – ^b^‘‘paññāyetaṃ nāma’’^eb^nti. Nipāyati saṃkilesadhamme visoseti nikkhāmetīti nipako, thiratikkhasatipuggalo, tassa bhāvo ^b^nepakka^eb^nti satiyāpi nepakkabhāvo yujjateva. Evañhi ‘‘satinepakkenā’’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti, satiyā ca nepakkenāti evaṃ vuccamānena satiniddeso nāma kato hotiyeva. ^b^Asukaṃ nāma^eb^ suttaṃ vā kammaṭṭhānaṃ vā ^b^me bhāsita^eb^nti. Vossajjīyati saṅkhāragataṃ etasmiṃ adhigateti ^b^vossaggo,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. Taṃ ārammaṇaṃ ^a^M2.0489^ea^ karitvāti āha – ^b^‘‘nibbānārammaṇaṃ katvā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gacchantiyā^eb^ti saṅkhārānaṃ udayañca vayañca udayabbayaṃ gacchantiyā bujjhantiyā. Tenāha ^a^V2.0191^ea^^b^‘‘udayabbayapariggāhikāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saddhāsatipaññindriyāni pubbabhāgāni^eb^ ‘‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ, cirakatampi cirabhāsitampi saritā anussaritā, udayatthagāminiyā paññāyā’’ti ca vuttattā. ‘‘Āraddhavīriyo viharati, so anuppannāna’’ntiādinā ca vuttattā ^b^vīriyindriyaṃ missakaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Vossaggārammaṇaṃ karitvā’’ti vuttattā ^b^samādhindriyaṃ nibbattitalokuttarameva. Ayamevā^eb^ti yvāyaṃ navame vutto. Ayameva pubbabhāgamissakalokuttarattadhammaparicchedo.
[06]Suddhikavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^481^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sammappadhāne ārabbhā^eb^ti sammappadhāne bhāvanāvasena ārabbha. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhāvento’’^eb^ti. Yathā vīriyindriyaniddese ‘‘cattāro sammappadhāne ārabbha vīriyaṃ paṭilabhatī’’ti desanā āgatā, evaṃ satindriyaniddese ‘‘cattāro satipaṭṭhāne ārabbha satiṃ paṭilabhatī’’ti, tasmā ^b^‘‘satindriyepi eseva nayo’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Saddhindriyādiniddesesu pana na tathā deseti.

[03]^b^482^eb^^b^.^eb^ Indriyānaṃ tikkhādibhāvo vipassanāvasena vā maggavasena vā phalavasena vā gahetabboti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tatoti…pe… veditabba’’^eb^nti. Nanu cettha mudubhāvo eva pāḷiyaṃ gahitoti? Saccametaṃ, taṃ pana tikkhabhāve asati na hoti tikkhādibhāvoti vuttaṃ. Yato hi ayaṃ mudu, ito taṃ tikkhanti vattabbataṃ labhati apekkhāsiddhattā tikkhamudubhāvānaṃ pārāpāraṃ viya. Idāni ‘‘tato’’tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘samattānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^samattānī^eb^ti sampannāni. Itaraṃ ^a^M2.0490^ea^ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^Samattānī^eb^ti vā pariyattāni, samattānīti attho. ‘‘Tato mudutarāni dhammānusārīmaggassā’’ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Tatoti hi sotāpattimaggavipassanindriyāni adhippetāniyeva, ‘‘tato mudutarānī’’ti vuttapaṭhamamaggo dhammānusārī vā siyā saddhānusārī vāti byabhicarati? Nāyaṃ doso, sotāpattimaggekadesavaseneva ^a^V2.0192^ea^ laddhabbapaṭhamamaggāpekkhāya vipassanāya vibhāgassa adhippetattā. Yo hi sotāpanno hutvā iriyāpathaṃ akopetvā yathānisinnova sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pāpuṇāti, tassa vipassanindriyāni sandhāya avibhāgena vuttaṃ – ‘‘tato mudutarāni sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni nāmā’’ti. Yo pana sotāpanno hutvā kālantarena sakadāgāmī hoti, tassa sotāpattimaggatthāya pavattāni vipassanindriyāni nāma honti. So ce dhammānusārīgotto, tassa yathāvuttavipassanindriyato mudutarānīti ^b^‘‘tato mudutarāni dhammānusārīmaggassā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Vipassanindriyāni nāmāti ānetvā sambandho. Dhammānusārīvipassanindriyato saddhānusārīvipassanindriyānaṃ mudubhāvassa kāraṇaṃ sayameva vakkhati. Dhammena paññāya maggasotaṃ anussaratīti ^b^dhammānusārī,^eb^ paññuttaro ariyo. Saddhāya maggasotaṃ anussaratīti ^b^saddhānusārī,^eb^ saddhuttaro ariyo.

[03]Evaṃ vipassanāvasena dassetvā maggavasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tathā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Sampayogato sabhāvato ca arahattamaggapariyāpannāni ^b^arahattamaggindriyāni. Arahattaphalindriyānī^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo.

[03]Idāni phalavasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘samattāni paripuṇṇānī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Sotāpattimaggaṭṭhapuggalavasena nānattaṃ jātaṃ, tasmā te dvepi idha tatiyavāre na labbhantīti adhippāyo. Dhammānusārīsaddhānusārīnaṃ nānattaṃ kathaṃ jātanti āha ^b^‘‘āgamanenapi maggenapī’’^eb^ti. Tadubhayaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘saddhānusārīpuggalo’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Uddisāpento^eb^ti uddesaṃ gaṇhanto.

[03]^b^Maggo tikkho hoti^eb^ upanissayindriyānaṃ tikkhavisadabhāvato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sūraṃ ñāṇaṃ vahatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Asaṅkhārenā^eb^ti saraseneva. ^b^Appayogenā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Dhammānusārīpuggalo hi āgamanamhi kilese vikkhambhento appadukkhena appakasirena akilamantova vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti. Saddhānusārīpuggalo pana dukkhena kasirena kilamanto hutvā vikkhambhetuṃ sakkoti, tasmā dhammānusārissa pubbabhāgamaggakkhaṇe ^a^M2.0491^ea^ kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ adandhaṃ tikhiṇaṃ hutvā vahati, yathā nāma tikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi khippaṃ vahati, saddo na suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ na hoti, evarūpā dhammānusārino pubbabhāgabhāvanā hoti, saddhānusārino pana pubbabhāgakkhaṇe kilesacchedakañāṇaṃ dandhaṃ na tikhiṇaṃ asūraṃ hutvā vahati, yathā nāma nātitikhiṇena asinā kadaliṃ chindantassa chinnaṭṭhānaṃ na maṭṭhaṃ hoti, asi sīghaṃ na vahati, saddo suyyati, balavavāyāmakiccaṃ icchitabbaṃ ^a^V2.0193^ea^ hoti, evarūpā saddhānusārino pubbabhāgabhāvanā hoti. Evaṃ santepi kilesakkhaye nānattaṃ natthi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kilesakkhaye panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Avasesā ca kilesā khīyanti^eb^ saṃyojanakkhayāya yogattā.

[03]^b^483^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tato^eb^ti phalato phalavemattatāya cariyamānattā. ^b^Indriyavemattatā^eb^ saddhādīnaṃ indriyānaṃ nānattena. ^b^Phalanānatta^eb^nti arahattaphalādinānattaṃ. ^b^Puggalanānatta^eb^nti anāgāmiādipuggalanānattaṃ.

[03]^b^484^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sīlakkhandhādīhi saddhindriyādīhi ca parito pūraṇena paripūraṃ arahattamaggaṃ karonto nipphattito ^b^arahattaphalaṃ ārādheti^eb^ nipphādeti. ^b^Tayo padesamagge^eb^ti sīlakkhandhādīnaṃ apāripūriyā ekadesabhūte tayo heṭṭhimamagge. ^b^Padesaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhimaphalattayaṃ. ^b^Catūsū^eb^ti imasmiṃ vagge paṭhamādīsu catūsu suttesu. Kāmañcettha tatiye ‘‘tatoti phalavasena nissakka’’nti vuttaṃ, catutthe ‘‘paripūraṃ paripūrakārī ārādheti, padesaṃ padesakārī’’ti, ‘‘catūsupi suttesu missakāneva indriyāni kathitānī’’ti pana vacanato vipassanāvasenapi yojanā labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^485-487^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vipassanāvasena nissakkaṃ veditabbaṃ,^eb^ na maggaphalavasena, imasmiṃ sutte sabbasova vipassanindriyānaṃ eva adhippetattā. Idāni tamatthaṃ ^a^M2.0492^ea^ pākaṭaṃ kātuṃ ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇāni hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Avihādīsu pañcasu suddhāvāsesu tattha tattha āyuvemajjhaṃ anatikkamitvā antarā kilesaparinibbānena parinibbāyanato ^b^antarāparinibbāyī,^eb^ asaṅkhārena appayogena sarasatova parinibbāyanato ^b^asaṅkhāraparinibbāyī,^eb^ tabbipariyāyato ^b^sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyī,^eb^ uddhaṃ vāhibhāvena uddhamassa taṇhāsotaṃ vaṭṭasotaṃ vāti ^b^uddhaṃsoto,^eb^ uddhaṃ vā gantvā paṭilabhitabbato uddhamassa maggasotanti ^b^uddhaṃsoto,^eb^ akaniṭṭhabhavaṃ gacchatīti ^b^akaniṭṭhagāmī^eb^ti evamettha saddattho daṭṭhabbo.

[03]^b^Imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne^eb^ti ‘‘vipassanāvasena nissakka’’nti vuttaṭṭhāne. ^b^Arahattamaggeyeva ṭhatvā^eb^ti imasmiṃyeva ^a^V2.0194^ea^ bhave arahattamaggeyeva, na vipassanāya ca ṭhatvā. ^b^Pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbānī^eb^ti ‘‘tato mudutarehi antarāparinibbāyī hotī’’tiādīni pañca nissakkāni niddhāretvā kathetabbāni. Idāni tamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘arahattamaggassa hī’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha avihādīsu uppajjitvā uppannasamanantarāya parinibbāyanato ^b^paṭhamāntarāparinibbāyī^eb^. Tattha āyuppamāṇavemajjhaṃ appatvāva parinibbāyanato ^b^dutiyāntarāparinibbāyī,^eb^ āyuvemajjhaṃ patvā parinibbāyanato tato paraṃ ^b^tatiyāntarāparinibbāyī^eb^ veditabbo. ‘‘Pañca nissakkānī’’ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyīti vattabbanti? Na vattabbanti dassento āha ^b^‘‘asaṅkhāraparinibbāyissa sasaṅkhāraparinibbāyinopi eteva pañca janā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Tīṇi nissakkānī^eb^ti ‘‘tato mudutarehi sotāpanno hotī’’tiādīni tīṇi nissakkapadāni. Idha sakadāgāmī na gahito, so anāgāmimagge ṭhatvā nīharitabbo, anāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyehi mudutarehi sakadāgāmī hoti. ^b^Sakadā…pe… mudutarānī^eb^ti idaṃ sakadāgāmimaggassa vipassanindriyehi ekabījisaṅkhātasotāpannavipassanindriyāni mudutarāni hontīti tīṇi katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Dhammānusārī^eb^tiādidvayaṃ kolaṃkolādidvayena gahitaṃ hotīti. ^b^Sakadāgāmimaggassa hī^eb^tiādi vuttasseva atthassa vivaraṇaṃ. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. ^b^Chaṭṭhasattamāni vuttanayānevā^eb^ti chaṭṭhasattamāni suttāni dutiyatatiyesu vuttanayāneva. Tattha pana missakāni indriyāni kathitāni, idha pubbabhāgavipassanindriyāni kathitānīti ayameva viseso.

[03]^b^488^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ta^eb^nti ^a^M2.0493^ea^ maggaphalavasena nissakkaṃ. ^b^Pāḷiyaṃ vuttameva^eb^ ‘‘arahattaphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno hotī’’tiādinā. ^b^Aṭṭhahī^eb^ti catūhi phalehi catūhi ca maggehīti aṭṭhahi. ^b^Bahibhūto^eb^ na antobhāvo. ^b^Lokuttarāneva indriyāni kathitāni^eb^ maggaphalacittuppādapariyāpannattā.
[03]^b^489-490^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Indriyasampanno^eb^ti ettha ^b^sampanna^eb^saddo paripūriatthoti āha ^b^‘‘paripuṇṇindriyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Missakāni indriyāni kathitāni^eb^ sāmaññatova desitattā.
[06]Mudutaravaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^492^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Itthibhāve^eb^ti ^a^V2.0195^ea^ itthitāya. ^b^Indaṭṭhaṃ karoti^eb^ tathāsattajanasāmaññakāraṇabhāvato. Itthiyā eva indriyaṃ ^b^itthindriyaṃ^eb^. Esa nayo purisindriye. ^b^Jīvite^eb^ti sahajātadhammānaṃ jīvane pālane pavattane. ^b^Vaṭṭindriyānī^eb^ti vaṭṭahetubhūtāni indriyāni. Imesu hi upādinnaindriyesu sati vaṭṭaṃ vattati paññāyati.

[03]^b^493^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajānitapubbaṃ dhamma^eb^nti catusaccadhammamāha, tathā ^b^tesaṃyeva ñātadhammāna^eb^nti. Ayaṃ panettha attho – ājānātīti ^b^aññā,^eb^ paṭhamamaggena ñātamanatikkamitvā jānātīti attho. Sotāpannādīnaṃ chāriyānaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. Aññassa indriyāni ^b^aññindriyāni. Aññātāvīsū^eb^ti ājānitavantesu. Yasmā aggaphaladhammesu ñāṇakiccaṃ sātisayaṃ, tasmā taṃ kiccaṃ sesadhammesupi samāropetvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘aññātāvīsu arahattaphaladhammesū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tattha tattha^eb^ tesu tesu maggaphalesu. ^b^Tena tenākārenā^eb^ti anaññātajānanādiākārena.

[03]^b^494^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vipassanato^eb^^a^M2.0494^ea^^b^nissakka^eb^nti vipassanindriyehi nissakkaṃ. Idāni tameva saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘samattānī’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Tīṇi nissakkāni evamidha pañca nissakkāni nīharitabbāni^eb^ ekabījiādivibhāvanato. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sakadāgāmimaggassa hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Sotāpattimaggassa vipassanindriyāni^eb^ nāma tenattabhāvena sakadāgāmimaggaṃ pattuṃ gacchantassa sotāpannassa vipassanindriyāni. Pañcapi te sotāpattimaggassa bhedāyevāti ^b^‘‘sakadāgāmimagge ṭhatvā nīharitabbānī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Ekabījī^eb^ti ettha khandhabījaṃ nāma kathitaṃ. Yassa hi sotāpannassa ekaṃ khandhabījaṃ atthi, ekaṃ attabhāvaggahaṇaṃ, so ekabīji nāma. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘sotāpanno hutvā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Mānusakaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0196^ea^^b^bhava^eb^nti idaṃ panettha desanāmattaṃ, devabhavaṃ nibbattetītipi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Bhagavatā gahitanāmānetāni. Ettakañhi pamāṇaṃ gato sattakkhattuparamo nāma hoti, ettakaṃ kolaṃkolo, ettakaṃ ekabījīti bhagavatā etesaṃ nāmaṃ gahitaṃ.

[03]^b^Dve tayo bhave^eb^ti devamanussesu eva dve tayo bhave. Sambodhicatusaccadhammo paraṃ ayanaṃ nissayo gati etassāti ^b^sambodhiparāyaṇo^eb^. Kulato kulaṃ gacchatīti ^b^kolaṃkolo^eb^. Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyato paṭṭhāya hi nīcakule uppatti nāma natthi, mahābhogesu kulesu eva nibbattatīti attho. Kevalopi hi kula-saddo mahābhogakulameva vadati. ^b^Dve vā tīṇi vā kulānī^eb^ti devamanussavasena dve vā tayo vā bhaveti ayampi missakabhavena kathito. Jātassa kumārassa viya ariyāya jātiyā jātassa nāmametaṃ, yadidaṃ niyatoti sattakkhattuparamādikoti ca samaññāti dassento āha ^b^‘‘bhagavatā gahitanāmavasenevā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yadi pubbahetuniyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti sotāpattimaggato uddhaṃ tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ upanissayābhāvato pubbahetukiccaṃ natthīti sotāpattimaggassa upanissayabhāvo āpajjati. Yadi tassapi pubbahetūpanissayo siyā, tāva niyamato sotāpattimagguppattito pubbe eva niyamito, yāvañca akaniṭṭhaṃ tassa pubbahetu nāma ^a^M2.0495^ea^, ahetukatā āpannā, iccassa ahetu appaccayā nipphatti pāpuṇāti. Kiñca hetu ce? Niyamato sotāpanno ca niyatoti paṭhamamaggādhigameneva anukkamena upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ kiccāni nipphajjanti, evaṃ sattakkhattuparamatādiniyame sati sattamabhavādito uddhaṃ pavattatāya dukkhassa mūlabhūtā kilesā paṭhamamaggeneva khīṇāti upari tayo maggā akiccā siyuṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṭhamamaggassa upanissayo kato nāmā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Yadi upari tayo maggā sattakkhattuparamāditaṃ niyamenti, tato ca añño sotāpanno natthīti sotāpattimaggassa akiccakatā nippayojanatā āpajjeyya. Atha sakkāyadiṭṭhiādippahānaṃ tassa kiccaṃ, tesaṃ tesaṃ pahānena sattakkhattuparamādiniyamatāya. Bhavitabbaṃ, yāva uparimaggā eva hontīti sattabhavādito uddhamapavattanato tena vinānena sakkāyadiṭṭhiādippahānena ca tena vinā bhavitabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘paṭhamamagge anuppanneva upari tayo maggā uppannāti āpajjatī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Tiṇṇaṃ maggāna^eb^nti upari tiṇṇaṃ maggānaṃ. ^b^Vipassanā niyametīti yujjatī^eb^ti vuttamatthaṃ vivaranto ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Sotāpanno ^a^V2.0197^ea^ vaṭṭajjhāsayo. Tatrekacce pākaṭe paññāte dassento ^b^‘‘anāthapiṇḍiko’’^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^Idhaṭṭhakavokiṇṇasukkhavipassakassā^eb^ti yo imasmiṃ kāmabhave ṭhito manussadevavasena vokiṇṇabhavūpapattiko sukkhavipassako ca, tassa vasena. ^b^Nāmaṃ kathita^eb^nti sattakkhattuparamoti nāmaṃ kathitaṃ. Keci pana ‘‘kāmabhave sattakkhattuṃyeva uppajjati, na tato’’ti vadanti, taṃ vīmaṃsitabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Sodhessāmī^eb^ti jambudīpe kenaci tepiṭakena bhikkhunā saddhiṃ piṭakattayameva mayhaṃ uggahaparipucchāvasena sodheyyāmīti ^b^paratīraṃ^eb^ jambudīpaṃ gato. Yo bhikkhu sakkotīti yojanā. Aniccānupassanādīsu ekamukhena abhiniviṭṭhenapi abhidhammapariyāyena tīhi eva vimokkhehi maggaṃ labhatīti abhinivesabhedena tayo puggalā suññatato vuṭṭhitā, tathā tayo appaṇihitato vuṭṭhitāti cha honti, teva saddhādhurapaññādhuravasena ^b^dvādasa sakadāgāmino^eb^. Tathā ^b^arahanto,^eb^ tayo antarāparinibbāyino ^a^M2.0496^ea^ eko upahaccaparinibbāyī eko uddhaṃsoto akaniṭṭhagāmīti pañca, te asaṅkhārasasaṅkhāraparinibbāyibhedena dasāti avihādīsu catūsupi cattālīsa, akaniṭṭhe pana uddhaṃsoto natthīti ^b^aṭṭhacattālīsa anāgāmino. Vipassanā kathitā^eb^ sammasanacārassa kathitattā.

[03]^b^495-500^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā cakkhussa sahajātatadindriyanissitadhammesu adhipateyyaṃ anuvattanīyattā, evaṃ taṃdvārikadhammesupi adhipateyyaṃ tehi anuvattanīyattāti vuttaṃ – ^b^‘‘adhipateyyasaṅkhātena indaṭṭhenā’’^eb^ti. Esa nayo sesindriyādīsupi. ^b^Catusaccavasena kathitāni^eb^ sabhāvādivibhāvanassa kathitattā.
[06]Chaḷindriyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^501-505^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathā cakkhu dassane adhipateyyaṭṭhena cakkhundriyaṃ, evaṃ sukhavedanā sukhane adhipateyyaṭṭhena ^a^V2.0198^ea^ sukhindriyaṃ. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Sesaṃ tebhūmaka^eb^nti sesaṃ bhūmittayavasena tebhūmakaṃ.

[03]^b^506^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kāyika^eb^nti ayamassa nissayavasena niddesoti āha – ^b^‘‘kāyapasādavatthuka’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sarūpaniddeso^eb^ sukhaṃ sukhindriyassa sarūpanti. Sādanīyaṭṭhena dhammapadāni attani assādayatīti ^b^sātaṃ,^eb^ madhuraṃ. ^b^Vedayita^eb^nti vediyanaṃ, anubhavananti attho. ^b^Aññadhammavisiṭṭho^eb^ti phassādīhi aññehi dhammehi visadiso. ^b^Kāyika^eb^nti pasādakāyasannissitaṃ. ^b^Cetasika^eb^nti cetosannissitaṃ, tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ettha panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Kāyapasāda…pe… natthi,^eb^ tasmā ^b^‘‘cattāro pasādakāye vatthuṃ katvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^509^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dvinnaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0497^ea^^b^araṇīna^eb^nti adharuttarāraṇīnaṃ. Kiñci dvayaṃ saṅghaṭṭitamattaṃ hutvā na samodhānagataṃ hotīti taṃnivattanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘saṅghaṭṭanasamodhānā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Punappunaṃ saṅghaṭṭanena hi tejopātubhāvo. ^b^Adharāraṇī viya vatthārammaṇaṃ^eb^ asatipi vāyāme tajjasamphassapaccayato. ^b^Uttarāraṇī viya phasso^eb^ vatthārammaṇādiphassena pavattanato. ^b^Saṅghaṭṭo viya phassasaṅghaṭṭanaṃ^eb^ araṇidvayasaṅghaṭṭanā viya phassasseva vatthārammaṇesu saṅghaṭṭanākārena pavattito. ^b^Aggi viya vedanā^eb^ anudahanaṭṭhena khaṇikāvāyañca. ^b^Vatthārammaṇaṃ vā uttarāraṇī viya^eb^ indhanāpātagahaṇādīsu ussāhassa viya pavattisambhavato. ^b^Phasso adharāraṇī viya^eb^ nirussāhanirīhatāvasena attasādhanato.

[03]^b^510^eb^^b^.^eb^ Rasanaṃ bhañjanaṃ nirujjhanaṃ raso. Yo yo dhammānaṃ raso yathādhammaraso, tena ^b^yathādhammarasena. Paṭipāṭiyā^eb^ti kamena, ubhayenapi dhammānaṃ pahānakkamenāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^Imasmiṃ indriyavibhaṅge^eb^ti imasmiṃ indriyasaṃyuttasaññite indriyavibhaṅge. ^b^Adesitattā^eb^ti sesasuttāni viya ‘‘sukhindriya’’ntiādinā adesitattā idaṃ ^b^uppaṭipāṭikasuttaṃ nāma. Valiyā^eb^ kharasamphassāya ^b^phuṭṭhassa. Ta^eb^nti kaṇṭakavedanādiṃ. ^b^Etassa^eb^ dukkhindriyassa.
[03]^b^Tesaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0199^ea^^b^tesa^eb^nti domanassindriyādīnaṃ. ^b^Kāraṇavasenevā^eb^ti taṃtaṃasādhāraṇakāraṇavasena. Tesañhi visesakāraṇaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘pattacīvarādīnaṃ vā’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]^b^Ekatovā^eb^ti punappunaṃ paduddhāraṇaṃ akatvā ekajjhameva. Dutiyajjhānādīnaṃ upacārakkhaṇe eva nirujjhantīti ānetvā sambandho. ^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ dukkhindriyadomanassādīnaṃ. ^b^Atisayanirodho^eb^ti suṭṭhu pahānaṃ ujuppaṭipakkhena vūpasamo. ^b^Nirodhoyevā^eb^ti nirodhamattameva. ^b^Nānāvajjane^eb^ti yena āvajjanena appanāvīthi hoti, tato bhijjāvajjane, anekāvajjane vā. Appanāvīthiyañhi upacāro ekāvajjano, itaro anekāvajjano anekakkhattuṃ pavattanato. Visamanisajjāya uppannakilamatho ^b^visamāsanupatāpo^eb^^a^M2.0498^ea^. ^b^Pītipharaṇenā^eb^ti pītiyā pharaṇarasattā. Pītisamuṭṭhānānaṃ vā paṇītarūpānaṃ kāyassa byāpanato vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbo kāyo sukhokkanto hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vitakkavicārapaccayepī^eb^ti ^b^pi^eb^-saddo aṭṭhānapayutto, so ‘‘pahīnassā’’ti ettha ānetvā sambandhitabbo ‘‘pahīnassapi domanassindriyassā’’ti. Etaṃ domanassindriyaṃ uppajjatīti sambandho. ‘‘Tassa mayhaṃ aticiraṃ vitakkayato vicārayato kāyopi kilami, cittampi vihaññī’’ti ca vacanato kāyacittakhedānaṃ vitakkavicārapaccayatā veditabbā. Vitakkavicārabhāve uppajjati domanassindriyanti ānetvā sambandhitabbaṃ. ^b^Tatthassa siyā uppattī^eb^ti tattha dutiyajjhānupacāre assa domanassassa uppatti bhaveyya. ‘‘Tatthassa siyā uppattī’’ti idaṃ parikappavacanaṃ upacārakkhaṇe domanassassa suppahīnabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘na tveva dutiyajjhāne pahīnapaccayattā’’^eb^ti. Pahīnampi somanassindriyaṃ pīti viya na dūreti katvā ^b^‘‘āsannattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Nānāvajjanupacāre pahīnampi pahānaṅgaṃ paṭipakkhena avihatattā antarantarā uppajjeyyāti imamatthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘appanāppattāyā’’^eb^tiādimāha. ‘‘Tādisāya āsevanāya icchitabbattā yathā maggavīthito pubbe dve tayo javanavārā sadisānupassanāva pavattanti, evamidhāpi appanāvārato pubbe dve tayo javanavārā upekkhāsahagatāva pavattantī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Aparisesa^eb^nti suvikkhambhitanti katvā vikkhambhanena anavasesaṃ.

[03]^b^Tathattāyā^eb^ti tathabhāvāya paṭhamajjhānasamaṅgitāya. Sā panassa uppādanena vā uppannassa samāpajjanena vā hotīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘uppādanatthāya samāpajjanatthāyā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dvīsū^eb^ti navamadasamesu suttantesu.
[06]Sukhindriyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^511^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pamukhe ^a^V2.0200^ea^, pāsādassa ca pacchimabhāge ātapo pacchātapo, tasmiṃ ^b^pacchātape^eb^. So hi pāsādassa pamukhabhāvena kato. Kiṃ pana bhagavato vajirasāraṃ sarīraṃ otāpetabbaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘sammāsambuddhassā’’^eb^tiādi ^a^M2.0499^ea^. ^b^Ayañca^eb^ imaṃ suttaṃ desitasamaye. ^b^Na sakkoti^eb^ byāmappabhāya kāyaci pabhāya anabhibhavanīyattā. Kiñcāpi buddhābhā sūriyābhāya anabhibhavanīyā, ghammasabhāvatāya pana rasmīnaṃ parito pharantī sūriyābhā tikhiṇā uṇhāti āha ^b^‘‘rasmiteja’’^eb^nti. Idāni tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘yatheva hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Suvaṇṇāvaṭṭaṃ viyā^eb^ti acche suvaṇṇapatte vinivattāavaṭṭaṃ viya. ^b^Garahaṇacchariyaṃ nāma kiretaṃ^eb^ ‘‘acchariyametaṃ avisicchephalavada’’ntiādīsu viya. ^b^Na evametarahī^eb^ti attano pākaṭavasena vadati, na itaresampīti. ^b^Sirājālā^eb^ti sirāsantānā. ^b^Evarūpaṃ na hotī^eb^ti aññesaṃ pākatikasattānaṃ vuttākāraṃ viya na hoti puññasambhārassa uḷāratamattā vipaccanassa pariyantagatattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘aññesaṃ apākaṭa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Valiyāvaṭṭaka^eb^nti appakaṃ valiyāvaṭṭaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kesaggappamāṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sabbānī^eb^ti sirājālāni. ^b^Purato vaṅko^eb^ti thokaṃ purato natamattaṃ sandhāyāha. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘svāyaṃ aññesaṃ apākaṭo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nayaggāhato^eb^ti anumānato. ^b^Dhī ta^eb^nti ^b^dhī^eb^-saddayoge upayogavacanaṃ. ^b^Dhī^eb^ti jigucchanatthe nipāto. ^b^Dhikkāro^eb^ti jigucchāpayogo. ^b^Taṃ phusatū^eb^ti tuyhaṃ pāpuṇātu.
[03]^b^512^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aññamaññassā^eb^ti añño aññassa. ^b^Na paccanubho^eb^ti attano avisayabhāvato. Idāni taṃ aññavisayataṃ anvayato byatirekato vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Visayāni paṭisaranti etthāti ^b^paṭisaraṇaṃ^eb^. Indriyaviññāṇāni hi asatipi tādise adhippāye attano ārammaṇassa yāthāvato sampajānanato pavedanavijānanāni karontāni viya pavattanti, tathā lokassa aññattha siddhito. Tenāha bhagavā – ‘‘mano paṭisaraṇaṃ, manova nesaṃ ^a^V2.0201^ea^ gocaravisayaṃ paccanubhotī’’ti manodvārikajavanamano hi savisesaṃ manovisayaṃ paccanubhoti, pañcadvārikajavanamano mananamattameva paccanubhavati. ^b^Rajjanādi^eb^ggahaṇañcettha nidassanamattaṃ, tasmā saddahanādipi gahitamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ, pañcadvārappavattivasena tathā vuttaṃ. ^b^Ekasmiṃ pana dvāre^eb^ti cakkhudvāre.

[03]^b^Dubbalabhojakā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0500^ea^ appānubhāvā rājabhoggā. ^b^Āya^eb^nti bhoguppattiṭṭhānaṃ. Yottabandhādinimittaṃ laddhabbakahāpaṇo ^b^yottakahāpaṇo^eb^. Addubandhādinimittaṃ gahetabbakahāpaṇo ^b^addukahāpaṇo^eb^. Māghātaghosanāya katāya hiṃsānimittaṃ gahetabbakahāpaṇo ^b^māpahārakahāpaṇo^eb^. Tassa parimāṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘aṭṭhakahāpaṇo’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Satavatthuka^eb^nti satakarīsavatthukaṃ.

[03]^b^Maggasatī^eb^ti ariyamaggasati. Bhāvanamanuyuñjantassa hi javanamano ussakkitvāva ^b^maggasatiṃ paṭisarati^eb^ tappariyosānattā. ^b^Ta^eb^nti nibbānaṃ. ^b^Sā^eb^ti phalavimutti. ^b^Paṭisarati^eb^ aggamaggasatiyā. Phalavimutti nibbānanti ubhayaṃ maggassa siddhāyevāti. Ārammaṇavasena natthi etassa paṭisaraṇanti ^b^appaṭisaraṇaṃ^eb^ asaṅkhatāmatassa santiniccasabhāvattā. Sayaṃ pana sabbesaṃyeva ariyānaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ. Tenāha ‘‘nibbānaṃ arahato gatī’’ti (pari. 339). ^b^Nibbānaṃ anupaviṭṭhaṃ^eb^ nibbānanissayattā. ^b^Na tato paraṃ gacchati^eb^ gatassa aññassa tādisassa abhāvā. Nibbānaṃ pari sabbaso osānanti ^b^nibbānapariyosānaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^Mūlajātā^eb^ jātamūlā. Tato eva ^b^patiṭṭhitā^eb^. Kā panassāti āha ^b^‘‘maggena āgatasaddhā’’^eb^ti. Maggo daḷhāya asaṃhāriyasaddhāya mūlaṃ diṭṭhisampayuttāni ceva vicikicchācittañcāti ^b^pañca akusalacittāni^eb^ samucchedavasena ^b^pahīnāni. Pañca nīvaraṇānī^eb^ti ettha apāyagamanīyāni paṭhamamaggeneva pahīnāni, itarāni vikkhambhanavasena jhānena pahīnānīti pañcasu orambhāgiyakilesasaṃyojanesu ekadesavigameneva bahiddhāsaṃyojano viya jātoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘jhānānāgāmiṭṭhāne ṭhito’’^eb^ti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so aparihīna…pe… nibbāyeyyā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^515^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pubbakoṭṭhake evaṃ āgatasuttaṃ ādiṃ katvā ^b^phalindriyāneva kathitāni^eb^ aggaphalavasena desanāya āgatattā.

[03]^b^520^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upari^eb^^a^V2.0202^ea^^b^saha vipassanāya tayo maggā^eb^ti vipassanāya saha sotāpattiphalato upari tayo maggā. Maggādhigamena idāni paccakkhabhūtattā ^a^M2.0501^ea^ ‘‘ime kho te dhammā’’ti vuttā. Tattha yaṃ aggabhūtaṃ, tassa vasena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘arahattaphalindriyaṃ nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ indriyabhāvasāmaññena ekajjhaṃ katvā. ^b^Ativijjhitvā passāmī^eb^ti sacchikatvā yāthāvato passāmi. ^b^Catūhi indriyehī^eb^ti vīriyindriyādīhi catūhi indriyehi. Sā vipassanāmaggaphalasahagatā siyāti missakā vuttā.
[06]Jarāvaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^521^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sūrabhāvenā^eb^ti atisūrabhāvena. ^b^Bujjhanatthāyā^eb^ti saccapaṭivedhāya.

[03]^b^522^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cattāri indriyānī^eb^ti paññindriyaṃ ṭhapetvā sesāni cattāri. ^b^‘‘Ariyañāṇaṃ lokuttara’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ maggañāṇaṃ katvā. Ariya-saddo pana yathā tathā visuddhepi hotīti tādisaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘tampi panā’’^eb^tiādi. Yathā hi cattārindriyāni missakāni, evaṃ paññindriyampi missakanti vuccamāne na koci virodhoti adhippāyenāha ^b^‘‘tampi pana…pe… vaṭṭatī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^523^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na sakkoti^eb^ indriyānaṃ aparipakkattā. ^b^Atthīti pajānāti^eb^ nayaggāhena, na paccakkhato. Na hi ariyāpi anadhigataṃ maggaphalaṃ paccavekkhituṃ sakkonti.
[03]^b^526^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāsavesū^eb^ti ^a^V2.0203^ea^ caturāsavavinimuttesu sesadhammesu ārammaṇesu. Tesupi uppajjanakānatthato ^b^cittaṃ rakkhati nāma^eb^.

[03]^b^528^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Taṃ^eb^^a^M2.0502^ea^^b^sandhāyā^eb^ti taṃ sūkarakhataleṇaṃ sandhāya. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ ‘‘sūkarakhatāya’’nti vacanaṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Bhāvanapuṃsaka^eb^nti bhāvajotakaṃ napuṃsakavacanaṃ yathā ‘‘visamaṃ vātā vāyanti, ekamantaṃ nisīdī’’ti. Kiccapaṭipatti tesaṃ saṃkāsanaṭṭhena sapatiso, sapatiso eva ^b^sappatisso,^eb^ sajeṭṭhakoti āha ^b^‘‘sappatissoti sajeṭṭhako’’^eb^ti.
[06]Sūkarakhatavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^531-650^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattānaṃ phalānaṃ hetubhūtāni ‘‘imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā’’tiādinā vuttāni, pañcindriyāniyeva phalūpacārena ^b^‘‘satta phalānī’’^eb^ti vuttāni. Tāni ca ^b^pubbabhāgāni^eb^ ‘‘imesaṃ, bhikkhave, pañcannaṃ indriyānaṃ bhāvitattā…pe… sattānisaṃsā pāṭikaṅkhā’’ti vacanato. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti sattānaṃ phalānaṃ. ‘‘Dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phala’’nti evaṃ atītasutte vuttāni heṭṭhā dve phalāni nāmāti vadanti. Yehi pana indriyehi aññatra pana antarāparinibbāyiṃ sesāni phalāni honti, tāni cattāri sapubbabhāgāni lokuttarānīti vuttaṃ siyā.
[06]Indriyasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^651-704^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sammappadhānasaṃyutte^eb^^a^V2.0204^ea^^b^pubbabhāgavipassanāva kathitā^eb^ ‘‘akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāyā’’tiādivacanato.
[06]Sammappadhānasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^705-812^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Balasaṃyutte balāni missakāneva kathitāni^eb^ ‘‘vivekanissita’’nti vacanato.
[06]Balasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^813^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chandaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0205^ea^^a^M2.0503^ea^^b^nissāya pavatto samādhī^eb^ti kattukamyatāchandaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi ^b^chandhasamādhi. Padhānasaṅkhārā^eb^ti catukiccasādhakassa sammappadhānavīriyassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. ^b^Tehī^eb^ti chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārehi. ^b^Iddhiyā pāda^eb^nti nipphattipariyāyena ijjhanaṭṭhena, ijjhanti etāya saddhā iddhā vuddhā ukkaṃsagatā hontīti iminā vā pariyāyena ^b^‘‘iddhī’’^eb^ti saṅkhātānaṃ upacārajjhānādikusalacittasampayuttānaṃ chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārānaṃ adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena pādabhūtaṃ, sesacittacetasikarāsinti attho. Sā eva ca yathāvuttaiddhi yasmā heṭṭhimā heṭṭhimā uparimāya uparimāya pādabhūtā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iddhibhūtaṃ vā pādanti iddhipāda’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sesesū^eb^ti vīriyasamādhiādīsu. Tattha hi vīriyaṃ cittaṃ vīmaṃsaṃ adhipatiṃ katvā paṭiladdhasamādhi vīmaṃsāsamādhīti attho veditabbo. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ iddhipādasaṃyutte. ^b^Ekaparicchedova^eb^ atthaniddeso.
[03]^b^817^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iddhipadesa^eb^nti iddhiyā ekadesaṃ. Ko pana soti āha – ^b^‘‘tayo ca magge tīṇi ca phalānī’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^818^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samatta^eb^nti sāmaññassa samaṃ attanaṃ ijjhanaṃ samattaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ. ^b^Vivaṭṭapādakā eva iddhipādā kathitā^eb^ ‘‘apārā pāraṃ gamanāya saṃvattantī’’tiādivacanato.

[03]^b^822^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Udenayakkhassa^eb^^a^V2.0206^ea^^b^cetiyaṭṭhāne^eb^ti udenassa nāma yakkhassa devāyatanasaṅkhepena iṭṭhakāhi kate mahājanassa cittīkataṭṭhāne. ^b^Katavihāro^eb^ti bhagavantaṃ uddissa tattha katavihāro. ^b^Vuccatī^eb^ti purimavohārena ^a^M2.0504^ea^ ‘‘udenacetiya’’nti vuccati. ^b^Gotamakādīsupī^eb^ti gotamakacetiyanti evamādīsupi. ^b^Eseva nayo^eb^ti cetiyaṭṭhāne katavihārabhāvaṃ atidisati. ^b^Vaḍḍhitā^eb^ti bhāvanāpāripūrivasena paribrūhitā. ^b^Punappunaṃ katā^eb^ti bhāvanāya bahulīkaraṇavasena aparāparaṃ pavattitā ānītā. ^b^Yuttayānaṃ viya katā^eb^ti yathā yuttamājaññayānaṃ chekena sārathinā adhiṭṭhitaṃ yathāruci pavattimarahati, evaṃ yathāruci pavattanārahataṃ gamitā. ^b^Patiṭṭhānaṭṭhenā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhānaṭṭhena. ^b^Vatthu viya katā^eb^ti sabbaso upakkilesavisodhanena iddhivisesānaṃ pavattiṭṭhānabhāvato suvisodhitaparissayavatthu viya katā. ^b^Adhiṭṭhitā^eb^ti paṭipakkhadūrībhāvato subhāvitabhāvena taṃtaṃadhiṭṭhānayogyatāya ṭhapitā. ^b^Samantato citā^eb^ti sabbabhāgena bhāvanupacayaṃ gamitā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘suvaḍḍhitā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Suṭṭhu samāraddhā^eb^ti iddhibhāvanāya sikhappattiyā sammadeva saṃsevitā.

[03]^b^Aniyamenā^eb^ti ‘‘yassa kassacī’’ti aniyatavacanena. ^b^Niyametvā^eb^ti ‘‘tathāgatassā’’ti sarūpaggahaṇena niyametvā. ^b^Āyuppamāṇa^eb^nti paramāyuppamāṇaṃ vadati. Tasseva gahaṇe kāraṇaṃ brahmajālavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. ^b^Mahāsīvatthero^eb^ pana mahābodhisattānaṃ carimabhave paṭisandhidāyino kammassa asaṅkheyyāyukatāsaṃvattanasamatthataṃ hadaye ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ āyusaṅkhārassa parissayavikkhambhanasamatthatā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā evāti imaṃ bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyyāti avoca.

[03]^b^Khaṇḍiccādīhi abhisuyyatī^eb^ti etena yathā iddhibalena jarāya na paṭighāto, evaṃ tena maraṇassapi na paṭighātoti atthato āpannamevāti. ‘‘Kva saro khitto, kvacani patito’’ti aññathā vuṭṭhitenapi theravādena aṭṭhakathāvacanameva samatthitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘so pana na ruccati…pe… niyamita’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Pariyuṭṭhitacitto^eb^ti yathā kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkā, evaṃ abhibhūtacitto. So pana abhibhavo mahatā udakoghena appakassa udakassa ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya ahosīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘ajjhotthaṭacitto’’^eb^ti. ^b^Añño^eb^ti therato, ariyehi vā añño yo koci paro ^a^M2.0505^ea^ puthujjano. Puthujjanaggahaṇañcettha yathā sabbena sabbaṃ appahīnavipallāso mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto kiñci atthānatthaṃ sallakkhetuṃ na sakkoti, evaṃ thero bhagavatā kataṃ nimittobhāsaṃ sabbaso na ^a^V2.0207^ea^ sallakkhesīti dassanatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘māro hī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cattāro vipallāsā^eb^ti asubhe ‘‘subha’’nti saññāvipallāso, cittavipallāso, dukkhe ‘‘sukha’’nti saññāvipallāso, cittavipallāsoti ime cattāro vipallāsā. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti yadipi itare aṭṭha vipallāsā pahīnā, yathāvuttānaṃ catunnaṃ vipallāsānaṃ appahīnabhāvena. ^b^Assā^eb^ti therassa.

[03]^b^Maddatī^eb^ti phusanamattena maddanto viya hoti, aññathā tena maddite sattānaṃ maraṇameva siyā, kiṃ sakkhissati na sakkhissatīti adhippāyo. Kasmā na sakkhissati? Nanu esa aggasāvakassa mahiddhikassa mahānubhāvassa kucchiṃ paviṭṭhoti? Saccaṃ paviṭṭho, tañca kho attano mahānubhāvassa dassanatthaṃ, na vibādhanādhippāyena. Vibādhanādhippāyena pana idha ^b^‘‘kiṃ sakkhissatī’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ hadayamaddanassa adhikatattā. ^b^Nimittobhāsa^eb^nti ettha ‘‘tiṭṭhatu bhagavā kappa’’nti sakalakappaṃ avaṭṭhānayācanāya ‘‘yassa kassaci, ānanda, cattāro iddhipādā bhāvitā’’tiādinā aññāpadesena attano caturiddhipādabhāvanānubhāvena kappaṃ avaṭṭhānasamatthatāvasena saññuppādanaṃ nimittaṃ. Tathā pana pariyāyaggahaṇaṃ muñcitvā ujukaṃyeva attano adhippāyavibhāvanaṃ obhāso. ^b^Jānantoyevā^eb^ti mārena pariyuṭṭhitabhāvaṃ jānanto eva. Attano aparādhahetuko sattānaṃ soko tanuko hoti, na balavāti āha – ^b^‘‘dosāropanena sokatanukaraṇattha’’^eb^nti. Kiṃ pana thero mārena pariyuṭṭhitacittakāle pavattiṃ pacchā jānātīti? Na jānāti sabhāvena, buddhānubhāvena pana jānāti.

[03]^b^Anatthe niyojento^eb^ guṇamāraṇena ^b^māreti,^eb^ virāgavibandhanena vā jātinimittatāya tattha tattha jātaṃ mārento viya hotīti ^b^‘‘māretīti māro’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Atipāpattā ^b^pāpimā^eb^. Kaṇhadhammasamannāgato ^b^kaṇho^eb^. Virāgādiguṇānaṃ antakaraṇato ^b^antako^eb^. Sattānaṃ anatthāvahaṃ paṭipattiṃ na muñcatīti ^b^namuci^eb^. Attano mārapāsena pamatte bandhati, pamattā vā bandhū etassāti ^b^pamattabandhu^eb^. Sattamasattāhato paraṃ satta ^a^M2.0506^ea^ ahāni sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘aṭṭhame sattāhe’’^eb^ti, na pana pallaṅkasattāhādi viya niyatakiccassa aṭṭhamasattāhassa nāma labbhanato. Sattamasattāhassa hi parato ajapālanigrodhamūle brahmuno sakkassa ca paṭiññātadhammadesanaṃ bhagavantaṃ ñatvā ‘‘idāni satte dhammadesanāya mama visayaṃ atikkāmessatī’’ti sañjātadomanasso hutvā ṭhito cintesi, ‘‘handāhaṃ dāni naṃ upāyena parinibbāpessāmi, evamassa manoratho aññathattaṃ gamissati, mama manoratho ijjhissatī’’ti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekamantaṃ ṭhito – ‘‘parinibbātu dāni, bhante, bhagavā’’tiādinā parinibbānaṃ yāci. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ‘‘aṭṭhame sattāhe’’tiādi. Tattha ^b^ajjā^eb^ti āyusaṅkhāravossajjanadivasaṃ sandhāyāha. Bhagavā cassa atibandhanādhippāyaṃ ^a^V2.0208^ea^ jānantopi taṃ anāvikatvā parinibbānassa akālabhāvameva pakāsento yācanaṃ paṭikkhipi. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na tāvāha’’^eb^ntiādi.

[03]^b^Maggavasena byattā^eb^ti saccapaṭivedhaveyyattiyena byattā. ^b^Tatheva vinītā^eb^ti maggavasena kilesānaṃ samucchedavinayena vinītā. ^b^Tathā visāradā^eb^ti ariyamaggādhigameneva satthusāsane vesārajjappattiyā visāradā, sārajjakarānaṃ diṭṭhivicikicchādipāpadhammānaṃ vigamena visāradabhāvaṃ pattāti attho. Yassa sutassa vasena vaṭṭadukkhato nissaraṇaṃ sambhavati, taṃ idha ukkaṭṭhaniddesena ‘‘suta’’nti adhippetanti āha ^b^‘‘tepiṭakavasenā’’^eb^ti. Tiṇṇaṃ piṭakānaṃ samūho ^b^tepiṭakaṃ,^eb^ tīṇi vā piṭakāni tipiṭakaṃ, tipiṭakameva ^b^tepiṭakaṃ,^eb^ tassa vasena. ^b^Tadevā^eb^ti yaṃ taṃ tepiṭakaṃ sotabbabhāvena sutanti vuttaṃ, tameva. ^b^Dhamma^eb^nti pariyattidhammaṃ. ^b^Dhārentī^eb^ti suvaṇṇabhājane pakkhittasīhavasaṃ viya avinassantaṃ katvā suppaguṇasuppavattibhāvena dhārenti hadaye ṭhapenti. Iti pariyattidhammavasena bahussutadhammadharabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni paṭivedhavasenapi taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Ariyadhammassā^eb^ti maggaphaladhammassa, navavidhassa vā lokuttaradhammassa. ^b^Anudhammabhūta^eb^nti adhigamāyānurūpaṃ dhammabhūtaṃ. ^b^Anucchavikapaṭipada^eb^nti tameva vipassanādhammamāha, chabbidhā visuddhiyo vā. ^b^Anudhamma^eb^nti nibbānadhammassa anudhammo, yathāvuttapaṭipadā, tassānurūpaṃ abhisallekhitaṃ appicchatādidhammaṃ. ^b^Caraṇasīlā^eb^ti samādāya vattanasīlā. Anumaggaphaladhammo etissāti vā ^b^anudhammā,^eb^ vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanā, tassa caraṇasīlā. ^b^Attano ācariyavāda^eb^nti attano ācariyassa ^a^M2.0507^ea^ sammāsambuddhassa vādaṃ. Sadevakassa lokassa ācārasikkhāpanena ^b^ācariyo,^eb^ bhagavā, tassa vādo, catusaccadesanā.

[03]^b^Ācikkhissantī^eb^ti ādito kathessanti, attanā uggahitaniyāmena pare uggaṇhāpessantīti attho. ^b^Desessantī^eb^ti vācessanti, pāḷiṃ sammā pabodhessantīti attho. ^b^Paññapessantī^eb^ti pajānāpessanti, saṅkāsessantīti attho. ^b^Paṭṭhapessantī^eb^ti pakārehi ṭhapessanti, pakāsessantīti attho. ^b^Vivarissantī^eb^ti vivaṭaṃ karissanti. ^b^Vibhajissantī^eb^ti vibhattaṃ karissanti. ^b^Uttānīkarissantī^eb^ti anuttānaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānaṃ pākaṭaṃ karissanti. ^b^Sahadhammenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^dhamma^eb^-saddo kāraṇapariyāyo ‘‘hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā’’tiādīsu (vibha. 720) viyāti āha ^b^‘‘sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanenā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Sappāṭihāriya^eb^nti sanissaraṇaṃ. Yathā paravādaṃ bhañjitvā sakavādo patiṭṭhahati, evaṃ hetudāharaṇehi yathādhigatamatthaṃ sampādetvā dhammaṃ kathessanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessantī’’^eb^ti ^a^V2.0209^ea^, navavidhaṃ lokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ pabodhessantīti attho. Ettha ca ‘‘paññapessantī’’tiādīhi chahi padehi cha atthapadāni dassitāni, ādito pana dvīhi padehi cha byañjanapadāni. Ettāvatā tepiṭakaṃ buddhavacanaṃ saṃvaṇṇanānayena saṅgahetvā dassitaṃ hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ ^b^nettiyaṃ^eb^ (netti. saṅgahavāra) ‘‘dvādasa padāni suttaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ byañjanañca attho cā’’ti.

[03]^b^Sikkhattayasaṅgahita^eb^nti adhisīlasikkhādisikkhattayasaṅgahaṃ. ^b^Sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariya^eb^nti anavasesaṃ satthusāsanabhūtaṃ seṭṭhacariyaṃ. ^b^Samiddha^eb^nti sammadeva vaḍḍhitaṃ. ^b^Jhānassādavasenā^eb^ti tehi tehi bhikkhūhi samadhigatajhānasukhavasena. ^b^Vuḍḍhippatta^eb^nti uḷārapaṇītabhāvūpagamanena sabbaso parivuḍḍhimupagataṃ. ^b^Sabbapāliphullaṃ viya^eb^ abhiññāsampadāhi sāsanābhivuḍḍhiyā matthakappattito. ^b^Patiṭṭhitavasenā^eb^ti patiṭṭhānavasena, patiṭṭhappattiyāti attho. Paṭivedhavasena bahuno janassa hitaṃ ^b^bāhujaññaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mahājanābhisamayavasenā’’^eb^ti. Puthu puthulaṃ bhūtaṃ jātaṃ, puthuttaṃ bhūtaṃ pattanti vā ^b^puthubhūtaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbākārena puthulabhāvappatta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Suṭṭhu pakāsita^eb^nti sammadeva ādikalyāṇādibhāvena paveditaṃ.

[03]^b^Satiṃ^eb^^a^M2.0508^ea^^b^sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā^eb^ti ayaṃ kāyādivibhāgo attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro mayā ettakaṃ kālaṃ vahito, idāni pana na vahitabbo, etassa avahanatthaṃ cirataraṃ kālaṃ ariyamaggasambhāro sambhato, svāyaṃ ariyamaggo paṭividdho, yato ime kāyādayo asubhādito sabhāvādito sammadeva pariññātāti catubbidhampi satiṃ yathātathaṃ visaye suṭṭhu upaṭṭhitaṃ katvā. ^b^Ñāṇena paricchinditvā^eb^ti yasmā imassa attabhāvasaññitassa dukkhabhārassa vahane payojanabhūtaṃ attahitaṃ bodhimūle eva parisamāpitaṃ, parahitaṃ pana buddhaveneyyavinayanaṃ parisamāpitaṃ matthakappattaṃ, taṃ dāni māsattayeneva parisamāpanaṃ pāpuṇissati, tasmā āha ‘‘visākhapuṇṇamāyaṃ parinibbāyissāmī’’ti, evaṃ buddhañāṇena paricchinditvā saccabhāgena vinicchayaṃ katvā. ^b^Āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajī^eb^ti āyuno jīvitassa abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ phalasamāpattidhammaṃ na samāpajjissāmīti vissaji, taṃ vissajjaneneva tena abhisaṅkharīyamānaṃ jīvitasaṅkhāraṃ na pavattayissāmīti vissaji. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Ṭhānamahantatāyapi pavattiākāramahantatāyapi ^b^mahanto pathavīkampo^eb^. Tattha ṭhānamahantatāya bhūmicālassa mahantataṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tadā…pe… akampitthā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ, sā pana jātikhettabhūtā dasasahassī lokadhātu eva, na yā kāci. Yā mahābhinīhāramahājātiādīsupi akampittha, tadāpi ^a^V2.0210^ea^ tattakāya eva kampane kiṃ kāraṇaṃ? Jātikhettabhāvena tasseva ādito pariggahassa katattā, pariggahaṇañcassa dhammatāvasena veditabbaṃ. Tathā hi purimabuddhānampi tattakameva jātikhettaṃ ahosi. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ‘‘dasasahassī lokadhātu nissaddā hoti nirākulā…pe… mahāsamuddo ābhujati, dasasahassī pakampatī’’ti ca ādi. Udakapariyantaṃ katvā chappakārappavedhanena. Avītarāge bhiṃsetīti bhiṃsano, so eva ^b^bhiṃsanako^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘bhayajanako’’^eb^ti. ^b^Devabheriyo^eb^ti devadundubhisaddassa pariyāyavacanamattaṃ, na cettha kāci bherī devadundubhīti adhippetā, atha kho uppātabhāvena labbhamāno ākāsato nigghosasaddo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘devo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Devo^eb^ti megho. Tassa hi tadā acchabhāvena ākāsassa vassābhāvena sukkhagajjitasaññite ^a^M2.0509^ea^ sadde niccharante devadundubhisamaññā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajjī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Pītivegavissaṭṭha^eb^nti ‘‘evaṃ ciratarakālaṃ vahito ayaṃ attabhāvasaññito dukkhabhāro, dāni na cirasseva nikkhipissāmī’’ti sañjātasomanasso bhagavā sabhāveneva pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udāneti, evaṃ udānentena ayampi attho sādhito hotīti dassanatthaṃ aṭṭhakathāyaṃ ^b^‘‘kasmā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]Tulīyatīti ^b^tula^eb^nti tula-saddo kammasādhanoti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tulita’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Appānubhāvatāya ^b^paricchinnaṃ^eb^. Tathā hi taṃ paṭipakkhena parito khaṇḍitabhāvena parittanti vuccati. Paṭipakkhavikkhambhanato dīghasantānatāya vipulaphalatāya ca ^b^na tulaṃ na paricchinnaṃ^eb^. Yehi kāraṇehi pubbe avisesato ‘‘mahaggataṃ atula’’nti vuttaṃ, tāni kāraṇāni rūpāvacarato āruppassa sātisayaṃ vijjantīti ^b^arūpāvacaraṃ atula^eb^nti vuttaṃ, itarañca tulanti. ^b^Appavipāka^eb^nti tīsupi kammesu yaṃ appavipākaṃ hīnaṃ, taṃ tulaṃ. ^b^Bahuvipāka^eb^nti yaṃ mahāvipākaṃ paṇītaṃ, taṃ atulaṃ. Yaṃ panettha majjhimaṃ, taṃ hīnaṃ ukkaṭṭhanti dvidhā bhinditvā dvīsu bhāgesu pakkhipitabbaṃ. Hīnattikavaṇṇanāyaṃ vuttanayeneva appabahuvipākataṃ niddhāretvā tassa vasena tulātulabhāvo veditabbo. Sambhavati etasmāti ^b^sambhavo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘sambhava^ hetubhūta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Niyakajjhattarato^eb^ti sasantānadhammesu vipassanāvasena gocarāsevanāya ca rato. Savipākaṃ samānaṃ pavattivipākamattadāyikammaṃ savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ, na ca taṃ kāmādi^ bhavābhisaṅkhārakanti tato visesanatthaṃ sambhavanti vatvā ^b^‘‘bhavasaṅkhāra’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ossajī^eb^ti ariyamaggena avassaji. ^b^Kavacaṃ viya^eb^ attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ attani sambhūtattā ^b^attasambhavaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0211^ea^^b^kilesañca^eb^ abhindīti kilesabhedasahabhāvikammossajjanaṃ dassento tadubhayassa kāraṇamāha ^b^‘‘ajjhattarato samāhito’’^eb^ti.

[03]Paṭhamavikappe avasajjanameva vuttaṃ. Ettha avasajjanākāroti taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘atha vā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha ^b^tīrento^eb^ti ‘‘uppādo bhayaṃ, anuppādo khema’’ntiādinā vīmaṃsanto. ^b^Tulento tīrento^eb^tiādinā saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vitthārato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘pañcakkhandhā’’^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā bhavasaṅkhārassa avasajjanākāraṃ sarūpato dasseti. ^b^Eva^eb^ntiādinā ^a^M2.0510^ea^ pana udānagāthāvaṇṇanāyaṃ ādito vuttamatthaṃ nigamanavasena dasseti. ^b^Abhītabhāvañāpanatthañcā^eb^ti ayampi attho saṅgahitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
[06]Cāpālavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^823-824^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Parato^eb^ imasmiṃ pāsādakampanavagge dasamasutte ^b^āvi bhavissanti. Chābhiññāpādakā^eb^ti channaṃ abhiññānaṃ pādakabhūtā padhānabhūtā. Yathā paṭhamasutte, tathā dutiyatatiyasuttesupi ca chābhiññāpādakā iddhipādā kathitāti attho.

[03]^b^825^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yo samādhissa nissayabhūto chando, so idhādhippetoti āha ^b^‘‘chandanti kattukamyatāchanda’’^eb^nti. Tassa ca adhipateyyaṭṭho nissayaṭṭho, na vinā taṃ chandaṃ nissāyāti āha – ^b^‘‘nissāyāti nissayaṃ katvā, adhipatiṃ katvāti attho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Padhānabhūtā^eb^ti seṭṭhabhūtā, seṭṭhabhāvo ca ekassapi catukiccasādhanavasena pavattiyā, tato eva bahuvacananiddeso, padhānasaṅkhāraṭṭhena padhānasaṅkharaṇato. ‘‘Chandaṃ ce nissāya…pe… ayaṃ vuccati chandasamādhī’’ti imāya pāḷiyā chandādhipati samādhi ^b^chandasamādhī^eb^ti adhipatisaddalopaṃ katvā samāso vuttoti viññāyati, adhipatisaddatthadassanavasena vā chandahetuko, chandādhiko vā samādhi ^b^chandasamādhi^eb^. Tena ‘‘chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi padhānabhūtasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgatā’’ti vakkhati, taṃ ānetvā ^a^V2.0212^ea^ sambandho. ^b^Padhānabhūtā^eb^ti vīriyabhūtā. Keci vadanti – ‘‘saṅkhatasaṅkhārādinivattanatthaṃ padhānaggahaṇa’’nti. Atha vā taṃ taṃ visesaṃ saṅkharotīti ^b^saṅkhāro,^eb^ sabbampi vīriyaṃ. Tattha catukiccasādhakato tadaññassa nivattanatthaṃ ^b^padhāna^eb^ggahaṇanti. Yathā chando chandasamādhinā ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato, evaṃ chandasamādhi chandena ceva padhānasaṅkhārehi ca samannāgato. Padhānasaṅkhārāpi chandena ^a^M2.0511^ea^ ceva chandasamādhinā ca samannāgatāti tīsupi padesu samannāgatasaddo yojetabbo. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti yasmā tayopi chandādayo ekacittuppādapariyāpannā, tasmā sabbe te dhammā ekato katvā ‘‘ayaṃ vuccati…pe… iddhipādo’’ti vuttanti. Evaṃ chandādīnaṃyeva cettha iddhipādabhāvo vutto, vibhaṅge pana tesaṃ iddhibhāvo sampayuttānaṃ iddhipādabhāvo vuttoti dassento ^b^‘‘iddhipādavibhaṅge panā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]Idāni nesaṃ iddhipādatāpi sambhavatīti dassento ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Tattha chandañhi bhāvayato padhānaṃ katvā bhāventassa tathā pavattapubbābhisaṅkhāravasena ijjhamāno chando ^b^iddhi^eb^ nāma, tassa nissayabhūtā padhānasaṅkhārā ^b^iddhipādo^eb^ nāma. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo. Tathā bhāvayantassa mukhyatāmattaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ, ijjhanattho pana sabbesaṃ samānanti dassento ^b^‘‘sampayutta…pe… ijjhantiyevā’’^eb^ti āha.

[03]Iddhipāde asaṅkarato dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘apicā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha ^b^chandādayo^eb^ti chandasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārā. ^b^Sesiddhipādesū^eb^ti vīriyiddhipādādīsu. Tattha vīriyasamādhipadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgatoti dvikkhattuṃ vīriyaṃ āgataṃ, tattha purimaṃ samādhivisesaṃ, vīriyādhipatisamādhi eva vīriyasamādhīti dutiyaṃ samannāgamaṅgadassanaṃ. Dveyeva hi sabbattha samannāgamaṅgāni samādhi padhānasaṅkhāro ca, chandādayo samādhivisesanāni, padhānasaṅkhāro pana padhānavacaneneva visesito, na chandādīhīti na idha vīriyādhipatitā padhānasaṅkhārassa vuttā hoti. Vīriyañca samādhiṃ visesetvā ṭhitameva samannāgamaṅgavasena padhānasaṅkhāravacanena vuttanti nāpi dvīhi vīriyehi samannāgamo vutto hoti. Yasmā pana chandādīhi visiṭṭho samādhi, tathāpi visiṭṭheneva ca tena sampayutto padhānasaṅkhāro sesadhammā ca, tasmā samādhivisesanānaṃ vasena cattāro iddhipādā vuttā, visesanabhāvo ca chandādīnaṃ taṃtaṃavassayadassanavasena hotīti ‘‘chandasamādhi…pe… iddhipādo’’ti ettha nissayatthepi pāda-sadde upādāyaṭṭhena chandādīnaṃ iddhipādatā vuttā hoti, teneva ^b^abhidhamme uttaracūḷabhājaniye^eb^ ‘‘cattāro iddhipādā chandiddhipādo’’tiādinā (vibha. 457) chandādīnaṃyeva iddhipādatā vuttā, pañhapucchake ca – ‘‘cattāro iddhipādā idha bhikkhu chandasamādhī’’tiādināva (vibha. 431) uddesaṃ katvāpi puna ^a^V2.0213^ea^ chandādīnaṃyeva kusalādibhāvo ^a^M2.0512^ea^ vibhatto. Upāyiddhipādadassanatthameva hi nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ, aññathā catubbidhatā na hotīti ayamettha pāḷivasena atthavinicchayo. Tattha ^b^upāyiddhipādadassanatthamevā^eb^ti chandādike dhure jeṭṭhake pubbaṅgame katvā nibbattitasamādhi chandādhipatisamādhīti chandādīnaṃ iddhiyā adhigamūpāyadassanaṃ upāyiddhipādadassanaṃ, tadatthameva ‘‘tathābhūtassa vedanākkhandho…pe… viññāṇakkhandho’’ti tattha tattha pāḷiyaṃ nissayiddhipādadassanaṃ kataṃ chandādivisiṭṭhānaṃyeva vedanākkhandhādīnaṃ adhippetattā. Evañcetaṃ sampaṭicchitabbaṃ, aññathā kevalaṃ iddhisampayuttānaṃyeva khandhānaṃ vasena iddhipādabhāve gayhamāne tesaṃ catubbidhatā na hoti visesakāraṇabhāvatoti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Kecī^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsino. ^b^Anibbatto^eb^ti hetupaccayehi na nibbatto, na sabhāvadhammo, paññattimattanti adhippāyo. Vādamaddanatthāya hoti, abhidhamme ca āgato uttaracūḷavāroti yojanā. ^b^Cattāro iddhipādā^eb^tiādi uttaracūḷavāradassanaṃ. Ime pana uttaracūḷavāre āgatā iddhipādā.

[03]Raṭṭhapālatthero chande sati kathaṃ nānujānissantīti sattāhāni bhattāni abhuñjitvā mātāpitaro anujānāpetvā pabbajitvā chandameva nissāya arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti āha – ^b^‘‘raṭṭhapālatthero chandaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Soṇatthero^eb^ti sukhumālasoṇatthero. So hi āyasmā attano sukhumālabhāvaṃ acintetvā ativelaṃ caṅkamanena pādesu uṭṭhitesupi ussāhaṃ avissajjento vīriyaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. ^b^Sambhutatthero^eb^ ‘‘cittavato ce alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso ijjheyya, mayhaṃ ijjheyyāti cittaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesi. Mogharājā ‘‘paññavato ce maggabhāvanā ijjheyya, mayhaṃ ijjheyyā’’ti paññāpubbaṅgamaṃ paññādhuraṃ paññājeṭṭhakaṃ katvā arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti āha ^b^‘‘mogharājā vīmaṃsaṃ dhuraṃ katvā lokuttaradhammaṃ nibbattesī’’^eb^ti. Idāni nesaṃ ariyānaṃ upaṭṭhānussāhamantajātisampadaṃ nissāya rañño santike laddhavisese amaccaputte nidassanabhāvena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘tattha yathā’’^eb^tiādimāha. Ettha ^a^M2.0513^ea^ ca punappunaṃ chanduppādanaṃ tosanaṃ viya hotīti chandassa upaṭṭhānasadisatā vuttā, thāmabhāvato ca vīriyassa sūrattasadisatā, cintanappadhānattā cittassa mantasaṃvidhānasadisatā, yonisomanasikāra-sambhūtesu kusaladhammesu paññā seṭṭhāti vīmaṃsāya jātisampattisadisatā vuttā.

[03]^b^826^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uddhaccapakatikā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0214^ea^ vikkhittasabhāvā, vibbhantacittāti attho. Anavaṭṭhitatāya vipphanditacittatāya ^b^vipphandamānacittā^eb^. Tucchatāya naḷo viyāti naḷo, māno, uggato naḷo etesanti ^b^unnaḷā^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘unnaḷāti…pe… vuttaṃ hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Capalā^eb^ti cāpalyatā nāma lolabhāvo. ^b^Murā^eb^ti kharavacanā, pharusavacanāti attho. ^b^Vikiṇṇavācā^eb^ nāma samphappalāpinoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘asaṃyatavacanā’’^eb^tiādi. Paṭipattidhamme pamuṭṭhā vinaṭṭhā paṭivinaṭṭhā sati etesanti ^b^muṭṭhasatī^eb^ti āha – ^b^‘‘naṭṭhassatino’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ubbhantacittā^eb^ti samādhino abhāvena uddhacceneva uparūpari bhantacittā. ^b^Pākatindriyā^eb^ abhāvitakāyatāya gāmadārakā viya pakatibhūtaindriyā. Nemo vuccati bhūmiyā baddhabhāvanimittapadeso, gambhīro nemo etassāti ^b^gambhīranemo. Suṭṭhu nikhāto^eb^tiādi tassa pādassa suppatiṭṭhitabhāvadassanaṃ.
[03]^b^827^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pahānattha^eb^nti anuppādapahānatthaṃ.
[03]^b^831^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhiññāpādakaṃ catutthajjhānaṃ adhippetaṃ^eb^ ‘‘iddhilābhāya pavattatī’’ti vacanato.
[03]^b^832^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chandaṃ uppādetvā^eb^ti bhāvanāchandaṃ uppādetvā. ^b^Līnākāro^eb^ti bhāvanācittassa layāpatti. ^b^Kosajjena^eb^ vokiṇṇāpajjanaṃ vuttaṃ.

[03]Evaṃ ^a^M2.0514^ea^ pasādābhāvena cittassa vikkhepāpatti, tattha pasāduppādanena yaṃ sampahaṃsanaṃ icchitabbaṃ, tassa uppādanākāraṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘so buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe āvajjetvā’’^eb^tiādi. Vatthukāme ārabbha vikkhitto punappunaṃ vikkhitto hotiyevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anuvikkhitto’’^eb^ti. Uppathaṃ paṭipannassa cittassa daṇḍanaṭṭhena niggaṇhanaṭṭhena suttāni eva daṇḍoti ^b^suttadaṇḍo,^eb^ tena suttadaṇḍena ^a^V2.0215^ea^ cittaṃ tajjetvā. Pañcakāmaguṇe ārabbha pavatto cittavikkhepo punappunaṃ uppajjatevāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘anuvikkhitto anuvisaṭo’’^eb^ti.

[03]Purepacchābhāvo kammaṭṭhānassa manasikāravasena uggahavasena vāti tadubhayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘katha’’^eb^ntiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Atilīnādīsu catūsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti atilīnātipaggahitasaṃkhittānuvikkhittasaññitesu catūsu ṭhānesu. Tattha bhāvanaṃ anajjhogāhetvāva saṅkoco ^b^atilīnatā,^eb^ ajjhogāhetvā anto saṅkoco ^b^saṃkhittatā,^eb^ antosaṅkhepo ^b^atipaggahitatā,^eb^ accāraddhavīriyatā ^b^anuvikkhittatā^eb^. Bahiddhā visamavitakkānubhāvanaṃ āpajjanto dvattiṃsākāravasena aṭṭhikasaññāvasena vā gahetabbanti āha – ^b^‘‘sarīravasena veditabba’’^eb^nti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘uddhaṃ pādatalā’’^eb^tiādi (dī. ni. 2.377; ma. ni. 1.110).

[03]Aññamaññaṃ asaṅkarato ākirīyanti pakārato ṭhapīyantīti ^b^ākārā,^eb^ bhāgāti āha – ^b^‘‘yehi ākārehīti yehi koṭṭhāsehī’’^eb^ti. Liṅgīyati sallakkhīyatīti ^b^liṅgaṃ,^eb^ saṇṭhānaṃ. Nimīyati niddhāretvā paricchindīyatīti ^b^nimittaṃ,^eb^ upaṭṭhānaṃ. ^b^Yo bhikkhū^eb^tiādi ālokasaññaṃ yo uggaṇhāti, taṃ dassanaṃ. ^b^Aṅgaṇe^eb^ti vivaṭaṅgaṇe. ^b^Ālokasaññaṃ manasikaroti^eb^ rattiyaṃ. ^b^Vīriyādīsupī^eb^ti yathā ‘‘idha bhikkhu chandaṃ uppādetvā’’ti chande vitthāranayo vutto, vīriyādīsupi eso eva vitthāranayo yojetabbo.
[06]Pāsādakampanavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^834^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Iminā catumahābhūtamayenā^eb^ti iminā sabbalokapaccakkhena catūhi mahābhūtehi nibbattena catumahābhūtamayena. Manomayo pana nimmitakāyo ^a^M2.0515^ea^ bhagavato rucivasena paresaṃ paccakkho hoti. ^b^Omātī^eb^ti avamāti. Ava-pubbo hi mā-saddo sattiatthopi hotīti ^b^‘‘pahoti sakkotī’’^eb^ti attho vutto. ^b^Asambhinnapada^eb^nti asādhāraṇapadaṃ aññattha anāgatattā. Kāyassa ^a^V2.0216^ea^ citte samodahanaṃ āropanaṃ tannissitatākaraṇañca atthato cittagatiyā pavattanamevāti āha ^b^‘‘cittagatiyā pesetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Tattha ^b^cittagatigamanaṃ^eb^ nāma cittavasena kāyassa pariṇāmanena ‘‘ayaṃ kāyo imaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū’’ti kāyassa cittena samānagatikatāṭhapanaṃ. Kathaṃ pana kāyo dandhapavattiko lahupavattinā cittena samānagatiko hotīti? Na sabbathā samānagatiko. Yatheva hi kāyavasena cittapariṇāmane cittaṃ sabbathā kāyena samānagatikaṃ na hoti. Na hi kadāci taṃ sabhāvasiddhena attano khaṇena avattitvā dandhavuttikassa rūpadhammassa vasena pavattituṃ sakkoti, ‘‘idaṃ cittaṃ ayaṃ kāyo viya hotū’’ti pana adhiṭṭhānena dandhagatikassa kāyassa anuvattanato yāva icchitaṭṭhānappatti, tāva kāyagatianulomeneva hutvā santānavasena pavattamānaṃ cittaṃ kāyagatiyā pariṇāmitaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ ‘‘ayaṃ kāyo idaṃ cittaṃ viya hotū’’ti adhiṭṭhānena pageva sukhalahusaññāya sampāditattā abhāvitiddhipādānaṃ viya dandhaṃ avattitvā yathā lahukaṃ katipayacittavāreneva icchitaṭṭhānappatti hoti, evaṃ pavattamāno kāyo cittagatiyā pariṇāmito nāma hoti, na ekacittakkhaṇeneva icchitaṭṭhānappattiyā, evañca katvā bāhāsamiñjanapasāraṇūpamāpi upacārena vinā suṭṭhutaraṃ yuttā hotīti. Aññathā dhammatāvilomatā siyā, nāpi dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ iddhibalena kātuṃ sakkā, bhāvaññathattameva pana kātuṃ sakkāti.
[03]^b^835-842^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Dvinnaṃ phalāna’’nti āgatasuttaṃ sandhāya ^b^‘‘dve phalāni ādiṃ katvā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Ayoguḷavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Iddhipādasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^899-900^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Chattiṃsāya^eb^^a^M2.0516^ea^^a^V2.0217^ea^^b^ṭhānesū^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ kāye samudayadhammānupassī, vayo, samudayavayo, bahiddhā samudayo, vayo, samudayavayo, ajjhattabahiddhā samudayo, vayo, samudayavayadhammānupassīti nava anupassanā, tathā vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṃ chattiṃsāya ṭhānesu. ^b^Dutiye dvādasasu ṭhānesū^eb^ti kāye ajjhattaṃ bahiddhā ajjhattabahiddhā, vedanāya citte dhammesūti evaṃ dvādasasu ṭhānesu.

[03]^b^901^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Imāya pāḷiyā^eb^ti imāya hīnattikapāḷiyā. ^b^Ime dhammā hīnā^eb^ lāmakaṭṭhena. ^b^Ime dhammā majjhimā^eb^ hīnapaṇītānaṃ majjhe bhavāti. Uttamaṭṭhena attappakaṭṭhena padhānabhāvaṃ nītāti ^b^paṇītā^eb^.

[03]^b^902-905^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kaṇḍakā etissā atthīti ^b^kaṇḍakī,^eb^ karamandagaccho. Osadhibhāvāpekkhāya itthiliṅganiddeso, tabbahulatāya taṃ vanaṃ ‘‘kaṇḍakīvana’’nteva paññāyittha. ^b^Sahassaloka^eb^nti sahassacakkavāḷalokaṃ. ^b^Dasacakkavāḷasahassaṃ ekāvajjanassa āpāthaṃ āgacchati^eb^ tathā ālokavaḍḍhanassa katattā.
[03]^b^907^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Arahattabhāvadīpaka^eb^nti ^a^V2.0218^ea^ arahattassa atthibhāvadīpakaṃ. ‘‘Arahattabhāvadīpika’’nti vā pāṭho.
[06]Rahogatavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^909-922^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dasabalañāṇa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0517^ea^ dasavidhabalañāṇaṃ. ^b^Ekadesenā^eb^ti padesavasena. Sāvakānampi attano abhinīhārānurūpaṃ ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti te kālapadesavasena ceva yathāparicayasattapadesavasena ca ṭhānānīti jānanti, sammāsambuddhānaṃ pana anantañāṇatāya sabbattheva appaṭihatameva ñāṇanti āha – ^b^‘‘sabbaññubuddhānaṃ panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ dasabalañāṇaṃ anantavisayattā ^b^nippadesaṃ^eb^ anūnatāya ^b^sabbākāraparipūraṃ^eb^.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Anuruddhasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^923^eb^^b^.^eb^ Jhānasaṃyuttaṃ ^a^V2.0219^ea^ suviññeyyameva, missakanti vadanti.
[06]Jhānasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^977^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Etthā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0518^ea^^a^V2.0220^ea^ etasmiṃ paṭhamasutte. ^b^Vuttameva,^eb^ tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva veditabbanti adhippāyo.

[03]^b^982^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^No^eb^-saddo pucchāyaṃ, tasmā nūti iminā samānatthoti āha ^b^‘‘bhāvetha nū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Kāmacchando^eb^ti vatthukāmesu icchāti āha ^b^‘‘pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Dvādasasu āyatanadhammesu^eb^ saparasantatipariyāpannesu. ^b^Iminā^eb^ kāmacchandappahānakittanena paṭighasaññāpaṭivinayakittanena ca ^b^anāgāmimaggaṃ katheti^eb^ pañcorambhāgiyasaññojanasamucchedassa byākatattā. ^b^Vipassanaṃ dassento^eb^ti ‘‘vipassanaṃ anuyuñjathā’’ti dassento.

[03]^b^984^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Neva kāyopi kilamati na cakkhūnī’’ti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ paduddhāro kato. ^b^‘‘Kāyopi kilamati, cakkhūnipi vihaññantī’’^eb^ti vatvā yattha yathā hoti, tāni dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘dhātukammaṭṭhānasmiṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Cakkhūni phandanti kilamantī^eb^tiādi ativelaṃ upanijjhāyane hotīti katvā vuttaṃ. ^b^Imasmiṃ pana kammaṭṭhāne^eb^ti ānāpānakammaṭṭhāne. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘bhikkhu cepi ākaṅkheyya, neva kāyo kilameyyā’’ti evamāha.

[03]^b^Labbhatī^eb^ti aṭṭhakathādhippāye ṭhatvā vuttaṃ, parato āgatena theravādena so anicchito. Na ^a^V2.0221^ea^ hi tārakarūpamuttāvaḷikādisadisaṃ nimittūpaṭṭhānākāramattaṃ khaṇamattaṭṭhāyinaṃ kasiṇanimittesu viya ugghāṭanaṃ kātuṃ sakkoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na labbhatevā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ānisaṃsadassanatthaṃ gahito,^eb^ ānāpānassatisamādhismiṃ siddhe ayaṃ guṇo sukheneva ijjhatīti. ^b^Yasmā bhikkhūti imasmiṃ vāre nāgata^eb^nti yathā purimavāre ‘‘bhikkhu cepi ākaṅkheyyā’’ti ^a^M2.0519^ea^ āgataṃ, evaṃ idha ‘‘bhāvite kho, bhikkhave, ānāpānassatisamādhimhī’’ti āgatavāre bhikkhuggahaṇamakataṃ, tasmā ‘‘so’’ti na vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^985^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pākāraparikkhepavaḍḍhanenā^eb^ti pākāraparikkhepena bhūmiyā vaḍḍhanena. Rājagahasāvatthiyo viya ^b^idampi ca nagaraṃ…pe… sabbākāravepullataṃ pattaṃ. Anekapariyāyenā^eb^ti ettha ^b^pariyāya^eb^saddo kāraṇavacanoti āha ^b^‘‘anekehi kāraṇehī’’^eb^ti, ayaṃ kāyo aviññāṇakopi saviññāṇakopi evampi asubho evampi asubhoti nānāvidhehi kāraṇehīti attho. ^b^Asubhākārasandassanappavatta^eb^nti kesādivasena tatthāpi vaṇṇādito asubhākārassa sabbaso dassanavasena pavattaṃ. ^b^Kāyavicchandanīyakatha^eb^nti attano parassa ca karajakāye vicchandanuppādanakathaṃ. ^b^Muttaṃ vā^eb^tiādinā byatirekamukhena kāyassa amanuññataṃ dasseti. Tattha ādito tīhi padehi adassanīyatāya asārakatāya ca, majjhe catūhi duggandhatāya, ante ekena lesamattenapi manuññatābhāvamassa dasseti. ^b^Atha kho^eb^tiādinā anvayato sarūpeneva amanuññatāya dassanaṃ. ^b^‘‘Kesalomādī’’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vibhāgena dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yepī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Vaṇṇento^eb^ti vitthārento. ^b^Asubhāyā^eb^ti asubhamātikāya. ^b^Phātikamma^eb^nti bahulīkāro. Kilesacorehi anabhibhavanīyattā jhānaṃ ^b^‘‘cittamañjūsa’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. ^b^Nissāyā^eb^ti pādakaṃ katvā.

[03]Apare pana ‘‘tasmiṃ kira addhamāse na koci buddhaveneyyo ahosi, tasmā bhagavā evamāha – ‘icchāmahaṃ, bhikkhave’tiādī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Pare kirā^eb^ti ^b^kira^eb^-saddo arucisaṃsūcanattho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘idaṃ pana icchāmatta’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Anekakāraṇasammisso^eb^ti ettha kāraṇaṃ nāma kāyassa asuciduggandhajegucchapaṭikūlatāva. ^b^Sabbamakaṃsū^eb^ti puthujjanā nāma sāvajjepi tattha anavajjasaññino hutvā karaṇakārāpanasamanuññatābhedaṃ ^a^V2.0222^ea^ sabbaṃ pāpaṃ akaṃsu ^a^M2.0520^ea^. Kāmaṃ dasānussatiggahaṇeneva ānāpānassati gahitā, sā pana tattha sannipatitabhikkhūsu bahūnaṃ sappāyā sātthikā ca, tasmā puna gahitā. Tathā hi bhagavā tameva kammaṭṭhānaṃ imasmiṃ sutte kathesi. Āhāre paṭikūlasaññā asubhakammaṭṭhānasadisā, cattāro pana āruppā ādikammikānaṃ ayogyāti tesaṃ idha aggahaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Vesāliṃ upanissāyā^eb^ti vesālīnagaraṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvā. ^b^Muhuttenevā^eb^ti satthari saddhamme ca gāravena upagatabhikkhūnaṃ vacanasamanantarameva uṭṭhahiṃsūti katvā vuttaṃ. Buddhakāle kira bhikkhū bhagavato sandesaṃ sirasā sampaṭicchituṃ ohitasotā viharanti.

[03]^b^Ānāpānapariggāhikāyā^eb^ti assāsapassāse pariggaṇhanavasena pavattāya satiyā. ^b^Sampayutto samādhī^eb^ti tāya sampayuttāññamaññapaccayabhūtāya uppanno samādhi. ^b^Ānāpānassatiyaṃ vā samādhī^eb^ti iminā upanissayapaccayasabhāvampi dasseti, ubhayatthāpi sahajātādīnaṃ sattannampi paccayānaṃ vasena paccayabhāvaṃ dasseti. ‘‘Yathāpaṭipannā me sāvakā cattāro satipaṭṭhāne bhāventī’’tiādīsu uppādanavaḍḍhanaṭṭhena bhāvanāti vuccatīti tadubhayavasena atthaṃ dassento ^b^‘‘bhāvitoti uppādito vaḍḍhito vā’’^eb^ti āha. Tattha bhāvaṃ vijjamānataṃ ito gatoti ^b^bhāvito,^eb^ uppādito paṭiladdhamattoti attho. Uppanno pana laddhāsevano ^b^bhāvito,^eb^ paguṇabhāvaṃ āpādito vaḍḍhitoti attho. ^b^Bahulīkato^eb^ti bahulaṃ pavattito. Tena āvajjanādivasībhāvappattimāha. Yo hi vasībhāvamāpādito, so icchiticchitakkhaṇe samāpajjitabbato punappunaṃ pavattissati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘punappunaṃ kato’’^eb^ti. Yathā ‘‘idheva, bhikkhave, samaṇo (ma. ni. 1.139; a. ni. 4.241), vivicceva kāmehī’’ti (dī. ni. 1.226; ma. ni. 1.271; saṃ. ni. 2.152; a. ni. 4.123) ca evamādīsu paṭhamapade vutto eva-saddo dutiyādīsupi vuttoyeva hoti, evamidhāpīti āha ^b^‘‘ubhayattha evasaddena niyamo veditabbo’’^eb^ti. Ubhayattha niyamena laddhaguṇaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ayaṃ hī’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Asubhakammaṭṭhāna^eb^nti asubhārammaṇaṃ jhānamāha. Tañhi asubhesu yogakammabhāvato yogino sukhavisesānaṃ kāraṇabhāvato ca ^b^‘‘asubhakammaṭṭhāna’’^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Kevala^eb^nti iminā ārammaṇaṃ nivatteti. ^b^Paṭivedhavasenā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0521^ea^ jhānapaṭivedhavasena. Jhānañhi bhāvanāvisesena ijjhantaṃ attano visayaṃ paṭivijjhantameva pavattati yathāsabhāvato paṭivijjhiyati cāti paṭivedhoti vuccati. ^b^Oḷārikārammaṇattā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0223^ea^ bībhacchārammaṇattā. ^b^Paṭikūlārammaṇattā^eb^ti jigucchitabbārammaṇattā. ^b^Pariyāyenā^eb^ti kāraṇena, lesantarena vā. ^b^Ārammaṇasantatāyā^eb^ti anukkamena vicitabbataṃ pattārammaṇassa paramasukhumataṃ sandhāyāha. Santehi sannisinne ārammaṇe pavattamāno dhammo sayampi sannisinnova hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘santo vūpasanto nibbuto’’^eb^ti, nibbutasabbapariḷāhoti attho. Ārammaṇasantatāya tadārammaṇānaṃ dhammānaṃ ^b^santatā^eb^ lokuttaradhammārammaṇāhi paccavekkhaṇāhi veditabbā.

[03]Nāssa santapaṇītabhāvāvahaṃ kiñci secananti ^b^asecanako^eb^. Asecanakattā ^b^anāsittako,^eb^ anāsittakattā eva ^b^abbokiṇṇo,^eb^ asammisso parikammādinā. Tato eva ^b^pāṭiyekko^eb^ visuṃyeveko. ^b^Āveṇiko^eb^ asādhāraṇo. Sabbametaṃ sarasato eva santabhāvaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ, parikammaṃ vā santabhāvanimittaṃ. ^b^Parikamma^eb^nti ca kasiṇakaraṇādinimittuppādapariyosānaṃ, tādisaṃ ettha natthīti adhippāyo. Tadā hi kammaṭṭhānaṃ nirassādattā asantaṃ appaṇītaṃ siyā. Upacāre vā natthi ettha santatāti yojanā. Yathā upacārakkhaṇe nīvaraṇādivigamena aṅgapātubhāvena ca paresaṃ santatā hoti, na evamimassa. Ayaṃ pana ādisamannā…pe… paṇīto cāti yojanā. ^b^Kecī^eb^ti uttaravihāravāsino. ^b^Anāsittako^eb^ti upasecanena anāsittako. Tenāha – ^b^‘‘ojavanto’’^eb^ti ojavantasadisoti attho. ^b^Madhuro^eb^ti iṭṭho. Cetasikasukhapaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ tikacatukkajjhānavasena, upekkhāya vā santabhāvena sukhagatikattā sabbesampi jhānānaṃ vasena veditabbaṃ. Jhānasamuṭṭhānapaṇītarūpaphuṭṭhasarīratāvasena pana kāyikasukhapaṭilābhasaṃvattanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, tañca kho jhānato vuṭṭhitakāle. Imasmiṃ pakkhe ^b^‘‘appitappitakkhaṇe’’^eb^ti idaṃ hetumhi bhummavacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Avikkhambhite^eb^ti jhānena sakasantānato anīhate appahīne. ^b^Akosallasambhūte^eb^ti akosallaṃ vuccati avijjā, tato sambhūte. Avijjāpubbaṅgamā hi sabbe pāpadhammā. ^b^Khaṇenevā^eb^ti attano pavattikkhaṇeneva. ^b^Antaradhāpetī^eb^ti ettha antaradhāpanaṃ vināsanaṃ, taṃ pana jhānakattukaṃ ^a^M2.0522^ea^ idhādhippetanti pariyuṭṭhānappahānaṃ hotīti āha – ^b^‘‘vikkhambhetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Vūpasametī^eb^ti visesena upasameti. Visesena upasamanaṃ pana sammadeva upasamanaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘suṭṭhu upasametī’’^eb^ti. Sāsanikassa jhānabhāvanā yebhuyyena nibbedhabhāgiyā hotīti āha ^b^‘‘nibbedhabhāgiyattā’’^eb^ti. Ariyamaggassa pādakabhūto ayaṃ samādhi anukkamena vaḍḍhitvā ariyamaggabhāvaṃ upagato viya hotīti āha ^b^‘‘anupubbena ariyamaggavuḍḍhippatto’’^eb^ti. Ayaṃ panattho virāganirodhapaṭinissaggānupassanānaṃ vasena sammadeva yujjati. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.

[03]^b^986^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Thero^eb^ti ^a^V2.0224^ea^ ānandatthero. ^b^Ayaṃ desanā^eb^ti ‘‘kathaṃ vibhāvito nu kho kimilā’’tiādinā pavattā desanā. ^b^Kāyaññatara^eb^nti rūpakāye aññatarakoṭṭhāse. ^b^Eva^eb^nti yathā ānāpānaṃ anussaranto bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī jāto, evaṃ sabbattha vāresu vedanānupassītiādi attho veditabbo.

[03]^b^Desanāsīsa^eb^nti desanāpadesaṃ. Manasikārapadesena vedanā vuttāti taṃ sabbaṃ sarūpato aññāpadesato apadisati. ^b^Yatheva hī^eb^tiādinā tattha nidassanaṃ dasseti. ^b^Cittasaṅkhārapadadvaye^eb^ti ‘‘cittasaṅkhārapaṭisaṃvedī passambhayaṃ cittasaṅkhāra’’nti etasmiṃ padadvaye.

[03]^b^Evaṃ santepī^eb^ti pītimanasikāracittasaṅkhārapadesena yadi vedanā vuttā, evaṃ santepi. ^b^Esā^eb^ yathāvuttā ^b^vedanā ārammaṇaṃ na hoti^eb^. Vedanārammaṇā ca anupassanā, ^b^tasmā vedanānupassanā na yujjati^eb^. Yadi evaṃ mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsu ‘‘vedanā vediyatī’’ti vuttaṃ, taṃ kathanti āha – ‘‘mahāsatipaṭṭhānādīsupī’’tiādi. Tattha ^b^sukhādīnaṃ vatthu^eb^nti sukhādīnaṃ uppattiyā vatthubhūtaṃ rūpasaddādiṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā vedanā vediyati, na puggalo puggalasseva abhāvato. ^b^Vedanāppavattiṃ upādāya^eb^ nissāya yathā ‘‘puggalo vedanaṃ vediyatī’’ti ^b^vohāramattaṃ hoti^eb^. Evaṃ idhāpi vedanāya assāsapassāse ārabbha pavatti, tathā pavattamanasikārasīsena ‘‘vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharatī’’ti vutto. ^b^Taṃ sandhāyā^eb^ti taṃ vedanāya ārammaṇabhāvaṃ sandhāya ^a^M2.0523^ea^. ^b^Ādīnaṃ^eb^ padānaṃ. ^b^Etassa^eb^ ‘‘vedanānupassanā na yujjatī’’ti vuttānuyogassa.

[03]^b^Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjatī^eb^ti pītisahagatāni paṭhamadutiyajjhānāni paṭipāṭiyā samāpajjati. ^b^Tassā^eb^ti tena. Paṭisaṃviditasaddāpekkhāya hi kattuatthe etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. ^b^Samāpattikkhaṇe^eb^ti samāpajjanakkhaṇe. ^b^Jhānapaṭilābhenā^eb^ti jhānena samaṅgībhāvena. ^b^Ārammaṇato^eb^ti ārammaṇamukhena tadārammaṇajhānapariyāpannā ^b^pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti,^eb^ ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattāti vuttaṃ hoti. Yathā nāma sappapariyesanaṃ carantena tassa āsaye paṭisaṃvidite sopi paṭisaṃvidito hoti mantāgadabalena tassa gahaṇassa sukarattā, evaṃ pītiyā āsayabhūte ārammaṇe paṭisaṃvidite sā pīti paṭisaṃviditāva hoti salakkhaṇato sāmaññalakkhaṇato ca tassā gahaṇassa sukarattā. ^b^Vipassanakkhaṇe^eb^ti vipassanāpaññāya tikkhavisadabhāvappattāya ^a^V2.0225^ea^ visayato dassanakkhaṇe. ^b^Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhenā^eb^ti pītiyā salakkhaṇassa sāmaññalakkhaṇassa ca paṭivijjhanena. Yañhi pītiyā visesato sāmaññato ca lakkhaṇaṃ, tasmiṃ vidite sā yāthāvato viditā eva hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘asammohato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Idāni tamatthaṃ pāḷiyā eva vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘vuttañheta’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^dīghaṃ assāsavasenā^eb^ti dīghassa assāsassa ārammaṇabhūtassa vasena. Pajānato sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hotīti sambandho. ^b^Cittassa ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato^eb^ti jhānapariyāpannaṃ ‘‘avikkhepo’’ti laddhanāmaṃ cittassekaggataṃ taṃsampayuttāya paññāya pajānato. Yathā hi ārammaṇamukhena pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti, evaṃ taṃsampayuttadhammāpi ārammaṇamukhena paṭisaṃviditā eva hontīti. ^b^Sati upaṭṭhitā hotī^eb^ti dīghaṃ assāsavasena jhānasampayuttā sati tasmiṃ ārammaṇe upaṭṭhitā ārammaṇamukhena jhānepi upaṭṭhitā nāma hoti. ^b^Tāya satiyā^eb^ti evaṃ upaṭṭhitāya tāya satiyā yathāvuttena tena ñāṇena suppaṭividitattā ārammaṇassa tassa vasena tadārammaṇā sā pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. ^b^Dīghaṃ passāsavasenā^eb^tiādīsupi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbānī’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Yathevā^eb^tiādīsu ^a^M2.0524^ea^ ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – jhānapaṭilābhena yathā ārammaṇato pītiādayo paṭisaṃviditā honti tena vinā tesaṃ appavattanato. Evaṃ jhānasampayuttena taṃpariyāpannena vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato vedanā paṭisaṃviditā hoti aruṇuggamena viya sūriyassa tena vinā vedanāya appavattanato.
