Tasmā vuttanayena atisayappavatti vedanā suppaṭividitā, tasmā suvuttametanti pubbe vuttacodanaṃ nirākaroti.

[03]^b^Ārammaṇe^eb^ti assāsapassāsanimittaṃ vadati. ^b^Cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti^eb^ asammohato cittassa paṭisaṃviditattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tasmā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Cittapaṭisaṃviditavasenā^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena itarā tissopi cittānupassanā saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^So^eb^ti dhammānupassanaṃ anuyutto bhikkhu. ^b^Yaṃ taṃ pahānaṃ^eb^ pahāyakañāṇaṃ. ^b^Paññāyā^eb^ti aparāya vipassanāpaññāya aniccavirāgādito disvā duvidhāyapi ajjhupekkhitā hoti. ^b^Idañhi catukka^eb^nti aniccānupassanādivasena vuttaṃ catukkaṃ. ^b^Tassāpi^eb^ dhammānupassanāya. Pajahatīti ^a^V2.0226^ea^^b^pahāna^eb^nti āha ^b^‘‘niccasaññaṃ…pe… pahānakarañāṇaṃ adhippeta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vipassanāparampara^eb^nti paṭipāṭiyā vipassanamāha. ^b^Pathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhatī^eb^ti majjhimāya paṭipattiyā sammadeva vīthipaṭipannaṃ bhāvanācittaṃ paggahaniggahānaṃ akaraṇena ajjhupekkhati. ^b^Ekato upaṭṭhāna^eb^nti yasmā majjhimasamathavīthinātivattiyā tattha ca pakkhandanena indriyānaṃ ekarasabhāvena, tatramajjhattatāya bhāvato avisesaṃ ekaggabhāvūpagamanena ekantato upaṭṭhāti, tasmā na tattha kiñci kātabbanti ajjhupekkhati. ^b^Tatthā^eb^ti evaṃ ajjhupekkhane. ^b^Sahajātānampi ajjhupekkhanā hoti^eb^ tesaṃ pavattanākārassa ajjhupekkhanato. ‘‘Paññāya disvā’’ti vuttattā ^b^ārammaṇājjhupekkhanā adhippetā^eb^. Na kevalaṃ nīvaraṇādidhamme ajjhupekkhitā, atha kho abhijjhā …pe… paññāya disvā ajjhupekkhitā hotīti yojanā.

[03]Paṃsupuñjaṭṭhāniyassa kilesassa uppattiṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ ^b^‘‘catumahāpatho viya cha āyatanāni’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Kāyādayo cattāro ārammaṇasatipaṭṭhānā. ^b^Catūsu ārammaṇesū^eb^ti kāyādīsu catūsu ārammaṇesu ^b^pavattā^eb^^a^M2.0525^ea^^b^cattāro satipaṭṭhānā^eb^ paṃsupuñjaṭṭhāniyassa kilesassa upahananato.
[06]Ekadhammavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^987-988^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kasmā^eb^tiādi vihārasamāpattiācikkhaṇe kāraṇaṃ vibhāvetuṃ āraddhaṃ.

[03]^b^Eva-vākāro^eb^ti eva-kāro vā-kāro ca. ^b^Ekantasantattā^eb^ ekantena santamanasikārabhāvato. Sekkhavacaneneva tesaṃ sikkhitabbassa atthibhāve siddhepi sikkhitabbarahitesu tesupi sekkhapariyāyassa vuccamānattā sikkhitabbasaddena sekkhe visesetvā vuttā. Āsavakkhayatthaṃ sikkhitabbassa abhāvepi diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāratthaṃ jhānādisikkhanena vinā sikkhitabbābhāvā ^b^‘‘asekkhā nāmā’’^eb^ti vuttā. Buddhānaṃ pana sabbaso sammadeva pariniṭṭhitasikkhattā ‘‘sikkhāmī’’ti na vuttaṃ. Ānāpānajjhānaphalasamāpatti ^b^tathāgatavihāro^eb^.

[03]^b^989-996^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Aniccādivasenā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0227^ea^ aniccadukkhānattavasena. ^b^Pavicinati^eb^ pakārehi vicinati. ^b^Nikkilesā^eb^ti apagatakilesā vikkhambhitakilesā. Pītisambojjhaṅgo, passaddhisambojjhaṅgoti pāṭho.
[03]Yāya anosakkanaṃ anativattanañca hoti, ayaṃ tatramajjhattupekkhā ^b^majjhattākāro^eb^ti vuttā. ^b^Ekacittakkhaṇikā^eb^ti ekacittuppādapariyāpannattā.

[03]Cattunnaṃ catukkānaṃ vasena ^b^soḷasakkhattukā^eb^. Ānāpānasannissayena pavattattā ārammaṇavasena pavattā ānāpānārammaṇāpi aparabhāge sati ānāpānassatīti pariyāyena vattabbataṃ arahatīti ^b^‘‘ānāpānassati missakā kathitā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Ānāpānamūlakā^eb^ti ānāpānasannissayena ^a^M2.0526^ea^ pavattā satipaṭṭhānā. ^b^Tesaṃ mūlabhūtā^eb^ti tesaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ mūlakāraṇabhūtā. ^b^Bojjhaṅgamūlakā^eb^ti bojjhaṅgapaccayabhūtā. ^b^Tepi bojjhaṅgā^eb^ti ete vīsati satipaṭṭhānahetukā bojjhaṅgā. ^b^Vijjāvimuttipūrakā^eb^ti tatiyavijjāya tassa phalassa ca paripūraṇavasena pavattā bojjhaṅgā. ^b^Phalasampayuttā^eb^ti catutthaphalasampayuttā, catubbidhaphalasampayuttā vā.
[06]Dutiyavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Ānāpānasaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^997^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Anuggahagarahaṇesu^eb^^a^M2.0527^ea^^a^V2.0228^ea^^b^nipāto^eb^ti anuggaṇhanagarahatthajotako nipāto. Kimettha anuggaṇhāti, kiṃ vā garahatīti āha ^b^‘‘catunna’’^eb^ntiādi. Tattha ^b^anuggaṇhanto^eb^ anucchavikaṃ katvā gaṇhanto. ^b^Garahanto^eb^ nindanto. Issarasīlo issaro, tassa bhāvo ^b^issariyaṃ,^eb^ pabhutā. Adhīnaṃ pati adhipati, tassa bhāvo ^b^ādhipaccaṃ,^eb^ sāmibhāvoti āha – ^b^‘‘issariyādhipacca’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Anantakānī^eb^ti antarahitāni.

[03]^b^Aveccappasādenā^eb^ti vatthuttayassa guṇe yāthāvato avecca pavisitvā pasādo. So pana kenaci calanarahitoti āha ^b^‘‘acalappasādenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Maggenā^eb^ti ariyamaggena. ^b^Āgatappasādo^eb^ tassa adhigamena laddhappasādo. ^b^Apubbaṃ acarima^eb^nti ekajjhaṃ. Ariyasāvakānañhi ariyamaggo uppajjantova tīsu vatthūsu aveccappasādaṃ āvahanto eva uppajjati. ^b^Tesa^eb^nti visayabhūtānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ vasena tidhā vutto. ^b^Yasmā ca^eb^ atthato ^b^eko, tasmāva ninnānākaraṇo hoti^eb^ pavattaṭṭhānabhede satipi. ^b^Ariyasāvakassa hī^eb^tiādinā nayena tamatthaṃ vivarati. ^b^Pasādo^eb^ okappanā. ^b^Pemaṃ^eb^ bhatti. ^b^Gāravaṃ^eb^ garukaraṇaṃ. ^b^Mahantaṃ^eb^ uḷāraṃ. ^b^Etaṃ^eb^ vibhāgena ^b^natthi^eb^ sabbattha samānattā.

[03]^b^Eva^eb^nti bhavantarepi akopanīyatāya. ^b^Sadisavasenā^eb^ti aññehi akhaṇḍādīhi sadisavasena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘mukhavaṭṭi yañhi chinne’’^eb^tiādi. Khaṇḍā etissā atthīti ^b^khaṇḍā^eb^. Esa nayo sesesupi. Pātimokkhe āgatānukkamena sīlassa ādimajjhavibhāgo veditabbo. ^b^Dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇaṃ vā^eb^ti sīlakoṭṭhāsānaṃ. ^b^Ekantaraṃ bhinna^eb^nti abhinnena ekantaraṃ hutvā bhinnaṃ. ^b^Tesaṃ^eb^ khaṇḍādīnaṃ. ‘‘Bhujissehī’’ti uttarapadalopena niddesoti āha ^b^‘‘bhujissabhāvakarehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Idaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0229^ea^^b^vītikkanta^eb^nti idampi sīlaṃ vītikkantaṃ. ‘‘Ayaṃ sīlassa vītikkamo’’ti ^b^evaṃ parāmasituṃ asakkuṇeyyehi^eb^.

[03]^b^998^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yesa^eb^nti ^a^M2.0528^ea^ aniyamato saddhādīnamādhārabhūtapuggaladassanaṃ. ^b^Buddhe pasādo gahito^eb^. So hi itarehi paṭhamaṃ gahetabboti. ^b^Ariyakantāni sīlāni gahitāni^eb^ sotāpannassa sīlānaṃ adhippetattā. ^b^Saṅghe pasādo gahito^eb^ dhammappasādassa anantaraṃ vuccamānattā. ^b^Dhamme pasādo gahito^eb^ aveccappasādabhāvato. Sotaṃ ariyamaggaṃ ādito patti sotāpatti, tassā aṅgāni ^b^sotāpattiyaṅgāni. Paccentī^eb^ti pajāyanti adhigacchanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘pāpuṇantī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Brahmacariya^eb^nti maggabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^Katarapasādo^eb^ vattamānoti adhippāyo. ^b^Maggappasādo^eb^ti maggasampayutto pasādo. ^b^Āgatamaggassā^eb^ti adhigatamaggassa. ^b^Missakappasādo eso^eb^ti tasmā ubhopi therā paṇḍitā bahussutā.

[03]^b^999^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yadaggena tasmiṃ upāsake yathāvuttāni sotāpattiyaṅgāni saṃvijjanti, tadaggena so tesu vattissatīti āha ^b^‘‘catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu sandissasī’’^eb^ti. Vijjaṃ bhajantīti ^b^vijjābhāgiyā,^eb^ tesu koṭṭhāsesu pariyāpannāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vijjābhāgiyeti vijjākoṭṭhāsike’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^1000-1001^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Sotāpattī’’ti paṭhamamaggo adhippeto, tassa adhigamūpāyo ^b^sotāpattiyaṅgaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sotāpattiyā pubbabhāgapaṭilābhaṅga’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sotāpattiatthāyā^eb^ti sotāpattimaggatthāya. ^b^Aṅga^eb^nti kāraṇaṃ. ^b^Itare^eb^ ratanattayappasādādayo. Pubbabhāgiyāya ^b^sotāpattiyā aṅgaṃ^eb^ kāraṇanti.

[03]^b^1002^eb^^b^.^eb^ (Vitānaṃ kāyānaṃ kālanakāya, kāraṇassa upagatānaṃ sātapariyā sijjhati. Tattha ^a^V2.0230^ea^ kāyaparipajjhāyamukhena tantiṃ ṭhapesi bhagavā. Na hi passatha namatthehi karaṇe niratthako piti vattati. ^b^‘‘Niyatattā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. Tameva niyamaṃ ^b^‘‘majjhimapadeseyevā’’^eb^ti avadhāraṇena vibhāveti ^a^M2.0529^ea^. Mahāmaṇḍalacārikaṃ carantopi majjhimapadesassa antanteneva carati. Tattha ca vineyyajanassa samosaraṇatā mattapanavācamahatthasupananti.) [Etthantare pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca, suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.] Aruṇuṭṭhāpanampi tattheva hoti. Paccantapadese pana dūre vineyyajanā honti, tattha gantvā maggaphalesu patiṭṭhāpetvā tato paccāgantvā majjhimapadese eva vāsaṃ upagacchati, tattha manussehi katānaṃ kārānaṃ mahapphalabhāvaniyamanatthanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ‘‘Āsanne no bhagavā’’ti idaṃ nidassanamattanti dassento ^b^‘‘na kevala’’^eb^nti ādimāha.
[03]^b^Sakiñcanasapalibodhanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti ettha kiñcanaṃ palibodho asamāpitakiccatā, tadubhayassa atthibhāvenāti attho. ^b^Mahāvāse^eb^ti mahāgehe.

[03]^b^Dvepi janā^eb^ti isidattapurāṇā. ^b^Sitaṃ^eb^ nāma mandahasitaṃ. ^b^Hasitaṃ^eb^ nāma vissaṭṭhahasitaṃ. ^b^Muttacāgo^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ^b^visuddhimaggaṭīkāyaṃ^eb^ (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.160) vuttanayena veditabbaṃ. ^b^Saṃvibhāge^eb^ti parassa dānavasena saṃvibhajane. ^b^Akatavibhāga^eb^nti deyyadhammavasena na katavibhāgaṃ. Puggalavasena pana ‘‘sīlavantehī’’ti vuttattā katavibhāgameva mahapphalatākaraṇena. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sabbaṃ dātabbameva hutvā ṭhita’’^eb^nti.
[03](Etthantare pāṭho asuddho dussodhanīyo ca, suddhapāṭho gavesitabbo.)

[03]^b^1003^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paveṇiāgatassā^eb^ti anekapurisayugavasena paramparāgatassa. ^b^Attani upanetabba^eb^nti attani netvā parasmiṃ upanetabbaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘yo kho myāyaṃ dhammo appiyo amanāpo, parassapeso dhammo appiyo amanāpo’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Amantabhāsenā^eb^ti samphassa samphappalāpassa amantāya mantārahitabhāsanena.

[03]^b^1004-5^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dve gāmā^eb^ dvinnaṃ ñātīnaṃ gāmāti katvā. ^b^Ñātike^eb^ti evaṃladdhanāme ekasmiṃ ^a^V2.0231^ea^ gāmake. ^b^Giñjakāvasathe^eb^ti giñjakā vuccanti iṭṭhakā, giñjakāhi eva kato āvasatho, tasmiṃ. So kira āvāso yathā ^a^M2.0530^ea^ sudhāhi parikammena payojanaṃ natthi, evaṃ iṭṭhakāhi eva cinitvā kato. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘iṭṭhakāmaye āvasathe’’^eb^ti. Tulāthambhadvārabandhakavāṭaphalakāni pana dārumayā eva. Oraṃ vuccati kāmadhātu, paccayabhāvena taṃ oraṃ bhajantīti ^b^orambhāgiyāni,^eb^ orambhāgassa vā hitāni ^b^orambhāgiyāni^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘heṭṭhābhāgiyāna’’^eb^ntiādi. ^b^Tīhi maggehī^eb^ti heṭṭhimehi tīhi maggehi. Tehi pahātabbatāya hi tesaṃ saññojanānaṃ orambhāgiyatā, oraṃ bhañjiyāni vā ^b^orambhāgiyāni^eb^ vuttāni niruttinayena. Idāni byatirekamukhena nesaṃ orambhāgiyabhāvaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘tatthā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Vikkhambhitāni samatthatāvighātena puthujjanānaṃ, samucchinnāni sabbaso abhāvena ariyānaṃ rūpārūpabhavūpapattiyā vibandhanāya na hontīti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘avikkhambhitāni maggena vā asamucchinnānī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nibbattivasenā^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena gantuṃ na denti. Mahaggatabhavagāmikammāyūhanassa vibandhanato ^b^sakkāyadiṭṭhiādīni tīṇi^eb^ saññojanāni kāmacchandabyāpādā viya mahaggatabhavūpapattiyā visesapaccayattā ^b^tattha^eb^ mahaggatabhave ^b^nibbattampi^eb^ tannibbattihetukammaparikkhaye kāmabhavūpapattipaccayatāya mahaggatabhavato ^b^ānetvā idheva^eb^ kāmabhave eva ^b^nibbattāpenti^eb^. Tasmā ^b^sabbānipi^eb^ pañcapi saṃyojanāni ^b^orambhāgiyāneva. Paṭisandhivasena anāgamanasabhāvo^eb^ti paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena tasmā lokā idha na āgamanasabhāvo. Buddhadassana-theradassana-dhammassavanānaṃ pana atthāya assa āgamanaṃ anivāritaṃ.

[03]Kadāci uppattiyā viraḷākāratā, pariyuṭṭhānamandatāya abahalatāti ^b^dvedhāpi tanubhāvo. Abhiṇha^eb^nti bahuso. ^b^Bahalabahalā^eb^ti tibbatibbā. Yattha uppajjanti, taṃ santānaṃ maddantā pharantā sādhentā andhakāraṃ karontā uppajjanti, dvīhi pana maggehi pahīnattā tanukatanukā mandamandā uppajjanti. ^b^Puttadhītaro hontī^eb^ti idaṃ akāraṇaṃ. Tathā hi aṅgapaccaṅgaparāmasanamattenapi te honti. ^b^Ida^eb^nti ‘‘rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā’’ti idaṃ vacanaṃ. ^b^Bhavatanukavasenā^eb^ti appakabhavavasena. ^b^Ta^eb^nti mahāsīvattherassa vacanaṃ paṭikkhittanti sambandho. Ye bhavā ariyānaṃ labbhanti, te paripuṇṇalakkhaṇabhavā eva. Ye na labbhanti, tattha kīdisaṃ taṃ bhavatanukaṃ. Tasmā ubhayathāpi bhavatanukassa asambhavo evāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘sotāpannassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aṭṭhame bhave bhavatanukaṃ natthi^eb^ aṭṭhamasseva bhavassa sabbasseva abhāvato. Sesesupi eseva nayo.

[03]^b^Kāmāvacaralokaṃ^eb^^a^M2.0531^ea^^b^sandhāya vuttaṃ^eb^ itarassa lokassa vasena tathā vattuṃ asakkuṇeyyattā. Yo hi ^a^V2.0232^ea^ sakadāgāmī devamanussalokesu vomissakavasena nibbattati, sopi kāmabhavavaseneva paricchinditabbo. Bhagavatā ca kāmaloke ṭhatvā – ‘‘sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā’’ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā^eb^ti ca iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito. Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṃ patvā idheva parinibbāyati, ekacco idha patvā devaloke parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā tattheva parinibbāyati, ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ime cattāro idha na labbhanti. Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṃ vasitvā puna idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati, ayamidha adhippeto. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘imaṃ lokanti kāmabhavo adhippeto’’ti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ ^b^‘‘sace hī’’^eb^tiādinā aññaṃyeva catukkaṃ dassitaṃ.

[03]^b^Catūsu…pe… sabhāvoti attho^eb^ apāyagamanīyānaṃ pāpadhammānaṃ sabbaso pahīnattā. ^b^Dhammaniyāmenā^eb^ti maggadhammaniyāmena ^b^niyato^eb^ uparimaggādhigamassa avassaṃbhāvibhāvato. Tenāha ‘‘sambodhiparāyaṇo’’ti. ^b^Tesaṃ tesaṃ ñāṇagati^eb^nti tesaṃ tesaṃ sattānaṃ ‘‘asuko sotāpanno, asuko sakadāgāmī’’tiādinā taṃtaṃñāṇādhigamanaṃ ñāṇūpapattiṃ. ^b^Ñāṇābhisamparāya^eb^nti tato parampi – ‘‘niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karissatī’’tiādinā ñāṇasahitaṃ upapattipaccayabhavaṃ. ^b^Olokentassa^eb^ ñāṇacakkhunā apekkhantassa. Kevalaṃ ^b^kāyakilamathova,^eb^ na tena kāci paresaṃ atthasiddhīti adhippāyo. ^b^Cittavihesā^eb^ cittakhedo, sā kilesūpasaṃhitattā ^b^buddhānaṃ natthi^eb^.

[03]Ādissati ālokīyati attā etenāti ādāsaṃ, dhammabhūtaṃ ādāsaṃ ^b^dhammādāsaṃ,^eb^ ariyamaggañāṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Tena hi ariyasāvako catūsu ariyasaccesu viddhastasammohattā attānaṃ yāthāvato ñatvā yāthāvato byākareyya, tappakāsanato pana dhammapariyāyassa suttassa dhammādāsatā veditabbāti. ^b^Yena dhammādāsenā^eb^ti idha pana maggadhammameva vadati. Sesaṃ uttānatthattā suviññeyyamevāti.
[06]Veḷudvāravaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1007^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dhammikattā ^a^V2.0233^ea^^a^M2.0532^ea^ desavāsīhi anukampito rājāti rājako, tassa ārāmo ^b^rājakārāmo,^eb^ tasmiṃ. ^b^Bhūmisīsaṃ^eb^ seṭṭhappadeso, yattha vasanto lābhaggayasaggappatto hotīti tesaṃ adhippāyo.

[03]^b^Vārāpehī^eb^ti paṭisedhehi. ^b^Yujjhāpetu^eb^nti kalahaṃ kārāpetuṃ. ^b^Puna āgacchantā^eb^ti aparasmiṃ saṃvacchare āgacchantā. ^b^Ubbaṭṭetvā^eb^ti mahatī vīciyo ubbaṭṭetvā. Yathā tassa sakalameva raṭṭhaṃ ekodakībhūtaṃ hoti, evaṃ katvā samuddameva jātaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘samuddameva akaṃsū’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^Isīnamantaraṃ katvā^eb^ti isīnaṃ kāraṇaṃ katvā, isīnaṃ hetūti attho, isīnaṃ vā antarabhedaṃ katvā. Tathā loke kolāhalassa patthaṭataṃ vibhāvento bhagavā ^b^‘‘me suta’’^eb^nti āha paccakkhato jānampi. ^b^Ucchinno^eb^ti kulacchedena ucchinno. Na kevalaṃ sayameva, atha kho ^b^saha raṭṭhehi. Vibhava^eb^nti vināsaṃ upagato.
[03]^b^Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vutta^eb^nti taṃ yathāvuttaṃ pasenadinā kosalarājena kāritaṃ vihāraṃ sandhāya etaṃ ‘‘rājakārāme’’ti vuttaṃ.
[03]^b^1008-9^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Udayagāmini^eb^nti ārambhato paṭṭhāya sampattiāvahaṃ.
[03]^b^1010^eb^^b^.^eb^ Duṭṭhā gati nipphatti duggati, duggatabhāvo dāliddiyaṃ, tadeva bhayaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ anavasesaṃ vā ^b^duggatibhayaṃ^eb^ daliddabhayaṃ. Sammadeva atikkantoti ^b^samatikkanto^eb^.

[03]^b^1012^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vohāramittā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0234^ea^ taṃtaṃdānaggahaṇavasena vohārakā mittā. ^b^Āmantanapaṭimantanairiyāpathādīsupī^eb^ti ālāpasallāpagamananisajjādiatthasaṃvidhānādīsu ^a^M2.0533^ea^. ^b^Ekato pavattakiccā^eb^ti saha pavattakattabbā. Amā saha bhavantīti ^b^amaccā^eb^. ‘‘Amhākaṃ ime’’ti ñāyantīti ^b^ñātī,^eb^ āvāhavivāhasambaddhā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sassusasurapakkhikā’’^eb^ti. Yonisambandhā vā ^b^sālohitā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhātibhaginimātulādayo’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^1013^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kismiñci kassaci ca tathā tathā uppannassa pasādassa aññathābhāvo ^b^pasādaññathattaṃ^eb^. Bhūtasaṅghātassa ghanāadikassa aññathābhāvo ^b^bhāvaññathattaṃ^eb^. Nirayādigatiantaraupapatti ^b^gatiaññathattaṃ^eb^. Sabhāvadhammānaṃ kakkhaḷaphusanādilakkhaṇassa aññathābhāvo ^b^lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ^eb^. ‘‘Ṭhitassa aññathattaṃ paññāyatī’’ti evaṃ vuttaṃ aññathattaṃ ^b^vipariṇāmaññathattaṃ^eb^. Lakkhaṇaññathattaṃ na labbhati. Tenāha ^b^‘‘lakkhaṇaṃ pana na vigacchatī’’^eb^ti, sesaṃ labbhatīti. ^b^Pathavīdhātuyā^eb^ti sasambhārapathavīdhātuyā. ^b^Āpodhātuyā^eb^ti etthāpi eseva nayo. ^b^Purimabhāvo^eb^ti ghanakaṭhinabhāvo. ^b^Bhāvaññathattaṃ^eb^ rasaññathattasabhāvo. ^b^Gatiaññathattaṃ^eb^ uggatūpapatti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘tañhi ariyasāvakassa natthī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Pasādaññathattampi natthiyeva^eb^ ariyasāvakassa.
[06]Rājakārāmavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1017-18^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samiddha^eb^nti sampuṇṇaṃ. ^b^Supupphita^eb^nti upasobhitatāya supupphitasadisattā. Byūhā nāma yehi eva pavisanti, tehi eva nikkhamanti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘byūhā vuccanti avinibbiddharacchāyo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Uddhatacārinā^eb^ti yaṭṭhantarā.

[03]^b^1019^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Tīhī^eb^ti ^a^V2.0235^ea^ ratanattaye uppannehi tīhi pasādadhammehi. ^b^Catūhī^eb^ti tehi eva saddhiṃ sīlena. ^b^Kocidevā^eb^tiādi parikappavasena vuttaṃ bhagavati ^a^M2.0534^ea^ attano saddhāya uḷāratamabhāvadassanatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhagavato sabbaññutāyā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dhammo samuppādo^eb^ti vivādadhammauppattihetu. Tadeva hi sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘kiñcideva kāraṇa’’^eb^nti. ^b^Kāraṇa^eb^nti nānākāraṇaṃ. ^b^Kalyāṇakusalavimutta^eb^nti akalyāṇaṃ akusalaṃ, tadidaṃ yathāvuttāppasādanena apanītātthadassanatthaṃ. ^b^Assā^eb^ti mahānāmasakkassa. ^b^Anavajjanadoso eso^eb^ti catūsu dhammesu ekenapi samannāgato sotāpanno hotīti anujānitvā catūhipi samannāgatena ācikkhitabbanti yāthāvato anavajjanadosoti attho.

[03]^b^1020^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pamāṇenā^eb^ti ekena pamāṇena, na sabbaso. ^b^Olokanaṃ khamantī^eb^ti dassanamaggena catusaccadhammā paccattaṃ passitabbā paṭivijjhitabbā. Paṭhamamaggakkhaṇe hi catusaccadhammā ekadesatova diṭṭhā nāma honti. ^b^‘‘Parimuccatī’’ti pana vattuṃ vaṭṭati^eb^ paṭivijjhanakiriyāya vattamānattā. ^b^Agantvā^eb^ apāyesu anuppattirahattā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na gacchatī’’^eb^ti, na uppajjatīti attho. ^b^Mahāsārarukkhe dassento āha^eb^ – ‘‘yo koci viññujātiko mama ce gocaraṃ gacchati, ekassa āgamanaṃ avañjhaṃ amogha’’nti dassetuṃ.

[03]^b^1021^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Dukkhettaṃ^eb^ nirojakaṃ, tāya eva dukkhettatāya visamaṃ hotīti āha ^b^‘‘visamakhetta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Loṇūpahata^eb^nti jātasabhāvena loṇena ūsarena upahataṃ. ^b^Khaṇḍānī^eb^ti khaṇḍitāni. ^b^Temetvā^eb^ti temitattā. ^b^Vātātapahatānī^eb^ti cirakālaṃ vātena ceva ātapena ca upahatāni ābādhitāni.

[03]^b^1022^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ṭhāna^eb^nti ṭhānaso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘khaṇenā’’^eb^ti. Niyyānikanti pavattaṃ ñāṇapaṭirūpakaṃ ^a^V2.0236^ea^ pakatipurisantarajānanādimicchāñāṇaṃ. Taṃ pana aniyyānikaṃ ‘‘niyyānika’’nti paccavekkhaṇavasena pavatteyyāti āha ^b^‘‘micchāpaccavekkhaṇenā’’^eb^ti. Guṇaviyuttassa attano sakattani avaṭṭhānasaṅkhātā vimutti ^b^micchāvimutti^eb^.
[03]^b^1023^eb^^b^.^eb^ Yathākammaṃ ^a^M2.0535^ea^ samparetabbato samparāyo, peccabhavo, samparāyahetukaṃ ^b^samparāyikaṃ,^eb^ maraṇabhayaṃ.
[06]Saraṇānivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^1027^eb^^b^.^eb^ Avicchedena niccappavattiyamānāni puññāni abhisandanaṭṭhena ^b^‘‘puññābhisandā’’^eb^ti vuttā, tena puññanadiyoti attho vutto. Sukhassa āharaṇato ānayanato ^b^sukhassāhāro^eb^.

[03]^b^1030^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Devāna^eb^nti visuddhidevānaṃ. ^b^Devapadānī^eb^ti tesaṃ padāni devapadāni, devoti vā sammāsambuddho. ^b^Devassa ñāṇena akkantapadānī^eb^ti paṭivedhañāṇena ceva desanāñāṇena ca akkantapadāni. ^b^Devā nāma^eb^ jātidevā. Tesampi devaṭṭhena devoti devadevo, sambuddho.

[03]^b^1034^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pāraṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ^eb^ saṃsāramahoghassa paratīrabhāvato. Tenāha – ‘‘tiṇṇo pāraṅgato, thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo (saṃ. ni. 4.238; itivu. 69; pu. pa. 188), ye ^a^V2.0237^ea^ janā pāragāmino’’ti (dha. pa. 85) ca. Atha vā pāti rakkhatīti ^b^pāraṃ,^eb^ nibbānaṃ. Yo paṭivijjhati, taṃ vaṭṭadukkhato pāti rakkhati, accantahitena ca vimuttisukhena ca rameti, tasmā ^b^pāra^eb^nti vuccati. ^b^Gacchamānā evā^eb^ti pāraṃ nibbānaṃ gacchamānā eva. Te dhammā ^b^āsavānaṃ khayāya saṃvattanti^eb^ sacchikiriyāpahānapaṭivedhānaṃ samakālattā.
[03]^b^1036^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Pavivekatthāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0536^ea^ pavivekasukhatthāya. ^b^Paṭisallānatthāyā^eb^ti bahiddhā nānārammaṇato cittaṃ paṭinivattetvā kammaṭṭhāne sammadeva līnatthāya.
[06]Puññābhisandavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1037^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Saṅkhyā atthi^eb^ heṭṭhā mahāpathaviyā, upari ākāsena, parito cakkavāḷapabbatena, majjhe tattha tattha ṭhitehi dīpapabbatapariyantehi paricchinnattā. Jānantena yojanato saṅkhātuṃ sakkāti adhippāyo. Mahāsarīramaccha-kumbhīla-yakkha-rakkhasa-mahānāgadānavādīnaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ, baḷavāmukhapātālādīnaṃ aviññāṇakānaṃ bheravārammaṇānaṃ vasena ^b^bahubheravaṃ^eb^.

[03]^b^1038^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sambhede^eb^ti sambhedaṃ samodhānaṃ gataṭṭhāne. ^b^Yatthimā mahānadiyo saṃsandanti samentī^eb^ti parikappavacanametaṃ. Tādisāsu hi mahānadīsu kāci puratthimasamuddaṃ paviṭṭhā, kāci pacchimaṃ.

[03]^b^1039^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Kusale ^a^V2.0238^ea^ patiṭṭhito’’ti ettha yaṃ accantikaṃ kusale patiṭṭhānaṃ. Taṃ dassento ^b^‘‘maggakusale patiṭṭhito’’^eb^ti āha, heṭṭhimamaggakusaleti adhippāyo. Tenāha ^b^‘‘bhāveti magga’’^eb^nti. Ariyaphalaṃyeva ^b^dhammasāro^eb^. Kilesā khīyanti etthāti kilesakkhayo, nibbānaṃ, tasmiṃ ^b^kilesakkhaye rato^eb^.

[03]^b^1040^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ariyānaṃ ^a^M2.0537^ea^ buddhānaṃ dhanantipi ariyadhanaṃ, nibbānanti keci. Anayatopi visuddhaṭṭhena ariyañca taṃ dhanañca dhanāyitaṭṭhenāti ariyadhanaṃ, tena ^b^ariyadhanena. Teneva bhogenā^eb^ti ariyadhanabhogena.
[06]Sagāthakapuññābhisandavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1048^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Samodhānetvā^eb^ti yehi indriyādīhi bhāviyamānehi sotāpattimaggo anuppatto, tāneva. Dhammasamānatāya cetaṃ vuttaṃ. Aññāneva hi atthato taṃ taṃ maggaṃ sādhakāni indriyādīni. ^b^Tanti paveṇī kathitā^eb^ti yaṃ kañci vineyyapuggalaṃ anapekkhitvā kevalaṃ tantivasena ṭhiti kathitā.

[03]^b^1049^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sattasu janesū^eb^ti sattasu kittiyamānesu upāsakajanesu. ^b^Gambhīrā^eb^tiādīsu ^b^dhammagambhīrā^eb^ti pāḷigatiyā gambhīrā, tathā ca ^b^sallasuttaṃ^eb^ heṭṭhā pakāsitameva. ^b^‘‘Cetanāhaṃ, bhikkhave, kammaṃ vadāmī’’^eb^tiādinā (a. ni. 6.63; kathā. 539) āgataṃ ^b^cetanāsuttaṃ^eb^^a^V2.0239^ea^. Tattha ‘‘cetanāsahajātaṃ nānākkhaṇika’’ntiādinā paṭṭhāne āgatanayena, suttesu (a. ni. 3.101) ca ‘‘diṭṭhadhammavedanīya’’ntiādinā āgatanayena gambhīrabhāvo veditabbo, nibbānassa ceva ariyamaggassa ca pakāsanato ^b^asaṅkhatasaṃyuttassa^eb^ lokuttaratthadīpakatā. ‘‘Atītaṃpāhaṃ rūpena khajjiṃ, etarahi khajjāmī’’tiādinā pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ khādakabhāvassa, puggalassa khāditabbatāya vibhāvanena ^b^khajjanīyapariyāye^eb^ (saṃ. ni. 3.79) visesato nissattanijjīvatā dīpitāti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sattasuññatādīpakā khajjanikasuttantādayo’’^eb^ti. ^b^Upasampajja viharissāmā^eb^ti ye tesu suttesu vuttapaṭipadaṃ sammadeva paripūrenti, te tesu upasampajja viharanti nāma ^a^M2.0538^ea^. ^b^Etthā^eb^ti ‘‘na kho neta’’nti ettha na-kāro ‘‘aññamañña’’nti ettha ma-kāro viya byañjanasandhimattameva, nāssa koci attho.

[03]^b^1050^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Na kho paneta^eb^nti na kho etaṃ, noti ca amhehīti atthoti āha ^b^‘‘na kho amhehī’’^eb^tiādi. Assasantīti ^b^assāsanīyā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘assāsakarehī’’^eb^ti. Marissatīti ^b^māriso,^eb^ ekantabhāvimaraṇo, so pana maraṇādhīnavuttikoti vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘maraṇapaṭibaddho’’^eb^ti. ^b^Adhimuccehī^eb^ti adhimuttiṃ uppādehi. Taṃ pana tathā cittassa paṇidhānaṃ ṭhapananti āha ^b^‘‘ṭhapehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Āgamanīyaguṇesū^eb^ti pubbabhāgaguṇesu. ^b^Pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi^eb^ anantāparimāṇattā. ^b^Nānākaraṇaṃ natthi^eb^ vimuttiyā ninnānattā.
[03]^b^1055^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paññāpaṭilābhāyā^eb^ti maggaphalapaññāya paṭilābhatthaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘satta sekkhā’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Sappaññavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1058^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mahante^eb^^a^V2.0240^ea^^b^atthe pariggaṇhātī^eb^ti saccapaṭiccasamuppādādike mahāvitthāre atthe paricchijja asesetvā muṭṭhigate viya katvā gaṇhāti. Sesaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
[06]Mahāpaññavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sotāpattisaṃyuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1071^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Cittekaggatāyā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0539^ea^^a^V2.0241^ea^ nissakkavacanaṃ ‘‘parihāyantī’’ti padaṃ apekkhitvā. ^b^Yathābhūtādivasenā^eb^ti yathāgatādivasena. Yathābhūtaṃ nāma imasmiṃ sutte ‘‘samāhito, bhikkhave, bhikkhu yathābhūtaṃ pajānātī’’tiādi. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena ‘‘tathā yasmā’’tiādisaṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tathā hi yathābhūtavasena kāraṇacchedo kato ‘‘tathā yasmā’’tiādivacanehi. ^b^Vaṇṇā^eb^ti akkharā, ‘‘guṇā’’ti keci. ^b^Padabyañjanānī^eb^ti nāmādipadāni ceva taṃsamudāyabhūtabyañjanāni ca.

[03]^b^1073-75^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sāsanāvacarā adhippetā^eb^ bāhirakānaṃ saccābhisamayassa abhāvato. ^b^Tathā^eb^ti iminā catutthapañcamesu atthavisesābhāvaṃ dasseti. Yadi evaṃ kasmā visuṃ visuṃ desanāti āha ^b^‘‘tena tena abhilāpenā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]^b^1080^eb^^b^.^eb^ Duggatito saṃsārato ca niyyāti etenāti niyyānaṃ, saggamaggo mokkhamaggo ca. Tasmiṃ niyyāne niyuttā, taṃ ettha atthīti ^b^niyyānikā^eb^. Vacīduccaritasaṃkilesato vā niyyātīti ī-kārassa rassattaṃ ya-kārassa ka-kāraṃ katvā niyyānikā. Cetanāya saddhiṃ samphappalāpā veramaṇi. Tappaṭipakkhato aniyyānikā, tassa bhāvo ^b^aniyyānikattaṃ. Tiracchānabhūta^eb^nti tirokaraṇabhūtaṃ. ^b^Kammaṭṭhānabhāve^eb^ti aniccatāpaṭisaṃyuttacatusaccakammaṭṭhānabhāve. ^b^Sātthaka^eb^nti dānasīlādinissitattā hitapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Visikhā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0242^ea^ gharasanniveso. Visikhāgahaṇena ca gāmādigahaṇe viya tannivāsino visesato gahitā ‘‘āgato gāmo’’tiādīsu viya ^a^M2.0540^ea^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘sūrā samatthā’’^eb^ti. Kumbhaṭṭhānāpadesena kumbhadāsiyo vuttāti āha – ^b^‘‘kumbhadāsikathā’’^eb^ti. Ayāthāvato uppattiṭṭhitisaṃhārādivasena loko akkhāyati etenāti ^b^lokakkhāyikā^eb^. Iti iminā pakārena bhavo, iminā abhavoti evaṃ pavattāya ^b^itibhavābhavakathāya saddhiṃ^eb^.
[06]Samādhivaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1081^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^‘‘Isīnaṃ patanuppatanavasena^eb^ osīdanauppatanaṭṭhānavasena ^b^evaṃ^eb^ ‘isipatana’nti ^b^‘laddhanāme’^eb^ti saṅkhepato vuttamatthaṃ vivarituṃ ^b^‘ettha hī’’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^Āmantesī^eb^ti ettha yasmā dhammacakkappavattanatthaṃ ayaṃ āmantanā, tasmā samudāgamato paṭṭhāya satthu pubbacaritaṃ saṅkhepeneva pakāsetuṃ vaṭṭatīti ^b^‘‘dīpaṅkarapādamūle katābhinīhārato paṭṭhāyā’’^eb^tiādi āraddhaṃ. Tattha ^b^mārabalaṃ bhinditvā^eb^ti mārañca mārabalañca bhañjitvā. Atha vā mārassa abbhantaraṃ bāhirañcāti duvidhaṃ balaṃ bhañjitvā. ^b^‘‘Dveme, bhikkhave, antā’’^eb^ti ettha ^b^anta^eb^-saddo ‘‘pubbante ñāṇaṃ aparante ñāṇa’’ntiādīsu (dha. sa. 1063) viya bhāgapariyāyoti āha ^b^‘‘dve ime, bhikkhave, koṭṭhāsā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Saha samudāhārenā^eb^ti uccāraṇasamakālaṃ. ^b^Pattharitvā aṭṭhāsi^eb^ buddhānubhāvena. ^b^Brahmāno samāgacchiṃsu^eb^ paripakkakusalamūlā saccābhisambodhāya katādhikārā.

[03]^b^Gihisaññojana^eb^nti gihibandhanaṃ. ^b^Chinditvā^eb^ti haritvā. ^b^Na vaḷañjetabbā^eb^ti nānuyuñjetabbā. ^b^Kilesakāmasukhassā^eb^ti kilesakāmayuttassa sukhassa. ^b^Anuyogo^eb^ti anubhavo. Gāmavāsīhi sevitabbattā ^b^gāmavāsīnaṃ santako. Attano^eb^ti attabhāvassa. Āhito ahaṃmāno etthāti ^b^attā,^eb^ attabhāvo. ^b^Dukkhakaraṇa^eb^nti dukkhuppādanaṃ. ^b^Attamāraṇehī^eb^ti ^a^M2.0541^ea^ attabādhanehi. ^b^Upasamāyā^eb^ti ^a^V2.0243^ea^ kilesavūpasamo adhippeto, tadatthasampadānavacananti āha ^b^‘‘kilesūpasamatthāyā’’^eb^ti. Esa nayo sesesupi.

[03]Saccañāṇādivasena tayo parivaṭṭā etassāti ^b^tiparivaṭṭaṃ,^eb^ ñāṇadassanaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘saccañāṇā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Yathābhūtaṃ ñāṇa^eb^nti paṭivedhañāṇaṃ āha. ^b^Tesuyeva^eb^ saccesu. Ñāṇena kattabbassa ca pariññāpaṭivedhādikiccassa ca ^b^jānanañāṇaṃ,^eb^ ‘‘tañca kho paṭivedhato pagevā’’ti keci. Pacchāti apare. Tathā ^b^katañāṇaṃ. Dvādasākāra^eb^nti dvādasavidhāakārabhedaṃ. ^b^Aññatthā^eb^ti aññesu suttesu.

[03]^b^Paṭivedhañāṇampi desanāñāṇampi dhammacakka^eb^nti idaṃ tattha ñāṇakiccaṃ padhānanti katvā vuttaṃ. Saddhindriyādidhammasamudāyo pana pavattanaṭṭhena cakkanti ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Atha vā cakkanti āṇā, dhammato anapetattā dhammañca taṃ cakkañca, dhammena ñāyena cakkantipi ^b^dhammacakkaṃ^eb^. Yathāha ‘‘dhammañca pavatteti cakkañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, cakkañca pavatteti dhammañcāti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammena pavattatīti dhammacakkaṃ, dhammacariyāya pavattatīti dhammacakka’’ntiādi (paṭi. ma. 2.40-41). ^b^Ubhayampī^eb^ti paṭivedhañāṇaṃ desanāñāṇanti ubhayampi. ^b^Eta^eb^nti tadubhayaṃ. ^b^Imāya desanāyā^eb^ti iminā suttena ^b^pakāsentena bhagavatā^eb^ yathāvuttañāṇadvayasaṅkhātaṃ ^b^dhammacakkaṃ pavattitaṃ nāma^eb^ pavattanakiccassa aniṭṭhitattā. ^b^Patiṭṭhite^eb^ti aññāsi koṇḍaññattherena sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhite. ^b^Pavattitaṃ^eb^ nāma kassapasammāsambuddhassa sāsanantaradhānato paṭṭhāya yāva buddhuppādo, ettakaṃ kālaṃ appavattapubbassa pavattitattā, uparimaggādhigamo panassa atthaṅgato evāti.

[03]^b^Ekappahārenā^eb^ti ekeneva pahārasaññitena kālena. Divasassa hi tatiyo bhāgo pahāro nāma. Pāḷiyaṃ pana ‘‘tena khaṇena tena layena tena muhuttenā’’ti vuttaṃ. Taṃ pahārakkhaṇasallakkhaṇameva. ^b^Sabbaññutaññāṇobhāso^eb^ti sabbaññutaññāṇānubhāvena pavatto obhāso cittaṃ paṭicca utusamuṭṭhāno veditabbo. Yasmā bhagavato dhammacakkappavattanassa ārambhe viya parisamāpane ativiya uḷāratamaṃ pītisomanassaṃ udapādi, tasmā ^b^‘‘imassapi udānassā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^1089^eb^^b^.^eb^ Atthasaṃvaṇṇane ^a^M2.0542^ea^ vaṇṇīyanteti ^b^vaṇṇā^eb^. Teyeva pariyāyena akkharaṇato ^b^akkharāni^eb^^a^V2.0244^ea^. Atthaṃ byañjentīti ^b^byañjanāni^eb^. Yasmā pana akārādike sarasamaññā, kakārādike byañjanasamaññā, ubhayattha vaṇṇasamaññā, tasmā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘vaṇṇānaṃ vā ekadesā yadidaṃ byañjanā nāmā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Nettiyaṃ^eb^ pana vākye byañjanasamaññā. Byañjanaggahaṇeneva cettha ākāraniruttiniddesā gahitā evāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. ^b^Saṅkāsanā^eb^ti atthassa ñāpanā bhāgaso. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vibhattiyo’’^eb^ti. Saṅkāsanaggahaṇeneva cettha pakāsanā vuttā hoti. Vibhattiyo hi atthavacaneneva vivaranti, tāhi kāraṇapaññattiyo vuttāyevāti, tāhipi atthapadāni gahitāneva honti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthāro pana ^b^visuddhimaggavaṇṇanāyaṃ nettiaṭṭhakathāyañca^eb^ vuttanayena veditabbo. ^b^Sabbākārenā^eb^ti sabhāgādivibhāvanākārena. ^b^Vaṇṇādīna^eb^nti tasmiṃ pana vitthāre pavattavaṇṇādīnaṃ. ^b^Tasmā^eb^ti vaṇṇādīnaṃ antābhāvato. ^b^Evamāhā^eb^ti ‘‘aparimāṇā vaṇṇā byañjanā saṅkāsanā’’ti evamāha.

[03]^b^1090^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Sabhāvāvijahanaṭṭhenā^eb^ti attano dukkhasabhāvassa kadācipi apariccajanena tathasabhāvaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘dukkhañhi dukkhameva vutta’’^eb^nti. ^b^Sabhāvassā^eb^ti dukkhasabhāvassa. ^b^Amoghatāyā^eb^ti avañjhatāya. ^b^Avitatha^eb^nti na vitathaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hi dukkhaṃ adukkhaṃ nāma hotī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Aññabhāvānupagamenā^eb^ti samudayādisabhāvānupagamanena musā na hotīti añño aññathā na hotīti ^b^anaññathaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[06]Dhammacakkappavattanavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^1091^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ananubodhā^eb^ti ^a^M2.0543^ea^ paṭivedhassa anurūpabodhābhāvena. ^b^Appaṭivedhā^eb^ti saccānaṃ paṭimukhaṃ vedhābhāvena.
[03]^b^1092^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Phalasamādhiphalapaññāna^eb^nti ^a^V2.0245^ea^ aggaphalasamādhiaggaphalapaññānaṃ.
[03]^b^1097^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ariyāna^eb^nti buddhānaṃ ariyānaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na hī’’^eb^tiādi.
[03]^b^1098^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Paṭividdhattā desitattā cā^eb^ti iminā paṭivedhañāṇena desanāñāṇena ca pariggahitattā ^b^ariyasantakāni honti^eb^ ariyassa bhagavato santakabhāvato.
[03]^b^1100^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ekappaṭivedho^eb^ti ekeneva ñāṇena catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ ekajjhaṃ paṭivedho.
[06]Koṭigāmavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^1101^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Punappunaṃ vaṭṭasmiṃyeva nibbattanti^eb^ adiṭṭhattā catunnaṃ ariyasaccānaṃ.
[03]^b^1105^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Bhaveyya^eb^^a^M2.0544^ea^^b^ce^eb^ti dukkhadomanassāni ajjhupekkhitvā sahitehi tehi saccābhisamayo bhaveyyāti evaṃ parikappanā na kātabbāti.

[03]^b^1109^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Ajjhāsaya^eb^nti ^a^V2.0246^ea^ sassatādibhedaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ. So hi ‘‘idameva saccaṃ moghamañña’’nti gāhassa mukhabhūtattā ^b^mukhanti adhippeto^eb^. Tañca apare adiṭṭhasaccā olokenti, diṭṭhasaccā pana neva olokenti.
[03]^b^1110^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Kukkuko^eb^ pamāṇamajjhimassa purisassa hatthoti attho. ^b^Kukkū^eb^ti tasseva nāmaṃ.
[06]Sīsapāvanavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^1111^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Lokacinta^eb^nti lokasannivesapaṭisaṃyuttavīmaṃsāva. ‘‘Lokacitta’’ntipi pāṭho, taṃtaṃlokapariyāpannaṃ cittanti attho. ^b^Nāḷikerādayo^eb^ti ^b^ādi^eb^-saddena avuttānaṃ osadhitiṇavanappatiādīnaṃ saṅgaho. ^b^Evarūpa^eb^nti edisaṃ aññampi taṃtaṃlokacittaṃ.

[03]^b^Vigatacitto^eb^ti attatthaparatthato apagatavitakko addasa evaṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsūti sambandho. ^b^Sambarimāya^eb^nti sambarena asurindena uppāditaṃ asuramāyaṃ, yaṃ ‘‘indajāla’’ntipi vuccati indassa mohanatthaṃ uppāditattā. ^b^Samparivattetvā^eb^ti paridhāvetvā. ^b^Yathā ne^eb^ti ne asure yathā so puriso passati, evaṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsu. Kasmā panete evaṃ adhiṭṭhahiṃsūti? Taṃ purisaṃ tattha tathānisinnaṃ disvā ‘‘ayañca devo’’ti āsaṅkantā tathā adhiṭṭhahitvā bhisamuḷālachiddehi pavisitvā attano asurabhavanaṃ gatā. Tenāha bhagavā – ^b^‘‘devānaṃyeva mohayamānā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^1112-3^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Mariyādapāsāṇo^eb^ti ^a^V2.0247^ea^^a^M2.0545^ea^ gijjhakūṭapabbatassa mariyādapākārasadiso mahanto pāsāṇo. ^b^Aniṭṭharūpa^eb^nti ettha ^b^rūpa^eb^-saddo sabhāvattho ‘‘piyarūpe sātarūpe’’tiādīsu (ma. ni. 1.408-409) viyāti āha – ^b^‘‘aniṭṭhasabhāva’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^1115^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Upāsana^eb^nti ācariyaupāsanaṃ, ācariyaṃ antevāsinā vā divase divase sikkhanavasena upāsitabbato upāsananti laddhanāmaṃ ^b^kaṇḍakhipanasippaṃ. Kaṇḍaṃ atikkamante^eb^ti saraṃ khipante. ^b^Poṅkhānupoṅkha^eb^nti poṅkhasaddatthaṃ pākaṭaṃ katvā dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ekaṃ kaṇḍaṃ khipitvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. ^b^Aparaṃ anupoṅkha^eb^nti ettha ^b^apara^eb^nti tatiyakaṇḍaṃ. Anupoṅkhaṃ nāma idanti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘anupoṅkhaṃ nāma dutiyassa poṅkha’’^eb^nti vuttaṃ. Tañhi tatiyena sarena vijjhīyati. ^b^Puna aparaṃ tassa poṅkha^eb^nti idaṃ pana aparāparaṃ avirajjhanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. ^b^Durabhisambhavatara^eb^nti abhibhavituṃ asakkuṇeyyataraṃ. ^b^Vāla^eb^nti kesaṃ. ^b^Sattadhā bhinditvā^eb^ti sattakkhattuṃ viphāletvā. ^b^Tassa ekaṃ bheda^eb^nti tassa kesassa ekaṃ aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ bhedaṃ gahetvā. ^b^Vātiṅgaṇamajjhe bandhitvā^eb^ti vātiṅgaṇaphalassa majjhaṭṭhāne bandhitvā. ^b^Aparaṃ bheda^eb^nti aparaṃ kesassa aṃsusaṅkhātaṃ bhedaṃ. ^b^Aggakoṭiyaṃ bandhitvā^eb^ti yathā tassa vālabhedassa ūkāmattaṃ likhāmattaṃ vā kaṇḍassa aggakoṭiṃ adhikaṃ hutvā tiṭṭhati, evaṃ bandhitvā. ^b^Usabhamatte^eb^ti vīsatiyaṭṭhimatte ṭhāne ^b^ṭhito. Kaṇḍabaddhāya koṭiyā^eb^ti kaṇḍabaddhāya vālassa koṭiyā vātiṅgaṇabandhanavālassa koṭiṃ paṭivijjheyya.

[03]^b^1118^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Adhiccuppattika^eb^nti yadicchāvasena uppajjanakaṃ. ^b^Chiggaḷenā^eb^ti chiggaḷapadesena. ^b^Chiggaḷuparī^eb^ti heṭṭhimayugassa chiggaḷapadesassa upari. ^b^Āruḷhassa chiggaḷenā^eb^ti ubhinnampi chiddena. ^b^Gīvappavesanaṃ viyā^eb^ti catunnaṃ yugānaṃ chiddapadeseneva uparūpari ṭhitānaṃ chiddantarena kāṇakacchapassa gīvappavesanaṃ ^a^M2.0546^ea^ adhiccatarasambhavaṃ. Tatopi adhiccatarasambhavo manussattalābho, tato adhiccatamasambhavo ariyamaggapaṭilābhoti dassento āha ^b^‘‘catusaccapaṭivedho ativiya adhiccatarasambhavo’’^eb^ti.
[06]Papātavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[03]^b^1121^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Abhisamayasaṃyutte^eb^^a^V2.0248^ea^^b^vitthāritova,^eb^ tasmā tattha vuttanayeneva tassa attho veditabbo.
[03]^b^1133^eb^^b^.^eb^ Lokiyampi visuddhatthena ‘‘ariya’’nti vattabbataṃ labhatīti ^b^‘‘lokiyalokuttarenā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ.

[03]^b^1134^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Piṭṭhasurā^eb^ti piṭṭhena kātabbasurā, tathā ^b^odanasurā pūvasurā,^eb^ majjarasādibhūte kiṇṇe pakkhipitvā kattabbā surā ^b^kiṇṇapakkhittasurā. Sambhārasaṃyuttā^eb^ti mūlabhesajjasambhārehi saṃyuttā. ^b^Pupphāsavo^eb^ti nāḷikerapupphādito assavanakāasavo. Muddikaphalādito assavanakāasavo ^b^phalāsavo. Itī^eb^tiādiattho. Tena madhvāsavaguḷāsavasambhārasaṃyutte saṅgaṇhāti. ^b^Surāsavavinimutta^eb^nti yathāvuttasurāsavavinimuttaṃ.
[03]^b^1140^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Nīcavuttino^eb^ti kule jeṭṭhānaṃ mahāpitucūḷapitujeṭṭhabhātikādīnaṃ abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānāñjalikammasāmīcikammādivasena nīcavuttino.

[03]^b^1148^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Mūlabīja’’ntiādīsu ^a^V2.0249^ea^^a^M2.0547^ea^ mūlameva bījanti ^b^mūlabījaṃ,^eb^ mūlabījaṃ etassātipi ^b^mūlabījaṃ^eb^. Tattha purimena bījagāmo vutto ‘‘bījānaṃ samūho’’ti katvā, dutiyena bhūtagāmo. Duvidhopeso sāmaññaniddesena, ‘‘mūlabījañca mūlabījañca mūlabīja’’nti ekasesanayena vā bījattho veditabbo. Esa nayo sesesupi. ^b^Phaḷubīja^eb^nti pabbabījaṃ. Bāhirapaccayantarasamavāye sadisaphaluppattiyā visesakāraṇabhāvato viruhanasamatthe sāraphale niruḷho bīja-saddo. Tadatthasiddhiyā mūlādīsupi kesuci pavattatīti tato nivattanatthaṃ ekena bīja-saddena visesetvā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘bījabīja’’^eb^nti ‘‘rūparūpaṃ, dukkhadukkha’’nti (saṃ. ni. 4.327) ca yathā. ^b^Nīlatiṇarukkhādikassā^eb^ti allatiṇassa ceva allarukkhādikassa ca. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena osadhigacchalatādīnaṃ gahaṇaṃ.
[03]^b^1149^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aruṇuggamanato paṭṭhāya yāva majjhanhiko, ayaṃ buddhādiariyānaṃ āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo bhojanassa kālo, tadañño vikāloti āha – ^b^‘‘vikālabhojanāti kālātikkantabhojanā’’^eb^ti.
[03]^b^1150^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Yaṃ kiñci puppha^eb^nti ganthimaṃ aganthimaṃ vā yaṃ kiñci pupphajātaṃ, tathā pisitādibhedaṃ ^b^yaṃ kiñci gandhajātaṃ.^eb^

[03]^b^1151^eb^^b^.^eb^ Saṅkhepato ^a^V2.0250^ea^ ‘‘sabbapāpassa akaraṇa’’ntiādinayappavattaṃ (dīṇi. 2.90; dha.pa. 183) bhagavato sāsanaṃ accantachandarāgapavattito naccādīnaṃ dassanaṃ na anulometīti āha ^b^‘‘sāsanassa ananulomattā’’^eb^ti. Attanā parehi ca payojiyamānaṃ ^a^M2.0548^ea^ payojāpiyamānañca eteneva nacca-saddena gahitaṃ, tathā gītavāditasaddehi cāti āha – ^b^‘‘naccananaccāpanādivasenā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena gāyana-gāyāpana-vādana-vādāpanādīni saṅgaṇhāti. Dassanena cettha savanampi saṅgahitaṃ virūpekasesanayena. Yathāsakaṃ visayassa ālocanasabhāvatāya vā pañcannaṃ viññāṇānaṃ savanakiriyāyapi dassanasaṅkhepasabbhāvato ^b^‘‘dassanā’’^eb^icceva vuttaṃ. Avisūkabhūtassa gītassa savanaṃ kadāci vaṭṭatīti āha – ^b^‘‘visūkabhūtā dassanā cā’’^eb^ti. Tathā hi vuttaṃ ^b^paramatthajotikāya khuddakāṭṭhakathāya^eb^ (khu. pā. aṭṭha. 2.pacchimapañcasikkhāpadavaṇṇanā) – ‘‘dhammūpasaṃhitaṃ gītaṃ vaṭṭati, gītūpasaṃhito dhammo na vaṭṭatī’’ti.

[03]^b^1152^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Uccā^eb^ti ucca-saddena samānatthaṃ ekaṃ saddantaraṃ. Seti etthāti ^b^sayanaṃ,^eb^ uccāsayanaṃ mahāsayanañca samaṇasārupparahitaṃ paṭikkhittanti āha – ^b^‘‘pamāṇātikkantaṃ akappiyattharaṇa’’^eb^nti. Āsandādiāsanañcettha sayaneneva saṅgahitaṃ. Yasmā pana ādhāre paṭikkhitte tadādhārakiriyā paṭikkhittāva hoti, tasmā ‘‘uccāsayanamahāsayanā’’icceva vuttaṃ. Atthato pana tadupabhogabhūtanisajjānipajjanehi virati dassitāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Atha vā uccāsayanamahāsayanañca uccāsayanamahāsayanañcāti ^b^uccāsayanamahāsayana^eb^nti etasmiṃ atthe ekasesanayena ayaṃ niddeso kato yathā – ‘‘nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatana’’nti (udā. 1). Āsanakiriyāpubbakattā vā sayanakiriyāya sayanaggahaṇeneva āsanampi gahitanti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^1153^eb^^b^.^eb^ Aññepi uggahāpane upanikkhittasādiyane ca paṭiggahaṇattho labbhatīti āha ^a^V2.0251^ea^ – ^b^‘‘na uggaṇhāpenti, na upanikkhittaṃ sādiyantī’’^eb^ti. Atha vā tividhaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ kāyena vācāya manasāti. Tattha kāyena paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^uggahaṇaṃ,^eb^ vācāya paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^uggahāpaṇaṃ,^eb^ manasā paṭiggahaṇaṃ ^b^sādiyanaṃ^eb^. Tividhampi paṭiggahaṇaṃ sāmaññaniddesena, ekasesanayena vā gahetvā ‘‘paṭiggahaṇā’’ti vuttanti āha – ^b^‘‘neva naṃ uggaṇhantī’’^eb^tiādi. Esa nayo ^b^‘‘āmakadhaññapaṭiggahaṇā’’^eb^tiādīsupi.
[03]^b^1154^eb^^b^.^eb^ Nīvārādiupadhaññassa ^a^M2.0549^ea^ sāliādimūladhaññantogadhattā vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘sattavidhassā’’^eb^ti.

[03]^b^1155^eb^^b^.^eb^ ‘‘Anujānāmi, bhikkhave, pañca vasāni bhesajjāni – acchavasaṃ, macchavasaṃ, susukāvasaṃ, sūkaravasaṃ, gadrabhavasa’’nti (mahāva. 262; pārā. aṭṭha. 623) vuttattā idaṃ uddissa anuññātaṃ nāma. Tassa pana ‘‘kāle paṭiggahita’’nti (mahāva. 262) vuttattā paṭiggahaṇaṃ vaṭṭatīti āha – ^b^‘‘aññatra uddissa anuññātā’’^eb^ti. Vinayavasena upaparikkhitabbo, tasmā samantapāsādikāya vinayaṭṭhakathāya vuttanayenettha vinicchayo veditabbo.

[03]^b^1162-63^eb^^b^.^eb^ Kassaci bhaṇḍassa gahaṇaṃ ^b^kayo,^eb^ dānaṃ ^b^vikkayo^eb^. ^b^Tattha tatthā^eb^ti gāmantare santike ca gamanaṃ dūtakammanti vuccatīti yojanā. ^b^Pahiṇagamanaṃ^eb^ khuddakagamanaṃ.

[03]^b^1164^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Rūpakūṭaṃ^eb^ sarūpena sadisena chalavohāro. ^b^Aṅgakūṭaṃ^eb^ attano hatthādinā aṅgānaṃ chalakaraṇaṃ ^a^V2.0252^ea^. ^b^Gahaṇakūṭaṃ^eb^ mānesu gahaṇavasena. ^b^Paṭicchannakūṭaṃ^eb^ ayacuṇṇādinā paṭicchannena chalakaraṇaṃ. ^b^Mahatiyā^eb^ tulāya. ^b^Pacchābhāge^eb^ti tulāya pacchimabhāge. ^b^Hatthenā^eb^ti hatthapadesena. ^b^Akkamatī^eb^ti uṭṭhātuṃ adento gaṇhāti. ^b^Dadanto pubbabhāge^eb^ti paresaṃ dadanto pubbabhāge hatthena tulaṃ akkamati. ^b^Ta^eb^nti ayacuṇṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Lohapātiyo^eb^ti tambalohapātiyo. ^b^Suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karontī^eb^ti asanikhādasuvaṇṇakanakalimpitā suvaṇṇavaṇṇā karonti. Mānabhājanassa ^a^M2.0550^ea^ hadayabhūtassa abbhantarassa bhinnaṃ ^b^hadayabhedo^eb^. Nimiyamānassa tilataṇḍulādikassa sikhāya aggakoṭiyā bhinnaṃ ^b^sikhābhedo^eb^. Khettādīnaṃ minanarajjuyā aññathākaraṇaṃ ^b^rajjubhedo^eb^. Rajjugahaṇeneva cettha daṇḍakassa gahaṇaṃ katamevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03]^b^1166-71^eb^^b^.^eb^^b^Vadho^eb^ti muṭṭhippahārakasātāḷanādīhi hiṃsanaṃ, viheṭhananti attho. Viheṭhanatthopi hi vadha-saddo dissati ‘‘atthānaṃ vadhitvā vadhitvā rodeyyā’’tiādīsu. Aṭṭhakathāyaṃ pana ‘‘māraṇa’’nti vuttaṃ, taṃ pana pothanaṃ sandhāyāti sakkā viññātuṃ māraṇasaddassa vihiṃsanepi dissanato. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva.
[06]Āmakadhaññapeyyālavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Sāratthappakāsiniyā saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Mahāvaggavaṇṇanāya līnatthappakāsanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]Sakalarūpārūpasammasane ^a^M2.0551^ea^ saṇhasukhumavisayañāṇatāya vipassanācāranipuṇabuddhīnaṃ susaṃyatakāyavacīsamācāratāya samathavipassanāsu sammadeva yatanato ca ^b^yatīnaṃ^eb^ bhikkhūnaṃ khandhāyatanadhātusaccindriyapaṭiccasamuppādabhede paramatthadhamme nānānayehi ñāṇavibhāgassa sannissayena ^b^bahukārassa^eb^ saṃyuttāgamavarassa atthasaṃvaṇṇanaṃ kātuṃ sāratthappakāsanato eva ^b^nipuṇā^eb^ yā mayā aṭṭhakathā āraddhāti sambandho. Savisesaṃ paññāvahaguṇattā eva hissa ganthārambhe āditopi ‘‘paññāpabhedajananassā’’ti ^a^V2.0253^ea^ vuttaṃ. ^b^Mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāra^eb^nti saṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ. ^b^Ekūnasaṭṭhimatto^eb^ti thokaṃ ūnabhāvato ^b^matta^eb^-saddaggahaṇaṃ.

[03]^b^Mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāra^eb^nti pubbe vuttasaṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva puna nigamanavasena vuttanti. Atha vā ^b^mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāra^eb^nti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ. Tena etaṃ dasseti ‘‘saṃyuttamahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ sāratthappakāsiniṃ karontena sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya akāsi’’nti. ‘‘Mahāvihārādhivāsīna’’nti ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ ‘‘mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ samayaṃ pakāsayantiṃ mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ ādāyā’’ti ca. ^b^Tena^eb^ puññena. ^b^Hotu sabbo sukhī loko^eb^ti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampayuttena nibbānasukhena sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
[06]Ettāvatā sāratthappakāsiniyā
[06]Saṃyuttanikāya-aṭṭhakathāya līnatthappakāsanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Saṃyuttaṭīkā samattā.
